alt_title: 무한의 마법사, Infinite Wizard, El Mago infinito
description:
This is the tale of a boy dreaming about infinity as a human!

Found abandoned in a stable, Shirone is the son of a hunter—and a peasant through and through.
Despite hardships, he's a genius that manages to learn to read by himself and becomes obsessed with it.

Brimming with genius talent, he goes to the city with his father, where he learns about magic—
beginning his journey as an explosive rising star!

description:
Ikumi is a high school girl whose hobby is making stuffed toys. When she is rescued by Ayato, an elite student at her school, she decides to give him a handmade stuffed animal as a thank-you, but she witnesses him secretly throwing it away in the shadows. Then the "curse" of the stuffed animal is activated, and Ayato is turned into a doll...

---

One day, Hino, a celebrity at school who quit basketball because of an injury, asks her, "Do you know any good ways to pass the time?" Hino asks her if she knows of any good ways to pass the time, and they end up studying together. Itsuki then gradually becomes aware of Hino. A pure love story of a medical student begins!

The series follows the antics of a five year-old boy Shinnosuke Nohara, his parents, neighbours, and friends. This story is set in Kasukabe, Saitama Prefecture, Japan. The manga is called "Crayon Shin-chan" because "crayon" signifies the fact that it is a tool commonly used by kindergartners and that Shin-chan goes to kindergarten. "Shin-chan" is the affectionate name for the main character.

title: Shinmai Shimai no Futari Gohan
alt_title: 新米姉妹のふたりごはん, New Sisters, Eating Together, 新手姊妹的雙人餐桌, 新手姐妹的双人餐桌, 百合姐妹的自炊双人餐
description:
"But suddenly, I had a little sister. That was the problem."

After her father's remarriage, Sachi suddenly has a new stepsister, Ayari. 
At first, their interactions are awkward and very brief. 
However, they soon discover a shared love… of food?

Sachi eventually discovers Ayari's passion for cooking, and the two step-sisters soon begin to bond over Ayari's delicious cooking, 
starting to overcome the barriers that had once kept them apart. 
While their parents are away on their honeymoon, they learn to cope with their differences and bond over a seemingly insignificant thing.
genre: Comedy, Slice of Life, Cooking

title: An Introvert's Hookup Hiccups: This Gyaru Is Head Over Heels for Me!
alt_title: 陰キャの僕に罰ゲームで告白してきたはずのギャルが、どう見ても僕にベタ惚れです, 因懲罰遊戲才向陰角的我告白的辣妹，怎麼看都已經完全迷戀上我了, The Gal Who Was Meant to Confess to Me as a Punishment Game Has Apparently Fallen in Love with Me, 아싸인 내게 벌칙 게임으로 고백해 온 갸루가 아무리 봐도 나한테 반한 것 같다, Девушка, которая должна была признаться мне в качестве игрового наказания, очевидно, влюбилась в меня
description:
When the gorgeous Nanami Barato confesses to Yoshin Misumai, it seems too good to be true! Only, it is—and Yoshin knows it. How’s an introverted guy like him supposed to keep his cool when he knows this is all just a dare? Even more puzzling, despite her gaudy appearance, this supposed gyaru isn’t actually all that good with guys! Perhaps this is the perfect chance for this shy guy to pluck up his own courage and say yes to the guy-shy girl. So begins their new cushy life of morning meet-ups and handmade lunches. The thing is, judging by the way she’s acting, Nanami has fallen head over heels for him! From dares and dating to downright disasters, can these two first-timers figure out their feelings and maybe even fall in love—for real, this time?!

---

title: Reaper of the Drifting Moon
alt_title: 사신표월, Sasinpyowol, The Reaper, Death God of the Drifting Moon, Grim Reaper's Floating Moon, Жнец дрейфующей Луны, 死神漂月〜暗闇からの刺客〜, 死神漂月, El Asesino de la Luna a la Deriva
description:
He’s in the deepest part of the Jianghu. Keep your eyes wide open if you do not wish to get dragged into the abyss.

Kidnapped children raised 7 years in darkness for a single assassination mission that goes awry.

---
Pyo Wol was an orphan who wandered around the continent until he bumped into a mysterious man and lost consciousness. When he wakes up, he finds himself in a dark, confined space with only one iron door for an exit. Wol survives the next several grueling months, trying to keep a cool head and stay in shape. When the iron door finally opens, he discovers he's not the only one in this miserable situation. A group of masked people has kidnapped 300 children to train them into human weapons. Wol must fight and kill the others, for only a handful of the strongest will be selected. Will Wol be able to become one of the chosen and find a way to free himself from his captors?

---

alt_title: あの子にナイショのVTUBER, That Girl Is Secretly A VTUBER !
description:
High school student Warabi has a secret that she's been keeping from her childhood friend, Shuu. While she's active as a popular virtual idol, Shuu, who has no idea about her secret identity, is actually in love with her...!

Witness the heart-fluttering story of her secret V-Tuber activities and her romance with her childhood friend!
genre: Romance, Virtual Reality, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Aome Makito

title: Kinnikuman II Sei: Ultimate Chojin Tag Arc
alt_title: Ultimate Muscle 2: Ultimate Chojin Tag arc, キン肉マン2世: 究極の超人タッグ編
description: The sequel series to "Kinnikuman ii sei".     A new threat appears to defeat the Legends, known only as the 'Time Chojin'. These mysterious villains travel through time, in their quest to eradicate the Justice Chojin. If their plan succeeds, they will erase the New Generation from history and usher in a new era of evil domination over the humans.     The New Generation must travel through time to stop the Time Chojin.    In the process, they earn the distrust of the Legends. The ensuing conflict triggers the start of the 'Ultimate Chojin Tag Tournament', which will pit Legends against New Generation, and Justice Chojin vs Evil Chojin. The winners will determine the future of the planet as we know it and reign supreme over Earth.
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Survival, Sports, Superhero, Martial Arts, Gore, Drama, Aliens
author: Yudetamago

title: Apocalyptic Survival: I Can See Hidden Clues
alt_title: Surviving in the Apocalypse: I Can See Hidden Clues, 末世求生:我能看到隐藏提示, 종말론적 생존: 숨겨진 단서가 보인다
description: Upon awakening from slumber, it was discovered that billions of people had been transported to an apocalyptic era! Survival had become a shared goal of everyone, yet Zhang Chen could perceive concealed clues! While all were cautiously venturing into this unknown apocalyptic realm, Zhang Chen was already forging ahead…
genre: Action, Long Strip, Zombies, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Fanqie Manhua (番茄漫画)

title: Misaki-kun wa Kouryaku Chara Janai
alt_title: 三咲くんは攻略キャラじゃない, Misaki-kun is Unobtainable
description: Misaki-kun may be adorable, but he's just the 'best friend' type character you can find in any gal game. However, the protagonist, Kihara Hareta, isn't set on wooing any of the heroines; he has his eyes set on the Unobtainable Misaki-kun! Gender makes little difference in the face of such cuteness in this heart-stoppingly sweet comedy!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Video Games, Crossdressing, School Life
author: Natsuichi

title: Last Karte - Houjuuigakusha Touma Kenshou no Kioku
alt_title: Last Karte, ラストカルテ-法獣医学者 当麻健匠の記憶-
description: Kenshou Touma is a ordinary high schooler with worries and dreams about his future, just like everyone else. One day, he comes across a large number of crows in the park that have died an unnatural death. And while involved in that incident, a certain superpower manifests in him...
genre: Animals, Drama, Medical, School Life, Mystery
author: Asayama Wakabi

title: Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 1-bu 「Hon ga Nai nara Tsukureba Ii!」
alt_title: Ascendance of a Bookworm ~I'll do anything to become a librarian~ Part 1 「If there aren't any books, I'll just have to make some!」, Ascendance of a Bookworm: Part 1, Власть книжного червя, 本好きの下剋上 ～司書になるためには手段を選んでいられません～ 第一部 「本がないなら作ればいい！」
description:
A certain college girl who's loved books ever since she was a little girl dies in an accident and is reborn in another world she knows nothing about. She is now Myne, the sickly five-year-old daughter of a poor soldier. To make things worse, the world she's been reborn in has a very low literacy rate and books mostly don't exist. She'd have to pay an enormous amounts of money to buy one. Myne resolves herself: If there aren't any books, she'll just have to make them! Her goal is to become a librarian. This story begins with her quest to make books so she can live surrounded by them! Dive into this biblio-fantasy written for book lovers and bookworms!  
  
Adapted from [web novel (raw)](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4830bu/) / light novel of same name.
genre: Reincarnation, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Kazuki Miya

title: Kimi to Warui Koto ga Shitai
alt_title: I Wanna Do Bad Things with You, 君と悪いことがしたい, 想和你一起做壞事
description: Mamori Wataya is a tall but dark, plain, and shady high school girl. One day she meets Kanashi Fuji, who has a small, thin body and an evil-looking smile. A supporting character that no one can find and a villain that no one likes. This encounter turns their gray days blue.
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life
author: Yutaka (由田果)

title: Cat's Bride
alt_title: Cat's Prince Bride, Goyangiui Sinbu, La novia del principe gato, 猫王子的新娘, 고양이의 신부
description:
Kang Ha Ji was a lovable, friendly girl who fell victim of bullying by the school's most popular girl because of her childhood friend Hong Min-Joo. Then one rainy day after an attempt to save a black cat from jumping into the road. She fell through a dimension crack and was transported to Cat's Kingdom.  
"Did I found myself in a situation that's waaaay over my head because I met the Prince of this Kingdom?"  
  
Fantasy Romance manhwa of an adorable cat's Bride.
genre: Animals, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Daon Creative

title: Boushoku no Berserk: Ore Dake Level to Iu Gainen o Toppa Suru
alt_title: Berserk of Gluttony, Boushoku no Berserk: Ore Dake Level to Iu Gainen o Toppa Suru, Ненасытный Берсерк, 暴食のベルセルク～俺だけレベルという概念を突破する～ THE COMIC, 狂怒的暴食 ～僅自己突破了等級這概念～, 狂怒的暴食 ～只有我突破了等级这概念～, 폭식의 버서크, 폭식의 베르세르크 ~나만 레벨이라는 개념을 돌파한다~, Berserk of Gluttony: The One that Exceeds the Concept of Levels
description: In this world, there are two types of people. Those Who have powerful "skills", and those who don't. People born with powerful skills, exterminate monsters to level up and become successful, while people without them, become failures, who are treated harshly by society. Follow the story of Fate, a guy who works as a gatekeeper, and whose only skill is gluttony, a skill that only makes him hungry.
genre: Action, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: Isshiki Ichika

title: Corridor of Mirs
alt_title: Kami no Kairou, Mir's Cloister, 神の回廊, 미르의 회랑, Mire's Corridor
description:
One day, a girl woke up from a near car accident, and her name was Baek Nabi. After her chance encounter with a beautiful man, who saved her from the accident, Nabi starts to see things she has never seen before. Creatures who live off from human’s negative emotions are called ‘parasites’ . Nabi’s once normal life has overturned and becomes intertwined with several men all at the same time… “You’re a special existence. You just haven’t remembered yet.” A fantasy romance of Nabi and the mysterious beings around her.  


---

Official English translation by Comico's [Pocket Comics](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/208)
genre: Monsters, Long Strip, Romance, Reverse Harem, Magic, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: NOK

alt_title: Dart People, Клинки Хранителей, ヒョウ人 -BLADES OF THE GUARDIANS-, 镖人
description: Escort refers to paid warriors. Their targets of protection are also referred to targets as they are wanted by the government. On the eve of civil chaos during the last years of Sui dynasty, with the rise of a reign of terror around the country, various peoples' feelings of grudge and animosity develop.
genre: Historical, Action, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Drama, Tragedy
author: Xu Xian Zhe

title: Souzai Saishuka no Isekai Ryokouki
alt_title: A Gatherer's Adventure in Isekai, 素材採取家の異世界旅行記, 素材采取家的异世界旅行记, 素材採取家的異世界旅行記, Путешествие по миру коллекционера материалов, 소재채취가의 이세계 여행기, The Otherworldly Travels of a Material Collector
description: Takeru Kamishiro is an ordinary middle aged salaryman who was chosen by god to be reincarnated into a fantasy world in the body of a handsome young man in his prime. Takeru sets out to learn more about the world while gathering rare and interesting materials along the way to sell for money which he can use to gather even more materials ad infinitum.
genre: Monsters, Animals, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: Kinoko Masuo

title: Hozuki's Coolheadedness
alt_title: Хладнокровный Ходзуки, 鬼灯の冷徹, Hoozuki's Coolheadedness
description:
Hell is a bureaucracy, and business is running smoother than ever thanks to the demonic efficiency of Hoozuki, chief deputy to Lord Enma, the King of Hell. Whether offering counsel to the Momotarou of Japanese folklore or receiving diplomatic missions from the Judeo-Christian Hell, the demon who runs the show from behind the king's imposing shadow is ready to beat down any challenges coming his way into a bloody pulp. Metaphorically, of course…  
  
The poster boy for micromanagement and armed with negotiation skills worthy of Wall Street, Hoozuki no Reitetsu follows the sadistic and level-headed Hoozuki as he spends his days troubleshooting hell. With an abundance of familiar faces from popular Japanese legends and East Asian mythology working middle management positions, this referential and anachronistic dark comedy brings new meaning to the phrase "employer liability." Just how hard could it be to manage employees from hell, anyway?
___
[Alt Official English (Koudansha USA)](https://kodansha.us/series/hozukis-coolheadedness/)

[Official X Account](https://x.com/mogura_hozuki)
genre: Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Eguchi Natsumi

title: A Gangster Became a High Schooler
alt_title: 조폭인 내가 고등학생이 되었습니다
description:
"My dream is to enter college."

Kim Deuk-pal, an uneducated man whose lifelong wish was to attend school, dies in a car accident while trying to save Song Yi-heon, a boy who jumped off an overpass while driving, on a rainy day.

'I hope that little thing lives.'

When Kim Deuk-pal wakes up and finds out that the real Song Yi-heon tried to kill him due to school bullying and outing, he decides to take revenge and goes to the high school of his dreams. However, Choi Se-kyung, Song Yi-heon's unrequited love, begins to suspect Song Yi-heon

"You're not Song Yi-heon."
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Horol

title: Yankee Seito ni Nameraretemasu!
alt_title: ヤンキー生徒に舐められてます！
description:
It has already been 10 years after that day…  
  
Sakura Aya, who was always been bullied and harassed because of her huge breasts in her high school, once again must go back to that place as the new assigned teacher and the first thing she see is…  
  
(It… It’s an illicit sexual scene!)  
  
Yoshizawa Shinichirou, third year student who always cause problem, suddenly absence from school for days.  
  
“His father is sick…”  
  
Sakura, feels pity about his situation brings Yoshizawa to her home, and unknown to her, Yoshizawa seems interested in her body!?  
  
“You really lack of sense of danger”  
  
“Eh?”
genre: Romance, School Life, Delinquents
author: ENVY

title: Afterlife Diner
alt_title: 저승식당, Restaurant in the After Life, Underworld Restaurant
description:
“I was given a building as an inheritance?”

From a nobody who does all kinds of odd jobs and lived a hard life, he was given a chance to become a landlord right in the middle of Gangnam!

But, the condition for this inheritance is to ‘operate a restaurant for 5 years.’

‘Moreover, I can sense a chill down my spine thanks to the weird customers that came in for today’s store opening……Do I really just need to prepare food?’

“So then…all the guests who came in yesterday…”

“They were ghosts.”

Every night starting from 11 o’ clock until 1 o’clock, we will now be open!
genre: Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Cooking, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Hyung Sangjun

title: Usuzumi no Hate
alt_title: ウスズミの果て
description: In a deserted post-apocalyptic metropolis riddled with a mysterious material a young girl is searching for any signs of life and supplies.
genre: Sci-Fi, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Iwamune Haruo

title: Barairo no Yakusoku
alt_title: The Rose-colored Promise, Обещание цвета роз, 蔷薇色的约定, 薔薇色ノ約束, 장미빛의 약속
description:
Iroha, the daughter of a good family, has just lost her father and was grieving in her garden when an arrogant but handsome man dressed in a military uniform trespasses and changes her life forever…  
  
The latest manga from Kaho Miyasaka set in a Taisho era-esque world.
genre: Historical, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Mystery
author: Miyasaka Kaho

title: Soredemo Kimi o Shiawase ni Shitai
alt_title: それでも君を幸せにしたい, 即便如此也希望你能幸福, Still, I Want to Make You Happy
description:
Kouya is reunited with Manaki, a girl he used to play with when they were little, for the first time in nine years.
Even though they've lived far apart, Kouya's feelings for her have been growing through their social media exchanges, and he decided to take the opportunity of their reunion to reveal his feelings to her!
But she has a secret...?
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Shunsuke Noro

title: Empress of Another World
alt_title: Empress of Otherverse, 异世界皇妃, 異世界の皇妃, 異世界皇妃, 이세계의 황비
description: Crossing over into another world and time after a freak accident, Korean highschool girl Sabina is taken in by a duke of the Crentia kingdom— only to soon be offered up to the ugly old emperor as a concubine. When the king is killed by a mysterious assassin, Sabina must face the poisonous circle of other candidates in a battle for the royal seat. Can she attract the loyalty and affection of the men and women she needs on her side to survive?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Lim Seo-Rim

title: Report My Boss
alt_title: 리포트 마이보스
description:
"I have to protect you. That's what I thought. At first......"

Giwoo, who took time off school and was looking for a part-time job, happens upon a posting for a high-paying part-time job at a PC room.

When he arrives at the PC room for his interview, he sees crowds of people waiting outside as if it were a famous restaurant.

The reason being: the "boss's face".

A pure and beautiful boss who looks clueless and naïve, like he'd be an easy target of deception. Nervously standing teary-eyed within the wolfpack of onlookers that is always on the lookout for him.

Giwoo, who dreams of being a righteous policeman in the future, makes up his mind from the very first moment to protect the boss from this wolfpack.

But... as time goes on, the boss beings acting strangely...

"Excuse me, Boss... why are you beating up gangsters...?!"
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Noong (눙)

title: They Say There's a Ghost in the Club Room
alt_title: 동아리방에 귀신 나온대
description:
I met a friend who disappeared a few years ago, and it turns out he's now an exorcist?!

Jisang often speaks nonsense or acts dangerously out of nowhere, and sometimes experiences memory lapses. His friend and underclassman, Taeju, shares a concern that he has: When the club members enter the club room, they fall victim to strange phenomena.

Believing it to be the work of a ghost, Taeju calls an occult specialist to resolve the situation. Unexpectedly, the specialist turns out to be Jisang's childhood friend, Ham Leerae.

Jisang then learns that his symptoms weren't due to an illness, but were caused by spiritual possession. Determined to keep Leerae around, Jisang offers his body to assist with exorcism requests.

"That's how I can make you stay. So you can't escape now."

And the solution to free him from possession is...kissing?!
genre: Long Strip, Boys' Love
author: Hwangji

title: Sleepless Night
alt_title: 잠들지 못하는 밤
description:
In order to trace the culprit behind his family’s murder in his childhood, Vampire Hunter Heilo accepts a kill order from a client. 

His target is the head of the Livera Group, Herrace. Heilo joins Herrace’s company, and successfully acquires a position as the personal secretary of Herrace himself, who is known for his dominating presence in politics and the underworld. 

However, Herrace’s special treatment gradually causes Heilo’s heart to sway… 

What will his fate be, having fallen for the man he's supposed to kill?!
genre: Long Strip, Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Full Color
author: Ibelain

title: Haruka Reset
alt_title: はるかリセット
description: Haruka is a writer who is overwhelmed by deadlines and takes time out of her busy schedule to reset her mind. Strolling around the neighborhood, soaking in the public bath, eating the local cuisine, enjoying the park... even though she can’t take a big vacation or travel far, she’s determined to still enjoy any little “vacation” she can by getting creative!
genre: Comedy, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Nogami Takeshi

title: Onii-chan Is Done For! - Highschool ONIMAI (Doujinshi)
description: Without being able to return to being a man, Mahiro Oyama stayed as a girl since middle school and now has become a beautiful high-schooler who gets completely dominated by his first friend since the transformation, Momiji Hozuki, who has gotten really tall and became popular with the girls in their school.
genre: Genderswap, Romance, Girls' Love, Doujinshi, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

The curtain rises on Pseudo-Singularity I.
The stage: Shinjuku. Fight alongside mysterious new Servants in a prison district cut off from the outside world.

title: Onnamaou-sama wa Yuusha-kun o Taosenai.
alt_title: 女魔王様はゆうしゃくんを倒せない。, Demon Queen–sama Can't Defeat Hero-kun., The Demon Queen Can't Defeat Yuusha-kun.
description:
Demon Queen Abyss is worried… She's not able to defeat the Hero, considered the mortal enemy of the demons. This Hero is still an inexperienced young man—he should be easy to defeat! … However, the problem is that he, not knowing Abyss's true identity, considers her his “Master” and has become very fond of her…!?
___
Produced with the help of and supervised by [studioHEADLINE](https://mangadex.org/author/657c3108-5817-4669-a957-a9c7ec5080ee/studio-headline).

title: The Return of Elena the Knight
alt_title: Return of the Female Knight, ROTFK, Lady in Armor, 돌아온 여기사, 回归的女骑士, 穿越的女騎士
description:
Elena, who spent her entire life as a cold-blooded female knight to avenge her family, ended up dying without claiming her revenge. When she opened her eyes she found that she went back into the past. By day she was a lady in a dress, and at night she carried a sword to change history and prevent her family's destruction.  
  
"I want to marry you, Your Highness," she said to the crown prince. She would do this to save her family.
genre: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Lee Halin

title: Centuria
alt_title: ケントゥリア, Центурия
description: Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!

title: Arachi: First Irregular
alt_title: 아라치: 퍼스트 이레귤러, Arachi: Peoseuteu Irregular
description: Born to a mother who was sealed in a mysterious ark with ten longevity on it, Arachi, who has tremendous power, hides her power and is now the wife of HS group and an ordinary housewife. While leaving for Gangwon-do with her family, they got hit by a truck and her two sons Soo-hyuk and Seon-mi were seriously injured and lost consciousness. In order to protect her precious family, Arachi borrows the status of Sunmi, instead of Hwang Shin-hye, and awakens her past power to find the person behind the attack. Arachi, she’s coming out into the world!
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

title: Yumemiru Danshi wa Genjitsushugisha
alt_title: 夢見る男子は現実主義者, The Dreaming Boy is a Realist, 꿈꾸는 남자는 현실주의자, 满怀美梦的少年是现实主义者
description:
Wataru Sajou, who is deeply in love with his beautiful classmate Aika Natsukawa, is continuing to approach her without getting discouraged while having dreams about their mutual love. However one day he woke up thinking, “I am not really fit to be together with someone as good as her, huh…” Upon realizing this, Wataru started keeping an appropriate distance towards her, much to Aika’s surprise. “Could it be that he hates me now…? ”Did his intentions slip by her because she was getting impatient after arriving at the wrong conclusion!? This is the start of a romcom revolving around two people who just cant get their feelings across and both think their love is unrequited!

[Official English Light Novel](https://monogatari-novels.com/collections/the-dreaming-boy-is-a-realist)
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Okemaru

title: Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 4-bu 「 Kizokuin no Toshokan wo Sukuitai!」
alt_title: Ascendance of a Bookworm ~I'll do anything to become a librarian~ Part 4 「Let's Save the Royal Academy Library!」, 本好きの下剋上～司書になるためには手段を選んでいられません～第四部 貴族院の図書館を救いたい!, Ascendance of a Bookworm: Part 4
description:
As Rozemyne wakes up after almost two years she finds out that the world around her has undergone great change causing her to feel like Urashima Tarō from the Japanese fairy tale. However, there is no time for her to get acclimate to the new world as she is quickly sent off to the Royal Academy to become a true noble.   
She is presented with the difficult task of raising Ehrenfest's ranking while being surrounded by eccentric teachers and children from other duchies however she is motivated by the Royal Academy's giant library. While there are no other Archduke Candidates or members of royalty around Rozemyne commandeers the library!  
Here begins Part 4 of this biblio-fantasy as we enter the Royal Academy!
genre: Reincarnation, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Kazuki Miya

title: Baili Jin Among Mortals
alt_title: Bai Lijin Among Mortals, Mortal Baili Jin, 人间百里锦
description:
Baili Jin, a fairy who was living in heaven, eating and drinking without a care, broke her Majesty’s colourful, stained-glass plate at her birthday and got banished to the mortal realm. Now she has to begin her adventures in the mortal realm with all of her spiritual powers gone! In order to survive, the former fairy has to deliver take-out….  
  
An endearingly silly fairy, a gentle restaurant manager, a reserved top student and a hard to resist yandere onee-san (kind on the outside, dark/possessive on the inside) , let the story of their beautiful friendship and youthful days begin!  
  
Author's weibo: [@Viva喂娃酱](https://weibo.com/vivaandjulys)   
Artist's weibo: [@Julys橘奶司](https://weibo.com/julys0723)

title: Quest Supremacy
alt_title: 퀘스트지상주의, Quest Jisangjuui, QUESTISM, Квестовое превосходство, Supremacía de las Misiones
description: Kim SooHyun is an ordinary high schooler who isn’t good at studying, fighting, or being attractive. Suddenly, he’s faced with a quest window right in front of his eyes. After being given the powers of a game [system] out of nowhere, how will our hero confront the challenges ahead of him?
genre: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: YuNuni

title: Koibito desu ken! ~ Oogata Inu wa Te ga Hayai
alt_title: 恋人ですけん！~大型犬は手が早い, We’re Lovers Now! - This Big Mutt Moves Fast
description: Subaru, a fashion student who was looking for a model for the show, found a Mosa man who shines on the train with good material! When I want to see him again, the Mosaic man Kazue just appeared at the part-time job!? As a friend, while being fashionable, "After all I have a good face…", Subaru is Zokkon. Then, Kazue's conditionally OK, saying, "Please help me with your model!" If you accept the relationship without thinking that if you become a model, you will be forced into a male face and your tongue will be forcibly screwed in…?!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love
author: Abuku

title: Seducing the Monster Duke
alt_title: 용사의 어머니가 되겠습니다, Yongsaui Eomeoniga Doegetseumnida, I Will Become the Hero's Mother, I'll Become the Warrior's Mother, I Became the Mother of the Warrior, Seré La Madre Del Guerrero
description:
"You may be my wife but, I won't lay a single finger on you."

"Really? Then can I touch you?"

"...What?"

About 20 years later, the world will be in ruins because of the invasion of the beasts. There's only one way to stop the destruction. To marry the duke who is called a monster, and have his child who will become the hero in the future!

Elena who saw a glimpse of the future succeeded in marrying him but...

"Are we going to continue to not do anything?"

I wanted to get it quickly out of the way, but my husband's impregnable fortress is stronger than I could have imagined!

"Take it off! Why aren't you taking it off?! Are your clothes part of your skin?"

Will Elena be able to safely give birth to the hero and save the world?
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Long Strip, Romance, Survival, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Ellianyang (엘리아냥)

title: I Guess I Became the Mother of the Great Demon King's 10 Children in Another World
alt_title: Я стала мамой десяти детей сильнейшего демона в другом мире, 一不小心在異世界當上了最強魔王的十個孩子的媽媽., 異世界で最強魔王の子供達10人のママになっちゃいました。, 一不小心在异世界当上了最强魔王的十个孩子的妈妈, 이세계에서 최강마왕의 아이들 10명의 엄마가 돼버렸습니다
description: High school girl Akari mourns the loss of her mother who died when she shielded Akari from an oncoming truck a year ago. She discovers an adventure game her mother had gotten for her birthday some time ago, but never had a chance to finish. Suddenly, she is summoned to be the mother of the Demon Lord's 10 children in another world…
genre: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy
author: Tooyama Ema

title: My Ex-Girlfriend Became My Boss
alt_title: 前女友成了我的顶头上司, My Immediate Supervisor
genre: Long Strip, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Full Color
author: 茯苓

title: Kono Tabi Osananajimi to Karikon Shimasu
alt_title: この度幼なじみと仮婚します
description:
Taichi, who has been freeloading off his girlfriend, gets dumped and has no choice but to go back to his parents' house. The person who knocks on his door is his childhood friend, Ryousuke, who grew up to be a handsome man.
After they met again for the first time in years, Ryousuke suddenly proposes to Taichi. Confessing that he has always loved Taichi since they were kids, he requests that they apply for Provisional Marriage ー a system where couples can try being married for a maximum of six months.
Despite being overwhelmed by Ryousuke's intense feelings, the words "you don't have to do anything, so just be with me" lure him in. Taichi agrees to the provisional marriage like he's just agreeing to be roommates, but then...?!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love
author: Kuroda Kurota

title: Liar! Gokuou-kun
alt_title: Usotsuki! Gokuou-kun, ウソツキ！ゴクオーくん
description: The world is overflowing with them: fibs, falsehoods, lies… Surely you, too, Reader, have told a lie at least once in your life, with your heart beating fast. This is a story about dealing with those lies. The protagonist, Gokuoh, is a master liar, who loves both lying and exposing other people's lies. Together with his strange pet, Nekokarasu, he starts to expose the ocean of lies in his new school. Fighting lies with lies, all Gokuoh needs is the power of the "tongue." "What exactly does that mean?" you ask? Have a look and find out!
genre: Award Winning, Action, Comedy, Drama
author: Yoshimoto Makoto

title: Good-for-Nothing Blues
alt_title: ろくでなしBLUES
description:
Maeda is a new student in the Teiken High School. He stutters when he's nervous and he's rather clumsy. He gets noted immediately because he hits a teacher during the entrance ceremony. Some clubs search to enlist him as they see in him a force they can use to get even with other clubs. But Maeda is a loner and has only one dream: becoming boxing champion. His first objective is to beat the leader of the boxing club. "Rokudenashi" translates as "good for nothing".  
  
The manga focuses more on gang warfare than boxing.
genre: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life
author: Morita Masanori

title: Kataomoi x Kataomoi
alt_title: One-sided Love x One-sided Love, Unrequited Love x Unrequited Love, 片思い×片思い
description:
One day, high-school student Hanamoto is called out by a guy named Furuya, who's in a different class. At first, he thinks that Furuya might be trying to confess to him, but it turns out that he just "wants to be friends." Hanamoto is nonplussed – and perhaps a bit disappointed – but he agrees, and soon finds himself spending more and more time together with Furuya.  
  
But what, really, is this innocent-looking boy's reason for brazenly seeking out Hanamoto's acquaintance?
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life
author: Ueda Niku

title: Heimin Shusshin no Teikoku Shoukan, Munou na Kizoku Joukan wo Juurin shite Nariagaru
alt_title: 平民出身の帝国将官、無能な貴族上官を蹂躙して成り上がる, The Rising of the Commoner-Origin Officer: Beat up All the Incompetent Noble Superiors!
description:
All the bosses are annoying! The reincarnated strongest magician's trampling and subjugation begins!

Hazen Heim, a newly appointed imperial general, is demoted to the front line because he is a commoner. There were a lot of incompetent people, such as "a trash superior who takes advantage of his position to steal the achievements of his subordinates", "an evil subordinate who keeps bullying people below him", and "a top who is too opportunistic to do anything''. 

However, Hazen has the experience and overwhelming ability as the strongest magician that he cultivated in his previous life. He slaughters his malevolent subordinates in accordance with military law, and completely refutes his superiors who complain. He achieved extraordinary results, such as making peace with a hostile tribe by teaming up with a genius girl, and defeated all the annoying bosses!

An exhilarating upstart fantasy about an unscrupulous superior!
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Action, Crime, Military, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Hanane Kosaka

title: Tameshi ni Komando Itte mita
alt_title: ためしにコマンド言ってみた
description:
“Masa, kneel.” Select shop owner Masa’s current crush is his best friend, Oto, a fashion model.
They’re both high-ranking doms who attract a lot of attention when they walk the streets. Oto has been feeling under the weather lately, since he was dumped by his sub partner… At the same time, Masa has been building good relationships with three partners.
Feeling that his commands are too forceful and scary, Oto asks Masa for advice, but then Oto jokingly commands Masa to kneel down…?!
genre: Romance, Boys' Love
author: Yukue Moegi

title: Little Mushroom
alt_title: 小蘑菇
description:
“Until the day humanity falls.”

In the year 2020, Earth’s magnetic poles disappeared and humankind was nearly wiped out by cosmic radiation. Within the span of a hundred years, living creatures began to mutate and devour each other while the remaining humans, numbering in the tens of thousands, struggled bitterly in their man-made bases.

In the Abyss, home to the mutated xenogenics, there lived a sentient little mushroom. Because it had been nourished by the blood and flesh of the deceased human An Ze, not only did it take on a similar-looking human form, but a similar name as well: An Zhe.

An Zhe is determined to go to the human base to search for his spore, which had been harvested by humans. Once there, however, he faces the omnipresent risk of discovery and certain death as he tries to keep his non-human nature hidden from the Judges, whose responsibility is to inspect for and eliminate xenogenics like himself. And of all the Judges, Colonel Lu Feng is the most perceptive and merciless—as soon as he determines that someone is a xenogenic, he will execute that person on the spot.

But An Zhe’s mutation goes undetected by Lu Feng’s eyes, and so a tale of humans and xenogenics unfolds…

Silver Award winner at the 12th Chinese Nebula Awards for Chinese Science Fiction.
genre: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Jinjiang Literature City (晋江文学城)

title: BanG Dream! - Say MaMa (Doujinshi)
genre: Oneshot, Incest, Girls' Love, Doujinshi
author: Kurogane Ken

title: Ane Log
alt_title: Sister's Log - Moyako's Never-ending Monologue, Заблуждение сестры – Нескончаемый монолог Мояко, 姉ログ, 姉ログ 靄子姉さんの止まらないモノローグ, 姐姐的妄想日志, 姐姐的妄想日志 - 我的弟弟是變態, 姐姐的妄想日记, 姐姐的妄想日记 - 我的弟弟是变态, 누나 로그, 누나 로그 - 내 동생은 우주급의 변태다.
description:
When Konoe Moyako and her little brother, Akira, were young, he said he wanted to marry her. Naturally, Moyako decided that her little brother was a complete pervert who was obsessed with her. Now that they're both teenagers, Moyako is convinced she needs to 'rehabilitate' him. However, it seems that the 'perversion' is entirely in her imagination, and she can't seem to help turning completely innocent situations into creepy ones in her mind!  
  
Links to AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime:  
[OAV 1](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=16486)  
[OAV 2](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=16487)
genre: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Taguchi Kenji

title: Tsuitenai Game Jikkyousha wa Akogare no Hito ni Kakinsareru
alt_title: ツイてないゲーム実況者は憧れの人に課金される
description:
"Hasumi, a university student who meets with misfortune whenever she does anything, is interested in Oikawa, who helped her out at the entrance ceremony.
However, when she steels herself to talk to him, he doesn't even remember her... Then, at the suggestion of her older brother, who noticed how amusing Hasumi's game-playing was, she decides to livestream a let's play. The video unexpectedly goes viral, and Oikawa has found it too...?

Gaming livestreamer x unlaughing guy—who will be the one to get hooked?"
genre: Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Slice of Life
author: Ataru Tei

title: Amateur E-girl Streaming a Space War
alt_title: 底辺チューバーが宇宙戦争を撮ってみた
description:
On a day just like any other, a giant spaceship suddenly appeared and invaded Earth, obliterating entire cities in the blink of an eye. In the midst of the attacks, Kanna Fujimiya, amateur content creator, rose to fame overnight with her video coverage of the invasion. With her newfound popularity and charms, Kanna continues to cover the war from the front lines, but…!?  
  
This amateur content creator reveals the truth behind the interstellar war in this science fiction thriller!
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Gore, Aliens
author: Watanabe Kouzou

title: Sanda
alt_title: サンダ
description:
In the year 2080, the world is like it is now, yet different. Government-arranged marriages, elaborate plastic surgery, and medical science are at the forefront of Japanese society.

Sanda Kazushige is a middle-school student who hasn't quite matured, despite being in the thralls of puberty. Put into a life-threatening situation by his classmate Fuyumura, Sanda discovers his uncanny ability to turn into a burly (and more grown) Santa Claus, and is thrown into a world of chaos to save his fellow students in only ways Santa Claus can do, while trying to solve the mysteries of the school he attends and the truth to where his supposedly-dead classmate Ono went.
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Gore, Drama, School Life, Police, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Itagaki Paru

title: Kasane to Subaru
alt_title: かさねと昴, Kasane and Subaru, Касанэ и Субару, 累和昴
description: Both of them are straightforward people. Once they meet, they quickly get to know each other better. A heartwarming romantic comedy that begins with a certain incident. Shibata Kasane, a graphics designer at a toy design and development company, is troubled. Her troubles started when she grabbed her colleague Enokida Subaru's ass by accident! Kasane was intrigued by how similar Enokida's ass and her favourite childhood character felt. At the same time, Kasane felt guilty because Enokida might have been uncomfortable. Enokida said "I don't mind" but had a pained and frightened expression. Kasane was overcome by the urge to apologise profusely! On the other hand, it looks like Enokida is hiding something.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Crossdressing, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Yamada Kintetsu

title: The Maid I Hired Recently Is Mysterious
alt_title: My Recently Hired Maid Is Mysterious, La criada que contraté recientemente es sospechosa., Mi criada nueva es misteriosa, Моя новая горничная ну очень подозрительна, 最近雇ったメイドが怪しい
description:
I hired a maid who has something about her I just can’t put my finger on. Sure, she looks great and is a fabulous cook, but something about her’s not quite right. What have I gotten myself into!?

**Physical volumes version of [this title](https://mangadex.org/title/1f366545-bf36-4f83-b3c1-f65021320a6e/my-recently-hired-maid-is-suspicious-magazine) with added webcomic parts and different chapter numbering.**
genre: Romance, Comedy, Shota, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Konbu Wakame

title: Kuuraisen uchiharairei
alt_title: 空来船打払令, 空来船驱逐令, 空來船驅逐令
description: It was the end of the Edo period. Instead of Perry, a huge "Korai-ship" came to Edo... A samurai fighting with "steam" and a genius engineer heroine weave an oedo x steam battle!
genre: Sci-Fi, Historical, Action, Comedy, Samurai, Fantasy, Aliens
author: Katou Fumitaka

title: Okitsune Gal Katabami-san
alt_title: お狐ギャルの片喰さん
description:
A very ordinary and serious high school student, Kamou-kun.
Though his days are filled with diligent study, his concern lies in his childhood friend, Katabami-san, who interferes with his studies every day. And to make matters more complicated, Katabami-san's true identity is... a fox spirit!?

The struggle between Kamou-kun, who doesn't want to be bothered, and Katabami-san, who craves attention, begins anew today!

---

**Alternative Raw:** [Nico Nico Seiga](https://sp.seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/66393)
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Gyaru
author: Danbou Kigu

title: The Last Human
alt_title: Mortal of The Doom, Последний человек, 末世凡人, 블러디발렌타인:인류종말
description: Zuo Tianchen is the last living human in a mutated zombie-infested city. Just when he was sure he'd died, he finds his soul returned to just before that ill-fated day ten years ago. He swears he'll protect the people important to him this time round and reunite with his past lover. Watch his struggles to survive equipped with his memory of the next ten years!
genre: Thriller, Time Travel, Action, Comedy, Survival, Zombies, Post-Apocalyptic, Gore, Horror, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Amazing Works

title: The love princess of His Royal Highness the King's younger brother ~ After breaking off the engagement with the prince, I was captured by the beautiful King's younger brother.
alt_title: 王弟殿下の恋姫 ～王子と婚約を破棄したら、美麗な王弟に囚われました
description:
Melissa, the prince’s fiancée, bravely endures difficult days after being openly deceived. Since her childhood, she has trained every day to become an illustrious queen, but perhaps this marriage is doomed to failure. That’s when the king’s "younger brother" appears, Ashley, who loves to tease her.

"Well, how about some time and freedom?"

Melissa’s love and life take an unexpected turn!
genre: Romance, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Kamiyama Rio

title: Akuma-san to Outa
alt_title: Demon and Song, Devil and Song, 悪魔さんとお歌
description: Those who curse the world with their dying breath becomes demons. The ones who protect the country from these demons are the Children's Choir who have received divine blessings from the angels. Hymns sung by these children who are pure in body and soul are exceptionally beautiful. They are able to kill the demons with their pitch perfect harmony. As such, the demons are always looking for a chance to kill these children once night falls. However, there's one poor little boy who just can't seem to hit the perfect note…
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Demons, Comedy, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Music, Tragedy
author: Morishita Makoto

title: Isekai Ojisan
alt_title: Isekai Uncle, Uncle from Another World, 異世界おじさん
description: Having survived an isekai for 17 years, 34 year old Ojisan (uncle) returns to modern day Japan. Takafumi, Ojisan's nephew, now gets to witness what throwing a diehard Sega fan into an isekai for 17 years does to various things and people, both past and present.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Tragedy
author: Hotondo Shindeiru

title: J<->M
alt_title: J and M, J⇔M　ジェイエム
description:
J is a lone assassin feared as "untouchable" in the underworld.
Megumi is a lonely girl who has no place at home or school.
When the two meet, an unexpected story begins.
genre: Genderswap, Action, Comedy, School Life
author: Ohtake Masao

title: Bokutachi Wa Isekai Geinin Desu
alt_title: 僕たちは異世界芸人です！
description:
A ticket to the tournament final that decides the top for the comic artist who grabbed it desperately!
Hideki, an unsuccessful comic artist with a 15-year history as a duo, is happy for a short while, and goes to another world just before he could debut!
genre: Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy
author: Junichi Oke

title: The Dragon Tamer (Webtoon)
description: What happens when a girl from a quaint and small town meets the son of a Yakuza crime lord? Will she be able to change him for the better or will he continue down the dangerous and violent path?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: TinaFate1

title: Saikyou Rakudai Kizoku no Kenma Kiwameshi Antou Tan
alt_title: The Strongest Failed Aristocrat’s Dark Demon Sword, 最強落第貴族の剣魔極めし暗闘譚
description:
The sword saint and the sage are in fact the underdogs of the school! A "one-man, three-role" substandard (dark) fantasy!

Roy Revel is a frontier aristocrat from a lethargic small country. He is known as the "fallen aristocrat" at the school, but he has a secret. 

[The patron god of the land of swords, Cloud the White Sword Saint. 
The patron god of the land of magic, the great sage Eclipse the Black.]

The strongest and most admired of the two great powers is in fact Roy, who plays the role of an incompetent! In order to protect his family, Roy, the strongest nobleman who manipulates the fight against the Empire from the shadows, is interested in the beautiful girls at the academy who aspire to become sword saints and sages.

A new dark fantasy of the fallen aristocrat begins!
genre: Action, Romance, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: TANBA

title: Kinnikuman Lady
alt_title: Kinnikuman Ready, キン肉マンレディー
description:
Meat has been the trainer of the great Choujin superhero Kinnikuman for long. He thought his job was done helping his greatest subject become a master Choujin and king of his homeworld. But…what if upon waiting for his next subject, the little trainer was sent to another world?…  
  
A world where Kinnikuman has yet to become a great hero… and a world where he is… female!?  
  
Welcome to the world of Kinnikuman Lady! A world that promises to be as bizarre and exciting as the one of the original Kinnikuman.
genre: Loli, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Ninja, Comedy, Martial Arts, Girls' Love, Isekai, Monster Girls, Aliens
author: Ogawa Masashi (小川雅史)

title: Legal Pirate Parfait
alt_title: 합법해적 파르페, Privateer Parfait, Parfait: the Privateer, Parfait: the Legal Pirate
description: The extraordinary Princess Parfait's marvelous fantasy adventure!
genre: Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: BonesBloodFlesh (뼈피살)

title: Kinnikuman
alt_title: キン肉マン, Muscle Man, M.U.S.C.L.E
description:
Kinnikuman (Muscleman), a weak and clumsy super hero, constantly getting into wacky situations. As the series progressed, the story began changing from comedy to action as Kinnikuman battles stronger and stronger foes in the wrestling ring. The series continually introduced new Super Human characters, known as Chojin, who would challenge Kinnikuman and his friends for various purposes.  
    
---
- **The initial serialization lasted from 1979-1986 and ended with Vol. 36. The series directly continued in 2011 with Vol. 37.**
- **The 2011 Chapters resets the Count to 1 during it set of volumes (Beyond Vol 36)**

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 1985**
genre: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Sports, Superhero, Martial Arts, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Aliens, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Yudetamago

title: Onii-chan Is Done For!
alt_title: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!, ONIMAI: I'm Now Your Sister!, Мой братик теперь не братик!, 别当欧尼酱了！, 不当哥哥了！
description:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga  
  
- **Retail:** (Direct Retail From the Mangaka)

genre: Genderswap, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Nekotoufu

title: The Ranker's Guide to Live an Ordinary Life
alt_title: A Guide to the Right Life for Rankers, 랭커를 위한 바른 생활 안내서
description:
The first S-class Awakened is really a third-rate student?!

In the 21st century, the world became a 'fantasy'. In a South Korea filled with despair, S-classes have descended! The greatest of them - Witch Queen Jyo!

"Goddess Jyo... Queen Jyo... Who are you...? Who could it be?"

The true identity of the savior who has been shrouded in mystery for 10 years. Her identity? Gyung Jyo, a third-rate student, who's unable to make outgoing calls due to her mother's anger.and on the verge of being strangled and trapped in the abyss.

She was leading a peaceful and ordinary life as Korea's top unemployed person, however...

[The rankings are being updated.]
[Your current ranking has dropped to 2nd place.] 

"!?"

"I know who you are, Witch Queen."

Baek Dohyun, a regressor, appears in front of Gyung Jyo!

Will Gyung Jyo, an S-class Munchkin ranker, be able to maintain her comfortable and lazy tyrant life, as her well-rolling life turns upside down into the position of the world's savior?
genre: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Fantasy
author: Simsang

title: Star Dream Idol Project
alt_title: 星梦偶像计划
description: The shining lights, the magnificent stage! Friendships created through singing, making a future through dancing, the girls embark on their journey towards their dreams! One who has lost status due to a scandal is hiding a plot behind her back. A pair of bosom friends, separated by fate. A girl who tries to exonerate her mother sets off on her journey for a talent competition. When the stage turns into an empty battlefield, she uses her voice to chase after her dreams.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Music, Full Color
author: Yan Tou

title: Cycle Biyori
alt_title: さいくるびより, Psych House, ПСИХОнутые деньки
description: Psych House--a special home set up for those with supernatural powers. One day, Nemuru, a boy with a Psych that allows him to change size, invites Kotone, a girl with a teleportation Psych, to live at Psych House. The mysterious but normal days of those with psychic powers now begins!
genre: Comedy, Supernatural
author: Kobayashi Omusuke

title: Cool na Doukyuusei no ◯◯ Nengo…
alt_title: クールな同級生の◯◯年後..., The Cool Classmate XX Years Later..., The Cool Classmate ◯◯ Years Later...
genre: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Kyutai X

title: Drag-On Dragoon - Shi ni Itaru Aka
alt_title: Drag-On Dragoon, Drag-On Dragoon The Red unto Death, Drag-On Dragoon: Shi ni Itaru Aka, Drakengard - Shi ni Itaru Aka, Drakengard: Shi ni Itaru Aka, Вестники смерти: Роковой красный, ドラッグ オン ドラグーン 死ニ至ル赤
description:
Spin-off to Drag-on Dragoon 3 (localized as Drakengard). The story follows One, brother to the former Intoner One, and Nero, an Elf practiced with the bow.   
  
It begins with the duo massacring their way toward a town's church for redemption…

title: Even Though I Transmigrated as a Villainess, I’d Rather Raise a Cat
alt_title: 악역에 빙의했지만, 고양이나 키울래요, I Reincarnated as a Villainess, But Why Did I Become a Cat Butler Instead?, Even Though I Was Possessed as a Villain, I Still Want to Raise a Cat
description:
I transmigrated as Rowaine, the villainess who was executed for abusing a werebeast. In order to escape death, I decided to replace my sister Linier in her arranged marriage.

The problem is that Duke Blois, the groom, is a cat werebeast who is known as a bloodthirsty battlefield monster…

“My dear, I heard your hobbies include abusing werebeasts like myself.”

“I haven’t heard of such a condition stating that women who abused werebeasts could not be Your Grace’s wife, though.”

His emerald eyes flashed dangerously at me, I quickly kept speaking before he could say anything.

“If my hobby is a problem, then I promise that I will never abuse you, Your Grace.”

“Ha– what?”

This is the story of a ten-year contractual marriage between a cat lover and a prickly cat werebeast.
genre: Reincarnation, Animals, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Chanyeon

title: Disgusting Otaku, Become an Idol!
alt_title: キモオタ、アイドルやるってよ
description: "When I woke up this morning there was a beautiful girl, but that was… me!?" - Idol Otaku Aisaka Yousuke wakes up one morning and realizes he's now a beautiful girl named Aisaka Yoko. Now with his new appearance and his great Idol knowledge, he will attempt to become the number one idol.
genre: Genderswap, Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Music

title: Saikyou no Maou ni Kitaerareta Yuusha Isekai Kikanshatachi no Gakuen de Musou Suru
alt_title: 最凶の魔王に鍛えられた勇者、異世界帰還者たちの学園で無双する, The Hero Trained by the Worst Demon King Is Unrivaled in the School of Returnees From Another World, A Brave Man Trained by the Worst Demon King, Unrivaled in the School of Returnees From Another World
description:
Without possessing the unique skill blessed by the goddess, a boy named Kujou Kyouya failed to save the world. He was ridiculed as a “failed hero” at the interdimensional-level academy where returned heroes who had saved many worlds gathered.

However, he became the strongest and most unique hero, having trained for 30,000 years in another world with the most evil demon king, Felice, who has destroyed 3,000 worlds!

Now Kyouya’s unique skill is so powerful that he cannot even be defeated by the strongest heroes! The legend of a boy trained by the most evil demon king, begins!

---

- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/58212),  [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/1299578/vol_no/001)

title: Secretly More Powerful than the Hero
alt_title: 용사보다 너무 강해서 힘을 숨김, I Was More Overpowered Than the Hero, so I Hid My Power!, Yongsaboda Neomu Ganghaeseo Himeul Sumgim, Era más fuerte que el héroe así que oculté mi poder, 隱藏力量的邊緣英雄, 隐藏实力的幕后高手
description:
From a young age, I've always dreamed of being that “unassuming hero,” appearing ordinary but possessing unmatched strength. But one day, fate took a turn when I was hit by an eight-ton truck, and suddenly, reincarnation was on the table! 

"What would you like to be in your next life?" asked the goddess of reincarnation. Eagerly, I replied, "I wish to become a wimp, but secretly OP!”

She granted my wish, but with an unexpected twist: if anyone ever uncovers my true abilities, my heart will explode! 

This isn't quite the “secretly-OP-wimp-life” I had in mind…
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: HHAANN

title: My Dog Becomes a Human
alt_title: 犬がヒトになる話, 我家碰太變成了人類這件事, Моя собака становится человеком, Ponta Becomes A Human, ポン太がヒトになりまして。
description:
A slapstick comedy that involves a town and its neighbors where “pet dogs” have become “humans”!
Feelings that couldn’t be conveyed as a dog can now be understood directly…!?

title: Eternal Love
alt_title: Difficult to Coax, 难哄, Hard to Coax, First Frost
description: When Wen Yifan returned to her hometown for work, she met the rumoured “First-Class Handsome Guy” in a bar, but he turned out to be Sang Yan, whom she hurt and rejected in high school! In a twist of fate, the two people who could never get along kept bumping into each other. They even rented the same unit by chance and became housemates! Unspoken feelings refusing to see the light of day, strong emotions stirring beneath it all… Let’s see how Sang Yan, the “Peak Ideal Boyfriend” interprets and expresses deep affections and sweet love!

alt_title: Gacha Girl Corps, Isekai Bishoujo Gacha, Spin Gacha, Recruit New Comrades, and Build The Strongest Army of Beautiful Girls!!, Using Gacha to Increase My Companions and to Create the Strongest Girls’ Army Corps, You Increase Families and Make Beautiful Girl Army Corps, and put it up, Использование лотереи для усиления моих компаньонов и создания армейского корпуса сильнейших девушек, ガチャを回して仲間を増やす 最強の美少女軍団を作り上げろ
description:
For some reason, he was invited to another world after he rolled the gacha like he usually does.  
The gacha from the social game is available in his trusted smartphone.  
It was a convenient and cheat tool that can give out equipment and beautiful girl characters.  
He now aims to create the world's strongest army of beautiful girls in another world.

description: Natsukawa, a member of the beautification committee, often finds her gaze lingering on her schoolmate Aihara. One fateful day off, she spots Aihara walking alongside another girl... As summer’s heat stirs the air, a delicate tale of first love begins to take shape...

title: Mayme Angel
alt_title: Mamie Angel, メイミー・エンジェル
description:
It's the time of pioneers in the Far West, where the population goes en masse on track to Oregon in order to fufill their dreams of conquest.  
Mayme is a little girl who lives peacefully with her mother and sisters. Her dream has always been to go West to find her childhood love, Johnny, and marry him!  
Finally comes the day of her big departure to the Far West in a wagon and she meets Sammy. This will be a trip that will be filled with a lot of promise, but will also be filled with many problems.

Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **Maimy Angel**

description:
One day, Haruma Kozai was suddenly transported to a town centered around a dungeon. The special skill he was given was [Summon Angel].

This skill with a mysterious name does not simply summon an angel - rather it's a slightly strange skill in which angels are summoned for a price.

 ...At least that's what he thought, but it seems like “pleasure” is the price to pay!?

Make the summoned angel cum and decide on the cheat boost. A very naughty journey to another world begins~!
genre: Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation

title: RoomXMate
description: Dongmi Lin—Nickname “Control Freak”, a college student who likes to control other people. One day he moves into a new dorm and meets an uncontrollable dorm mate, and f****d with him. His brain starts to uncontrollably generate fantasies…

title: Harem Yori Heion o! Isekai de Shizuka ni NEET Hime sasete Kure
alt_title: ハーレムより平穏を！異世界で静かにニート姫させてくれ, More peace than a harem, More Peace than a Harem - In Another World, Let Me Be a Neet Princess in Peace, I Wish for Peace Instead of a Harem! Let Me Be a NEET Princess Peacefully in Another World
description:
An elite salaryman (aspiring NEET), gets reincarnated and genderswapped into a princess living an idle life of masturbation...!?

Kishibe is an elite office worker who dreams of becoming a NEET who has attained FIRE (Financial Independence, Retire Early). The fulfillment of his dream is now right before his very eyes!! ...or was, when he died saving a girl from getting hit by a car. A self-proclaimed god felt pity for such a man, so she reincarnated Kishibe into another world where he could live as a NEET. The next thing he knew, he had become Iris, the princess of a superpower kingdom!!

Blessed with incredible beauty and not having the need to work even once, Kishibe won the jackpot with a life full of indolence, freedom and masturbation!! ...is what he believed, but there was a catch. Princess Iris seemed like she possessed a trait that made others love her at the highest level (a skill?), and various girls just keep coming on to her (who was formerly a man)...!?

This is another world where one can experience endless love and eat meals that one didn't work for (does it taste good?), it's an envy-inducing, genderswap isekai story with a super NEET harem!

(Source: Nico Nico Seiga)
genre: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Loli, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic

description:
U149, also known as "Under149", is a spinoff story of Cinderella Girls encompassing the younger idols, who are under 149 cm, and their pursuits to be big time idols with their newly hired P-san.  
  
Part of [THE iDOLM@STER](https://mangadex.org/search?q=iDOLM%40STER) series.

description: Ichinose Shiki, an inheritor of the blood of Oni had lived out his entire childhood oblivious to this fact. However, when an unknown man comes rushing into his home in attempts to assassinate him, his foster father finally reveals the truth. In a world where Oni and Momotarou have never been able to coexist, join Ichinose in his struggle for power and unifying the two races!

title: Koroshi Korosare Sankaku Kankei ni Watashi ga Ima kara Hairun desu ka?
alt_title: 殺し殺され三角関係に私が今から入るんですか？, Am I About to Join a Kill-Or-Be-Killed Love Triangle?
description:
Kohaku is a girl who spent her junior high school years as a loner and dreams of living a fulfilling life in high school. However, on her first day of school she falls down the stairs and ends up hospitalized for a month! This means that everyone besides her has already formed a group of friends at school... 
In order to avoid being a loner, she summons up the courage and calls out to the only odd-numbered group in her class, but it seems that they are high up in the school caste system, and are actually involved in a blood-splattered love triangle with a non-human...! 

A high tension high school comedy about escaping being the class loner!
genre: Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Vampires, Slice of Life
author: Suzuki Fumie

title: SPY×FAMILY
alt_title: スパイ ファミリー, Семья шпиона, 间谍过家家, 間諜過家家, 間諜家家酒
description:
The master spy codenamed <Twilight> has spent most of his life on undercover missions, all for the dream of a better world. Yet one day he receives a particularly difficult order from command. For his mission, he must form a temporary family and start a new life?! 

A Spy/Action/Comedy manga about a one-of-a-kind family!

title: Wakeari Shinrei Mansion
alt_title: 訳アリ心霊マンション, Welcome Ghost Mansion
description: Kaoru Shinonome, who had been living as a freelancer, invests her inheritance in property and buys a vast old condominium. Her dream life as a wealthy landlord is about to begin—but there are no living tenants, only spirits, and her new property is a rollercoaster ride of psychic phenomena. Kaoru embraces her new specter-filled life as the owner of Ghost Mansion and starts recruiting for new non-living residents!
genre: Ghosts, Comedy, Horror, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: nebukuro

title: Tsuraneko
alt_title: つらねこ
description:
Chibi-chan, a middle school girl, can go no further than 2km from the sacred tree that servers as her town's symbol. That is her "disability".
Then one day, a mysterious figure arrives in town to help the girl's wish to leave, her name is Rokushaku-sensei.
Guided by Rokushaku, Chibi attempts to bypass her "disability" by going to "Nedoko", backroads that can transport her to another location.
However, those places are part of a mysterious world, filled with mysterious creatures.
In her desire to see the world, Chibi-chan will have to triumph over these "Nedoko".
genre: Monsters, Comedy, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Kumakura Takatoshi

title: Sakura, Saku
alt_title: サクラ、サク。, サクラ、サク。(咲坂伊緒), 樱花、绽放, Sakura, Saku (SAKISAKA Io), Расцветающая Сакура
description: Saku, who knows she doesn’t stand out much, is looking for a boy named Sakura who helped her before. It might be fate that she meets Haruki Sakura again after entering high school...?!

title: EVOL
alt_title: イーヴォー
description:
Work, sleep, work, sleep... what a dull existence
Why even live?!
No hopes, no dreams
Everything’s predictable...
Suicide is salvation
But when you wake up in purgatory...
...and it's the same world you left?

One option left
Let's turn this fuckin' world upside down


The story of "Evol" begins in a village occupied by an armed group when a young girl, driven by despair, attempts suicide. She survives and wakes up, but when a man tries to drive her into a corner, a strange phenomenon occurs. The place changes, and something also happens to the boy who wakes up in the hospital after committing suicide.
genre: Action, Crime, Superhero, Fantasy
author: Atsushi Kaneko

description: A story based on real-life events in 1966. The Sanrizuka Struggle told from the perspective of the peasants fighting for their land.

title: Musuko ga Kawaikute Shikataganai Mazoku no Hahaoya
alt_title: Demon Mother: My Son is so Cute, I Just Can't Help Myself!, La madre demonio indefensa frente a la lindura de su hijo, 儿子可爱过头的魔族母亲, 息子がかわいくて仕方がない魔族の母親, 아들이 귀여워서 어쩔 수 없는 마족엄마
description:
Lorem, an infamous and fearsome demoness, has had to settle down for the sake of Gospel, her baby boy. Try as she might, she is a loving and doting mother, but she remains fearsome to both fellow demon and human onlookers because she retains the dire reputation of her wild and terrible youth years past.

For the sake of motherly love, she has to persevere, to learn and to thrive in a world where she's not alone. For the sake of Gospel and his future.

Feel the Love in it!
genre: Action, Demons, Comedy, 4-Koma, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Zyugoya

title: Shinigami ni Sodaterareta Shoujo wa Shikkoku no Tsurugi wo Mune ni Idaku
alt_title: 死神に育てられた少女は漆黒の剣を胸に抱く, 被死神抚养的少女怀抱漆黑之剑, 사신에게 길러진 소녀는 칠흑의 검을 가슴에 품는다, Death's Daughter and the Ebony Blade, The Little Girl Raised by Death Holds the Sword of Death Tight
description:
Olivia is just a baby when the mysterious Z finds her at a temple in the depths of the Forest of No Return. From that day on, the temple becomes her home and Z her family. Z, a god of death, educates her in the ways of the world, in combat, and in the long-forgotten arts of magic—right up until the day Z disappears. 

Olivia leaves the forest for the first time in search of Z with its ebony blade in hand. Out in the wider world, all is not well. A bitter war rages between the Asvelt Empire and the Kingdom of Fernest, and Fernest is losing badly. When Olivia shows up on Fernest’s doorstep with a sack of imperial heads looking to volunteer, the royal army happily welcomes her into its ranks. Thanks to Z’s training, she quickly proves herself as a ferocious warrior. In fact, she might be just what Fernest needs to turn the tide of the war...but will they accept her lack of people skills and disregard for discipline? And will she ever see Z again?

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/death-s-daughter-and-the-ebony-blade)
genre: Action, Romance, Magic, Military, Gore, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Ayamine Maito

title: Isekai Raku Raku Survival: Seizon Skill Tsuwamono no Ore ga Bishoujo Shiri to Kurasu Mujintou Seikatsu
alt_title: 異世界らくらくサバイバル～生存スキル強者の俺が美少女四人と暮らす無人島生活～, Easy Survival in Another World: With My Robust Survival Skills, I’ll Live on an Uninhabited Island With Four Beautiful Girls
description:
More than ten years have passed since a means of transporting individuals from Earth to another world was developed. High school student Kakeru Satomi was taught survival techniques and wisdom by his mountain-dwelling grandfather. Kakeru was sent to another world together with 100 other adventurers of the same age in order to take part in a training program to become an adventurer, but the portal device that linked Earth and the other world vanished right after their transfer...!

With the way back to Earth blocked, thus began a dangerous life of survival on an uninhabited island in another world!!
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: Ayano (絢乃)

title: Isekai De Te Ni Ireta Seisan Skill Wa Saikyou Datta You Desu
alt_title: It Seems the Production Skill Acquired in Another World is the Strongest., My Isekai Crafting Powers Are Stronk, 異世界で手に入れた生産スキルは最強だったようです。, 異世界で手に入れた生産スキルは最強だったようです。 ~創造&器用のWチートで無双する~, 이세계에서 입수한 생산 스킬은 최강이었나 봅니다 ~창조&손재주의 더블 치트로 무쌍한다~
description:
29 year old Kou Kousaka is an ordinary salaryman working overtime in a black company when he dies and is sent to another world.   
  
He is given the option to become a sage, hero, or demon king. However, he chooses none of them and instead acquires a hidden skill: the ability to store items in a limitless inventory, immediately dismantle them into materials, and then use them to create something new.  He then starts his life as an adventurer.
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

title: Dead Dead Demon's Dededede Destruction
alt_title: DDDD, Dededede, デッドデッドデーモンズデデデデデストラクション, 恶魔的破坏, 惡魔的破壞, 灭世Demolition
description:
A series about the lives of two high school girls living in Tokyo after aliens have invaded. Dead Dead Demon's Dededededestruction is a self-styled dystopian slice-of-life that reflects on modern societal and political issues in Japan while still maintaining a sense of humor and frivolity.

Large mysterious alien ships have been looming above Japanese towns for three years, filling the sky. Everything changed three years ago. And yet, nothing has changed.

No weapon used against the invaders' ships had any success, beyond destroying part of Japan and leaving its economy in shambles. JSDF is fighting a guerrilla battle against the aliens all over Japan. America is joining the 'war' effort with more aggressive tactics, dividing Japan over the pacifist principle laid out in Article 9 of the Japanese constitution. But this may just be the mundane story of young high schoolers.

"No matter what happens, I won't back down. At least not until this world filled with lies and deceit crumbles away. The real threat to humankind is not invaders, but me."

---
- **Won the 66th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga** 
- **Won the 25th Japan Media Arts Festival Excellence Award in 2022**
genre: Thriller, Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Mecha, Adventure, Office Workers, Military, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Aliens, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Asano Inio

title: Seven Years Later

But who would have thought that she drowned in the sea and was saved by her friend who told her seven years have passed. What will happen? What about her family and friends? Can she go back to her original timeline?

title: Bunnie's Quest
alt_title: バニーズクエスト
description: On the moon, there is an advance civilization of bunny people who used to be identical to humans, but after incorporating themselves with bunny genes, transformed into docile creatures. The result is a society where AI are entrusted with all choices, from the content of meals to how each minute of leisure time should be spent. Amongst this society is a bunny girl named Uko who dislikes this lifestyle, complaining "Let me choose for myself!!". One day, Uko decides to flee the moon and head to Earth where she meets Hane, a bunny girl investigating life on Earth. On this planet with many strange customs, these two will...!?
genre: Sci-Fi, Comedy, Girls' Love, Web Comic
author: Konayama Kata

title: Sousou no Frieren
alt_title: Frieren: Beyond Journey's End, Frieren at the Funeral, Фрирен, провожающая в последний путь, 葬送のフリーレン, 葬送的芙莉蓮, 장송의 프리렌, Frieren: Remnants Of The Departed, Frieren: Más allá del final, Frieren: Más allá del fin del viaje
description: The adventure is over but life goes on for an elf mage just beginning to learn what living is all about. Elf mage Frieren and her courageous fellow adventurers have defeated the Demon King and brought peace to the land. With the great struggle over, they all go their separate ways to live a quiet life. But as an elf, Frieren, nearly immortal, will long outlive the rest of her former party. How will she come to terms with the mortality of her friends? How can she find fulfillment in her own life, and can she learn to understand what life means to the humans around her? Frieren begins a new journey to find the answer.
genre: Award Winning, Monsters, Demons, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life

alt_title: Королевство руин, はめつのおうこく, 파멸의 왕국, Разрушенные Королевства

Let's invade Earth during summer vacation!?

I, Princess Patra of Ptolemy, chose "Earth Invasion" for my summer vacation free study!
However, because of my comfortable life on Earth, I tend to fall behind on my homework!
Today is another peaceful day♪ (Thanks to Patra-chan's love for the Earth)
