title: Karma na Skill de Musou suru Isekai Harem Kaitoudan
alt_title: Isekai Phantom Thief, Isekai Robin Hood, 咎なスキルで無双する異世界ハーレム怪盗団, 用罪恶技能开无双的异世界后宫怪盗团, Harem Thief Order dominating in different world with karmic skill
description:
Takio Asakawa is an ordinary salaryman who - surprise, surprise - dies and gets reincarnated into another world. A big fan of isekai stories, Takio is immediately ready for his OP slow life adventure.  
  
However, when he enters the other world, he discovers that not all is as it seems. Adventure guilds are a relic of the past, and income inequality has plagued the country. Technology has also progressed to the point that guns exist, making swords and sorcery fairly useless.   
  
However, Takio discovers that he has a special skill - with slight of hand, he can steal from others as easily as breathing air. After recovering a woman who claims herself to be the reincarnation of the legendary thief Goemon Ishikawa, Takio realizes that he was brought to this world for a specific reason: to enact justice by stealing from the rich and giving to the poor.
genre: Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy
author: Miyama Yuuki

title: Sorry, I'm Actually Very Strong
alt_title: The Princess From Mars: The Young Lady's Journey to Counterattack, 抱歉，其实我很强, 火星公主：大小姐的逆袭之路
description: In a world where the strong prey on the weak, you can only get trampled on without strength. Emerging nobles have bullied and oppressed the young girl Olga Perez since she was a child due to the decline of her family. She continuously forced herself to grow up, and after becoming a soldier possessing both civil and military skills, she used her strength to overthrow the nobles who bullied and oppressed her. However, once the interest chain of the hostile nobles has been broken, more powerful opponents follow. She must continue to climb up and reach the peak of power.
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Long Strip, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color
author: 诈术师德德

title: Critically-Endangered Species Hacchin-Pamos
alt_title: 絶滅寸前動物ハッチンパモス
description:
The Hacchin-Pamos is a critically-endangered species. Let's find out why.

A daily comic series from Q-Rais.
genre: Animals, Comedy, Self-Published, 4-Koma, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Q-Rais

title: Deemo -Sakura Note-
alt_title: DEEMO: Sakura Note
description: This is a sad and gentle story about Alice, who grew up.
genre: Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Fujisaku Junichi

title: Her Mountain, Her Ocean
alt_title: 她的山，她的海, The Youth, Her Mountain, Her Sea
description: (Gentle, tenacious honor student and the cold domineering girl) Chi Tang and Youyu are both weirdos in Year 1 Class 2 of high school. They become desk mates, roommates, each other's salvation, protecting the other's warmth. The relationship between the two went from ignorance to understanding. A poem of youth composed.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color
author: 扶华

title: Journey to Seek Past Reincarnations
alt_title: A Journey to the Past, 寻找前世之旅
description: The story is about a little Master, Gong Yao Ying, in order to accomplish the assigned tasks, she travels across the different periods. The stories are created after meeting with the famous historical figures.
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Historical, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color
author: Vivibear

title: Fall for You
alt_title: 가을, 만나다, Meet in Autumn, 秋、君と出会った季節
description: “I don’t like that professor.” Instructor Yoon Hee-min does everything he says with an honest look in her eyes. "...That’s a good thing.” Seo Ji-hyeok, is a chemistry professor who is good at being alone. Ji-hyeok was comfortable alone, but he had no excuse to ignore Assistant Yoon, who quietly prepared everything before he had even ordered her to do anything. And that's how their academic life together began. "Even with the two people, there is a deafening silence, which is why I am more concerned about it. My heart is drawn and my eyes are drawn to that person."
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Choi Soo Hyun

title: Vampire x Maid Yuri
alt_title: 吸血鬼ご主人様とメイドさんの百合
genre: Oneshot, Girls' Love, Doujinshi, Fantasy, Vampires, Tragedy
author: Paderapollo

title: The Reborn Young Lord Is an Assassin
alt_title: 회귀한 공작가의 막내도련님은 암살자, Hoegwihan Gongjakgaui Mangnaedoryeonnimeun Amsalja, The Regressed Son of a Duke is an Assassin, The Regressed Youngest Son of the Duke Is an Assassin, Вернувшийся младший сын герцога, Регрессировавший сын герцога, 歸來的少爺是暗殺者, La venganza del asesino de la espada demoniaca
description:
Cyan Vert, illegitimate son of the Duke and the empire's greatest assassin, is betrayed by the righteous brother whose shadow he's always lived in. But just before the fatal blow strikes his throat, Cyan awakes to find he's just a boy again. The young lord has been reborn, and this time, he's not going to live in anyone's shadow!

---
Cyan Vert, the best assassin of the continent, meets a pitiful death after having been betrayed by his own brother, whom he had trusted all his life.

"If I were given another chance at life, I would live it differently. I would only trust myself, and achieve all the things I want on my own without serving anyone else but myself."

That is how he was given a second chance at life. Cyan Vert, a shadow who lived for others, is no more. He will now pave a path on his own, for only him!
genre: Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Coffee Lime (커피라임)

title: Venus Wars
alt_title: ヴィナス戦記, 金星战记, Record of the Venus Wars
description:
May 2003. An icy planet from distant space crashes into Venus, changing its qualities completely. These qualities prove to present some habitability for humans, enticing men to eventually colonize it for themselves...

80 years later, Venus is home to many people who call it home. However, an ever-present tension between the two major continents, Aphrodia and Ishtar, points to an ominous fate for Venus.

Hiroki Senoo is a rather rebellious member of a motorsport popular within Aphrodia's capital. One day, members of Aphrodia's military approach Hiroki, and, impressed by his skills, invite him to join. Thus, Hiroki finds himself enveloped in Venus's political landscape...

Note: Chapter count resets with Volume 3 to correspond with the second part.
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Military, Drama, Delinquents, Tragedy
author: Yasuhiko Yoshikazu

title: Insanely Talented Player
alt_title: 미친 재능의 플레이어, Jugador de talento insano
description:
[By Red-Ice Studios, creators of the series  ‘Solo Leveling and Omniscient Reader’s Viewpoint’]

It’s been six years since the game to decide the fate of the world had started. Hero-King Kang Yoo-Sung, the strongest player who hasn’t dropped from the top ranker’s position once, greets the new season, too.

“I… was finished a long fucking time ago. I’m just doing it for the money.”

[Taunt Level has drastically increased!]

[The Elder of Jesters expresses satisfaction with the actions of the contractor!]
genre: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: chena

title: Children of the Rune - Winterer
alt_title: 룬의 아이들 - 윈터러, Lun-ui Aideul - Winteoleo
description:
"Child, you must survive!"

After the destruction of his House by his uncle, all that was left for a young boy, Boris, was the heirloom sword, Winterer. But little did he know that this treasure would become the cause of another crisis. As people seek Winterer, Boris’ heart grows colder and bleaker, much like the winter.

The adventures of Boris — to survive and to protect the sword of his House — begin now. What awaits him at the end of this journey? And what secrets does the winter sword Winterer hold?
genre: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Mok-In (목인)

title: SSS-Rank Lone Summoner
alt_title: Only I Can Use Summoning SSS-Rank Lone Summoner, The Lone SSS-Class Summoner, 只有我能用召唤术
description: Zhang Ze crosses over to a parallel world where people rely on the Magic Domain to fight monsters and become stronger to resist the invasion of demons from the Devil’s Cave. For the sake of his sister, Zhang Ze enters the magic realm under the name of Asura, and then he unexpectedly awakens the strongest SSS-level talent summoning ability! The higher the level of the summoning art, the more monsters you can summon, and the more you can upgrade, it’s simply heaven-defying!
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: 竹楼听细雨

title: The Ultimate of All Ages
alt_title: Rebirth Of The Ultimate Master, The Eternal Supreme, 万古至尊, The Ancient Sovereign of Eternity, 这一世我要当至尊, 這一世我要當至尊
description: First among the ten martial emperors, Peerless Martial Emperor Gu Fei Yang met his demise in the Tiandang mountains. He was reincarnated fifteen years later, as Li Yun Xiao of the Tianshui Nation, and thus began a heaven-defying battlefront with the countless talents of the current generation. Martial arts of the nine heavens and ten divine realms. From then on, the whole world was set ablaze.
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Tai Yi Sheng Shui

title: Oishinbo
alt_title: 美味しんぼ, 맛의 달인, 美味大挑戰, The Gourmet
description:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**
genre: Award Winning, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking, Tragedy
author: Kariya Tetsu

title: A Story about You and the Sea
alt_title: 君と海のはなし
description: Non-H original doujin by Os_fresa, featuring Nei and Souta.
genre: Demons, Romance, Doujinshi, Shota, Slice of Life
author: os_fresa

title: Apparently, I'm the Villainess?
alt_title: They Say I'm the Villainous Young Miss, 据说我是反派大小姐
description: I worked as a manhua artist, then died from pulling an all-nighter. I woke up as the villainess "Emi Morwen" from my webcomic! Emi was an alluring yet cruel character who departed from the story by ending her own life. However, I’m not the real Emi!
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Full Color
author: 白纸困

title: SaYe
alt_title: 撒野, Act Wildly, Run Freely
description:
“I wish to have you by my left shoulder, with a smile by my right– I wish to run freely in your eyes– I wish for one look to last a lifetime.”   
  
Jiang Cheng, an accomplished student, was "exiled" to the steel mill where his biological father worked. This strange, foreign environment, coupled with his rather vulgar biological father, caused Jiang Cheng to feel quite depressed… that is, until one day, he met Gu Fei, the "Delinquent of the Steel Mill", by chance. Thus begins the story of Jiang Cheng and Gu Fei, a story of salvation and hope…

(by Jupiter Scanlations)
genre: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Wu Zhe
artist: Yuan Dian Ge Zi Manhua (原点格子漫画)

title: The Reborn Young Lord Is an Assassin
alt_title: 회귀한 공작가의 막내도련님은 암살자, Hoegwihan Gongjakgaui Mangnaedoryeonnimeun Amsalja, The Regressed Son of a Duke is an Assassin, The Regressed Youngest Son of the Duke Is an Assassin, Вернувшийся младший сын герцога, Регрессировавший сын герцога, 歸來的少爺是暗殺者, La venganza del asesino de la espada demoniaca

author: Wu Zhe
artist: Yuan Dian Ge Zi Manhua (原点格子漫画)

title: Isekai Yururi Kikou
alt_title: 異世界ゆるり紀行, 異世界ゆるり紀行 ～子育てしながら冒険者します～, Isekai Yururi Kikou - Raising Children While Being an Adventurer, Another World Leisurely Journey - Raising Children While Being an Adventurer, A Journey Through Another World ~Raising Kids While Adventuring~, 异世界悠闲纪行, 异世界悠闲纪行～边养娃边当冒险者～, 異世界悠閒紀行, 異世界悠閒紀行 ~ 邊養娃邊當冒險者 ~
description:
"I'm terribly sorry!"

Takumi gets accidentally killed by the wind god Syl and is reborn and summoned to another world. After giving Takumi his sincerest apologies, Syl grants Takumi with skills and sends him to the world Etelldia that Syl presides over. However, this new world is a vast forest filled with dangerous monsters!

In the forest, Takumi finds a young boy and girl who appear to be twins. He is worried about their safety and names them Alan and Elena, and decides to take care of them. He soon finds out to his surprise they are able to defeat a monster with their bare hands. The three of them reach a town, and Takumi decides to register at a guild to make a living. He begins his life as an adventurer while taking care of the two children.

An isekai fantasy about an adventurer with two kids!
genre: Action, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Minazuki Shizuru

title: Collapsing Future
alt_title: Folding the Future, 折叠未来
description:
Lu Renjia, an intern teacher, joins Onion Academy.

On the day of her employment, her childhood friend and elder brother, Wu Qi, suddenly goes missing.

While searching for Wu Qi, she gradually discovers another soul residing in her body...

Who are they? And who am I? As she unravels the mystery of herself, she is fortunate to have companions from the academy fighting alongside her, confronting conspiracies, and revealing cruel hidden truths.
genre: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color
author: 洋葱学园

title: I'm Trapped in a Drama
alt_title: 막장드라마에 갇혀버렸다, I’m Trapped In A Terrible Drama
description:
The main character, who grew up as an orphan, finally achieves her dream of owning her own home after suffering.
Her joy was short-lived and she suddenly died while watching a drama she enjoyed, feeling pain in her chest. However, when she opened her eyes again, she was in a drama she had watched before she died! And that too, while possessing Shin Sera, a villain who tries to kill the female protagonist, but is destroyed by the male protagonists!

Shin Sera Loving's main character tries to escape from the drama to prevent her destruction, but there is a succession rival who hates her, a fiancé who doesn't even treat her as a human being, and a pervert with a blank face.... With a variety of male protagonists with outbursts of personality, are you getting more and more entangled?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Villainess, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Kang Noh

title: Heesu in Class 2
alt_title: 2반 이희수
description: Heesu's world revolves around Chanyoung, his best friend and secret crush. He doesn't mind cheering Chanyoung from the sidelines or listening to all his girl problems. He doesn't care if people only know him as "Chanyoung's friend." Then one day, Heesu starts hearing his name everywhere. On the bus, in the halls, during lunch… Turns out, there's a rumor going around school (Got a love problem? Find Heesu in Class 2 and he'll tell you what to do!) and with that, Heesu suddenly finds himself the center of attention. But how could he give anyone advice? He doesn't even know what to do about his own crush!
genre: Long Strip, Boys' Love, School Life
author: Lily

title: Kagurabachi
alt_title: カグラバチ, Кагурабати, Kagura Bowl
description: Young Chihiro spends his days training under his famous swordsmith father. One day he hopes to become a great sword-maker himself. The goofy father and the serious son--they thought these days would last forever. But suddenly, tragedy strikes. A dark day soaked in blood. Chihiro and his blade now live only for revenge. Epic sword battle action!
genre: Action, Comedy, Crime, Samurai, Mafia, Magic, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Hokazono Takeru

title: Renge to Naruto!
alt_title: れんげとなると！, Renge and Naruto!
description: It's been a few months since the neighborhood Chinese restaurant closed down, and when I stopped by for the first time in a while, I found that it had been transformed into a flashy, mysterious restaurant with its old signboard still intact. When I went inside, there was a gal there... This is a story about a Chinatown restaurant where gals are hospitable.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking, Gyaru
author: Nicolai

title: Golden Light Gratia, The Child Loved By God
alt_title: 신의 사랑을 받는 아이, 황금빛 그라티아
description:
Gratia, a girl considered useless and despised by her family, has a revealing dream where a mysterious man predicts a great future for her. She soon discovers that she is the lost daughter of the influential Luciffero family. In a surprising event, after being attacked, a golden light erupts from Gratia, forcing everyone around her to close their eyes.

When the light dissipates, young Gratia disappears and in her place an adult version of herself appears, with distinct features of Luciffero. With an imposing stature and undeniable beauty, she comes across Nea, her mother, and realizes that the transformation expected for the future happened that day.

This was the moment when ten-year-old Gratia and twenty-year-old Gratia switched bodies for the first time.
genre: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Mystery
author: 화 연재

title: Ikkyu
alt_title: あっかんべェ一休, 一休和尚
description: This is a biography of the famous Buddhist monk Ikkyu from the late Hisashi Sakaguchi. Set in 14th century Japan, Ikkyu must learn to live and excel as a monk, despite the fact that his father is the emperor. His intelligence and purity help him succeed, but he continues to get the short end of the stick in life. Can Ikkyu persevere in his quest for spirituality in spite of everything that is set against him?
genre: Historical, Drama
author: Sakaguchi Hisashi

title: Lady & Maid
alt_title: Agassiwa Maid, Dama Y Sirvientes, Lady and Maid, Señorita y Criada, 아가씨와 메이드
description:
An enormous fortune, a beautiful sprawling estate, and five adoring male maids… what more could a gal wish for? Yeon Hwa Lee is living out every girl's fantasy when she suddenly inherits her grandfather's estate, including his five loyal servants. Bom and Yeong Ho are so cute and adorable, Alexander is buff and sexy, while Won Hu and Edward are elegant and cool. Their only desire is to service their mistress… and Yeon Hwa simply can't resist.  
  
[Original Otome Game](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.BookpalComics.LadyMaid)
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Reverse Harem, Crossdressing, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Red Peach (레드피치)

title: Sakamoto Days
alt_title: Дни Сакамото, サカモト デイズ
description: Taro Sakamoto was the ultimate assassin, feared by villains and admired by hitmen. But one day…he fell in love! Retirement, marriage, fatherhood and then… Sakamoto gained weight! The chubby guy who runs the neighborhood store is actually a former legendary hitman! Can he protect his family from danger? Get ready to experience a new kind of action comedy series!
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Mafia, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Suzuki Yuuto

title: That Time I Was Blackmailed By the Class's Green Tea Bitch
alt_title: 关于被班上绿茶威胁那件事, 關於被班上綠茶威脅那件事
description:
Green Tea Bitch (n.): A woman who pretends to be pure and innocent but in fact is manipulative and calculating.

After school ends, a good honor student is threatened by the class's green tea bitch.
"I never thought you wide-eyed goody-two-shoes would do something like this."
"If you don't want me to expose your shameful secret…"

A cute romance that stems from a misunderstanding begins in *That Time I Was Blackmailed By the Class's Green Tea Bitch*!
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Xian Jun

title: Casino Gui
alt_title: カジノグイ, Парень из казино
description:
Gen Suzuki, a young man who grew up in an orphanage, is trying to live an honest life.  
But when the cruel reality of the 10 million yen debt from her sister hits him, he decides to rob a Dark Casino.  
What awaits him is the baptism of the underworld!
genre: Traditional Games, Psychological, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Mafia, Gore, Drama, Delinquents
author: Nozaki Hanaichi

title: Mikakunin de Shinkoukei
alt_title: 未確認で進行形, Engaged to the Unidentified, Unidentified in Progress, Comprometida con lo desconocido, 미확인으로 진행형, 未確認進行式, 未确认进行式, Помолвлена с незнакомцем
description: This is a four-panel comedy manga about Kobeni Yonomori, who on her 16th birthday suddenly has a young man with little presence named Hakuya Mitsumine and his little sister Mashiro appear in front of her. It turns out that Hakuya is her fiancé, and Mashiro is her future sister-in-law. The three (and Kobeni's overprotective big sister Benio) start living together under the same roof, and hilarious happenings occur.
genre: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Arai Cherry

title: End of the World
alt_title: エンド・オブ・ザ・ワールド
description: In addition to the title story about boy and a girl who kill their parents and roam the American Midwest, the collection includes five short stories: "VAMPS," Okazaki's version of a vampire tale; "Sunflowers," a summer vacation nightmare experienced by an elementary school student; "Little Sun in the Water," a coming-of-age story of bankruptcy; and "Otome-chan," a family story about a father with eccentric tastes. A collection of masterpieces by Okazaki Kyouko!
genre: Psychological, Drama, Vampires
author: Okazaki Kyoko

title: Gekiga Legend of Mao Zedong
alt_title: 劇画毛沢東伝
description: Based on a wealth of research, the book examines the life of Mao Zedong, the bright star who laid the foundation of today's China. The young Mao Zedong, who carried the banner of revolution through an era of upheaval, is depicted with images of unusual power with distinctive penmanship from Fujiko A, better known for his work in boys comics.
genre: Historical, Military, Drama
author: Fujiko Fujio (A)

title: Dungeon Elf - Dungeon ni Takarabako ga Aru no wa Atarimae desu ka?
alt_title: ダンジョンエルフ ダンジョンに宝箱があるのは当たり前ですか?, Dungeon Elf - Is It Normal for There to Be Treasure Chests in Dungeons?
description:
A mystery that not even the most devoted RPG enthusiast can answer.
Why are there conveniently placed treasure chests in dungeons?
In the thickets of the Forest of Beginnings, a perilous place where even a party of heroes must face the possibility of total annihilation.
Sometimes even within ordinary homes. Unbeknownst to all but the adventurers themselves, the treasure chests are always there, quietly aiding them in maintaining the balance of the world.
This is the untold, unnoticed tale of someone burdened with a treasure chest.
___
Made by GyroKnuckle and Tomozo under the group name “[River Slan](https://mangadex.org/author/1e179cfa-adca-4dcd-8247-23fa22e80a9e/river-slan)”.
genre: Adventure, Fantasy
author: GyroKnuckle

title: I Shall Master This Family
alt_title: 이번 생은 가주가 되겠습니다, Ibeon Saengeun Gajuga Doegetseumnida, Ibeonsaeng-eun Gajuga Doegessseubnida, In This Life, I Will Be the Lord, I'll Be the Matriarch in This Life, In This Life, I'll Become the Head of the Family, В этой жизни я - глава семьи, На сей раз я - хозяйка этой жизни, Я стану хозяйкой этой жизни, 今世は当主になります, 这一世我来当家主, 今生我会成为家主, 今生我來當家主
description:
I've reincarnated as Firentia Lombardy, the illegitimate daughter of the wealthiest and most influential family in the Empire. I thought I was all set to have a comfortable and luxurious life… but it wasn't long before my beloved father died, my relatives kicked me out, and our family went bankrupt!!

To add insult to injury, I was hit by a carriage one day when I drank (a bit too much) booze to drown my sorrows… but my despair was only temporary. When I opened my eyes, I found that I'd traveled back in time to when I was 7 years old!

I was surprised to see my father again in the flesh. But as if that wasn't already shocking enough, the 2nd prince, our family's once sworn enemy, was now following me around like a dog!

Now that I've been given a second chance at life, I'll take things into my own hands and claim both the 2nd prince and my family for myself!

---
**Links:**
* Alternative Official English - [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/i-shall-master-this-family/info)
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Kim Roah (김로아)

title: Koneko-chan, Kocchi ni Oide
alt_title: Kitten-chan, come over here., 仔猫ちゃん、こっちにおいで
description: After Yuuko graduated from junior college, she ended up managing a clothing shop. Though her career is going well, she hasn’t had time to work on her love life. One day, she’s out drinking with her best friend, Mikan, bemoaning her lack of a boyfriend for a Christmas date. When she trips and hurts her leg, Mikan asks her little brother Leo (an 18-year-old) to see Yuuko home safely. When they arrive at her apartment, though, Yuuko makes a move on him and they end up sleeping together. The next morning, she realizes that she not only slept with her best friend’s little brother, she actually took his virginity! Leo isn’t satisfied with it being a one-night stand, and they start having a completely sexual relationship. Will she be able to keep this from Mikan, and is it possible their relationship may grow to something more?
genre: Romance, Slice of Life
author: Watabe Mihou

title: Saki-chan wa Inma no Ko
alt_title: 咲ちゃんは淫魔の子（合掌）, Saki-chan Is a Succubus's Child, 咲酱是那梦魔之子
description:
Saki-chan, a succubus, has fallen in love with Rokuhara, a son of a temple, of all people. She tries her best to talk to him, but her succubus blood runs wild and she always ends up tempting him. "I wish I could say I love you honestly!"

This is a story about a pure and simple love of a succubus who can't be honest.
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic
author: Hotomura

title: HadaCamera
alt_title: Naked Camera, Голый фотоаппарат, ハダカメラ, 알몸 카메라, Обнажённый объектив
description:
Because he did not pass his college entrance exam, Kagami Kyosuke cannot stay close to Kojo Hikari, the love of his life. So instead he gets a part-time job near her university and buys an old camera since Hikari is passionate for photography. But as it turns out, that camera also has a secret which will get him involved in all sorts of "exciting" and "awkward" situations especially with Botan Oshikiri, his senpai and co-worker. How will Kyosuke's life play out now?  


---
genre: Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Harem, Drama, Supernatural
author: Honna Wakou

title: Otona no Bouguya-san
alt_title: Armor Shop For Ladies & Gentlemen, Магазин брони для леди и джентльменов, おとなの防具屋さん, 어른의 방어구점 씨
description: "All armor handled in this shop is…" On his way of searching for a job, young man Kautz caught a sight of a shop recruiting for a store clerk. When he entered, what he saw was… Welcome to the journey! Welcome to the adult armor shop!
genre: Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Ayamiya Fumi

title: Dagashi Kashi
alt_title: Дешёвые сласти, だがしかし, 粗点心战争, 다가시카시
description:
Shikada Kokonotsu's father owns a rural sweets shop, and he plans for Kokonotsu to take it over one day. 
However, Kokonotsu wants to be a manga author instead! 
One day in summer the cute but weird girl Shidare Hotaru, from a famous sweets company, comes to pay a visit. 
Apparently, Kokonotsu's father is famous and she wants him to join her family's company; 
he will only agree if she can convince Kokonotsu to take over the family business though.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Kotoyama

title: Somewhere Out There...
alt_title: 今のどこかで
description:
SHORT (unofficial and author-imagined) SEQUEL to "The Boy Who Collects the Stars".

Teenage Yoshika meets a new friend.
genre: Oneshot, Animals, Adventure, Doujinshi, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Natsu (ナツ)

title: Six Half
alt_title: 6.5, シックスハーフ
description:
Kikukawa Shiori wakes up from a motorcycle accident only to find out she's lost her memory! Try as she might, she can't remember anything about the yankee-looking boy who claims to be her boyfriend, her kind-hearted and good looking older brother, or her aloof and introverted younger sister.  
  
When she goes to school for the first time since her accident, she overhears people talking about her—and the things they say aren't flattering. From what she hears, she was a terrible person before the accident. Was she really as horrible as they're making her out to be? And will she ever get her memory back?
genre: Psychological, Romance, Incest, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Iketani Rikako

title: Isekai Metaller
alt_title: 異世界メタラー, Another World Metaller, Otherworld Metaller, Metalero de Otro Mundo
description:
Alex, a devoted metalhead, finds himself in deep sorrow at his band’s breakup concert. Amidst the sadness, he experiences an electrical accident due to equipment trouble...

When he wakes up, he discovers he has been transported to another world! In this new world, Alex encounters situations that are a metalhead’s dream, featuring werewolves and dragons, which excite him immensely. 

Determined to lead this otherworld to peace with his metal spirit, Alex sets out on an adventurous journey!
genre: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Music
author: Kasuga Ryo

title: Watashi ni Tenshi ga Maiorita!
alt_title: An Angel Flew Down to Me!, 私に天使が舞い降りた!, Мой ангел спустился ко мне!, 天使降臨到我身邊！, 天使降临到我身边！, Wataten: ¡Un ángel descendió ante mi!
description: The four-panel comedy manga's story centers on Miyako Hoshino, a shy college student and otaku. Miyako's younger sister Hinata, who is a fifth grader, has a classmate and friend named Hana. When they meet, Miyako falls for Hana at first sight.
genre: Loli, Comedy, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, Slice of Life
author: Mukunoki Nanatsu

title: Zatsuyou Fuyo Jutsushi ga Jibun no Saikyou ni Kizuku made
alt_title: 雑用付与術師が自分の最強に気付くまで, Until the Chore-Granting Sorcerer Realized That He Is at His Strongest
description:
Wimme Strauss is an adjunct sorcerer who provides support and does odd jobs. However, after defeating the master of the hierarchy, he is expelled from the party by the leader, whose pride is hurt. Wimme is at a loss, but his childhood ~~stalker~~friend Heidemarie finds him and recruits him for the biggest party, the Wings of the Dragon.
"It's like a miracle ...... fuhehe."
He claims that his achievement is a coincidence, but it's only a matter of time before everyone around him realizes what he's capable of.
genre: Action, Adventure, Magic, Adaptation
author: Tokura Haka

title: Shiba to Ran
alt_title: シバとラン, Shiba and Ran
description:
The master said: “Learn the art of popularity and train in its arts…”?!

Shibata is a high school boy who really wants to be popular. He worships his super popular female upperclassman, Ran, as “master” and becomes her disciple to learn the secret techniques to being popular. Where will this strange master-disciple relationship take them?

Drawn by the author of the popular manga, “Koi to Yobu ni wa Kimochi Warui”, this is a princely girl x unpopular boy high school love comedy between master and disciple!
genre: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, School Life
author: Mogusu

title: Rash!!
alt_title: ラッシュ!!
description: Asaka, the prison's nurse, is leaving her post to her gorgeous granddaughter Yuki, who will bring a lot of troubles and chaos in the life of the people around her, starting with detective Tatsumi, her childhood friend and now her neighbor.
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Drama, Police
author: Hojo Tsukasa

title: The Shikisaki Sisters Want to Be Exposed
alt_title: 四季崎姉妹はあばかれたい
description: One day, Tarou Yamada, who runs a detective business, slips on a banana peel and reincarnates into Tsukushi Shikisaki, the younger brother of three beautiful big-breasted sisters who will all die on the same day. As he spends time surrounded by the three beautiful sisters, he finds out that the boy he is reincarnated as will be killed by one of the three sisters ...!?
genre: Reincarnation, Comedy, Harem, Shota, Slice of Life
author: Asakura Ryousuke

title: Omae no Are wo Ore ni Choudai!
alt_title: Give Me Yours!, お前のアレを俺にちょうだい！
description: Aoi suffers from premature ejaculations. Surely, if he swallow's the semen of his friend Kazuki, who has late ejaculations, it'll fix him, right? It's like taking vitamins!
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Ayase Mano

title: Seitokai ni mo Ana wa Aru!
alt_title: 生徒会にも穴はある!, В студсовете тоже есть дырка!, There is Also a Hole in the Student Organization!, Even the Student Council has Holes
description: When it comes to the face of this student organization, it's a little weird, like a fool, scary, or moody. However, mysterious and futuristic days that seem strangely cute pass by.
genre: Award Winning, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Muchi Maro

title: Useless Ponko
alt_title: ぽんこつポン子, Ponko, La Inútil, 고물 로봇 퐁코, Бесполезная Понко
description:
The near future in a quiet seaside town.
Yoshioka, who has recently lost his wife, just wants to spend the rest of his days in peace.
However, Yoshioka's children, worried about their father's health, 
send an off-model housekeeping robot called Ponko to help him.
Unusual for the age, as human-like robots are then considered obsolete, 
Ponko does her best to serve Yoshioka, but her "best" is not that good. 
Yoshioka's quiet life is now changing, as this eager but ditzy robot girl manages to keep his hands full…
genre: Sci-Fi, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Keita Yatera

title: Senpai ga Uzai Kouhai no Hanashi
alt_title: A Story About a Senior Who Annoys His Junior, A Story About a Senpai Who Annoys His Kouhai, My Senpai Is Annoying, 先輩がうざい後輩の話
description:
Futaba Igarashi is a diminutive office lady who finds that her towering and boisterous work senpai Harumi Takeda always gets in her hair, but he always has her back, he always keeps her company, and she starts noticing that her heart is slowly veering towards him…  
  
1st place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga (2018)

title: Sasinsonyeon
alt_title: The Boy of Death, Sasinsonyeon, 死神少年, 사신소년, Жнец смерти, Reaper Boy, Hero Ticket, El Niño de la Muerte
description:
Lee Kyung Ho's mind was engulfed with ending his life due to bullying and the loss of his mother. He attempts to, but is saved. His determination to commit suicide somehow entices Sierra, a grim reaper who later offers him a contract. This contract blesses him with the ability to borrow the powers of the dead in their previous life in return of sacrificing years from his lifespan. For the sake of attaining what he wishes for, he eventually agrees to it.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=730656)

---

genre: Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Ryu (류)

title: Primal Hunter
description: Jake, a seemingly average office worker, unexpectedly finds himself thrust into a fantasy world teeming with dangers and opportunities. Rather than succumbing to fear, Jake thrives in this unfamiliar realm. As he navigates the expansive multiverse, his power grows and he transforms—evolving from a mundane office worker into a true apex hunter.
genre: Official Colored, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Zogarth

title: Silencer
alt_title: サイレンサー
description:
(from ebookjapan):

Shizuka Katsuragi is a female detective who loves silencers. She is assigned to the "annex" of the Community Safety Division, a hive of activity in the Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department.

 Her partner is Kenya Iha, the most eccentric person in the Metropolitan Police Department. The pairing of the two is a strange one, as they both pull each other down. 

With the policy of "conquer poison with poison," her beloved gun quietly blows fire today...
genre: Thriller, Action, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Mafia, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Police, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Buronson

title: Mikadono Sanshimai wa Angai, Choroi.
alt_title: 帝乃三姉妹は案外、チョロい。, 帝乃三姊妹意外的好對付。, The Mikadono Sisters Are Surprisingly Easy to Deal With., 帝乃三姐妹原来很好搞定
description: Though Ayase Yuu is the son of a renowned and talented actress, he is below average in anything he does. He is entrusted to live under the care of his mother's friend, and later discovers that he will also be rooming with the three sisters from his school who possess both beauty and talent. Though Yuu thought that an understanding would be impossible to reach between an ordinary person and those blessed with talent, the three sisters are surprisingly...?!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life
author: Hirakawa Aya

title: Melody of Iron
alt_title: Iron Melody, 鉄の旋律
description:
The Melody of Iron: Dan Takuya has both of his arms severed and is left for dead. He learns to control new arms made of iron with telekinesis and goes out for revenge.  
  
Included stories:   
- White Phantom  
- Revolution

[Official English](https://emanga.com/collections/osamu-tezuka/products/melody-of-iron)

---
**Volume 96 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works**
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Anthology, Crime, Martial Arts, Mafia, Adventure, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Medical, Horror, Police, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Tezuka Osamu

title: “Okaeri, Papa”
alt_title: 「おかえり、パパ」, “Welcome Back, Papa”, “Welcome Home, Papa”, Добро пожаловать домой, Папа, С возвращением домой, Папа, Welcome Back, Papa
description: A high school girl is trying to get obsessively close to her kind stepdad. Even going as far as watching him in bed with her mom.
genre: Psychological, Romance, Incest, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Semimaru

title: Ura Baito: Toubou Kinshi
alt_title: 灰色兼职：逃亡禁止, 灰色兼職：逃亡禁止, 裏バイト:逃亡禁止, Gray Part-Time Jobs: No Escape
description:
Ura baito, also known as a shady part-time job: a gray area job that pays very well. The price you pay is your life.  
Yume Kokuryo and Nagomi Shirahama are seeking a large sum of money for some reason. 
To that end, they casually dive into various shady part-time jobs. 

This work may affect you physically and mentally. Read it at your own risk. 
We are not responsible for any damage to your health.
genre: Ghosts, Comedy, Drama, Horror, Web Comic, Mystery
author: Taguchi Shoutarou

title: Naisho no Ofutarisama.
alt_title: ないしょのおふたりさま。, 秘密的二人。, 秘密的二人。, The Secret Pair
description: Is it wrong to think about eating food all day...? Eliza, a young lady who is only interested in food is brought a delicious gift by a delinquent named Misaki. She's scary... but she can't resist the allure of good food!
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Numa Chiyoko

title: Patalliro!
alt_title: パタリロ!, 巴得利奥
description:
Patalliro is the story of the young boy king Patalliro and his many misadventures as he avoids being assassinated 
by various beautiful boys thanks to the skills of his bodyguard, Major Jack Bancoran from England's Information Bureau. 
Later they're joined by the hot-blooded Maraich, and a beautiful love-and-hate relationship blossoms between him and Bancoran.
genre: Action, Comedy, Crime, Adventure, Military, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Maya Mineo

title: How to Live as a Villain
alt_title: 악당이 살아가는 법, Истинный злодей, The True Villain, Como vivir como un villano
description:
“You have been chosen as a player in the great game to select the next god’s successor, the Mission! Congratulations!”
Seonghoon has suddenly fallen into another world to participate in a game to become a god. This other world that is akin to that of a game contains players who cooperate and also kill each other in cold blood…!!
Seonghoon, a person without an ounce of talent, uses wicked and crude tricks to become an all-powerful player!
genre: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Rundgreen (룬드그린)

title: Kanojo ga Onii-chan ni Nattara Shitai 10 no Koto
alt_title: 彼女がお兄ちゃんになったらしたい10のこと, 10 Things I’d Want to Do if She Becomes My Big Brother
description: As a result of entering high school, Nanase moves into a sharehome. Only, there is a special rule that states "all the residents must be assigned a family role"!! What will happen of Nanase's life as she starts living with her pretend family...!?
genre: Comedy, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Akakoko

title: When a Villain Meets a Villainess
alt_title: 악당과 악당이 만나면, When Villainess and Villain Meet, When a Villain meets a Villain
description: Atalanta, the head of an underground organization, is infamous for committing violent acts against nobles. One day, she receives a commission from the Emperor to assassinate the tyrant Grand Duke Lionel Bianca. Atalanta dreams of a future where her and the members of her organization can live a normal life, so she accepts the commission and infiltrates the Grand Duchy to assassinate him… But, why can’t he be killed? Will Atalanta be able to safely escape from the Grand Duke, who is suddenly whispering confessions of love?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Salk (삵)

title: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Natsuyasumi-hen
alt_title: The Irregular at Magic High School  - Summer Vacation Arc, Непутёвый ученик в школе магии: Летние каникулы, 魔法科高校の劣等生 夏休み編
description:
Follows a variety of characters over their summer break between the Nine School Competition Arc and the Yokohama Disturbance Arc.  
  
Adaptation of the first five chapters of the original novel's volume 5.
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Military, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Satou Tsutomu

title: Sekai ni Hitori, Zenzokusei Mahou no Tsukaite
alt_title: 世界に一人、全属性魔法の使い手, The Only Person in the World Able to Use All Magic Attributes
description: After a traffic accident, Zenichi Kiyama, a humble office worker, was reincarnated as a baby in a different world called "perfect compatibility". However, the result of his attribute appraisal with crystal was "dark attribute". The worst result is that he is a demon child...! ?
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic
author: Katanakaji

title: Cheating Men Must Die
alt_title: 万渣朝凰, Phoenix Rising Above Evil, 負けヒロイン救済計画, 환생해결사, Hwansaeng Haegyeolsa
description:
Why torment scumbags for just a moment when you can do so forever? Join Su LuXia as she transmigrates into countless worlds with her ‘Supporting Female Character’s Counterattack System’ to unleash vengeance upon the deplorable male and female leads using a variety of tactics! 

Su LuXia: "The only thing that brings me comfort is the tears of remorse from scumbag men and the agonizing groans of despicable women who can't get what they want." 

System: "Has My Esteemed Host learnt to reel back her vengeful spirit? Nope, I guess not."
genre: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Long Strip, Romance, Martial Arts, Adventure, Video Games, Wuxia, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Vampires, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Shidai Man Wang

title: PTSD Radio
alt_title: 後遺症ラジオ, After Effects Radio
description: From the mangaka of Seeds of Anxiety comes another collection of short horror stories using introspection that will unhinge you… Best for midnight viewing!
genre: Monsters, Demons, Ghosts, Office Workers, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Nakayama Masaaki

title: Navigatoria
alt_title: ナヴィガトリア
description: Enter a world where the First Space War has ended, and Earth has claimed its first extraterrestrial colony. Manabu Houo, a boy born into a totalitarian state, finds his only joy in watching forbidden movies with his childhood friend, Hina-chan. However, one day upon returning home, he finds a group of government officials waiting for him...?! Watch as this thrilling sci-fi school drama unfolds on a distant planet!
genre: Sci-Fi, Drama, School Life
author: Oshiishi Waka

title: The Invincible Summoner Who Crawled up From Level 1
alt_title: レベル1から始まる召喚無双~俺だけ使える裏ダンジョンで、全ての転生者をぶっちぎる, Unrivaled Summoner Starts From Level 1: Destroy All the Reincarnated People in the Secret Dungeon That Only I Can Use
description:
After losing his father in a tragic accident, Shinobu Iijima and his younger sister Megumi are taken in by their father’s old friend, Ayumu.

Shinobu works hard in the hopes of starting a new life for himself. Megumi, and a mobile game called La Vita Online, are the only things keeping him afloat.

One day, Ayumu reveals his true intentions of tearing Shinobu down and getting his hands on Megumi. But just after Shinobu learns that Ayumu deleted all of his game data in La Vita, their high-rise apartment catches on fire and Shinobu falls to his death, Megumi in tow. He wakes up in a strange new world... and realizes he’s been reincarnated into the world of La Vita Online.

An announcement from the devs tells him that Ayumu is already there, and a countdown to Megumi’s arrival is ticking. Shinobu vows to protect Megumi after she arrives at any cost, even if it means he has to crawl his way up from level 1 to fend off all the other reincarnated players.
genre: Action, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Shiraishi Arata

title: My Stepmother Made Me Fall For Her
alt_title: 我在恋综被影后后妈强制爱了, Мачеха заставила меня в неё влюбиться, I was forced to love by my stepmother, Stepmom made me fall in love with her
description: Ruan Tao, who originally wanted to dominate the entertainment world, encounters her malicious stepmother at the very beginning of her career. However, the stepmother is a great actress who dominates the world of entertainment with an iron fist. Ruan Tao can only submit and at the same time think about how to overthrow the evil stepmother's reactionary forces!As a result, she is arranged to participate in a romance reality show with her stepmother, but who is to tell her that it isn't a young love reality show with men and women courting each other? What is the plot when the stepmother holds her hand and asks with concern, fearing that she will hurt herself?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: 2396 Studio (二三玖陆工作室)

title: The Funeral Procession of K
alt_title: Kの葬列
description: The funeral bells are ringing the day that Mikaya moves into his new apartment. However, once he arrives, he learns a startling fact: the room he's moving into belonged to the dead man, K. Strangely enough, no one ever found K's body. Where is the body, and which of his eccentric neighbors was the one who killed K…?
genre: Psychological, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Kusumoto Maki

title: The Constellations Are My Disciples
alt_title: 성좌들이 내 제자
description: 300 years ago, Martial God Hyun-oh Kim defeated Barche, the boss of the tower of destruction, and prevented the end of the world. Kim Hyun-oh, should have died suffering the same fate as the tower of destruction. However, after 300 years, he is reborn as the 17-year-old Kim Joo-hyuk. In the midst, he finds out that the “Constellations”, that were created during his absence, are his disciples from 300 years ago and sets on a journey to find them.
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Magic, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Cha Jiwoon

title: Shinozaki-kun no Mente Jijou
alt_title: The Everyday Maintenance of Shinozaki-kun, 篠崎くんのメンテ事情
description:
Shinozaki – an everyday, ordinary salaryman whose head has been coming off too easily lately – finds his otherwise-typical life suddenly interrupted by a young woman named Yuuyake. 

According to her, Yuuyake’s magician grandmother modified Shinozaki’s body to an extreme degree in the past- and he’s chock-full of machinery! 

…All of which require maintenance that Yuuyake will apparently now be performing regularly. 

With that, the slightly off-color daily life of an utterly ordinary salaryman, a magician, and a strange black creature named Grey begins!
genre: Comedy, Office Workers, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Burio Michiru

title: Nezumi no Hatsukoi
alt_title: ねずみの初恋, Nezumi's First Love
description:
Nezumi is a girl who was raised as a hitman by the yakuza and grew up not knowing human love. An ordinary young man, Ao, knows nothing. They fall in love and start to live together, but the evil hand is close at hand... This is a story of first love, so cruel and so sad.

Read the prequel oneshot featuring Messiah-chan's backstory [here](https://mangadex.org/title/a53ff4b3-1514-4b91-9fa0-acd99dd797de/gomennasai-messiah-chan).
genre: Romance, Crime, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama
author: Oseto Riku

title: Makikomarete Isekai Teni suru Yatsu wa, Taitei Cheat
alt_title: Those Who Get Caught Up in Another World Are Usually Cheaters, He is a matchless warrior in different-dimension world!!, Непревзойденный воин в другом мире, 巻き込まれて異世界転移する奴は、大抵チート, 휘말려서 이세계 전이하는 녀석은 대개 치트
description:
One day during lunch break, High School student Takanashi Kyousai and four friends are suddenly transported to another world of Swords and Magic. The Princess of the Other World,  who was the Time-Space Magician that summoned them, wants them to be Heroes and defeat the Demon King to save her world. 

While his four friends were taken aback by this sudden turn of events, Kyousai was calm and said, "It's just like a story". However the Princess made a shocking statement: 

"I only summoned four Heroes, didn't I?" 

What fate awaits Kyousai, the man who was accidentally summoned to another world?

---
genre: Action, Demons, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Kaitou Hakobune

title: Toki
alt_title: 怜-Toki-
description: A Saki spin-off series. It follows the characters Toki Onjouji, Ryuuka Shimizudani and other girls from Osaka during their elementary and middle school years.
genre: Traditional Games, Comedy, Sports, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life
author: Kobayashi Ritz

title: Demon King of the Royal Class
alt_title: 마왕은 학원에 간다, The Demon Prince Goes to the Academy, El Principe Demonio va a la Academia, 魔王去上學, 魔王在学校的生活, 魔王様は学園に行く
description:
Upon dying, the author of "The Demon King is Dead" is given two choices: go to hell or be reborn in his novel and survive till the end.

The problem? He's reborn as Baalier Junior, a weak demon prince, after his realm was conquered! To make things worse, his attempt to escape somehow gets him enrolled as a student of the Royal Class in Gradias Temple, a prestigious human school.

In the midst of plotlines and political schemes, can this author keep his identity a secret and reach a happy ending?
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color
author: 로노푸

title: Saki
alt_title: 咲, 咲 -Saki-, 咲‐Saki‐
description:
Saki's never been a big fan of mahjong. A lifetime of being forced to play with family at holidays (and losing her money as a consequence...) has left a foul taste for the game in her mouth. When she's convinced, though, to play a game with her classmates, she discovers that not only has fending off her family left her with an uncanny ability for the game but, more surprisingly, that it can even be fun!

Is this revelation enough to cleanse Saki's distaste for the game? Can her classmates convince her to join their club, or is there just too much baggage to make it worth her while?
genre: Comedy, Sports, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Kobayashi Ritz

title: Kubera
alt_title: Kubera - One Last God, Kubera: One Last God, One Last God Kubera, One Last God, Kubera, Кубера - Последний Бог, クベーラ, 庫佩拉, 쿠베라
description:
Gods with everlasting lives. Sura who possess unrivaled power. And humans, caught helplessly in-between.  
When Kubera's peaceful village meets its fiery end, a mysterious magician named Asha comes to her rescue. Together they begin a journey in search of answers and revenge. Meanwhile across the realms, a web of entwined fates is growing tighter. One by one the other players of the game will emerge, each with their own agenda to pursue.  
At the center of this maelstrom stands Kubera, the girl with a god's name. Will this sixteen-year-old be the salvation of the world or its destruction?
genre: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Currygom

title: Chigau Miyahara Omae janai!
alt_title: ちがう宮原おまえじゃない！, No, Miyahara, Not You!, 錯了宫原、不是妳啊！, 我要找的、才不是宫原你啦！, ちが宮, NoMiya
description: The manga centers on Arima, a boy who has a crush on a girl named Yukihira. But every time he tries to make a move to get closer to Yukihira, his other friend Miyahara just happens to be in the scene and will always mistakenly think that Arima is making a move on her. (Source: [ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2022-11-11/midori-obiya-launches-new-manga-mini-series/.191780))
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Obiya Midori

title: Demonic Emperor
alt_title: Best Devil Housekeeper, Demon Emperor Butler, Demon Emperor Great Butler, Demon Emperor Housekeeper, Devil Butler, Housekeeper is the Magic Emperor, Magic Emperor, Mo Huang Da Guan Jia, The Devil Butler, The Steward Demonic Emperor, The Steward Demonic King, Как демон-император стал дворецким, 魔皇大管家, The Servant Is the Demon King?!, Demon King Steward
description:
Because he had the heritage of the ancient Demonic Emperor, Demonic Emperor Zhuo Yifan met the misfortune of being betrayed and killed by his trusted disciple. After being reborn, his cultivation went back to zero and he was trapped by a heart demon, given no choice but to become the housekeeper of the Luo Family's lone eldest miss. From being a Magic Emperor to being an insignificant housekeeper, how would he get along with his "heart demon eldest miss" and what power would he gain in order to lead himself and the declining family to rise back to the peak of the continent!


---

**Note:** 魔 can mean "magic" and "demon", while 管家 can mean "butler" and "housekeeper". I'm not sure as to why the previous translator decided to use "Magic" when it's a cultivation world, but I'll just follow. And Zhou Fan never does the work of a housekeeper throughout the manhua.

---

[Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-servant-is-the-demon-king/info)
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

title: Necromancer, the Ultimate Scourge!
alt_title: 死灵法师！我即是天灾, Necromancer! I Am a Disaster, Necromancer: King of The Scourge, Disastrous Necromancer, Catastrophic Necromancer
description:
In a world where magic and monsters exist, Lin Moyu has hit the age of acquiring his very own profession. While most would be lucky just to obtain a high-level combat class, Moyu becomes the ultrarare necromancer!

Being the first and only one of his kind, he has no idea of the potential he possesses on his journey to level up and face great challenges.

What new heights will Moyu achieve with his unique army of undead?
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Full Color
author: Blackbird Club (黑鸟社)

title: Yowamushi Pedal
alt_title: Weakling Pedal, 弱虫ペダル, 飆速宅男, Трусливый велосипедист
description:
Otaku Sakamichi Onoda has just entered high school and plans to join the anime club. In middle school, Onoda didn’t have any friends with whom he could talk about anime, games, Akihabara and other otaku things, and he is hoping he can make such friends in the anime club, but he finds out it's been disbanded. In order to reestablish the club he tries to find 4 other people who would like to join.  
  
Since he was a little boy, Onoda has ridden his mamachari–a bulky bicycle with a step-through frame mainly used for short rides, such as for casual fun or to pick up groceries–to go to Akihabara every week to check out or buy otaku things. Fellow freshman Shunsuke Imaizumi and bicyclist, while training, notices a boy (Onoda) riding his mamachari up a steep road.  
  
Freshman and road racing cyclist, Shokichi Naruko visits Akihabara to get some Gundam plastic models for his younger brothers and meets Onoda who catches his attention because of the his cycling skill on the mamachari and later find out they go to the same school. Later on, both Naruko and Imaizumi try to convince him to join the bicycle racing club, but will he?


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by m&c! Comics as **Yowamushi Pedal, Go!**

---
- **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2015, which it shared with The Seven Deadly Sins**
genre: Award Winning, Psychological, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life
author: Watanabe Wataru

title: Toys of the Trade
alt_title: 조선음구공방, Joseon Musical Workshop, Joseon Sex Shop, 汉阳工坊, 玩具工坊
description: Nobleman Park Hyowon is no stranger to the pleasures of the flesh. If anything, he’s actually quite experienced. So when a friend mentions an oh-so-secret sex toy workshop, Hyowon’s interest is thoroughly piqued. But the coarse Shinwoo is nothing like the refined artisan Hyowon expected, and he finds himself drawn in by the man’s almost rude nature. So much so, that he’s determined to get past that rough exterior, and what better way than by targeting his pride? Accusing Shinwoo of lacking confidence in his products, Hyowon demands a hands-on demonstration, and soon gets much more than he bargained for when Shinwoo shows him pleasure he could never have imagined. There’s just one thing Hyowon can’t figure out. Just how much of his pleasure is caused by the art…and how much by the artisan?
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Boys' Love, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Songmi

title: Catenaccio
alt_title: カテナチオ
description: Yataro Araki, a member of the Tojo High School soccer team, has big dreams. Within a decade, he sees himself conquering the soccer world’s loftiest peak: European “football!” Fast forward to what may be his last soccer match before graduation, the match that will make or break his dreams. Having thus far failed to attract the attention of scouts, he is now desperate to do whatever it takes to prove himself. Yataro is prepared to get his hands dirty if it means winning. If it means standing at the top! Welcome to the world of international football! Nothing is sacred, no rule is left unbroken! Not when victory is on the line!
genre: Psychological, Sports
author: Morimoto Daisuke

Living in Ataraxia, a world of swords and magic, a reincarnated individual decided to make a living out of streaming.

Living in a world where such a thing did not exist despite the many forms of entertainment, he quickly made a name for himself.

This is not the tale of just a streamer… but of a boy who becomes a legend as a haishinsha.

title: Osanajimi no Koukousei no Aida ni Nikutai Kankei wa Seiritsu suru ka.
alt_title: 幼なじみの高校生のあいだに肉体関係は成立するか。, ¿Se puede establecer una relación física entre amigos de la infancia y estudiantes de preparatoria?, Are Physical Relationship Possible Between Childhood Friends of High School Students?
description:
Del autor de "Hirasaka Hinako es eróticamente linda", un trabajo completamente nuevo de Konya Yunkio.

La inocente Yuka Ota, la sexualmente curiosa Kasumi Niiyama, el evasivo Kosei Horie y el enamoradizo Ryuhei Onosaka. Los cuatro chicos y chicas de preparatoria, que han crecido como una familia, reciben en herencia una casa de una anciana, Hasebe Haru, valorada en cuatro millones de yenes y un plazo fijo. Bajo el mismo techo, se desarrollan el amor y la amistad excéntricos de estudiantes de preparatoria. Una historia juvenil ligeramente erótica.

Of course, viewers are excited, but will those being watched feel the same excitement...?
 Brought to you by mmk of 'Love Comedy Quest,' this is a pure love short comedy of the new era about 'neighbors'!

title: The Life of a Returning Officer
alt_title: 회귀 경찰의 리셋 라이프, Hoigui Gyeongchalui Riset Laipeu, Police Returner's Reset Life
description:
Choi Jong-hyuk, captain of the intellectual crime unit, loses his mother and his own life to a mysterious mastermind for digging too deeply into a case. In his last moments, Jong-hyuk catches a glimpse of the man who kills him before waking up as his 17-year-old self.

 To prevent his mother's death, Jong-hyuk swears to hunt down the one responsible. Luckily, he has knowledge about the future and his experience as an officer.

Will these tools be enough to catch the criminal that eluded him once?
genre: Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Crime, Drama, Fantasy, Police, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Hangil

title: Nichijou
alt_title: My Ordinary Life, Мелочи Жизни, 日常, 일상
description:
While the title suggests a story of simple, everyday school life, the contents are more the opposite. The setting is a strange school where you may see the principal wrestle a deer or a robot's arm hide a rollcake. However there are still normal stories, like making a card castle or taking a test you didn't study for. The art style is cute but mixes with extreme expressions and action sequences for surprising comedy bits.

(The original magazine run ends at Chapter 192)
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Mecha, Martial Arts, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Arawi Keiichi

title: Fate/hollow ataraxia
alt_title: フェイト／ホロウアタラクシア
description:
The plot of Fate/hollow ataraxia is based half a year after the events of Fate/stay night. Like its preceding counterpart, the story is set in Fuyuki City. Bazett Fraga McRemitz, a member of the Mages' Association and a master in the 5th Holy Grail War, wakes on the fourth day of the 5th Holy Grail war with a new servant, Avenger, and no memory of what happened to her beforehand. She and Avenger set off to fight and win the Holy Grail War.  
  
Meanwhile, Shirō Emiya lives a peaceful life with all his friends from the 5th Holy Grail War. After one of her experiments changes time and space, Rin Tōsaka leaves for the Mages' Association in England to fix things. The Servants sense a new danger while dark creatures appear soon afterward. Shirō, as a precaution, sets off to ensure nobody is in danger and instead finds himself frequently meeting a mysterious girl, Caren Ortensia.  
  
Both Bazett and Shirō find themselves in time loop that lasts four days, beginning of the fourth day of the 5th Holy Grail War. Each time they die or survive four days, they always awake on the first day of the loop aware of what has happened to them since the first time loop began. Determined to end the loop, Bazett, Avenger, and Shirō fight to discover the truth behind what's causing the endless four days.
genre: Action, Fantasy
author: TYPE-MOON

title: re CERVIN
alt_title: レ・セルバン, Возвращение Сервана
description: Once upon a time, an evil dragon lived in this world. To fight it, humans joined forces with the inhabitants of Paradise and, one day, were able to seal an ancient evil. But years passed and the seal was broken, and the dragon was freed to wreak havoc and destroy countries again. A king who has lost his kingdom and a girl who has lost her memory.
genre: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Hamada Kousuke

title: Shin'yaku Märchen
alt_title: New Testament Märchen, Shinyaku Märchen, Shinyaku Marchen, 新約Märchen
description:
Torikai Yasuyuki's comic adaptation based on the fantasy band Sound Horizon's Prologue Maxi Ido e Itaru Mori e Itaru Ido and 7th Story CD Märchen.   
  
Fairy tale of light and darkness. Connecting and spinning, everything will be linked…  
  
Es war einmal, vor langer Zeit, ein Junge namens Mär. Sein Haar war weiß wie Schnee, doch blind war er.  
Ein Herz voller Güte nannte er sein eigen, doch Leid stand ihn bevor. Als schlussendlich sein Glück entschwand und nur Dunkelheit und Tod waren bei seiner Seit, da traf er den Mann gekettet ans Land mit Ketten aus Tod und Leid.
genre: Historical, Drama, Fantasy, Tragedy
author: Sound Horizon

alt_title: Demon King's Demon Resources, 魔王の人事, 魔王人事
description: Igel sama the demon who soon will become the greatest member of the Demon King Army's Four Heavenly Kings! Except that on the day she thought she would finally be promoted she instead get transferred to the Demon Resources Department which seems to be the subject of lots of suspicious and scary rumors…

title: 【Oshi no Ko】
alt_title: Hijos predilectos, 【My Star】, Звёздное дитя, 推しの子, 【推しの子】, Ребёнок идола, 【我推的孩子】, 【최애의 아이】
description:
The story begins with a beautiful girl, her perfectly fake smile, and the people who love her selfishly for it.  
  
What transpires behind the scenes of the glittering showbiz industry? How far would you go for the sake of your beloved idol? What would you do if you found out reincarnation was real? The star of the show is Aquamarine Hoshino and the stage is but a mere facade. Will he manage to reach the climax before the world of glamour swallows him whole?

title: Inkya de Wotaku de Binbou Dakedo Bijin Ojou-sama ni Osaretemasu
alt_title: 陰キャでヲタクで貧乏だけど美人お嬢様に推されてます, Я застенчивый и бедный отаку, но эта красивая богатая юная леди одержима мной., I'm a Shy and Poor Otaku, but This Beautiful Rich Young Lady Is Obsessed With Me
description: Eiji is a high school student who lives with his father, an unsuccessful novelist. He is a shy, otaku, and poor boy, but he is an honest boy who never forgets the compassion for others that his late mother taught him. Even he yearns for Aoi, the daughter of the president of a large company. However, Eiji is unable to look Aoi in the eye because of the huge disparity between her and himself. One day after school, Aoi greets Eiji when he comes home. Aoi says one surprising thing to the surprised Eiji...
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Mitsuki Rin

title: Nine Peaks
alt_title: ナインピークス, Девять вершин, Пиковая девятка
description:
A heartwarming tale of a father and son's bond.

After just starting at his new school, Mashio Gaku is suspended within a week for getting into a scuffle with a third year. After returning home to his disapproving dad's okonomiyaki joint, his father, Mashio Harumi, can't help but reprimand him and refuses to serve him.

Their harsh words are the last exchange they share before an unfortunate traffic accident takes Harumi's life.

At his father's wake, Gaku finds out he was, in his words, a big fuckin' deal. In mourning, Gaku heads out to fish like him and his father always would, only to hook a big catch and get pulled into the water...

When he comes to, he finds himself staring a familiar stranger in the face... **in the year 2000.**
genre: Time Travel, Action, Delinquents
author: Tetsuhiro Hirakawa

title: Unexpected Luck
alt_title: 追尾, Rear-End Collision
description:
"Young Master Chi, you're not going to help me unconditionally, are you?"

"You'll find out soon enough what this deal entails. Now, all you need to do is give me an answer. Do you want this opportunity or not?"

"Yes, I do."

Chi Mingyao made a deal with an actor who was brave enough to block him because of a car accident. He only wanted to tease the little actor at first, but eventually, he genuinely wanted to befriend Li Yangxiao and pass on his good luck to him—all so that Yangxiao could chase his dreams without a care in the world.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Tan Shi (潭石)

title: Haikei "Kouri no Kishi to Hazere-Hime" Datta Watashitachi e
alt_title: 拝啓「氷の騎士とはずれ姫」だったわたしたちへ, 경애하는 「얼음 기사와 못난이 공주」 였던 우리들에게, Dear Us Who Used to Be "the Ice Knight and the Failure Princess"
description:
The sickly and socially withdrawn Princess Ridelle fell in love with the quick-witted knight, Sir Oscar and became his wife. But after finding out that Oscar didn't wish for the marriage, their marriage life became no different than a pile of misfortunes.  
  
Soon, Ridelle was struck down by another tragedy, changing both of their lives tremendously, but…  
  
This is the love story between a former princess who was looked down upon as "the Failure Princess," and the young count known as "the Ice Knight"—the crossing of their paths weaving tragedies in their wake.
genre: Reincarnation, Romance, Sexual Violence, Drama, Adaptation, Tragedy

title: Kuroko's Basketball
alt_title: 黒子のバスケ, The Basketball Which Kuroko Plays, The Basketball which Kuroko Plays.
description:
Kuroko is a member from the legendary middle school basketball team known as -The Generation of Miracles-, and while nobody seems to know about him, the main 5 players of the team all admit that he is a better player. When he joins the high school basketball team, everyone is surprised to find out that he is small, weak, and easy to miss. What is the secret that makes him so strong, and how will he help his high school team?

Official Release:
- Indonesian release by m&c! Comics as **Kuroko's Basketball** (2013)
genre: Action, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

In Chinjuku, the city that never sleeps, there is a psychic senior police officer who has powers beyond human comprehension! His name is Meguru Chojo! description: Yusei Matsui, creator of Assassination Classroom and Neuro: Supernatural Detective, is back! Set in feudal Japan in between the Kamakura and Muromachi periods, our hero Hojo Takatoki is a boy on the run that history all but forgot! When the Kamakura shogunate is overthrown by Ashikaga Takauji, Takatoki's family and standing are visciously taken away from him, and he must flee to the far reaches of the land to survive and seek out his revenge!

title: White Cat Legend
alt_title: Journal of the Dali Court, 大理寺日志, Дневник палаты по уголовным делам
description: This amusing and charming story happened in 7th century ,when the first and only female monarch of ancient China got the throne. We follow the daily life of Chen Shi, a kind young man who came to the capital city Luoyang to look for his brother. To find him, he went to the Dali Court (a government institute like nowadays High Court of Justice). One thing led to another, he eventually became a secretary for Li Bing, a senior official with the appearance of a white cat.
genre: Historical, Animals, Long Strip, Comedy, Crime, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color

title: Bleach (Official Colored)
alt_title: Bleach - Digital Colored Comics, BLEACH (Official Colored), BLEACH カラー版, ブリーチ, ブリーチ カラー版, 死神, 블리치, BLEACH
description:
Ichigo Kurosaki has always been able to see ghosts, but this ability doesn't change his life nearly as much as his close encounter with Rukia Kuchiki, a Soul Reaper and member of the mysterious Soul Society. While fighting a Hollow, an evil spirit that preys on humans who display psychic energy, Rukia attempts to lend Ichigo some of her powers so that he can save his family, but much to her surprise, Ichigo absorbs every last drop of her energy. Now a full-fledged Soul Reaper himself, Ichigo quickly learns that the world he inhabits is one full of dangerous spirits, and along with Rukia, who is slowly regaining her powers, it's Ichigo's job to both protect the innocent from Hollows and to help the spirits themselves find peace.   
  
Monochrome version won the 50th Shogakukan Manga Award in the Shounen category.
genre: Official Colored, Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Kubo Tite

title: Act Like a Boss Monster, Mr. Swallow!
alt_title: 보스 몹답게 행동하세요, 스왈로우 씨!, Ведите себя как подобает боссу подземелья, господин Сваллоу!, The Unbeatable Dungeon's Lazy Boss Monster, Mr Devourer, Please Act Like a Final Boss, Boss Mopdapge Haengdonghaseyo, Swallow-ssi!, Actúe como un jefecito final, Sr. devorador
description:
The Primordial Core’s an unconquerable dungeon, the lair of the most powerful monster ever to exist, the Original Monster, the incarnation of evil — Swallow... who happens to be a lazy boss monster who just wants to sleep.

Taking care of this lazy bum is Renee, a homunculus maid whose obsession with Swallow knows no bounds. At this point, the only one keeping the dungeon running is Patrick, the last brain cell of the bunch — and he’s a skeleton!

Will Mr. Swallow get any rest amid all this chaos?
genre: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Reltree

title: Satanophany
alt_title: サタノファニ
description: A mysterious syndrome turns schoolgirls into homicidal monsters behind numerous atrocities in Japan. However, nothing is what it seems and when Chika Amagi is arrested for the brutal murder of five people, a journey into uncharted, troubled waters begins!
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Gore, Drama, Horror, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Yamada Yoshinobu

title: Ore ni wa Kono Kuragari ga Kokochiyo Katta: Zetsubou kara Hajimaru Isekai Seikatsu, Kami no Kimagure de Kyousei Haishinchuu
alt_title: 俺にはこの暗がりが心地よかった　―絶望から始まる異世界生活、神の気まぐれで強制配信中―, The Darkness Was Comfortable for Me, 黑暗使我感到愉悦, 從絕望開始的異世界生活
description:
“I will have the 1,000 people I have chosen go to a parallel world.”

Chaos spread once those words of God were displayed to the whole world.

Kurose Hikaru, whose childhood friend had been chosen, was killed together with her on the same day she was supposed to be transferred. However, for some reason, Hikaru didn’t die and, even though he wasn’t chosen at first, he ended up as one of the [Otherworlders that will have all their actions live broadcasted to Earth].

Transferred without any preparations at all to that accursed land, he faced threats innumerable times and somehow managed to survive with his Gift, the Dark Spirit Abilities.

“I must not die. I am sure the people on Earth are all rooting for me after all…”

This is the story of a young boy who is tossed about by the gazes of the viewers, yet eventually manages to raise his head and walk forward.
(NovelUpdates)
genre: Action, Psychological, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Supernatural, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Hoshizaki Kon

title: Shota Oni
alt_title: ショタおに
description: After leaving a scar on his best friend's face years ago, Tsubaki feels responsible and is determined to grow up big and strong so he can protect Yuu. Yuu is already in high school and Tsubaki is only in elementary, but he is sure that his feelings will get through and Yuu will eventually come to rely on him.
genre: Comedy, Boys' Love, Shota, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Nakayama Miyuki

title: The Great Mage of the Hero’s Party Reincarnates
alt_title: 용사파티 대마법사의 환생, The Rebirth of the Hero's Party's Archmage, El renacimiento del archimago del grupo del héroe
description:
At age 13, the genius wizard Rin embarked on a journey with Lista and the hero party to defeat the great evil known as “the Abyss,” which sought to plunge the world into chaos. But as the battle grew more intense, Rin’s body succumbed to the dark poison of the Abyss, putting his life in grave danger.

With the words “I’ll come back,” Rin’s soul entered a forced dormancy, only to reawaken 300 years later as a noble boy. Starting his second life in a peaceful world, Rin discovers that on one side of the world, the destined forces of darkness are beginning to stir once more.
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Potetorusu

title: Meiten Restaurant
alt_title: 冥天レストラン
description: As the distinguished son of a family who run a financial conglomerate, Gatarou Barazono took full advantage of his money to live a rosy life and enjoy it to its fullest. But one day, he suddenly got hit by a truck, and when he awoke, he found himself in the "Afterlife!" There, he finds the dubious-looking "Meiten Restaurant" (Underworld Restaurant), where the deceased are served their final meal before going to rest in peace...
genre: Reincarnation, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Cooking, Supernatural
author: Suzuno Suke

title: Ane no Tomodachi
alt_title: 姉のともだち, My Older Sister's Friend, Подруга старшей сестры, The Cutest Girl Closest to Me.
description:
Hinako, a friend of Asahi's older sister, is a frequent guest at the home of the high school boy. She always misleads his mind with her suggestive attitude while treating him like a little brother...or rather, pet? A love story between a gal who has a bugged sense of proximity and an otaku guy who acts like her parent! 

---
Chapters 1 & 2 can be found in the [Pre-Seralization](https://mangadex.org/title/abad18cf-bf72-4bbc-97c8-b55dfa28f9b9/ane-no-yuujin).
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Gyaru

title: Detective Conan
alt_title: Case Closed, 名侦探柯南, 名偵探柯南, 名探偵コナン, 명탐정 코난
description: Shinichi Kudo is a high school detective who sometimes works with the police to solve cases. During an investigation, he is attacked by members of a crime syndicate known as the Black Organization. They force him to ingest an experimental poison, but instead of killing him, the poison transforms him into a child. Adopting the pseudonym Conan Edogawa and keeping his true identity a secret, Kudo lives with his childhood friend Ran and her father Kogoro, who is a private detective.
genre: Award Winning, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Police, Mystery
author: Gosho Aoyama

title: APOSIMZ
alt_title: Country of Dolls, Страна кукол: Апосимз, 人形の国, 人形之国, 人形之國, 인형의 나라, Un pais de marionetas
description:
The 200,000 KM diameter artificial celestial body of APOSIMZ. Most of its volume is its core space, which is covered by a superstructural shell. Fifty centuries ago, the people who lost a war against the core lost their right to reside legitimately in APOSIMZ, and were left behind on the extremely cold surface. They face the spreading Frame disease and aggressive automatons which appear frequently on the ruins level. Yet even so, somehow people survive.  


---
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Adventure
author: Nihei Tsutomu

alt_title: 7人の眠り姫, Las Siete Bellas Durmientes, The Seven Sleeping Beauties, 爱寐七公主
description: A wandering prince set off to break an ancient curse bewitching the Kingdom of Amaryllis by waking up its princess with a kiss of true love. However, nobody told him there were 7 princesses to kiss and he must now take responsibility by living with them while they find out why the people of Amaryllis are unable to wake up. Will they reach a happily ever after?

title: Hero Killer
alt_title: 히어로 킬러, Убийца героев, 英雄殺手
description:
The world is in constant turmoil, with constant wars breaking out between Heroes and Villains.

Gifted with supernatural abilities, one lone girl sets out on a bloody path for revenge against the injustices of the world she lives in. With the constant clashes between titans, no one is safe.

If no one is willing to protect the innocent, who are the real heroes, and who are the real villains? What truly separates one from the other?
