*Death rollback? Predict future?*
Fang Xiu traveled to his other self in a strange world and gained the ability to “reverse after death.” What gave him an extremely powerful motivation to survive was his dearest strange wife. Fang Xiu swore: “The most gentle and beautiful wife in this strange world can only die in my hands.

alt_title: あなたと私の関係は？

Yuka, 28 years old and without a boyfriend, decides to participate in the group date. 
But what she meets there is a math teacher she had a crush on in high school...! The two become drinking buddies and meet more and more often, until one day they get drunk and end up spending the night at a hotel.  *"Ten years have passed, and I've grown up... but I'm liking him more and more... is it because I'm his former student? Or...?"*

description:
After his sister is devoured by a dragon and losing all their supplies in a failed dungeon raid, Laios and his party are determined to save his sister before she gets digested. Completely broke and having to resort to eating monsters as food, they meet a dwarf who will introduce them to the world of Dungeon Meshi - delicious cuisine made from ingredients such as the flesh of giant bats, walking mushrooms, or even screaming mandrakes.  
  
---

title: I Am a Hero
alt_title: Я — герой, アイアムアヒーロー, 请叫我英雄
description:
(from ebookjapan):

The series has sold over 8.3 million copies! The gold standard of zombie manga, "I Am a Hero," is now available in a "complete edition" with a new cover design, reprinted color pages from the serialization, and over 80 pages of new artwork in the final 22 volumes! Witness the new ending of the story. 

He is 35 year old who spends his time as an assistant to a mangaka, sometimes escaping into delusion in order to win over the agonizing reality. One day, however, a mysterious infection begins to spread without him noticing...and the real world begins to break down...⁉ 

He wanders into a world where the ordinary and the extraordinary, the mundane and the insane intersect. A personal survival panic horror story! 

[Official English](https://www.darkhorse.com/Books/25-142/I-Am-a-Hero-Omnibus-Volume-1-TPB)

She is not able to apologise, and after a few years, her foster brother becomes a knight-at-arms, but things are not what they seem.

alt_title: Sexy and Stupid Water Polo Comedy, ハンツー×トラッシュ
description: Hamaji Youhei, a freshman in high school, lives his life aimlessly, lazing around all day. He can't keep up with his studies, no good at sports and won't stick with anything for long. Besides that he's a pervert who's continuously rejected by girls. A sophomore convinces him into joining a club where he could lunge at girls, fondling and touching all he wanted. Thus he joined the Water Polo Club. Can Youhei, who never sticks with anything for long, find his place in this club?

alt_title: Король зверей и лекарственные травы., 獣王と薬草, Beast King & Medicinal Herb
description: Dungeons are the stuff of dreams—defeat the monsters, take their loot, and then venture into uncharted territory to discover hidden riches! Tina, an upstart adventurer with just such a dream, ends up mortally wounded while exploring a dungeon. Suddenly, the great demon known as the Beast King Garon, who was supposed to have been slain by a hero in the distant past, appears before her!  Dungeon fantasy meets medical drama!

alt_title: 寺町先輩は理解らせたい

genre: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, School Life
author: Fujita Nagisa

title: Munou wa Fuyou to Iware "Tokei Tsukai" no Boku wa Shokunin Guild kara Oidasareru mo, Dungeon no Shinbu de Shin mo Chikara ni Kakusei suru
alt_title: 無能は不要と言われ『時計使い』の僕は職人ギルドから追い出されるも、ダンジョンの深部で真の力に覚醒する, As a Watchmaker, I Was Kicked Out of the Craftsman's Guild Because My Incompetence Was Deemed Unnecessary, but I Awakened to My True Power in the Depths of the Dungeon, Watchmaker's Revenge
description:
In a world where skills are supreme, Shikuro is given the incompetent skill of "clock-user". One day, Shikuro, who is looked down upon by others, is accused of rape and sent to the frontier, where he is pushed down a hole that leads to a dungeon's deepest level.
In the depths of his desperate situation, he thought to himself, "If only I could use my clock-user ability to stop my stomach clock as well. Then the hunger would stop." This triggered the awakening of his skill "clock-user". Eventually, he makes full use of his abilities and is recognized as an SSS-class adventurer--.
genre: Action, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Roumu Kohaku

title: Koisuru Psycho no Shirayuki-kun
alt_title: 恋するサイコの白雪くん, Shirayuki-kun un Psicopata Enamorado
description:
I will kill everyone for your sake.

"Hey, I think I like you!" Shirayuki says with a smile.
Haruki endures relentless bullying from a trio of classmates. One day, a beautiful transfer student named Shirayuki suddenly approaches him and asks if he would date him if the bullying stopped. Haruki dismisses it as a joke. But the next day, one of his tormentors disappears. Then another. One thing's for sure—Shirayuki is a psychopath that lacks common sense and empathy.
genre: Thriller, Psychological, Boys' Love, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Delinquents, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: Enatsu Haruka

title: Ore no Koigokoro ga Moteasobarete imasu
alt_title: 俺の恋心が弄ばれています, My Love Is Being Played With
description: In order to drive away his persistent previous boyfriend, Yuzuha, one of a set of twins who are popular influencers, declares he’ll start a relationship with the passerby pudgy underclassman Yachiro. Although he was partially caught up in it, the kind Yachiro went along with it and agreed to pretend to be his boyfriend. Yuzuha fully enjoys playing at being lovers with warm and squishy Yachiro. However, when Yachiro loses weight and drastically changes into a gorgeous man, his heart won’t stop fluttering——!?
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, Slice of Life
author: Kuroiwa Chihaya

title: Maigo ni Natteita Youjo wo Tasuketara, Otonari ni Sumu Bishoujo Ryuugakusei ga Ie ni Asobi ni Kuru You ni Natta Ken Nitsuite
alt_title: 迷子になっていた幼女を助けたら、お隣に住む美少女留学生が家に遊びに来るようになった件について, お隣遊び, The Story of How a Beautiful Foreign Student Who Lives Next Door Started to Visit My House After I Helped a Lost Little Girl, After Coincidentally Saving the New Transfer Student's Little Sister, We Gradually Grew Closer
description:
One day, Charlotte Bennett transferred to Aoyagi Akihito's class. Her proper and refined mannerisms and adorable appearance captured the hearts of his classmates, but Akihito calmly takes a step back, feeling that she "lives in a different world."

However, helping Charlotte's lost sister, Ema, throws his daily life into upheaval...?!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Nekokuro

title: Mata Ashita
alt_title: Mata Ashita (MURATA Mayu), またあした (村田真優), 明天见
description: Towa's always been shy around guys, despite being a total tomboy. This has crushed her chances of ever having a boyfriend, but a perhaps fateful encounter on the first day of high school might lead to love? But will it be with the surprisingly kind "angelic" delinquent, or the popular yet secretly "devilish" prince?!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life
author: Murata Mayu

title: The One Within the Villainess
alt_title: 悪役令嬢の中の人, 悪役令嬢の中の人〜断罪された転生者のため嘘つきヒロインに復讐いたします〜, 恶役千金的真面目, 恶役千金的真面目～为被定罪的转生者向骗子女主报复～, 惡役千金的真面目, 惡役千金的真面目～為被定罪的轉生者向騙子女主報復～, 악역 영애 안의 사람, Akuyaku Reijou no Naka no Hito
description:
In order to clear the name of ‘Emi’, a girl who had reincarnated as Remilia, the villainess of an otome game, the real Remilia who had been watching all along inside awakens.

Now it's time for the true villainess's revenge to begin!
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: Makiburo

title: North Snow Love Story
alt_title: 북설애담
description: Seolha, a snow woman who hides her true identity and lives as a human, marries the Northern General, known for ruthlessly killing yokai! Can Seolha keep her secret and lead a happy married life without being discovered as a yokai?
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Hwiyo

title: Odoriba ni Skirt ga naru
alt_title: 踊り場にスカートが鳴る, 與妳翩翩共舞, The Skirt Sings at the Landing, The Skirt Rings at the Landing
description:
Haruma Kiki always dreamed of doing ballroom dance as the feminine "follower" role, but as she aged she only grew taller and taller, eventually causing her to give up ever looking good in a dress or anything ladylike. Now, as a second year in high school, she specializes in the masculine "leader" role—until one day, her partner suddenly leaves her. When Toribami Michiru, a short and pretty first year, shows up wanting to join the ballroom dance club, Kiki asks her to be her new partner, but Michiru reveals that she only plays the leader role—and she wants none other than Kiki as her partner.  
  
Bimonthly serialisation in Yuri Hime.
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life
author: Utatane Yuu

title: I Tried Confessing My Love to a Serious Girl
alt_title: カタブツ系女子に告白してみた, I Tried Confessing My Love to a Serious Girl
description: Although she's pretty, she's widely rumoured to be the school's number one straight-laced girl. So when I gathered up my courage to confess to her…‽
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic
author: Kobayashi Shoujo

title: His Name is 101
alt_title: その名は101
description:
(from ebookjapan):

Babel II is back! Koichi Yamano, a 16-year-old ESPer boy, is now called 101 at a research institute, where he donates his special blood to give vitality to the sick. 

However, he escapes when he finds out that ESPers are actually being created and misused by a huge organization. 

The battle between 101 and the organization has begun as 101 tries to dispose of his ESP abilites in order to keep the peace!
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Survival, Mafia, Adventure, Office Workers, Military, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Yokoyama Mitsuteru

title: To Those Of You For Whom Even Regret Is A Luxury
alt_title: For Those of You For Whom Regret Is a Luxury
description:
My younger sister became a great soprano through a song I wrote, had an affair with my husband, and my husband said it was all my fault. The moment I was dying at the hands of my family who deceived me, a second life miraculously obtained. I decided to get everything right from the beginning.

“A cheating wife. It's tempting. “You look like fun, you.”

I decided to borrow the power of this man, who was called a vicious murderer, and begin my revenge.
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Fairy Dragon

title: The Big Bees
alt_title: デカいはちの話
description: What if bees were big and fluffy? Like, really big and fluffy.
genre: Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Yu-hachi

title: Rascal Does Not Dream of Siscon Idol
alt_title: 青春ブタ野郎はシスコンアイドルの夢を見ない, Этот глупый свин не понимает мечту девочки идола
genre: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Miyazaki Jun

title: Shimeji Simulation
alt_title: シメジシミュレーション, Симуляция Симэдзи
description:
A surreal yet heartwarming 4-koma series about everyday life.  
  
From the author of Shoujo Shuumatsu Ryokou/Girls' Last Tour.
genre: Sci-Fi, Comedy, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, Philosophical, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Tsukumizu

title: Hananoi-kun to Koi no Yamai
alt_title: A Condition Called Love, 花野井くんと恋の病, 花野井君的相思病, I'm addicted to you.
description: Hotaru is a 16-year-old high school first-year who has always been ambivalent about love, preferring instead to have a lively life with her family and friends. So when she sees her schoolmate, Hananoi-kun, sitting in the snow after a messy, public breakup, she thinks nothing of offering to share her umbrella. But when he asks her out in the middle of her classroom the next day, she can’t help but feel that her life is about to change in a big way… [Kodansha]
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Megumi Morino

title: Quick Transmigration: Addictive Relationship
alt_title: 快穿：上瘾关系
description: Ling Qi, a mischievous rabbit spirit, stole the Celestial Emperor's prized carrots and was punished with trials across three thousand lesser realms. In each realm, he diligently cosplays various roles, from pervert to villain, with one goal: sabotage the central couple! However, despite his intentions not to seduce anyone, his attempts often fail. As the trials progress, Ling Qi realizes that everything was manipulated by the Celestial Emperor…
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: 佳思君

title: Lying Puppies Get Eaten
alt_title: 说谎的小狗会被吃掉的
description: The puppy is clearly an omnivore, then why does he have to pretend to be a carnivore? On his first day transferring into a new school, his secret was discovered by his fox classmate. Then begins his life of living under “threat”, but after spending more time with him, the fox isn’t actually too awful…?
genre: Animals, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color
author: _Px_

title: The Dangers in My Heart
alt_title: Угрозы в моём сердце, 僕の心のヤバイやつ, 僕ヤバ, 我心裡危險的東西, 我心里危险的东西, 내 마음의 위험한 놈, Los peligros en mi corazón
description:
A ‘fearsome psycho-thriller’ centering on the ‘dark side of adolescence’.

Following Ichikawa Kyoutarou, a teenage boy belonging to the very bottom caste of his school, this work details his troubled interactions with a certain classmate, and his attempt to hide murderous impulses that find themselves in the darkest recesses of his soul.

In reality, though, it's a sweet youth rom-com between a messed up boy and a bright, if somewhat strange, beautiful girl.

- Won the Tsugi ni Kuru Web Manga 2020 Award.
- Was nominated for the 2020 and 2021 Manga Taisho Award.
- Won the top prize of 2021 Tsutaya Comic Awards
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Sakurai Norio

title: Guide to Raising a Loyal Dog
alt_title: 忠犬攻略
description: A reward notice for a “lost dog” ties the fates of Ling Xiangwan and Bai Qingxiao together. As the poor university student, Ling Xiangwan, searches for the owner of the dog he is currently carrying, he accidentally catches glimpses of Bai Qingxiao’s naughty deeds. It is only then that he realizes this is not the kind of “dog” the notice was looking for. As the door to flee the scene is quite literally shut, Bai Qingxiao asks Ling Xiangwan to pay him company, how humiliating! Ling Xiangwan leaves, fuming. After that, Bai Qingxiao just can’t seem to get Ling Xiangwan out of his mind…
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: 星际数科

title: Island Part 2
alt_title: 아일랜드 2부, 靈甲鬼修羅 - 避邪回歸
description: "On the beautiful Jeju Island, MiHo Won, a beautiful teacher, and Van, a cold and mysterious guy, become entangled in strange events, fighting unknown monsters. A legend of exorcism comics is back as webtoon!"
genre: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Horror, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Youn In-Wan

title: I Became the Target of the Harem in Another World
alt_title: 我竟成了异世界后宫的采集对象
description: The dimensional wall is broken. Secret books, magical equipment, and spiritual beasts have descended, and the world has entered an era of hegemony. I want to hide, but a girl from another world comes to my door to collect my...
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Survival, Adventure, Video Games, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Supernatural
author: 羽栖

title: Seichou Cheat de Nandemo Dekiru you ni Natta ga, Mushoku dake wa Yamerarenai you desu
alt_title: I've Become Able to Do Anything with My Growth Cheat, but I Can't Seem to Get out of Being Jobless, 成長チートでなんでもできるようになったが、無職だけは辞められないようです, 只有无职是不会辞去的, 只有無職是不會辭去的, 성장 치트로 뭐든 할 수 있게 되었지만, 무직만큼은 그만둘 수가 없습니다
description:
I, Ichinosuke, failed to get a job 100 times in a row. In fact, my lifelong unemployment streak remains unbroken.

On my way to yet another job interview, I was involved in an accident with a truck and tragically passed away. Suddenly, a goddess bestowed upon me the ability to grow at a speed 20 times faster than normal… and another goddess, making a mistake, bestowed upon me the ability to grow at a speed 20 times faster than normal, before sending me to a game-like other world.

Wait, 20 times 20…. 400 times faster than normal?!

However, knowing that I would not become stronger even if I continued growing while being jobless, I aimed to get a job… but I discovered that remaining Jobless was a cheat in and of itself, provided you can stomach the slow leveling process. … Which I do at 400 times faster than normal.

As my Growth Cheat and Jobless Cheat existed side-by-side in this other world, the story of my adventure, no doubt certified by the job-placement agency as harmful material, begins here.
genre: Loli, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Tokino Yousuke

title: My Brother's Lover
alt_title: 내 형의 연인
description:
After confessing my love at the end of our graduation ceremony, we accidentally met again in college.

Chan-ran, a piano prodigy, and Hye-joon, an ex-lover of Chan-ran. Hye-joon, who has not yet forgotten his brother who has committed suicide, looked like him.

Agitated by his voice, Hye-joon, who was drunk, slowly closed his eyes and fell into the temptation to sleep...
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Sexual Violence, School Life, Web Comic
author: Ponpacha

title: Toppuu to Beat
alt_title: 突風とビート, Gusts and Beats, Toppuu and Beat
description: Nike, a mysterious high school girl living in a small town by the sea in Hokkaido, begins a mysterious journey to find her forgotten self when she meets Nemoto, a boy who rarely shows up for class.
genre: Romance, Drama, School Life, Mystery
author: Shiina Karuho

title: The Blond Yankee and The Punishment Game
alt_title: 金髪ヤンキーと罰ゲーム
description:
As part of her punishment game, the transfer student, Shindou Eruko, must talk to the coolest delinquent in the school, which turns out to be Hoshi Natsuki, the blonde delinquent in the class next door. However, she soon found out that Hoshi-kun might not be as scary as he looks...

This manga is Konogi Yoshiru's fantasy take on  [Shingeki no Eroko-san](https://mangadex.org/title/bdfc7777-f1ee-4131-82cb-2fb5861d32e1/shingeki-no-eroko-san-hen-na-oneesan-wa-danshikousei-to-nakayoku-naritai), depicting a setting with Eruko being in the same age as Hoshi-kun. It was later adapted in the main title as Eruko's dream sequence.
genre: Romance, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Konogi Yoshiru

title: First Call
alt_title: ファーストコール ～童貞外科医、年下ヤクザの嫁にされそうです！～, First call 〜 The Virgin Surgeon is About to be Married to a Young Yakuza!〜
description:
“I love you, doctor. Please become my wife.”

Takara Souta, a young and revered orthopedic surgeon, is brought in to work on a handsome man with a pierced penis—
The man turned out to be Ibu Seiichirou, the young leader of the Ibu clan and the largest crime syndicate in the Kanto region!
Ibu, who has fallen in love with Souta, the man who saved him, suddenly kisses and proposes to him, asking him, “to be his miss”!
 
A story too sweet to exist!
 The dangerous love comedy between a yakuza leader and a (virgin) orthopedic surgeon is finally comicalized!
 Includes a newly drawn manga, "Sudden Herpangina".
genre: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Mafia
author: Tanizaki Toruku

title: The Dangers in My Heart
alt_title: Угрозы в моём сердце, 僕の心のヤバイやつ, 僕ヤバ, 我心裡危險的東西, 我心里危险的东西, 내 마음의 위험한 놈, Los peligros en mi corazón

title: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun
alt_title: Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun, Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!, 入间同学入魔了, 魔入りました！入間くん, 마에 들어갔습니다! 이루마 군
description:
Iruma Suzuki, fourteen years old, can’t say no to any request. His irresponsible parents make him work dangerous job after dangerous job to support them, and then one day they sell him to a demon! But, much to his surprise, the demon wants to adopt Iruma as his grandson? Unable to refuse his request, Iruma becomes the grandson of the great demon Sullivan. His new doting demon grandfather enrolls him in Demon School Babyls – where Sullivan is coincidentally the principal. Thus begins Iruma-kun's extraordinary school life among the otherworldly, meeting many colorful demons, taking on daunting challenges, and facing his true self as he rises to become someone great. 

Cozy magical slice of life with occasional urban terrorism.
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy
author: Nishi Osamu

title: Sousei no Onmyouji
alt_title: Twin Star Exorcists, Оммёдзи двух звезд, Экзорцисты Двух Звезд, 双星の陰陽師, 双星之阴阳师, 쌍성의 음양사
description:
Rokuro Enmado is from a family of exorcists who remove evil Kegare, but his real dream is to be a singer, a soccer player, or anything other than an exorcist. When another exorcist, a girl named Benio Adashino arrives, Rokura is suddenly inflamed with competitive spirit and decides to put his natural knack to good use. Their rivalry gets more complicated when they both learn they are the destined "Twin Star Exorcists," two ultimate fighters fated to marry and create the prophesied child who will eliminate all the Kegare in the world.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Twin Star Exorcists** (2019)
genre: Thriller, Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Magic, Gore, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy, Gyaru
author: Sukeno Yoshiaki

title: Mugen no Skill Getter!
alt_title: 無限のスキルゲッター！, Limitless Skill Getter!, Infinite Skill Getter!
description:
During a Once-in-A-lifetime ceremony, the young boy, Yuri, receives the trash skill “Life transfer”, allowing him to transfer his life force to another person…
Crushed by despair after receiving the skill, Yuri encounters a woman who loses her life right in front of him. Wanting to be the one to decide who he gives his life to, he activates “Life Transfer”, dying on the spot. It had appeared as though the woman’s life was ended rather abruptly, however, the woman turned out to be the daughter of god. As a “thank you” for saving the life of his daughter, god resurrected Yuri, and in addition, gave him the ability to receive double the experience points each month.
With the endless amount of experience he gains, Yuri will leisurely walk the path to the world’s strongest, collecting endless amounts of skills along the way!
***
[Orignal webnovel](https://www.alphapolis.co.jp/novel/587737999/279349914)
genre: Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Maruzushi

title: Ariadne in the Blue Sky
alt_title: Ариадна голубых небес, 蒼穹のアリアドネ
description: Lacile, a human weapon made during the last great war who now lives in isolation, meets Leana a runaway princess from the floating city of Ariadne and becomes her knight of the blue sky. They set off into the outside world, both harboring the dream of seeing what the world has to offer!
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Animals, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Yagi Norihiro

title: Countach
alt_title: カウンタック
description: The day after he finds himself dumped by his girlfriend, Sorayama Shun recieves a letter… from himself? The letter was from Shun 25 years ago for his future self. The letter reminds him of the time when he dreamed of owning a Countach and being a successful professional racer. With loads of luck and his ambition to make his childhood dream come true, he finds himself as a new owner of an LP400 Countach.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Sports, Slice of Life
author: Umezawa Haruto

title: Random Chat
alt_title: Random Chat, Random Chatting, Random Chatting-ui Geunyeo!, The girl from Ranchat, Девушка из анонимного чата!, 匿名女孩!, 랜덤채팅의 그녀!, The Girl from Random Chatting!
description:
Joonwoo hates school and has trouble making friends. The only time he's happy is when he's talking to strangers on the Random Chatting phone app. That's how Joonwoo ends up befriending a girl on RanChat who turns out to be his classmate Sungah but she has no idea about it! Will Joonwoo be able to fight his social anxiety and become closer to her in real life?  

---
**Links:**
- Alternate Official Raw - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=3166015)
- Promotional video - [YouTube](https://youtu.be/YmCRdVGAOPk)

genre: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

title: The Great Ruler
alt_title: The Great Dictator, 大主宰, 斗破苍穹之大主宰
description:
The Great Thousand World. It is a place where numerous planes intersect, a place where many clans live and a place where a group of lords assemble. The Heavenly Sovereigns appear one by one from the Lower Planes and they will all display a legend that others would desire as they pursue the road of being a ruler in this boundless world.  
  
In the Endless Fire Territory that the Flame Emperor controls, thousands of fire blazes through the heavens.  
  
Inside the Martial Realm, the power of the Martial Ancestor frightens the heaven and the earth.  
  
At the West Heaven Temple, the might of the Emperor of a Hundred Battles is absolute.  
  
In the Northern Desolate Hill, a place filled with thousands of graves, the Immortal Owner rules the world.  
  
A boy from the Northern Spiritual Realm comes out, riding on a Nine Netherworld Bird, as he charges into the brilliant and diverse world. Just who can rule over their destiny of their path on becoming a Great Ruler? In the Great Thousand World, many strive to become a Great Ruler.  
  
*Note : The Comic Format Change From Normal Page to Longstrip Starting at Chapter 84,*
genre: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Ren Xiang

title: Giant Killing
alt_title: Сокрушение гигантов, ジャイアントキリング, 逆轉監督
description:
A truly great coach makes the game of soccer interesting! Tatsumi Takeshi is 35 and has spent the last few years coaching in England before being brought back to Japan to coach his old team. His favorite pastime? Causing giant upsets a.k.a. Giant Killing! 

---
Official Release:

- Indonesian release by Level Comics

genre: Award Winning, Comedy, Sports, Drama

title: My Wife Is From a Thousand Years Ago
alt_title: 我家老婆来自一千年前
description: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.
genre: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Full Color
author: 花还没开 (Hua Hai Mei Kai)

title: Somehow, I Started Living With a NEET Otaku Kunoichi (Pre-Serialization)
alt_title: ニートでオタクなくノ一となぜか同棲はじめました, Каким-то образом, но в моём доме поселилась куноичи-отаку, Somehow, I Started Living With a NEET Otaku Kunoichi, 不知为何我和NEET且宅的女忍者开始了同居生活
description:
A man is the target of a kunoichi's mission, and a lot of blood was spilled for him to learn this.  
  
However, said kunoichi is taking some "liberties" with the mission… Or are those part of the mission too?  
  
Approved scanlation by [@kotatsu358](https://twitter.com/kotatsu358)
genre: Monsters, Romance, Ninja, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Kotatsu (小龍)

title: My Dear Aster
alt_title: 마이 디어 아스터
description:
A few years ago, Lihen’s daughter said.

“If mother ever lives again, don’t give birth to me.”

“What are you talking about all of a sudden?”

“You don’t have to give birth to me. Meet someone better than Dad. You said you had a first love. If you live again, confess. Who knows? Maybe it will work out?”

The mother and daughter giggled together.

Then Lihen Copland woke up. As a nineteen-year-old.

Living again didn’t change her life much. But maybe she could make her daughter a little happier. To do so, she would have to marry her husband again.
But that resolve soon began to waver.

After meeting her first love, Sir Schudermel Laft.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A7%88%EC%9D%B4-%EB%94%94%EC%96%B4-%EC%95%84%EC%8A%A4%ED%84%B0/3255), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60910874)

alt_title: 异兽迷城, Beastly Maze, The Lost City of Alien Beasts, The City of Beasts, Существа, которыми мы являемся, Затерянный город чудовищ, Заточенный в городе зверей
description: Gao Yang, an orphan, crosses over to a "parallel world" at the age of six and starts living in a warm family of five. At the age of eighteen, Gao Yang accidentally discovers the true nature of the world: it's not a parallel world at all but a mysterious realm, and the family and friends around him are all terrifying "beasts"!

description: I’m not sure why I decided to buy a medusa in the slave market, but since then she insists a lot that I remove the blindfold from her eyes. Is she trying to petrify me? Or does she really want to see me with her own eyes?

author: Kuga Tsuniya

title: Shy na Ano Ko ni Natsukaretai

author: Chiba Laki

title: Tsui no Taimashi ―Ender Geisterー
alt_title: The Last Exorcist -Ender Geyster-, 終の退魔師―エンダーガイスター, 終之退魔師
description:
Akira, a demonically strong S-class exorcist, is sent from Germany to investigate a paranormal event in a certain city in Japan. 
He destroys creatures from other worlds with his beautiful exorcist partner Chikage.
genre: Action, Demons, Adventure, Magic, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Yomoyama Takashi

title: Puberty, an All Boys School!? and Nakano-kun
alt_title: 思春期と男子校!?と中野くん, Puberty & Boys' School!? Nakano-kun
description: Hajime Nakano is forced by his mother to enroll at a newly opened all boys high school, and he laments over having to spend the next three years surrounded by other guys. However, he doesn't know that all of the other students are girls secretly pretending to be guys, and each of them think they are the only girl in the whole school.
genre: Comedy, Crossdressing, Harem, School Life
author: Higashi 385

title: Only for Love
alt_title: 错撩, Accidental Love
description: The stunning financial reporter, Zheng Shuyi, is dating a two-timing scumbag? How could she possibly stand back and do nothing about those love birds: the cheating bastard and his white lotus of a mistress. Upon seeing the Rolls-Royce's plate number of the mistress' uncle, which was a straight numerical number plate, Zheng Shuyi made up her mind. Doesn't the cheater plan to marry rich to retire twenty years early, by going down the laughable CEO route? Then I shall become both you and your mistress' aunt!
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Qiao Yao (翘摇)
artist: Super Duper Green Sauce (绿绿绿酱)

title: Hyouka
alt_title: Хёка: Тебе не уйти, 氷菓, Ice Cream
description:
Oreki Houtarou is an "energy-saver" kind of guy, who expends as little energy as possible to do only things he has to. When he starts high school, his older sister sends him a letter asking him to join the Classics Club. The club meant a lot to her, and its number of members has been reduced to zero.  
  
Houtarou reluctantly signs up for the club, only to find that someone else has joined, too! She's Chitanda Eru, a cute, big-eyed girl with an overwhelming sense of curiosity. A mystery crops up that catches Eru's interest, and also draws in Houtarou's friend, Fukube Satoshi. They continue solving mundane mysteries together, and soon they draw in Satoshi and Houtarou's friend, Ibara Mayaka, as well. Mayaka has had a blatant crush on Satoshi since middle school, but he always fends off her advances. Together, they search for the truth in a mystery that involves the history of the Classics Club.
genre: Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Yonezawa Honobu

title: Love Is an Illusion! ~The Queen~
alt_title: Love is fantasy! ~The Queen~, 사랑은 환상! ~더 퀸~
description:
Park Dokyeom, who is crazy about sex, suddenly wants to get married!!??

She asks her secretary, Seung-ah, to look for a match for her.

Will Seung-ah be able to find the right marriage partner for Dogyeom?

The Spin-Off to Love Is an Illusion! about Dojin’s older sister.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Office Workers, Drama, Full Color
author: Fargo

title: Shigurui
alt_title: Death Frenzy, シグルイ, 剑豪生死斗, 劍豪生死鬥
description:
At the beginning of the Edo period (1603-1868), when people enjoyed a time of peace, Lord Tokugawa Tadanaga decides to hold a fighting tournament. In the past, matches were fought with wooden swords, but this time real swords will be used. The one-armed Fujiki Gennosuke and the blind Irako Seigen will fight each other in this tournament, even though both of them are disciples of Iwamoto Kogan — known as Japan's greatest swordsman. So begins the story of intertwining fates, conflict, and strange destinies.  
  
Note:  
It's SHOUNEN because it's published in Champion Red, a shounen magazine for late teens+early 20ies
genre: Historical, Action, Martial Arts, Samurai, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Yamaguchi Takayuki

title: Crows Gaiden Housenka - the beginning of HOUSEN
alt_title: クローズ外伝鳳仙花 ―the beginning of HOUSEN
description: Before Narumi Taiga, Bitou Tatsuya, King Joe and Tsukimoto Mitsumasa, there was Terakado Butta. This is the story of how, under his leadership, Housen became the powerhouse that would become Suzuran High School's greatest opponent. Butta was there the year the school was founded, and without him, we would have never had the Housen Hitman we know and fear today.
genre: Action, Comedy, School Life, Delinquents
author: Takahashi Hiroshi

title: Sensei! Bokutachi ga Sekai wo Horoboshimasu.
alt_title: 先生！ 僕たちが世界を滅ぼします。, Мы уничтожим весь мир, учитель!, Teacher, we will destroy the world!, The strongest Assassin as a Teacher
description:
A "Teacher" has a sacred job that protects and guides students.

In this world where people who can use magic and people who cannot use magic coexist, Solo is a sorcerer who lives alone.
He is also known as No. 0, a skilled assassin who always completes any request he receives.

"As part of a certain mission, I am assigned to teach at a magic school, and the teenagers I am assigned to teach are the students of the Class 2D, which is made up of dropouts."

While he is desperately playing the role of a teacher in order to complete his mission, a transfer student arrives and the situation takes an unexpected turn...

A school fantasy unfolding between a false teacher and the strongest assassin and the most evil students who serve as his "beacon"!
genre: Comedy, Magic, School Life, Fantasy
author: Kobayashi Kina

title: Futago Challenge!
alt_title: ふたごチャレンジ！, Twins Challenge!
description: Akane and Kaede are twins who look identical. Their parents force them to "become more like a girl and more like a boy..." so they come up with a "challenge"...!?
genre: Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Nanato Nii

title: Koisuru (Otome) no Tsukurikata
alt_title: Convertí a my amigo de la infancia (♂) en una chica, I Think I Turned My Childhood Friend (♂) Into a Girl, How to Make a "Girl" Fall in Love, 幼馴染（♂）を女の子にしてしまった話, 恋する（おとめ）の作り方, I Think I Turned My Childhood Friend Into a Girl, 戀愛（少女）的培育法

description: Takara Shun, a high school student who belongs to a popular group in the class, and Taichi Amagi, a pure boy who is not a conspicuous type but is liked by people, realize their love for each other. Even though they start dating in secret, it is difficult to be honest.

author: Hanage no Mai

title: Souei Sousho
alt_title: 双影双書, 双影双书
description: Shou, a young boy living in the red light district is suddenly taken to live in the imperial palace. He was selected to become the prince's shadow and act as his shield. In the palace where conspiracies swirl will Shou be able to protect himself and the prince?
genre: Historical, Comedy, Drama
author: Funamoto Erika

title: Minami-ke
alt_title: Minamike, みなみけ, 南家, The Minami Family, The Minami Household
description:
*Minami-ke* ("The Minami Household") is a manga following the three Minami sisters, Haruka, Kana, and Chiaki in their lives at home and school. It's a funny manga that depicts how these characters interact with each other and their classmates. Although they are ordinary girls, their ordinary adventures are told in an extraordinary manner.
**Source:** MangaUpdates
genre: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Sakuraba Coharu

title: Kazuo Umezu's "Ultraman"
alt_title: ウルトラマン
description:
(from ebookjapan):

Kazuo Umezu's "Ultraman" was serialized at the same time as the 1966 TV broadcast!　The fierce battles with popular monsters such as the Baltan and Mefilas aliens are fully recorded along with the color pages from the serialization and the chapter covers!

Kazuo Umezu's very famous manga adaptation of the first Ultraman series.

title: Green WorldZ
alt_title: グリーンワールズ
description:
Plants have taken over the planet.  
  
In 2017, the vegetation in Tokyo rose up and toppled human society in moments.  
The few survivors are forced to live in the relative safety of a subway network, but supplies are running low.  
Join an average high school student named Akira as he challenges the plants in a struggle for survival!
genre: Action, Adventure, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Oosawa Yuusuke

title: Kuroko to Akuyaku-kun
alt_title: 黒子と悪役くん, Kuroko and Villain-kun, Kuroko to Heel-kun, Kuroko Girl Meets Heel Boy
description: Kayoko Kuroda is an ordinary and plain girl, who is doing her best behind the scenes, but for some reason, her classmate Shishima-kun, who is dangerous, suddenly approaches her...?!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Yamashina Tina

title: Kakunaru Ue wa
alt_title: 描くなるうえは, Now That We Draw, 既然要画恋爱漫画
description:
Uehara-kun, who loves 2D, dreams of becoming a comic artist one day! However, his dream is threatened when an editor rejects his work as too boring.

The next day, while contemplating giving up on his dream, a gal in his class, Miyamoto Niina, sees his manuscript, and a too-close pseudo-romance for the sake of their comics begins!?

This is a comic artists × youth romantic comedy!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Takahata Kyuu

title: Shouwaru Tensai Osananajimi to no Shoubu ni Makete Hatsutaiken o Zenbu Ubawareru Hanashi
alt_title: 性悪天才幼馴染との勝負に負けて初体験を全部奪われる話, 败给了性格恶劣的天才青梅，初体验全部被夺走这件事, 敗給了性格惡劣的天才青梅，初體驗全部被奪走這件事, How I Lose Bets With My Sadistic Gifted Childhood Friend and She Steals All of My Firsts
description:
A twisted girls' love story featuring: A devilish girl hiding behind the mask of an honor student x An ordinary girl who hates losing.

Wakaba Yoshizawa has a childhood friend named Komaki Umezono.

This girl wore the mask of an honor student with good morals who's blessed with both beauty and brains, but in reality she's an evil genius who looked down on people. For the sake of regaining the dignity she lost to Komaki, Wakaba challenges her to a match, but Komaki tells her "Each time I win, I will take one precious thing from you." as a condition!? Every time she loses to the girl she "hates", her true feelings get exposed.

(Source: Young Ace Up)
genre: Psychological, Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Adaptation
author: Inukai Anzu

title: Party kara Tsuihou Sareta Sono Chiyushi, Jitsu wa Saikyou Nitsuki
alt_title: The Healer Who Was Banished From His Party, Is, in Fact, the Strongest, パーティーから追放されたその治癒師、実は最強につき
description:
A healer gets booted from his party because the leader notices he isn’t really contributing much to the team.

Soon enough, the healer must look for new members to party with. After finding a cute martial artist to work together with, he reveals his secret - while he’s a fairly mediocre healer, he actually fights well in close combat.

Anyway, here’s the story of a support who’s secretly a DPS, and where the entire conflict stems from the fact that he never told his old party he was DPS.
genre: Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Kage Kinoko

title: Madame Petite
alt_title: Madam Petit, マダム・プティ, 青春小妇人, 마담 프티, Madame Petit
description: It's the 1920s and Mariko, age 16, is married to a man 30 years her senior. She is honestly happy to be his wife and really excited to board the Orient express in Turkey on their honeymoon trip. But her life takes a rapid turn when her husband is discovered dead after the first night on board… And that's only the start of Mariko's great adventure.
genre: Thriller, Historical, Romance, Adventure, Drama
author: Takao Shigeru

title: A Savage God Reigns
alt_title: 残酷な神が支配する, A Cruel God Reigns in Heaven, After Us, the Savage God, Psycho Suspense: A Cruel God Reigns, A Savage God Reigns
description:
A Savage God Reigns portrays the tale of two step-brothers – Jeremy and Ian – as they strive to discover their separate paths towards redemption.  
 
---
- **Won the 1st Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize Excellence Award in 1997**
genre: Thriller, Award Winning, Psychological, Romance, Sexual Violence, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Horror, Slice of Life, Tragedy
author: Hagio Moto

title: Crushing Jade and Casting Pearls
alt_title: 碎玉投珠, Humillando al jade y escogiendo a la perla
description:
When Ding Hanbai, the young master of the centuries-old jade-carving shop, first laid eyes on his timid shidi Ji Zhenzhu, he bullied him relentlessly, not expecting that Jiangnan could produce someone who would break down his defenses and melt his heart this way.   
They go from being unable to stand each other to admiring one another, but as the days pass, even this admiration begins to evolve…   
A step from brotherhood, a step to special affection, and one more step into a lifetime together.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Bei Nan

title: The Betrayal of Shadow
alt_title: Shadow's Resurgence, 家族影子的背叛
description: Sal Cooper, the most loyal and efficient shadow of the family, was sent out as a sacrificial pawn by the newly appointed head of the Cooper family during the major distribution meetings after representing the family in victorious battles. He became the object of abuse by the former subordinates who once served under him. After exerting all his efforts to kill those who had humiliated him and attempting to take Alan down with him, he discovered that as a child, he was chosen by the family to be the “shadow” and was enchanted with magic, unable to harm Alan and instead bearing all the injuries Alan suffered, thereby enhancing Alan’s own abilities. Learning from Alan that his entire life as a shadow was orchestrated, Sal reversed the magic’s effects and, through his own death, reclaimed everything Alan had taken from him, including talents and abilities. Although Alan survived, he lost his vitality and the ability to intimidate other families, leading to the downfall of the Cooper family. However, Sal Cooper was reborn at the age of three, before the magic of “nourishment” was cast upon him.
genre: Thriller, Reincarnation, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Crime, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Military, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color, Tragedy
author: 绘境社

title: Planetary Human II: Globe
alt_title: 행성인간2: 행성의, Planetary Human 2: Planetary
description: The second season of Cho Seok's Tidal Universe masterpiece, Planetary Human. So… prepare yourself to be mindfucked.
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Long Strip, Comedy, Horror, Web Comic, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color
author: Jo Seok (조석)

title: Saike Mata Shite mo
alt_title: Saike Mata Shitemo, Saike Once Again, Yet Again, サイケまたしても, 命运轮回
description:
The story follows an unambitious, introverted middle school student called Saike Kuzushiro. After witnessing the death of his childhood friend, Mikan Karatachi, in a road accident, he cries out to God. After a fall, Saike wakes up in bed the previous morning, the day of the accident.  
  
Will history repeat? Can he save Mikan? What power does he have to change the future?  

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Saike's Repeated Days** (2017)
genre: Time Travel, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Fukuchi Tsubasa

title: Dealing With Demons
alt_title: Even if Disillusionment Swallows You, Even if Despair Consumes You, 환멸이 그대를 삼킬지라도
description:
Staying alive is a new form of entertainment.
When Dokyung, disillusioned by the harshness of life, finally resolves to call it quits, a bored demon, Hwamyung, appears before her with a particular offer. Will Dokyung, having entered into a contract with the Demon of Disillusionment, be able to flip her disastrous life upside down?
genre: Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Surreuk Comics (스르륵코믹스)

title: A Life Changing Turn
alt_title: 대박사건, Crash (Gwangjin), Crash
description:
"Did I hit a man?"
With a mayor father, and one foot in Hankuk University, high school student Jo Soo-Ah is living the high life. One mistake leads to a hit-and-run. "It's okay because no one saw it", she thinks. But her life is slowly cracking down when the messages of M, an eyewitness who seemed to know everything, flying towards her.
genre: Psychological, Long Strip, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color
author: Dooyeop

title: Iljin Romance
alt_title: 일찐로맨스, カーストロマンス
description: Jin Daim has no friends, but likes drawing. Iljina is the most popular girl in school, even though she rejects every confession. Daim thinks she and her friends are an annoyance and disturbs his drawing time before class, but all he ever draws is her. Things get complicated when his secret sketch books gets discovered by one of Iljina's friends.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic
author: Yuhwa Yuhwa

title: After Rebirth: Upgrading through Consumption
alt_title: 重生不当舔王，我独自氪金升级, I Regressed to Level Up Instead of Being a Simp, Rebirth Without Being the Licking King, I Use Cash to Level Up
description: After failing the college entrance examination and being cheated on, Han Li, who achieved nothing after graduation, made a wish to heaven: "I wish... to go back in time..." Thus the Consumer System appeared and Han Li regressed to the age of eighteen! Not enough skills? Upgrade them with points! Looks too ordinary? Fix that mug with some points! The rich classmate who always looked for trouble taught him a lesson, and captured the hearts of the goddesses... With this regression, let's witness how Han Li counterattacks and rises to the heavens!
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Full Color

title: Chou Ten-chan! NEEDY GIRL OVERDOSE Koushiki Anthology
alt_title: 超てんちゃん！ NEEDY GIRL OVERDOSE公式アンソロジー, OMGkawaiiAngel! NEEDY GIRL OVERDOSE Official Anthology

The Internet's Angel’s advent upon this manga world!!!

The super popular game「NEEDY GIRL OVERDOSE」's first official anthology!

title: The Beloved Daughter of a Crime Family Was Reincarnated as the Daughter of a Gangster in an Otome Game: Highest-Ranking Villain, That Doting Is Unnecessary!
alt_title: 悪党一家の愛娘、転生先も乙女ゲームの極道令嬢でした。～最上級ランクの悪役さま、その溺愛は不要です！～, 悪党一家の愛娘、転生先も乙女ゲームの極道令嬢でした。
description:
After her sudden death at the hands of an assassin, the former granddaughter of a Yakuza boss reincarnates into an otome game as the heroine. The game is, of course, set in the time of early European mafia (but with magic and other special abilities somehow)—specifically a kingdom where the royal family is supported behind the scenes by five major crime families! "Please God, whyyy, I only wanted to life a normal life!" 

A dangerous love game between a former Yakuza heiress and her villain fiancé begins!
genre: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Mafia, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Slice of Life, Adaptation

alt_title: Overlord of Insects, The King of the Insects, 全民：我虫族主宰
description: Having been transported into a world where everyone is a Job-Changer, Jiang Chen awakened the Insect Domination System! The little insects can evolve, attack, and extract talents! Most importantly, they can breed invincible natural disasters!

title: Soutaisei Moteron

description: Tachibana Kazuya, Kumazawa Daigo, and Niinuma Hiroko all want to be popular. But they don't know how to do so! So, they try and create a club to research and find out how to become popular.

title: Attack!! Ramenman
alt_title: 闘将!! 拉麺男
description:
A fighting manga set in China. Ramenman, the main character, travels from place to place, fighting various enemies. Originally debuting in Yudetamago's other early work, Kinnikuman, Ramenman became so popular (more so than Kinnikuman himself), that he got his own spinoff. It was serialized from June of 1982 to December of 1988 in Fresh Jump (officially ending in the January 23, 1989 issue, due to the suspension of the magazine itself). It was made into an animated series in 1988.  
  
Since the Ramenman in this series seems to have no direct connection to Kinnikuman's Ramenman, it is assumed that this series is set in a parallel world. There is also the belief that this Ramenman is supposed to be the ancestor of Kinnikuman's Ramenman.
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Wuxia, Slice of Life, Aliens, Supernatural
author: Yudetamago

title: Watashi Dake ga Miyaji Miyuki wo Aishiteiru
alt_title: I'm the Only One for Miyaji Miyuki, 私だけが宮地美雪を愛している
description:
Miyaji Miyuki (16) moved away when she was little, not long after going on a spree of proposing to several different girls in kindergarten.

Years later, she returns to her hometown and transfers to a new high school, where she is forced to reckon with her past...
genre: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Harem, School Life
author: Suzuo

title: I'm a Scarecrow
alt_title: 나는 허수아비, I Am a Scarecrow
description:
'Can you buff me?'

Monaka, who looks like a top-tier experienced player at a glance, offers to form a party with White Jack, who's a returning player of “Lunatic Online”, but…

'Don't step on that.'

'Ack!' 

'Take a potion.' 

'Hack! Haack!' 

'I'm sorry… I couldn't click on the potion.'

Get to know the noob, White Jack, Monaka's character, and the other guild members.

'We're getting married, so change genders, Hyung. You lost earlier at rock-paper-scissors.'

The chaotic life of Lunatic's Netkama*!

(This game is set in the virtual game “Lunatic”, which is based on the online game “La Tale”.)

(Please be aware: Due to the nature of this series, this work purposely uses incorrect spellings for a sense of realism.)

*TL/N: Scarecrow can also mean 'puppet/figurehead'.
*Netkama is a term for when a male uses a female character online and hides their true identity. The original author, Kimma, also wrote the novel, “Netkama Punch!!!”.
genre: Genderswap, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Adventure, Video Games, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Kimma

description: This is the ninth collection of panpanya's works originally published in *Rakuen* magazine. Including the title stories and others, a total of sixteen chapters are presented that will make you fall in love with life's little details.
genre: Anthology, Adventure, Drama, Slice of Life

title: Heisei Haizanhei ☆ Sumire-chan
alt_title: 平成敗残兵☆すみれちゃん, Heisei Remnant Soldier ☆ Sumire-chan, Heisei Surviving Soldier ⭐ Sumire-chan, 平成敗残兵⭐︎すみれちゃん, Heisei Remnant Soldier ⭐︎ Sumire-chan, 平成敗残兵すみれちゃん, Heisei Remnant Soldier Sumire-chan, 平成敗殘兵☆堇醬
description:
A formerly unsuccessful idol turned vagrant, Sumire-chan (31).

A vanquished survivor of the cutthroat competition in the showbiz world, with her mind and body both beaten by the struggle, she now lives in a run-down apartment where she spends her days lazing around, for the time being.  Her cousin Yuusei, a first-year highschooler, has been keeping an eye on her and comes to her with a proposal for a moneymaking idea.

"You have a nice body, so let's release a doujin gravure photobook."
Will Sumire-chan actually be able to stage a comeback in the world of the Reiwa era!? 
Let's stay tuned!
genre: Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Satomi U

A little boy who has an armpit fetish and a high school girl who loves male attention and exposing herself so much so that she doesn't care who it is. When she notices that he has stalked her to her basketball game, she decides it wouldn't be bad to indulge him more.

alt_title: A Monster Wants to Eat Me, 私を喰べたい、ひとでなし, Монстр, что хочет съесть меня, Watashi wo Tabetai, Hitodenashi, 想吃掉我的非人少女, 想吃掉我的非人少女, This Monster Wants to Eat Me

description: Fifteen years have passed since the end of the Great War. Thriving at the bottom of the Imperial City of Flowers is the bar Haraiso, run by an idiosyncratic owner, Miss Haru. Various customers visit the restaurant every night, attracted by the delicious sake and snacks...

Unfortunately, despite his best efforts to find that same thrill in sports and horror movies, he's never quite managed to feel as alive since. However, that may all be about to change in a fateful encounter with one very eccentric girl!

description:
The Hero has defeated the Demon King! But the Princess he meant to save turned out to be a Prince. NEETdom, here he comes, but a life of relaxation surrounded by animes is a pretty sweet deal.  
  
Unfortunately, he gets caught up in millennia old legends, curses, and a twisted plot involving multiple Kingdoms and many dragons. Through and through, though, he'll follow a path of whimsy, even if that involves him palling it up with "villains".

A boyish childhood friend grows up to be a super handsome girl!

---

Serialization of the Twitter webcomic *[A Story About Becoming Cooler Than the Cool Girl](https://mangadex.org/title/d0407445-b80d-4854-9f12-c8227f94cba6/)*.

title: Family Compo
alt_title: F.Compo, Family Component, 搞怪家庭, 非常家庭, ファミリー・コンポ, ファミリーコンポ
description:
Just before entering the university, Yanagiba Masahiko's father died in a car accident. His mother died when he was four, which makes him now really an orphan. But even before this recent death, he didn't have a family life, as his father was always busy or abroad.  
  
When his mother's younger brother and his wife decide to invite him to live with their family, his life takes a turn. But it is not going to be the normal family life he is imagining for himself. What is the "terrible" secret that lead his parents to break the bonds with his aunt and uncle? What could be the true nature of his cousin, Shion? And last but not least, will this "terrible" secret eventually get Yanagiba, too?
genre: Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Hojo Tsukasa

title: Pisu and the Store Keeper
alt_title: 店番のスピス, Spis, Store Staff, 店に入ったら謎の魚が店番をしている話, A Mysterious Fish Tending to the Store.
description: One day during the rainy season, a man was taking someone else's umbrella from a storefront in Bikon, when he felt a gaze and looked up to see a mysterious fish hanging from a string staring at him in the rain. It did not speak, did not move, and its expression did not change... The name of the mysterious fish was - Pisu-chan. Surrounded by the mischievous store manager, the work-ready mysterious insects, and the innocent and relentless children who come to play with her, Pisu-chan makes the store a lively place to be.
genre: Animals, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Yu-hachi

title: Ore wa Subete o “Parry” Suru ~Gyaku Kanchigai no Sekai Saikyou wa Boukensha ni Naritai~
alt_title: 俺は全てを【パリイ】する　～逆勘違いの世界最強は冒険者の夢をみる～, I Parry Everything: What Do You Mean I’m the Strongest? I’m Not Even an Adventurer Yet!, I Parry All ~With A Reverse Misunderstanding, The World's Strongest Dreams Of Being An Adventurer~
description:
Ever since he was a young boy, Noor has wanted to be like the adventurers in his father’s stories — dragonslayers, cursebreakers, heroes who always save the day. But as everyone knows, to be an adventurer, you’ve gotta have the right skills! 

Unfortunately for Noor, his [Parry] is bottom-of-the-barrel useless, his prospects are nonexistent, and everybody he knows is telling him to throw in the towel. Faced with this harsh reality, he figures there’s only one thing to do: make up for it with effort! An intense, solitary training regimen ought to do it. If one year won’t cut it, he’ll train for five! If not five, ten! 

Now facing the tail end of his twenties with no new skills to show for his labors, Noor sets out to become an adventurer anyway, determined to try one last time to make his dream come true. He might be clueless when it comes to adventuring, but he’s no stranger to hard work! 

Now, if only he can figure out why everyone keeps looking at him like that...
 
---
 
Original Web Novel: <https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6537fu/>
genre: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Nabeshiki

title: Kaguhara-san's Fetish Notebook
alt_title: 香原さんのふぇちのーと, Kaguhara's Fetish Notebook, 香原同學的性癖筆記, 香原同学的兴趣笔记, Фетишистские заметки Кагухары-сан
description: Kaguhara Ririka is a plain, friendless and often overlooked first year girl at Fuetchi Senior High. However, she has one hobby in particular that she can never tell a soul about; that being her dedication to her fetish and recording her observations of how it manifests itself in all sorts of unique ways amongst her classmates.
genre: Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life

title: Seirei Gensouki ~Konna Sekai de Deaeta Kimi ni~
alt_title: 精霊幻想記 ～こんな世界で出会えた君に～, Seirei Gensouki: Spirit Chronicles, Mythical Spirit Chronicle, 精靈幻想記, 정령환상기, Хроника мифического духа, Мифический дух: Хроники
description:
Meet Rio, a callous orphaned boy living in the slums. At only 7-years-old, he realizes he’s actually the reincarnation of Haruto Amakawa, a Japanese university student with a tragic past. 

While still reeling from this shocking epiphany, Rio also comes to learn that he possesses extremely potent magical abilities and uses his new powers to solve the kidnapping case of a little girl. 

His good deed is acknowledged, and he’s rewarded by being enrolled into… a prestigious academy for noble children...?

---

**Note:** This is a relaunch of the now discontinued alternate story: [Seirei Gensouki ~Konna Sekai de Deaeta Kimi ni~](https://mangadex.org/title/dfabad2b-10be-4f16-b779-7746e095d832)

**Links:** [Official English Novel](https://j-novel.club/s/seirei-gensouki-spirit-chronicles)
genre: Reincarnation, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Adaptation
author: Kitayama Yuri

title: The Academy's Genius Swordsman
alt_title: 아카데미의 천재칼잡이, Academy Cheonjaekaljabi, Academy’s Genius Swordmaster, 皇家学院的天才剑豪
description:
Following a momentous battle against giants for the fate of the world, Ronan emerges victorious as the last man standing of the Imperial Army. As he laments this hollow victory with his dying commander, Grand Marshal Adeshan, they quickly learn that the war is far from over and an overwhelming force of giants descends from the heavens.

Fearing the worst, yet seeing hope in the courageous Ronan, Adeshan uses her last time slip to send him back to the past, so that he can enroll in the prestigious Phileon Academy and become the strongest swordsman the empire has ever seen!
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Military, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Sichi

title: Blazing USA: Desert Rose vs. Blazing Transfer Student
alt_title: 炎のUSA 砂の薔薇 VS 炎の転校生, Desert Rose & Blazing Transfer Student - Blazing USA (Doujinshi), SUPER TUG.5 炎のUSA 砂の薔薇 VS 炎の転校生, SUPER TUG.5 - Blazing USA: Desert Rose vs. Blazing Transfer Student
description:
An official doujinshi drawn and written by [Kaoru](https://www.mangaupdates.com/authors.html?id=4414) [Shintani](https://myanimelist.net/people/3840/Kaoru_Shintani) under the pen name of 88 Night,  
in collaboration with [Kazuhiko Shimamoto](https://www.mangaupdates.com/authors.html?id=909), [Noboru Takizawa](https://mangadex.org/manga/4581)'s creator.  
  
Part of a series of doujinshi where the [CAT Division M](https://mangadex.org/manga/15646/desert-rose) teams or clashes with other action/seinen manga characters 
including the Gunsmith Cats pair and the Sukeban Deka heroine, usually developed in collaboration with their creators  
(a notable exception being Desert Rose vs Akihime, where they meet the heroine of his wife Saeki Kayono's josei manga; 
clearly the couple developed it together)

title: 67% Inertia
alt_title: Inertia 67 Percent, Инерция 67%, 惰性67%, 惰性67パーセント, 타성 67퍼센트
description: This comedy manga takes place in the room of a college girl named Yoshizawa. Her friends, Itou, Kitahara, and Nishida often stop by, and they run into funny adult-level problems. For instance, there is the day when her friends drop by while Yoshizawa's hungover in bed, and she suddenly realizes that she doesn't have on any underwear under the covers. Yoshizawa also has unusual problems, like her need for advice on drawing realistic penises in her manga, since she's never encountered one in real life before. There are a lot of quirky things that can happen in a college girl's home!
genre: Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Shimimaru

title: Versus
alt_title: バーサス, VERSUS, Противостояние
description:
Centuries ago, humanity’s natural enemy, “Demons,” invaded the world and oppressed humankind. The Great Demon Lord and 47 subordinates known as Demon Lords have since dominated the world, while the human race lives on in fear.

In desperation, a last-ditch effort for humanity’s very survival is placed in the hands of 47 people gathered from across the world. These heroes will oppose the demon army and win back humanity’s freedom…or die trying!
___
Composition: [bose](https://mangadex.org/author/aa8eb4f2-d4a2-4c4e-b6e8-2394f3b09b71/bose)

[Official English (K MANGA) - United States Only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10569/episode/349625)

author: ONE

title: Shikkaku kara Hajimeru Nariagari Madou Shidou!
alt_title: The Magician Who Rose From Failure, Start up from disqualification. The rising of the sorcerer road, The Upcoming Magician's Road That Started from Disqualification, 失格から始める成り上がり魔導師道!
description:
Cursed with a naturally low supply of aether, Arcus Raytheft is disinherited and shunned by his family.

Things start to change when he experiences another man’s life through a dream — a dream that shows him marvelous technological wonders that don’t exist in his world. Armed with this new knowledge, Arcus sets about showing his parents that they were wrong about him.

Surely an arsenal of mind-blowing spells will be enough to convince them you don’t need aether to succeed?
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Hitsuji Gamei

title: Complex Age
alt_title: コンプレックス・エイジ
description:
One-shot:  
Unknownst to her coworkers, Sawako, 34 years old and in her second year of marriage, has the hobby of wearing gothic lolita clothes. She had always kept it as her hobby, but as the years pass by, she begins to notice the pleasure she derives from those clothes waning…  
  
Series:  
Twenty something temp worker Nagisa Kataura lives like an average young woman - but she has a secret life. When she’s not sitting at her day job, she spends most of her time transforming into her favorite anime and manga characters through the art of cosplay. Worried about being thought childish and nerdy, Nagisa struggles to keep her hobby a secret.  
  
Note: The original one-shot was the 2nd place winner of the 63rd Tetsuya Chiba Award in general category.
genre: Psychological
author: Sakuma Yui

title: Chounin A wa Akuyaku Reijou wo Doushitemo Sukuitai
alt_title: 町人Aは悪役令嬢をどうしても救いたい～どぶと空と氷の姫君～, Villager A Wants to Save the Villainess no Matter What!, Крестьянин хочет спасти злодейку любой ценой!
description:
Allen, an eight-year-old boy from a poor family in the royal capital, is living a poor but happy life together with his mother. One day, however, memories of his previous life suddenly come back to him and he remembers that he is in an dating sim game and that the capital will be destroyed by war if he doesn’t do something about it. If this continues, both he and his mother will be killed! With a sense of urgency, he decides to rise to the occasion in order to save his precious mother’s life and save his favorite character, the villainous young lady Anastasia, the only girl he liked in the game, from her all too tragic and ruinous end.

This is the story of a man who isn’t even a character in the game, but who strives with his steely determination and uses all the knowledge he has to turn overcome fate!
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Video Games, Sexual Violence, Magic, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Isshiki Kotaro

title: Juvenile Prison
