description:
'Cha Ju-young' is imprisoned in a juvenile detention center for rendering his gangster father comatose.
Not long after, the father, who was thought never to wake up, comes to visit...
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Cheongmin

title: Cat's Eye
alt_title: キャッツアイ, 貓眼三姐妹
description: This is a story about three sisters in search of their lost father, who was a famous artist. They steal his works of art from museums/galleries to make him recognize their presence in the world. The three sisters' gang is called Cat's Eye, and so is the coffee shop they own. This coffee shop is located right in front of the police-headquarters. Hitomi, the middle sister, is betrothed to the police inspector Toshio, who is in charge of the investigating the Cat's Eye. Toshio falls in love with Hitomi, even as a Cat's Eye member.
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery
author: Hojo Tsukasa

title: Surviving the Apocalypse
alt_title: 종말에서 살아남기
description:
A boy was locked in a basement and trained his entire life. His deranged father, the one who confined him, declared, 


“The Apocalypse is coming.” 

Now, armed with the training and survival skills he had honed over years of practice, he must survive the impending apocalypse.
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Song

title: The Hero Returns
alt_title: Hero, Returns, 영웅, 회귀하다, Герой возвращается, Heroe, regresa
description:
The strongest hero of humanity, Kim Sung Bin.

He threw everything on the line and fought… but he still couldn’t prevent the destruction of the world.

However, his legend has just begun as he returns 20 years into the past.

“I’ll definitely… kill it this time.”

Now fully equipped with overwhelming power and experience, the hero’s raid isn’t over yet!
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: B. Ain (흑아인)

title: My Arika
alt_title: 私のアリカ
description: A huge incident happens to Arika, the center of a hugely popular idol group. Is the culprit a fan? Or could it be... The light and dark sides of the glamorous idol industry are now exposed!
genre: Thriller, Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery
author: Fujisawa Moyashi

title: The Last Adventurer
alt_title: 최후의 모험가, Последний искатель приключений, Choehu-ui Moheomga, 메이플스토리: 최후의 모험가, Maplestory: The Last Adventurer, El último aventurero
description:
In the Era of Adventure kickstarted by the spawning of Gates, marked by absolute hopelessness, destitute, desperation, and despair, everyone had given up their hope and lost their courage to continue fighting - except one adventurer that refused to go down until his last breath.

"You are the only one left, Last Adventurer Elpam."

As the history of adventurers was forced to come to an end, the Last Adventurer returned to where this story all began.
genre: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Dedart (디다트)

title: Garan no Hime
alt_title: 伽藍の姫, 伽蓝的公主, 伽藍的公主, 伽藍の姫 -がらんのひめ-, Princess of Cathedral
description: A world where machine civilization has perished and immortal monsters called "Monotsuki" are rampant. Isana, a girl born in a remote village, meets a mechanical person who lost her memories and looks exactly like her sister, who should have disappeared in the ruins she wandered into. Convinced that "My sister is alive," Isana gives the mechanical person the name "Hime" (princess) and together they set out on a journey to find her sister.
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Girls' Love, Mystery
author: Koruse

title: Archmage Streamer
alt_title: BJ대마도사, BJ Archmage, Grand Warlock Streamer
description:
Jung Hyunwoo is just an unlucky gamer barely making ends meet in the VR game "God Wars." He even ends up losing access to his game account due to a horrible accident and is forced to create a new character. 

In the process, he discovers that he has an ability that allows him to see hidden information in the game, which leads him to become a Grand Warlock. 

Now equipped with a mind-blowing skill and a legendary class, all that's left is for him to level up and go from zero to hero...

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_7M4wH6g1eI)
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Dedart (디다트)

title: The Swordmaster's Son
alt_title: Youngest Son of the Renowned Swordsmanship Clan, 검술명가 막내아들, The Youngest Son of a Renowned Family of Swordsmen, Младший сын фехтовальщика, Youngest Son of the Renowned Swordsmanship Clan, Swordmaster's Youngest Son, El hijo menor del maestro de la espada
description:
Jin Runcandel was destined to become the head of his swordmaster clan. But despite his best efforts, he's banished for his shoddy swordsmanship. Though Jin eventually makes a contract with the god Solderet and is freed from the curse that hindered his abilities, he meets a rather unfortunate end. In the next moment, however, he awakens as a baby, long before his tragedy began.

Armed with a second chance and some new powers, Jin swears to fulfill his destiny and become the ultimate swordmaster!

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UspJjUOFrFQ)
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Emperor Penguin (황제펭귄)

title: After School Lessons for Unripe Apples
alt_title: A 90's Cram School for the Unripened, 세기말 풋사과 보습학원, 20th Century Green Apple School, 90's Cram School for Unripe Apples
description:
That asshole is back as an entirely new level of asshole!   
  
In her final year of middle school, Hwang Miae is stuck with Kim Cheol, a boy she met briefly years ago - he's her classmate… and her neighbor. Now the other kids keep calling them a couple! In a flurry of uneasiness, Cheol starts to avoid Miae like the plague.   
  
You bastard! Do you think you're the only one going through this?   
  
But it doesn't stop there. Destiny won't leave them alone as Kim Cheol and Hwang Miae keep seeing each other everywhere… causing even more trouble. As strange friends intrude on their relationship, Miae experiences puberty the right way…   
  
A new project of <Cheese In The Trap> author Soonkki!
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Soon-Ki

title: Akai Kiri no Naka kara
alt_title: 紅い霧の中から, From the Red Fog, Desde la niebla roja
description: This work is a story about a boy, Rwanda, whose mother is a vicious murderer, set in England at the end of the 19th century. Rwanda, who has long been confined in the basement, grew up and left the house after a certain incident. Eventually, he arrived at the town and was picked up by a staff member of the nursing home and decided to live in the facility. But peaceful everyday life is only boring for Rwanda…
genre: Thriller, Historical, Action, Psychological, Crime, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Nohara Mosae

title: Fami-res Iko.
alt_title: Let's go to the FamiRes., Let's go to family restaurant., ファミレス行こ。, 去恰饭吧。, 去恰飯吧。
description:
Satomi Oka moved to Tokyo from Osaka when he entered university. On his way home from a new year's party, he stops by a family restaurant and starts a part-time job...

---
- The MC is Satomi Oka, from author's previous work, [Let's Go Karaoke!](https://mangadex.org/title/212e9236-c0e3-4e85-ae92-087495820251)
genre: Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Wayama Yama

title: Yuusha-sama no Osananajimi to Iu Settei no Make Heroine ni Tensei shita no de, Chougoushi ni Job Change Shimasu
alt_title: 勇者様の幼馴染という職業の負けヒロインに転生したので、調合師にジョブチェンジします。, 勇者様の幼馴染という職業（せってい）の負けヒロインに転生したので、調合師にジョブチェンジします。, I Reincarnated as the Hero's Childhood Friend Who Was the Losing Love Interest, so I Changed Jobs to Alchemist, Because I Reincarnated as the Loser Heroine Whose Profession Is the Brave's Childhood Friend, I'll Change My Job to Alchemist, I Reincarnated as a Hero’s Childhood Friend Who Lost Her Job as a Heroine, so I Changed Jobs to Alchemist, I Reincarnated as a Losing Heroine, the Hero’s Childhood Friend Who Lost to the Main Heroine, so I Switched Jobs to Alchemist, Так как я переродилась в Героиню-неудачницу, чья роль – быть подругой детства Храбреца, я поменяю мою работу на алхимика, 용사님의 소꿉친구라는 직업의 패배 히로인으로 전생해서, 조합사로 전직합니다, 因为转生成了勇者青梅竹马的败犬女主角、所以要转职成为药剂师
description: As the monster's teeth drew near, it was then that I remembered. "I've witnessed this scene before." This was the world of an RPG I played in my previous life. And I, as the main character's childhood friend, was the losing love interest who would be turned down by him in the future. The childhood friend whose role ended one hour into the opening after confessing to the main character as he was about to set off into his journey. The one many players sympathized with as the main character would meet another girl who would cling onto him during his journey. If I remain in this village, in the future I'll be the losing love interest?! To prevent that from happening, I'll leave the village and make use of my newly blossomed ability in compounds with becoming an alchemist at the royal capital as my aim. I don't give a damn about some job that requires me to be the main character's childhood friend. I'll be seizing happiness with my own hands!
genre: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Harumine

title: Yukionna to Kani wo Kuu
alt_title: Eating Crab with a Yukionna, 雪女と蟹を食う
description: A certain summer day, as the cicadas sing loudly. A man with no money and no place to belong tries to end his life, however is unable to take the last step. While wavering between life and death, he sees a gourmet food program on television, and realising he's never once eaten crab in his life decides that "For my last day on this Earth, I'll eat crab". Settings his sights on the wife who lives in a high-class neighbourhood that he happened across in a library, he forces his way into her home. And thus, he demands money from her, however… things go in an unexpected direction.
genre: Psychological, Romance, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Drama
author: Gino0808

title: Fairy Cat
alt_title: 手のひらねこ, Сказочный котик
description: A slightly mysterious and heartwarming story about the smallest cat in the world and a high school boy. A fantastic cat named Tenohira Neko, small enough to fit in the palm of your hand, appears to Kanade, a first-year high school student. He is told that if he likes it, it will live with him...?
genre: Animals, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Takano Hisa

title: Bokura no Natsu ga Saketeiku
alt_title: ぼくらの夏が裂けていく, Summer's Gonna Tear Us Apart
description: A teenage boy returns to his remote home island from the mainland. While people stopped wearing masks there, on the island the rules to wear masks outside at all times are still surprisingly strict. Could the reason be something different than corona?
genre: Thriller, Psychological, Gore, Medical, Horror, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Miyatsuki Arata

title: Bijutsubu Girl
alt_title: Art Club Girl, 美術部ガール
description: Middle school life isn’t all fun and games for an art club girl either! From club activities to studying, games to manga, hobbies, BL, and “mufufu” fantasies…or even…love?! “Uchida” is a member of the “art club.” She’s got a lot of strange obsessions and she’s not great at dealing with people. A short candid manga about the ups and downs of school life with the classmates surrounding her and the adolescent boy who sits next to her.
genre: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Koikawa Hayato

title: Tora to Hachidori
alt_title: Tiger & Hummingbird, トラとハチドリ
description:
Sporting an exhausted expression and a T-shirt with a large tiger printed on it, Matsuri Kitou’s taste in fashion is like a school delinquent. Unexpectedly, she soon finds herself working at one of the centers of fashion in Shibuya, a clothing store named omne.
Supervised by MB, a fashion blogger who knows the ins-and-outs of the industry, this story all about life working in a clothing store begins!
genre: Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life
author: MB

title: Hana ni Arashi
alt_title: Rainbows After Storms, Наноха и Чидори, はなにあらし, 好事多磨
description: Unbeknownst to their friends and classmates, Nanoha and Chidori are dating. Watch as they try to keep their relationship secret!
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Kobachi Ruka

title: Houkago no Meikyuu Boukensha: Nippon to Isekai wo Ikiki Dekiru You ni Natta Boku wa Level Up ni Isoshimi Masu
alt_title: After School Labyrinth Adventurer, 放課後の迷宮冒険者～日本と異世界を行き来できるようになった僕はレベルアップに勤しみます～, After School Labyrinth Adventurer ~I'm Now Able to Go Back and Forth Between Japan and Another World, and I'll Work Hard to Level Up~
description:
Akira Kudo, a high school student who can freely travel back and forth between Japan and another world, Do Merta. With no goals in mind, he spends his time after school enjoying life in another world as he is!

As an adventurer, he gets teased by the guild's receptionist, receives "rewards" from his magic master, and has fun with the girl he helped...!?

"I hate pain! I don't care about ranking up! Guild requests are also troublesome!"

A leisurely labyrinth exploration fantasy just for after school!
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Hitsuji Gamei

title: Kono Ura Aka, Sensei desho?
alt_title: この裏アカ、先生でしょ？
description:
Rinko, a high school teacher in her late twenties, is not seen as herself because of her sister, a popular actress, both at work and in her private life, and out of frustration, she starts a "behind-the-scenes account" on social media to post pictures of her body.
One day, while she is fulfilling her need for approval and secretly enjoying herself, a male student, who is a bit of a pain in the ass, comes into her life...

This is the start of a love suspense with a rather distorted age difference.
genre: Psychological, Romance, Drama, Mystery
author: NAGASHI Mayumi

title: Sister Prison
alt_title: 언니 감옥, Unnie Gamok
description:
A very special prison with only women!

Ahn Taeseong, one of the world's leading conglomerates, creates a very special women's prison in order to protect his precious daughter Jiae. There, Jiae forms her own harlem and continues her debauchery life.
However, there she also meets Eunha, who has been charged with attempted murder. Intrigued by the other woman, Jiae pretends to help Eunha in her jailbreak plan, but falls into a world of lust with her...
genre: Psychological, Long Strip, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Drama
author: Shang-Gi

title: Akuma de Sourou
alt_title: Flying Rabbit, Lovely Devil, The Devil Beside Me, The Devil Does Exist, Дьявол существует, 恶魔在身边, 悪魔で候, 惡魔在身邊, 악마로소이다
description:
High school is difficult for most kids. But for Kayano, a shy girl whose single mother seems to work all the time, it's even worse than usual. She's so afraid of drawing attention to herself that she can't tell the handsome Kamijo how much she loves him until one day she finally gets up the courage to write him a letter confessing her feelings…  
  
Formerly licensed in English by CMX.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Takanashi Mitsuba

title: Disaster is Always Nearby
alt_title: 재난은 늘 곁에 있다
description: One morning, ten years of Yoon Dami's life vanished. It all began when she got entangled with a man who claimed to be a god. However, the god dismissed Dami, saying it had nothing to do with him. Then, he discovered the existence of a "thing" he had been searching for in Dami's household for a long time, and this began to change his relationship with Dami. But is it possible to mend a relationship that has already become so strained?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Lee Hye (이혜)

title: Isekai Saikyou no Yome desu ga, Yoru no Tatakai wa Ore no Hou ga Tsuyoi You desu ~Chiryaku o Ikashite Nariagaru Harem Senki~
alt_title: 異世界最強の嫁ですが、夜の戦いは俺の方が強いようです~知略を活かして成り上がるハーレム戦記~, She's the Strongest Bride, But I'm Stronger in Night Battles: A Harem Chronicle of Advancing Through Cunning Tactics, She's the Strongest Bride in Another World, but It Seems I'm Stronger in Night Battles: A Harem Chronicle of Advancing through Cunning Tactics
description:
Albert is reborn in another world and strives for a peaceful life in the Kingdom of Alexa. However, after being "kidnapped" by a Demon Goddess of war, Marida, he becomes a wanted man by the Kingdom!

Unable to return to his original country, Albert decides to live in the Empire of Eranzia. While enjoying intimate moments with the alluring body of Marida (but not just her!), he uses his previous worlds knowledge to achieve great accomplishments in governance, military affairs, strategy and of course..... Night-time battles!

A slightly risqué harem comedy begins!
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Shingyou Gaku

title: Shokei Shoujo no Ikiru Michi
alt_title: Жизнь девушки-карателя, 処刑少女の生きる道, The Executioner and Her Way of Life, 處刑少女的生存之道, 处刑少女的生存之道, 처형 소녀의 살아가는 길
description:
In this world, there are Strays - people who arrived from another world's Japan. These Strays were responsible for great disasters in the past so upon being spotted, they are meant to be killed by Executioners.  
  
Menou, an Executioner, meets a Stray named Akari, who she kills without hesitation. Yet, Akari comes back to life. Searching for a way to kill her, this journey of Akari and Menou begins.
genre: Adventure, Magic, Girls' Love, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Sato Mato

title: Tattahitotsu no Kotoshika Shiranai
alt_title: たったひとつのことしか知らない, The One Thing I Don’t Know About You
description:
Fujinoki, an ordinary office worker, finds unexpected joy in the irregular calls from his elementary school classmate, Akaiwa. After 20 years without seeing each other, Fujinoki has no clue about Akaiwa's whereabouts or occupation. However, their peculiar phone-only friendship takes an unexpected turn!

This edition includes bonus pages appended to the ending, thanks to the overwhelming positive response from the readers! From the talented author Honda, creator of "Honda-san the Skeleton Bookstore Employee."
genre: Oneshot, Action, Office Workers, Drama, Police, Slice of Life
author: Honda

title: There Is No True Peace in This World -Shin Kamen Rider SHOCKER SIDE-
alt_title: 真の安らぎはこの世になく-シン・仮面ライダー SHOCKER SIDE-, Shin Kamen Rider 2023: Prologue
description: A completely original manga project spun-off from *Shin Kamen Rider* directed by Anno Hideaki! A dark hero rising story by a superb production team depicting the biggest enemy in *Shin Kamen Rider* and *SHOCKER*!
genre: Action, Psychological, Mecha, Superhero, Drama
author: Yamada Kyuuri

title: Pillow Fish
alt_title: 枕魚, Рыба-подушка
description:
I thought I could keep moving forward, but in an unexpected instant, I’ve lost myself in the gaps of this vast universe. Where have I seen this, this landscape that doesn’t exist? Right over there, in a time that will never come to pass. Welcome to the world of panpanya.    The 22 chapters of Makura Uo, which include stories like Ame no Hi (Rainy Day) and Gomi no Sakebigoe (The Cries of Trash), were either serialized in the special web edition of Hakusensha’s Rakuen Le Paradis magazine or published as doujinshi. Included are entries from panpanya’s diary as well as annotations from the author herself.    

(Source: AniList)
genre: Animals, Drama, Slice of Life
author: panpanya

title: K - Memory of Red
alt_title: 'K': Memory of Red, Hồi ức của xích vương, K -Memory of Red-, K -ความทรงจำของสีแดง-, K -メモリー・オブ・レッド-
description: Set in a world where history has taken a slightly different course from the one we're familiar with. In Shizume City there is a psychic war between seven kings. The story goes that the Third King, known as the Red King, created a group called HOMRA filled with extraordinary people. If you manage to join HOMRA, you also acquire unbelievable psychic abilities.
genre: Action, Martial Arts, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Gohands

title: The Villainess Refuses to Flirt With the Male Lead
alt_title: 恶女拒绝泡男主, 악역이지만, 남주는 꼬시지 않아요
description:
Transmigrating as the villainess of a cliché imperial manhua isn't scary, what's scary is that the male leads are all children! Not only do I have to take care of children, but I'm also being courted by one of them and being called "wife"! Ms. Hong would like to say: "Fuck you, god!" 凸(｀⌒´メ)凸

Official Translations:
[Korean](https://page.kakao.com/content/59080258)
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Drama, Villainess, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Kuri

title: Kirakira Shitemo, Shinakutemo
alt_title: キラキラしても、しなくても, 无论闪亮还是暗淡, Sparkling or Not, Deslumbrante o no
description: Sparkling love is not the only kind there is. Keita is a high school student who likes his friend Masato. However, his love could not be more different from the sort of sparkling love often seen in BL… This is a delicate, bittersweet story of adolescence.
genre: Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Koike Sadaji

title: The Dungeon Smells Like Chicken
alt_title: 던전에서 치킨 냄새가 나요
description:
My basement is connected to another world? Sena, who gained fame for her exceptional cooking skills, is tormented by her ex-boyfriend’s stalking, as he seeks her money. One day, a mysterious door appears in Sena’s basement, and out comes Michael, a handsome man from another world who resembles a golden retriever with his kind and charming demeanor. To win his heart, Sena takes drastic measures. And that is… “Feed him chicken, lots of chicken!”

Every fortnight, the door to the other world opens. Guided by Michael, Sena crosses into this other world, capturing the hearts of its people with items from Korea and delicious food! Unveiling past secrets and embarking on delightful and noisy adventures in this other world, the story unfolds.

And then, “At some point, I found myself holding you dear to my heart. I dare say I want to be by your side and never be apart.”

A sweet and bittersweet romantic fantasy with mouth-watering food!
genre: Romance, Cooking
author: Kim Jiwoo

title: Snake in the Office
description:
A naga starts a new job in a new town.

Posted with [author permission](https://twitter.com/DanielLCarrier/status/1769140595296207140).

---
Alternative Official English: [TheDuckWebComics](https://www.theduckwebcomics.com/Snake_in_the_office/5771894/)

author: Tony Kuusisto

title: My Girlfriend Is a Zombie
alt_title: Guardian Girlfriend, Virus Girlfriend, 我的女友是丧尸, 我的守护女友, 我的病毒女友
description: Faced with doomsday, the special power inside Ling Mo was woken up. He found out that he could control zombies. Therefore he could walk through the zombie crowd safe and sound using his power, and eventually, he met his beloved girlfriend - Ye Lian, but only to find out that she had already been transformed into a zombie. To help Ye retrieve her memories, Ling Mo started his survival in doomsday.
genre: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Zombies, Post-Apocalyptic, Harem, Horror, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Dark Litchi

title: The Girl Downstairs (Doona!)
alt_title: Ли Дуна!, 이두나!
description: When Joon moves into a new apartment for his first day in college, he was not expecting an ex celebrity, Duna, to be living downstairs, hiding from her past life. Joon finds Duna strange and avoids her at first, but soon finds himself in her room without realizing what he is getting himself into. The Girl Downstairs is a new college romance story from the creator of hit series, Nano List.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Min Song Ah (민송아)

title: Ore no Shibou Flag ga Todomaru Tokoro wo Shiranai
alt_title: My Death Flags Show No Sign of Ending, 不知我的死亡flag将于何处停止, 俺の死亡フラグが留まるところを知らない, 내 사망플래그가 그칠 줄 모른다
description:
When he came to his senses, Hirasawa Kazuki, a normal university student, found himself in possession of the body of a game’s character. Moreover, it was Harold Stokes, the story’s most hated character who was even given the title『King of Trash』by the players. Myriads of landmines are just waiting for him to step on them, like death flags!  
  
Will Harold be able to clear the survival route while avoiding the countless death flags in his way?!
genre: Award Winning, Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Izumi

title: Tanikamen
alt_title: Masked Tani, Tani the Mask, 谷仮面
description: The story is of a masked boy, Tani, a strong young man, who has a crush on a girl named Shima Rihoko, the school volleyball star. He gets into trouble trying to get her attention, besides facing the thugs of the school. He’s a very jealous guy, and will not let anyone get close to Shima-san.
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, School Life
author: Shibata Yokusaru

title: Touhou Suichouka ~ Lotus Eater-tachi no Suisei
alt_title: The Lotus Eaters, Drunk and Sober, Touhou Drunken Butterfly Flower ~ Lotus Eaters' Sobering, 東方酔蝶華　ロータスイーター達の酔醒
description: In this sixth official Touhou manga series from ZUN, the shrine maiden Reimu Hakurei goes to investigate a strange rumor in the human village, where she gets involved with the local Geidontei bar and its poster girl, Miyoi Okunoda.
genre: Thriller, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life
author: ZUN

title: Our Similarities
alt_title: Monster, Similar, 同类
description: You must take the fall with me.The abuse people suffer during their childhood will all burst out all at once when they grow up. Some people choose to vent their anger to the outside world, but some people will only keep it in and torture themselvesThis is quite literally the description from bilibili 😭 - Kora
genre: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Gore, Full Color
author: 呉羽

alt_title: 舌尖禁锢

title: Gendai no Saikyou Heishi, Isekai Dungeon o Kouryaku Suru

description: Hasumi Ryuuji, the man called “the modern era’s strongest soldier”, someone who can make numerous difficult strategies a success, was transferred during a mission into the depths of another world’s dungeon. A “heavenly voice” echoed inside his brain guiding him — “Welcome, the hero from another world” — as he encounters a scene in which adventurers are being attacked by monsters. However, making good use of his superior physical abilities, discernment, and hand-to-hand combat abilities, he succeeds in easily making quick work of the monsters. In this other world, where adventurers are existences weaker than monsters, Hasumi, who can suppress his target even with just a knife, was someone regarded as a hero due to his outstanding abilities. Hasumi decides to cooperate with the adventurers he rescued, but they are attacked by a dragon, falling into a critical situation. Nevertheless, he leads his flustered comrades, coordinate them and makes an attack opportunity to appear. Moreover, after he summons modern firearms with a “weapon summoning” item, he kills the dragon in one shot by accurately targeting its weak spot. In front of this man’s tempered body and intellect, someone who is asked “Who the heck are you?” answers “I’m just a soldier”, even the mythical-grade dungeon is not a threat?! The curtain rises for the story of an ex-special forces soldier turned adventurer challenging another world!

title: [Rouhou] Ore no Iinazuke ni Natta Jimiko, Ie de wa Kawaii Shika nai.
alt_title: [Good News] The Plain-Looking Girl, Who Became My Fiancée, Is Only Cute at Home, [Good News] My Plain-Looking Fiancee Is Secretly Sweet With Me, 【朗報】俺の許嫁になった地味子、家では可愛いしかない。, 【好消息】我的不起眼未婚妻在家裡有夠可愛 小說, 【好消息】我的不起眼未婚妻在家里有够可爱 小说, 【낭보】나의 약혼녀가 된 수수녀, 집에서는 귀엽기민 하다
description:
“Onii-san, congratulations on your marriage. This person is your bride.”

“M-my name is Watanae Yuuka… I’m in the same class as you…”

My name is Sakata Yuuichi. I’m in my 2nd year of high school. Due to my parents’ circumstances, I’m suddenly getting married..? Furthermore, my partner is a plain girl, Watanae-san. During my 3rd year of middle school, I went through a bad experience. Ever since then, I’ve only been interested in 2D heroines. There’s absolutely no way I’d ever be interested in a 3D girl. That was what I thought, but…

“…Well then, who’s your favorite heroine right now?”

Turns out, she was actually an otaku and she becomes very talkative when you get to know her. She’d always happily engage in our conversations. She showed me things I’d never have expected from a girl in my class.

“Err, since we’re going to be living together… Is it okay if I call you Yuu-kun?”

And, the moment I let my guard down, she’d instantly try to shorten the distance between us. What’s more…

“Just between you and me, I’m actually the voice actress for Yuuna Izumi from 『Alice Stage』. Thank you for always supporting me!”

It’s a secret from everyone else, but it turns out she’s actually my favorite heroine’s voice actress?! I am only interested in 2D heroines! But, Yuuka’s true self, which she only shows when she’s alone with me, is nothing but cute! This is the story of me and Yuuka, starting as bethrothed. A heartwarming and chaotic romcom!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Hidaka Yuu

author: Kuune Rin

title: Double Complex
alt_title: ダブルコンプレックス
description:
Haruto, currently financially unstable, not in education, or in employment, is begging for rent money from a woman. When his negotiation plans go awry, the person who suddenly appears is none other than Haruto's brother, Asahi...!

He had always acted as the "perfect brother" in front of his family, so Haruto is unable to confide to anyone in his family about his current ruined state, and desperately tries to cover up the situation.

However, Asahi forces Haruto to bring him to his place, and he discovers Haruto's current state...?!

【An obsessed-type cool little brother x Former perfect older brother】
The love between brothers who frustratingly misunderstand each other unfolds! 

What is the truth behind the "complexes" that each of them harbors...?
genre: Boys' Love, Incest, Drama
author: Mitasu Ama

title: Rosen Garten Saga
alt_title: Сага о Розенгартене, Сага о Саде роз, ローゼンガーテン・サーガ, 薔薇園傳奇
description: Lynn's village getting attacked by bandits doesn't keep her down in the dumps for long! Picking up a sword housing an extraordinary pervert… I mean hero, Siegfried, she sets off on a journey of many bouts with various degenerat… ahem, heroes!
genre: Genderswap, Loli, Historical, Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Crossdressing, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Supernatural
author: Sakimori Fuji

title: For My Derelict Favorite
alt_title: 버려진 나의 최애를 위하여, Beoryeojin Na-eui Choeaereul Wihayeo, For My Forsaken Beloved, For My Abandoned Love, For My Derelict Beloved, 为了我被遗弃的爱
description:
I entered my favorite romantic fantasy novel! I may be a commoner, but I'm rich beyond belief. I quietly watched the romance of the main characters in the original novel, assuming I would go back to reality after reaching the novel's ending... However, even after the ending, I am still stuck in this world! As a result, I learned the behind-the-scenes stories that I didn't want to know. My favorite second male lead, Kaelus, died. Living in poverty without him, I eventually became ill and died as well. I thought I would return to reality, but I went back in time instead. This is definitely... This means I have to save my beloved, right?

---
**Notes:**
* The novel of this series was originally released as R15, 7 months after being completed the book/ebook was later re-released as R19. The webtoon will follow how the novel was originally released which is R15.
* *For My Derelict Favorite* is the official English name on the Korean novel.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8423030), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=794155)
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Ryuho

title: I Have An Apocalyptic Dungeon
alt_title: 我有一座未世地下城, I Have an Apocalyptic Underground City, I Have a Post-Apocalyptic Dungeon
description:
A Female President? Then come help me manage the shelter. A Female Special Forces Soldier? Then come and be the captain of the guards.   
At the end of the world, titles like CEOs, beautiful women, secretaries, electricians, programmers and all other professions are all no longer useful. Don't be afraid to come to my underground system shelter- as long as you are talented people and human beings!   
  
5 consecutive updates will be launched after February 16.
genre: Long Strip, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Harem, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Walter Bloodhoof

title: Fairy Tail
alt_title: FAIRY TAIL [フェアリーテイル], Хвост Фей, 妖精的尾巴
description:
Celestial wizard Lucy wants to join the Fairy Tail, a guild for the most powerful wizards. But instead, her ambitions land her in the clutches of a gang of unsavory pirates led by a devious magician. Her only hope is Natsu, a strange boy she happens to meet on her travels. Natsu's not your typical hero - but he just might be Lucy's best hope.
  
Won the 33th Kodansha Manga Award for Best Shounen Manga.  
Won the Society for the Promotion of Japanese Animation's Industry Award for Best Comedy Manga.
genre: Award Winning, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Mashima Hiro

title: Boruto: Two Blue Vortex
alt_title: -ボルト- Two Blue Vortex, Boruto: Two Blue Vortex, BORUTO Part 2
description:
With everyone's memories having been altered, Boruto finds himself being hunted by his own village. After escaping with Sasuke, what future awaits Boruto...?

(Source: MangaPlus)

---

**Links:**
- [Viz - Alternative Official English](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/boruto-two-blue-vortex)
genre: Action, Ninja, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Aliens
author: Kishimoto Masashi

title: Imouto wa Siscon Ani ga Mendokusai
alt_title: 妹はシスコン兄がめんどくさい
description:
Yui Hasegawa, an unattractive high school student, has an older brother, Yu, who is both a literary and martial artist, cool, and called the most handsome guy in school.
The two are so unlike each other that it is hard to believe they are brother and sister.
There are even rumors that they don't get along, Yui, who has a "perfect brother," is troubled.

It is...

The fact that her brilliant and talented older brother is actually a severe siscon. 
A hilarious home comedy about siblings who are complete opposites!
genre: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Yoshimizu

title: I Only Want to Beat You
alt_title: I Want to Beat You, Oh Roji, I Want to Defeat You, Oh Roji, 오로지 너를 이기고 싶어, Oroji Neoreul Igigo Sipeo, IOWTBY, Я хочу победить только тебя, Solo quiero derrotarte, Solo quiero derrotarte
description: The male lead 'Lee Gigo', who has never lost a single time in his life, and the female lead who defeated him 'Oh Roji'. Who will end up as the victor of this 'bet'?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Amadoji (아마도지)

title: Mr. Do of the Rose Mansion
alt_title: 장미 저택의 도도훈 씨
description:
Song Hakyum, an omega who is no stranger to debauchery and has been with so many alphas he’s lost track, is the hidden son of a nationally renowned actor. When rumors about his promiscuity spread, his father who has always told him to “spend money however you like, but keep your head low,” exiles Hakyum to their countryside vacation home. The only thing at the mansion in the mountains is the stoic gardener Do Dohoon who only cares about the fresh air and roses.

“Dohoon, if there’s anything you want to know about omegas, I’ll teach you. Everything, one thing at a time… What do you say?”

“I’m not curious about anything. Regardless, I can’t send you back to Seoul.”

Hakyum desperately tries to seduce his way back to Seoul, but the stubborn beta Dohoon doesn’t budge. The country is boring to a city boy like Hakyum. To make matters worse, the ever so annoying Do Dohoon’s face and body are exactly Hakyum’s type. It also annoys Hakyum that, in catching a glimpse of Do Dohoon in the shower, he found that he had an impressive package. What kind of beta was he?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Web Comic, Full Color
author: 탕쥐 (Tang Mouse)

title: Kougekiryoku Zero Kara Hajimeru Kenseitan
alt_title: 攻撃力ゼロから始める剣聖譚, The Master Swordman's Story Starts with the Zero Ability to Attack, Tale of the Sword Saint Beginning with Zero Attack Power
description: Although Eugene was blessed with an extraordinary talent for defensive magic, he had no talent for offensive magic. He is ridiculed as incompetent by those around him and enrolls in a magic academy to escape. However, his "useless" defensive magic came in handy there, and as expected, he was assigned to take care of the beautiful Demon King Erinyes, who once ruled the world...!?
genre: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: Oosaki Airu

title: After-school Secret Club
alt_title: 放課後ひみつクラブ
description: Yuichi Nekota enters the giant school city "Private Eucalyptus Leaf Academy". Excited about his new life, he meets Chitose Arikasaki, a girl who investigates the mysteries of the school! The two form the 'After School Secret Club', and today they continue their search for the truth!
genre: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Fukushima Teppei

title: Memento (mori): Pseudo-Daycare
description: To achieve their goal of traveling back to the past, three adventurers that usually spend their time fighting monsters are ready to do anything to achieve it! Including becoming workers at a... daycare...?
genre: Long Strip, Comedy, Fantasy
author: Dae Dind

title: Worst Gaiden Mr. Zetton
alt_title: «Отбросы» гайдэн — Мистер Зеттон, Worst Side Story: Mr. Zetton, WORST外伝 ゼットン先生
description: After years of studying, Hanazawa Saburou, AKA Suzuran's legendary Zetton, has finally become a high school teacher. But on his first day at work, the principal tells him he was actually hired not to teach, but to make the students of his homeroom class drop out of school?!
genre: Action, Comedy, Mafia, School Life, Delinquents
author: Suzuki Dai

title: Miyu-chan wa Zutto Tomodachi
alt_title: みゆちゃんはずっと友達, Miyu-chan Will Always Be Your Friend, Miyu-chan Siempre Será tu Amiga
description:
In the summer of his second year of high school, Yuushin Tahara finds that his childhood friend, Miyu Fukagawa, who had moved away, has returned to the house next door. Although Miyu has grown up to be quite cute, there's something a little strange about her... 

A fresh and suspenseful romantic comedy about the gentle protagonist and his cute but rather quirky childhood friend, along with their friends and the adventures they get into!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Mystery
author: Hideki

title: Isekai Walking
alt_title: Walking in Another World, 異世界ウォーキング
description:
Sora, a Japanese boy who was summoned to another world, gained the skill "Walking." Its effect is that "no matter how much he walks, he never gets tired." Because of this weak skill, the king expelled him from the group of summoned heroes. But when Sora starts walking in another world, he suddenly levels up!
 
Walking had a hidden effect of "gaining 1 EXP for each step taken." He acquired useful skills such as 'Appraisal,' 'Alchemy,' and healing magic...

Getting one skill after another, he became talented just by walking! The adventure to encounter and touch the unknown is about to begin!
genre: Monsters, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Aruku Hito

title: Kaijin Reijou
alt_title: Slasher Maidens, 怪人麗嬢, 괴인영애
description:
Asuma Sudou has always been a proud pervert, but he's sworn to give that up to chase the girl of his dreams. Having received a special invitation to enter the same all-girls school as her, he's planning to live his romantic youth to the fullest. But those plans are cut short when it turns out the school is a front for a secret organization dedicated to battling kaijin-monsters created when people succumb to their murderous impulses! The girls of the school fight using the relics of defeated kaijin, but when the bloodthirsty instincts sealed within threaten to overwhelm them, Asuma is the only one who can bring them back to their senses!

(From: Yen Press)
genre: Action, Horror, Fantasy
author: Tashiro Tetsuya

title: Konbini Baito no Gal ga Kininaru Kyaku to Chikazuku Hanashi
alt_title: コンビニバイトのギャルが気になる客と近づく話, コンビニではじまる恋の話, A Story About a Gyaru Working at a Convenience Store Who Gets Closer to a Customer She's Interested in, A Story About a Burgeoning Love at a Convenience Store, История о гяру-продавщице, сблизившейся с покупателем, История любви, начавшаяся в супермаркете
genre: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Mizuguchi Mafuyu

title: Koukousei WEB Sakka no Mote Seikatsu: "Anta ga Kami Sakka na Wake Nai Deshou" to Boku wo Futta Osanajimi ga Koukai Shiteru kedo Mou Osoi
alt_title: 高校生WEB作家のモテ生活「あんたが神作家なわけないでしょ」と僕を振った幼馴染が後悔してるけどもう遅い, The Teen Web Novelist is a Girl Magnet: Now My Crush Feels Bad for Rejecting Me!
description:
Yuta Uematsu is a aspiring novel writer who has long had feelings for his childhood friend Michiru Okuwa, who had always supported his creative work. He finally decided to confess his love to her, even though he didn't feel like he was a match for Michiru, the most popular girl at school. When Michiru brushed him off with the words, "It's impossible!" and stormed out, Yuta was left stunned in disbelief. Michiru went back to reading "Digital Masters," a very popular web novel. However, "Digital Masters" was actually Yuta's work....... This is a romantic comedy revolving around Yuta, who is actually a very successful writer, and his high school life.

(Source: Natalie.mu, translated)
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation
author: Ibarakino

title: Tada de wa Dakaremasen
alt_title: タダでは抱かれません, I Won't Sleep with You for Free, 无法白“嫖”
description: Miyako Kirishima, a university student and aspiring teacher, is a poor girl who enjoys being frugal. One day, she has a meal with Yui Nakano, her friend whom she occasionally tutors. On the way home, Yui invites her to a love hotel. Miyako is reluctant, unwilling to have sex with a friend. However, Yui cuts her off, offering her 30000 yen for sex! Subsequently, Miyako ends up in more "transactions" with her other friends at her women's university!? The curtain rises on a tale of yuri, friendship, money, and sex♡.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Harem, School Life, Web Comic
author: Hinohara Fuki

title: Worker Bee
alt_title: 工蜂
description: Hart is a death row inmate with self-destructive tendencies who is drafted into a dangerous mining mission in a perilous forest. There, he encounters the highest-ranking leader, who turns out to be his first love from whom he had once parted ways. Hart tries to resist the strings of fate, but he gradually falls into a dangerous love relationship that defies his status.
genre: Official Colored, Animals, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Crime, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery
author: 早上七点

title: Yuki to Sumi
alt_title: 雪と墨, Snow and Ink
description:
Neneo was being hauled through the city for the terrible crime of murdering 50 villagers.
"I will buy you" she said. With one word, Freya, the daughter of a prestigious family, changed his fate as he was about to be beheaded. When Freya loses the battle for the throne and heads off to a remote, cold region, Neneo is ordered as her squire, and he finds himself in the company of a woman who, like himself, is scorned and pitied by the world. The two have different backgrounds and different ways of thinking, but as they confide in each other about their respective circumstances, they come to understand each other.
genre: Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Unohana Miyuki

title: Fushigi na Neko no Machi Meltier
alt_title: The Curious Cat Town, ふしぎな猫のまち メルティア, 신비한 고양이 마을의 메르티아
description:
This is "Meltier," a town of cats. Moko, who has no memory of her past, ends up helping out at a coffee shop in town. There, she meets many unique and fun kittens and friends! A little bit mysterious and extraordinarily happy. A heartwarming fairy tale fantasy of everyday life!

---
Note: Has an original song sung by the author herself called はじめまして、世界！
genre: Animals, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Mystery
author: Sakura Oriko

title: Hazukashigariya no Tsuma to Shinkon Seikatsu Hajimemashita
alt_title: 恥ずかしがり屋の妻と新婚生活はじめました, 容易害羞的妻子与新婚生活的开始, Starting My Married Life with My Shy Wife
description:
Eat lunch at the convenience store, go home, take a bath, sleep. This was how I lived my life, but that ends today! My cute wife is now... wait why's she so distant?!

A comedic glimpse in the exciting newlywed life with a very shy but cute wife.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Kiribai Kineso

title: Butterfly Trap
alt_title: 버터플라이 트랩
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Drama
author: Kim Daecheon

title: Touhou Ibara Kasen ~ Wild and Horned Hermit.
alt_title: Eastern Thorned Poet Hermit ~ Wild and Horned Hermit., WaHH, Тохо Ибаракасэн ~ Дикий и Рогатый Отшельник, 東方茨歌仙　～ Wild and Horned Hermit.
description:
In this 10 volume official Touhou series, spanning the time period of nine long years between the UFO and WBaWC games, we follow the misadventures of the business inept shrine maiden Reimu Hakurei and her ever-curious friend Marisa Kirisame, who meet a mysterious, young hermit woman named Ibara Kasen.  
  
Upon seeing how sloppily the Hakurei Shrine conducts its business, she decides to become a regular shrine visitor, determined to lend her near unlimited wisdom to the shrine maiden, in order to make her place a proper Shinto Shrine. Does the nagging, yet well meaning hermit bring nothing but good-will with her advice, or is there something more sinister hiding behind the friendly face and her bandaged arm?
genre: Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: ZUN

title: The Worn and Torn Newbie
alt_title: 닳고 닳은 뉴비, 元ガチ勢、初心者に生まれ変わる, Изрядно поношенный нуб, 全裸菜鸟在异世界被摩擦, Dalko Dareun Newbie
description:
After learning 15 miserable years of his life as a failed gamer was one long nightmare, Lee Eojin is glad to be a newbie again! Vowing not to repeat the same mistakes, Eojin starts anew as the hotshot, Stagnant Water. 

He’s conquering monsters, getting sweet gear, and making enough dough to set himself up for life!

 Loved by fans and hated by foes, both old and new, will Eojin break the game and triumph, or will the game break him once again?
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Step on a LEGO (레고밟았어)

title: Koukousei WEB Sakka no Mote Seikatsu: "Anta ga Kami Sakka na Wake Nai Deshou" to Boku wo Futta Osanajimi ga Koukai Shiteru kedo Mou Osoi
alt_title: 高校生WEB作家のモテ生活「あんたが神作家なわけないでしょ」と僕を振った幼馴染が後悔してるけどもう遅い, The Teen Web Novelist is a Girl Magnet: Now My Crush Feels Bad for Rejecting Me!

title: Yamada-kun to Lv999 no Koi wo Suru
alt_title: 山田くんとLv999の恋をする, 和山田進行Lv999的戀愛, 和山田进行LV.999的恋爱, My Love Story with Yamada-kun at Lv999
description:
Recently dumped, Akane is just about to quit the game she used to play with her boyfriend when she meets Yamada in the same RPG. Yamada in real life turns out to be somewhat of a legend. The only problem is - he is ONLY interested in the game. As Akane's feelings grow, will Yamada's focus stay on the game?

The manga won the Tsutaya Comic Award in 2022.
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Mashiro (msr7025)

title: Dear, 00
alt_title: 디어, 제로제로
description:
After humanity's successful conquest of the Gate, peace has returned once again. However, the powerful psychic abilities of the Espers have become a double-edged sword for humanity, causing them great distress.

A new opportunity arises for Esper "NO.00 Michael," who is facing imminent death.

Adam, a retired soldier who has always struggled with the relationship between Guides and Espers, decides to give Michael, the cause of his leg injury, a second chance.

Adam gives Michael a new name, "Eve," in the hope that he can live a normal life, blending in with humanity.

The two, who have always fought on the front lines, risking their lives, embark on a journey to live a peaceful life in the embrace of humanity, dreaming of an ordinary existence.
genre: Sci-Fi, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Brothers Without a Tomorrow

title: Re:Monster
alt_title: リ・モンスター, Перерождение: Монстр, 重．怪物
description: Tomokui Kanata has been reincarnated into the weakest race, goblin, and given a new name, Gobrou, after having undergone an unfortunate death. However, Gobrou has retained his previous life's memories and ability to learn skills from what he eats. In this alternate world of survival of the fittest, events unfold. Will a goblin party become the heroes of this world, in a delightful twist from your usual scenario?
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Video Games, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Kanekiru Kogitsune

title: Foul's Start
alt_title: 파울즈 스타트
description:
Growing up, Eun Hae-il is unable to forget the boy he had his very first crush on.
This year, he gets accepted into his dream college after retaking the entry test 4 times.
However, one day he saves a child from drowning in the ocean but, attempting to save him, he submits to exhaustion and drowns.
Right before he stops breathing, he closes his eyes and thinks of the boy he has longed had a crush on, but when then he opens his eyes again he's no longer drowning in the ocean, but on a bus.
Hae-il, a man who has crossed between time and has survived death, now stands in front of the man he has longed loved, Yoon Pado. “Has God really given me a second chance?”
genre: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color
author: Brothers Without a Tomorrow

title: Sekai de Yuuitsu no Tenshokushi: Job Hopper na Ore wa, Isekai de Subete no Job o Kiwameru Koto ni Shita
alt_title: 世界で唯一の転職師～ジョブホッパーな俺は、異世界ですべてのジョブを極めることにした～, The Only Job Changer in the World: I, a Job Hopper, Decided to Master All the Jobs in Another World, The World's Only Job Changer
description:
Tsukasa, a company employee who repeatedly changes jobs in search of better conditions, challenges the final interview of a major corporation.  But as soon as he went past the door, he found himself in another world. His past career seems completely irrelevant, leading to a sense of discouragement. But, the "Job Changer" bestowed upon him grants him a unique ability!

With the power to freely switch between jobs like swordsman, mage, spear user, alchemist, appraiser, pharmacist, and more, he begins a leisurely life in this different world. Whether dealing with monsters or making use of abundant knowledge from herbs to items, he adapts effortlessly, engaging in everything from helping people to earning money. 

Unstoppable with his versatile skills, the powerful corporate slave leaps into a fantasy of career advancement!
genre: Monsters, Action, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Renkinou

title: Hitokiri Shoujo Koushaku Reijou no Goei ni Naru
alt_title: 『人斬り』少女、公爵令嬢の護衛になる, "Hitokiri" Girl Becomes Bodyguard For Duke's Daughter
description:
Shurine, a girl raised for the sole purpose of becoming a bodyguard, is framed by the state and branded a "hitokiri". 

Following a life on the run, she meets Lutecia, a duke's daughter, aboard a magical train. With Lutecia's life in danger, Shurine offers a solution:

"If you need a bodyguard, why not hire me right now?"
genre: Historical, Action, Samurai, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Sumeragi

title: Chirijiri Yuku no
alt_title: ちりぢりゆくの
description:
Kuno Shio, who is half human and half alien, has a "glitch" that causes his body to turn into a gel-like mass when he gets lustful.
He enjoys attracting girls who gather because of his novelty, but one day, his parents are worried about Shio, who is only interested in splattering, and transfer him to a boarding school for boys.
At the moment when Souma Minato, the class representative who was assigned to take care of Shio, hugs him, Shio somehow splatters...!?
The popular pure love comedy for youth, which was popular on LINE manga, is now a full-color comic with original illustrations!!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Aliens, Full Color

title: Official "Test" Manga
alt_title: TEST edited2, Korean, test title, 刃直海角骨入, 刃直海角骨入, 刃直海角骨入, 刃直海角骨入, Taest
description:
From the creator of popu***l***ar ser***i***es like ***T***wo Pi***e***ce, Da***r***uto, ***a***nd Detergent, comes the series Test, an award winning romantic comedy about a high schoo***l*** weapon meister named Yugi as he trave***l***s the entire world collecting all the Life Notes, so that one da***y*** ***h***e can recover h***i***s bro***t***her's body after performing the taboo of one punching the Titan we saw that day with his Stand and becoming the Nokage Pirate King -dattebayo. Watch as he roams through the Ho***l***y ***E***mpi***r***e of Britannia with his Onii-chan and generic harem girls as they conquer all odds with the power of friendship, love and…(why don't they just bang each other.) In this feature length epic rivaling that of Gilgamesh and the Iliad we will explore the mentality and sociology of these societal menaces as they ravage the Earth in their never quenchable thirst for imoutos.  Reviewers gives this series a 10/10 for the unconventional portrayal of the magical girl genre.  Nominated for the 1st Mangadex Award for Worst Manga of the Year.  Winner of the 2nd Mangadex Awards for Best Manga of the Year.  Best manga ever written, as stated by meichiro noda

title: Radiant
alt_title: Радиант, ラディアン
description:
Seth is an apprentice sorcerer from the Pompo Hills. Like all sorcerers, he's an "infected", one of the few people having survived an encounter with a Nemesis, those creatures falling from the sky and destroying everything around them. Being immune to them, Seth wants to become a Hunter and fight the Nemesis. But what Seth really wants is to find the source of all Nemesis, the Radiant. Helped by his fellow sorcerers, he will seek the Radiant, under the harsh scrutiny of the Inquisition…


---

alt_title: Hide it! Makina!, かくして！マキナさん！!
description: Makina Agatsuma, the school idol, moves into the home of Eita Akutsu, an introverted mechanical otaku. Eita, who has secretly harbored feelings for her, thinks he's hit the jackpot! But it turns out, she's actually a robot made for sexual purposes. Caught off guard by her sudden physical advances, the virgin Eita is at a loss. Furthermore, he finds himself in a frenzy trying to help her maintain her secret identity. A romantic comedy with a slightly risqué mechanical revelation, where hilarity ensues as they try to keep the secret under wraps!

alt_title: Himegami no Miko (姫神の巫女), Kannazuki No Miko: Destiny of Shrine Maiden (Spin-off), 神無月の巫女 Spin-off「姫神の巫女」
description:
Himeko Kurusugawa and Chikane Himemiya are two high-school girls at the prestigious Ototachibana Academy in the fictional Japanese village of Mahoroba. They are also the reincarnations of the solar and lunar mikos. When their ancient enemy the Orochi (the eight-headed Yamata no Orochi of Japanese folklore) rises once more the girls’ long-sealed personas awaken to defend the world!  
  
'Kannazuki no Miko' Spin-off Manga and 4th alternate reincarnation of Himeko and Chikane.  
  
Kannazuki No Miko - 1st alternate reincarnation

alt_title: デザートイーグル, Орел пустыни
description: Ichigo Washio is a young man with a bright future—a bright future, that is, within the gangs of Shinjuku. When he meets Ringo Takamizawa, a fellow student hell-bent on revenge on those who took everything from his mother, the gregarious Ichigo doesn't think twice about helping Ringo—even when it means it’ll pit Ichigo against men he's looked up to his whole life. But Ichigo knows he's in the right, and with his new friends and a healthy dose of stupidity to guide him, he's ready to return justice to Shinjuku's streets! [Kodansha]
genre: Action, Drama, Delinquents

title: Maou no Musume, Sugoku Choroi.
alt_title: 魔王の娘、すごくチョロい。, The Demon King's Daughter Is Way Too Easy, 魔王之女，超好對付, 마왕의 딸, 너무 쉽잖아
description: In the final showdown between the Demon King and the Hero, the latter used all his power to seal away the former. To exact her revenge on her father's nemesis, the Demon King's daughter, Hel, resurrected the Hero and planned to use him as her personal servant. However, the resurrected Hero is unexpectedly dazzling and dashing, and Hel's composure begins to waver. Will she ever be able to torment her new servant?
genre: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Web Comic

title: Dungeon Busters
alt_title: ダンジョン・バスターズ, ダンジョン・バスターズ　～中年男ですが庭にダンジョンが出現したので世界を救います～, Dungeon Busters: I Am Just Middle-Aged Man, But I Save the World Because the Dungeon Appeared in My Home Garden.
description:
Clear all the dungeons! There are 666 of them and 10 years to do it. If not, the only thing that awaits...is total annihilation. Ezoe Kazuhiko suddenly finds a mysterious underground space in his yard. When he steps into what turns out to be the very first dungeon in this world, he ends up activating the Dungeon System and learns from the mysterious beauty who appears to him, Akane, that the world is doomed to destruction if the 666 total dungeons that will be appearing in this world are not all cleared within 10 years. As countries begin taking measures in response to the dungeons appearing all over the world, Ezoe seeks out companions together with whom he establishes Dungeon Busters Inc., a company dedicated to clearing all the dungeons in the world! The curtains rise on this dungeon-delving epic with overwhelming realism!


* [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3255fp/)  (jp)
* [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/dungeon-busters)
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

Also has extra NTR Buster chapters, where you see people who try to NTR get what's coming to them.

title: All My Abilities Are Forbidden Spells
alt_title: 全民转职：我的技能全是禁咒 签约, Job Transfer For All: My Skills Are All Forbidden Spells
description:
Lin Han finds himself transmigrated into a world that merges reality and games. This world is rife with dungeons, forbidden zones, and hidden realms, not to mention rampaging monsters! 

When the time for the Class Change comes, Lin Han doesn’t receive the Warrior Class that he has always dreamt of. 

Instead, he receives the class Life Cleric. Just as he’s despairing over his misfortune…

[Ding! You’ve awakened the “Myriad Augmentation System”!] 

With every attribute augmented ten thousand times, all of Lin Han’s basic skills have turned into Forbidden Spells! 

Watch Lin Han as he dominates the battlefield with his Forbidden Spells and becomes known as a close-combat Healer!
- - -
Crossing to the other world with his soul, Lin Han arrived in an era where games and reality merged. There are countless dungeons, forbidden lands, and hidden realms where mighty monsters reign supreme!

On the day of his class profession, Lin Han missed the opportunity to become a warrior, the class of his dreams! Unexpectedly, he awakened the unique hidden profession – Life Sacrificer – at a critical moment!

[Ding! Ten Thousandfold Amplification System Awakening!]

Lin Han’s attributes increased by ten thousand times, and his basic skills all reached forbidden curses!

In the name of a close-combat healer, during the moment of unlimited forbidden curse devastation!
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Office Workers, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: 17K漫画

title: Saikyou Ansatsusha, Class Ten'i de Isekai e
alt_title: 最強暗殺者、クラス転移で異世界へ, The Strongest Assassin Gets Transferred to Another World With His Whole Class
description:
An ordinary high school student by day, an assassin living in the underworld by the night. A boy with two faces, Aragi Kai. His classmates hate him because of his anti-social character and weird aura.

One day, Aragi and his classmates were suddenly transferred to another world. It is a world of swords and magic. A woman who calls herself Leonora appears before the confused students, and declares…

“You are Hero Candidates summoned here to defeat the Demon King. Please help us.”

Leonora grants each of the students a unique ability: ‘Divine Protection’. While some powerful ‘Divine Protections’ are given like telekinesis and destructive blast, Aragi’s ‘Divine Protection’ is judgment.
genre: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Amamiya Kazuki

title: The Soulless Duchess
alt_title: 빈껍데기 공작부인, Binkkeopdegi Gongjakbuin, The Duchess With an Empty Soul, The Duchess' Empty Shell, The Empty Shelled Duchess, 公爵夫人的百變召喚術, 虚名的公爵之妻, “透明”的公爵夫人, かりそめの公爵夫人
description:
The naïve Yvona is ready to do anything for her amazing fiancé! Summon magical beasts and let him take the glory? Sure! Wreck her body for a powerful spell and die for him? Yes! Watch him secretly embrace her trusted cousin Tristan with passion and deride her openly? Oka— wait. What? Just then, Yvona dies... and wakes up a year in the past with a burdened heart. Armed with her knowledge, Yvona's ready to fight for herself. And hmm, maybe form an alliance with the coldhearted Duke of Azentine...

---
I died miserably on the day I found out the truth. The truth that my fiancé had a hidden lover, and it was my very own male cousin.

On the second morning, after my 20th birthday, a miracle happened. From that point on, I decided not to believe in love anymore. I want to have a relationship with no strings attached and without any superficial feelings such as love.

"Duke Agentine, will you marry me?"

This proposal was nothing more than a marriage to keep up appearances and without love involved.

---

title: Rosario to Vampire Season II
alt_title: Rosario + Vampire Season 2, Rosario + Vampire Season II, Rosario and Vampire II, ロザリオとバンパイア Season 2, ロザリオとバンパイア Season II, 十字架与吸血鬼 season II, 吸血鬼与十字架2
description:
The story continues where the first season left off only months into the future. Yuokai Gakuen has been repaired and the new semester is underway. Tsukune and gang are back, and more powerful then ever. Anti-Thesis's true identity is relieved. With new adversaries looming on the horizon, and something much more sinister then the gang has ever faced before.   
  
Tsukune is battling with the monster inside him. With the help of Moka, Mizore, Kurumu, Ruby, and Yukari. Tsukune trains to get his vampire blood under control and the strength to protect what he holds dear.  
  
The new season focuses more on the girls, their past, and their families. New confrontations await them. New friends and allies will join them by their side. Together they will discover the secrets of Moka's rosary, and her lineage…  
  


---

title: Kanojo ni shitai Joshi Ichii, no Tonari de Mitsuketa Amari-chan
alt_title: 彼女にしたい女子一位、の隣で見つけたあまりちゃん
description:
Fukusuke, un chico agradable pero un poco aburrido, se enamora a primera vista de Yua, la chica más hermosa de la clase. Sin embargo, se rumorea que Yua está interesada en Yusei, el amigo de la infancia de Fukusuke y la estrella del equipo de baloncesto. 

Fukusuke suspira por un amor imposible. Pero, un día, Fukusuke descubre a una chica adorable, llamada Amari Usuha, que es tímida y se esconde tras la sombra de Yua. "Um, ¿quieres ser mi amigo?" Y entonces, los dos empiezan a practicar juntos para "ser normales", pero... "¿Es cierto que Amari-chan está enamorada de Yusei?" "......." "¿Por qué te sonrojas tanto?" 

Una comedia romántica que comienza con amistad, entre un chico aburrido y una chica secretamente adorable, solamente conocida por él. 
(Un pequeño manga para promocionar la novela)
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation

title: Hope You're Happy, Lemon
alt_title: クソ女に幸あれ, Всего наилучшего, стерва, Надеюсь, ты счастлива, Лемон, God bless you witch
description:
"I've been cheating on you. Oh, and it's not just one guy. It's three. Sorry about that."

Back in middle school, Akiyoshi Sunao's first-ever girlfriend shattered his heart, and he swore off love. However, all that changes when he develops a crush on a girl in his university's film club. Just as he's finally beginning to move on from the past, he bumps into his ex-girlfriend. Little does he know that this is only the beginning...

To his horror, he wakes up in her body the next morning!

A beleaguered office worker finds his way to a cafe where he decries the hardships of his routine. In there, a friendly gyaru high schooler notices his lamentations and after hearing him vent out, she cheers him up the "gyaru" way and they exchange contacts.

description:
The story revolves around Tsukune Aono, a boy who accidentally gets enrolled in a school inhabited by monsters and demons. He quickly befriends Moka Akashiya, a vampire who soon develops an obsession with his blood, and later meets other girls who soon take a romantic liking to him.

title: Aisare Tenshi na Classmate ga, Ore ni Dake Itazura ni Hohoemu
alt_title: 愛され天使なクラスメイトが、俺にだけいたずらに微笑む, The Classmate Who Is Adored by Everyone Smiles Teasingly Only at Me
description: Girls and sweets are full of secrets!? Ichise Souma is a high school student who dreams of becoming a pastry chef and devotes himself to making sweets. He meets Satomi Chika, a female classmate, after receiving some sweets. Chika is a beautiful girl with a soothing personality, known at school as the “Angel of Peace.” Souma thought she was a good girl who would kindly listen to his worries about making sweets, but… “Ichise-san, your embarrassed face is really cute.” Chika shows an unexpected side of herself only when they are alone, and Souma’s heart is on the verge of exploding! A sweet and stimulating boy-meets-girl story with a mischievous angel connected by sweets begins!
genre: Romance, School Life, Cooking, Adaptation

title: I Became a Tyrant’s Maid
alt_title: 폭군의 침방 시녀가 되었다, I Became The Tyrant's Chambermaid
description:
Youour Highness- That is absurd!!

"Youour Highness, did you just cough-!!!"

"It's doomed! I've been transmigrated to another world! As an extra chambermaid from a 19+ imperovished novel from the early 2000s!"

For now, I'm trying my best not to upset the male lead's temper so I can survive and return home...

"Youour Highness! Please have mercy!"
"Youour Highness! That is such an absurd thing to say!"
"Could you please stop with that damn antiquated language?!"
Seems like the etiquette here is a bit different from what I know...

Anyway, after defeating an assassin and taking an arrow for him, I feel like I've become somewhat closer to the male lead.

The ominous journal that seems to understand my words, and the male lead, who orders me around, seems a bit fishy too.

"Can I survive here and return home?"
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: Joo Yeryeong

title: Charming the Duke of the North
alt_title: 북부 공작님을 유혹하겠습니다, Bukbu Gongjangnimeul Yuhokagetseumnida, Bugbu Gongjagnim-eul Yuhoghagessseubnida, I Seduced the Northern Duke, Я соблазню северного герцога, 北部公爵を誘惑します, 诱惑北部公爵, 攻略北部公爵大人, 我要诱惑北部公爵！, 魅惑北方公爵, 我要誘惑北部公爵！
description:
"Pretend to be my lover and join the social circle."

Selena, the top star that had the entire world's attention, was suddenly warped to Northern Duke's land during an accident while filming. Kalcion, the Northern Duke that saved her from the infernal beasts, offers Selena a chance to go back home in return for collecting information in various social circles by pretending to be his lover. Selena quickly accepts Kalcion's offer, but… 

"Why in the world can't you do this!?"

 "Don't you think that the answer to that should be obvious to you, the actress, not to me, the duke?"

There was a critical problem. The Northern Duke's acting skills are horrible!

"…Let's change the plan. I'll seduce you instead."

And thus the contractual relationship between the two started. Will Kalcion's acting skill improve first, or will he start to have true feelings for Selena instead?

---
Rinha, Korea's most beloved actress, gets into an accident while on set. When she regains consciousness, she realizes she has traveled to the Kingdom of Iklein and meets the northern duke Calcion, who saves her from a demonic beast. Calcion asks her to be his fake lover so she can get into socialite and discover the conspiracy happening in his castle.

---

title: Asshole Hero
alt_title: Arsehole Hero, Badass Hero, Bastard Hero, Hun Dan Ying Xiong, Scumbag Hero, 混蛋英雄
description:
Bastards? How can there be bastards in the world. They are all heroes!
Li Erdan only wants to be a bastard, but he always does "good things" by accident and is repeatedly reported as a hero by the media. However, and just as when he was about to turn from evil to good and work hard, fate decided to play a joke on him...
genre: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Sykes Culture

title: Ijiwaru Killer Tune
alt_title: The Killer Tune Which He Sings is Magic, いじわるキラーチューン, 장난치는 킬러 튠
description: Komugi Shirai wakes up every day at 4.30 am to help in her sister's bakery. Her neighbor Kirato, a seemingly philandering musician, often returns home at around the same time… when Komugi goes to a club to watch her best friend's band's concert, she finds herself in front of Kirato's band.
genre: Romance, Drama, School Life, Music
author: Kirishima Rira

title: Make Heroine ga Oosugiru! @comic
alt_title: 負けヒロインが多すぎる！@comic, Too Many Losing Heroines!, 敗北女角太多了!, ¡Demasiadas heroínas perdedoras!, Too Many Losing Heroines! @comic
description:
***“Huh? Who are you calling losing?”***

As the background of the class, I, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, witnessed a popular girl–Anna Yanami, getting rejected by another guy.

_“Even though he said we’ll get married. Don’t you think he’s pretty mean?”
“When did he say that?”
“When we were 4 or 5 years old.”_

That doesn’t count, right? With this, the losing heroines like Remon Yakishio from the Track and Field Club, and Chika Komari, from the literature club.

_“Nukumizu-kun. There are two types of girls. Childhood friends or cheating cats.”
“I see. Well, that’s a bold statement.”_

There’s a fortune for those who shine only after losing. Losing Heroines—The curtain to the mysterious coming-of-age story “Makeine” opens now!
  
---
