title: Corrupting the Heroine's First Love
alt_title: 여주인공의 첫사랑을 타락시켜 버리면, If You Corrupt the Heroine's First Love, Corrupting Your Heroine's First Love Will Result With This
description:
“I am a knight of Latem. We’re not destined to stand under the same sky.”

She had become Karina Apocalita, the personification of evil and a member of the heterogeneous race that ruled the world with malevolence. The plot began to twist and turn when Karina unknowingly saved the life of Reneiger, a justful knight and the heroine’s first love.

Reneiger became doubtful of his faith, eventually losing his glow and radiant platinum blond. Soon the sacred knight fell from grace and aligned himself to Karina’s fate.

“There’s no turning back now. Dear God, please forgive me.”

He knew he would never be able to escape from her hands.

---
"I am a knight of Latem, and that means I cannot coexist under the same sky as you."

After entering the book *A Trapped Bird Cannot Escape*, I realized that I had taken over the body of Karina Apocalypta, a member of a species that reigns as the evil of the world. However, the novel's plot begins to twist after I saved the life of Reneiger, the first love of the female protagonist, who happens to be a holy knight. Reneiger begins to doubt his faith, ultimately losing his brilliant platinum hair. Thus, the once sacred holy knight turns corrupt and eventually sympathizes with Karina's fate...

"Now we have each other's desires," Karina said while caressing his cheek. It was a feeling of being pulled in by each fascinating tendril of thorny vines.

Reneiger couldn't bear it, "It can't be undone."

---
In a land overshadowed by darkness, Karina Apocalita rises as a formidable figure, her being a tapestry of power from a diverse race. Her destiny intertwines with Reneiger, a knight from the virtuous Latem order, known for justice and as the former love of a legendary heroine. Their paths take an unforeseen turn when Karina, unaware of her impact, saves Reneiger's life. This act, challenging his convictions, triggers a crisis within him, tarnishing his once radiant aura and precipitating a fall from grace.

Faced with his altered fate, Reneiger prays for forgiveness, realizing his escape from Karina's shadow is but a dream. This pivotal moment raises a haunting question: will Reneiger rediscover the light, or be consumed by the darkness emanating from Karina?
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Cha Sohee (차소희)

description:
Cursed to be an ugly cat--but maybe you're happy!

"I'll have you turn into a cat, sister." Marie, the viscount's young daughter, lost her fiancé to her younger sister Emilia and has been cursed even more. Her reflection in the mirror - an ugly cat!

Running away from her sister for her life, Marie, who escaped from their house, collapsed from loneliness and hunger, unable to speak. Then, a kind hand reaches out to her, "In the middle of this rain, poor thing...Would you like to come with me?" 
The figure is the "ruthless, merciless, undefeated duke" who is rumored even in social circles.

An unfortunate girl gets her one and only happiness, and a happy cat life begins!

description:
“It’s safe because it’s a desk job, super stable because it’s public work!” 

Alina Clover thought being a receptionist for the Adventurers Guild would be her ticket to the good life… but her dream gig turns into an overtime nightmare whenever adventurers get stuck clearing a dungeon. 

To save herself from paperwork, Alina turns to the simplest solution at hand — beating down the monsters herself! A mysterious adventurer showing up out of nowhere, soloing the boss, then disappearing without taking credit is bound to create rumors, and Alina’s treasured job forbids side hustles. 

So there might be trouble when the leader of the Silver Sword party discovers her secret…!

alt_title: 恋した人は、妹の代わりに死んでくれと言った, 恋した人は、妹の代わりに死んでくれと言った。―妹と結婚した片思い相手がなぜ今さら私のもとに?と思ったら―, 恋した人は、妹の代わりに死んでくれと言った。―妹と結婚した片思い相手がなぜ今さら私のもとに?と思ったら―@COMIC, The Person I Loved Asked Me to Die in My Younger Sister's Place, 我爱的人、让我代替妹妹去死
description:
In place of her sister, Wisteria took on the job of becoming a guardian of a poisonous otherworld. One day, a man who resembled her first love dropped out of the sky. His name was Lloyd. To her surprise, he was the son of her first love!

 To win the hand of the princess, he has come to ask for Wisteria's partner, Saltis, a sentient holy sword. Having survived in the other world frozen in time, Wisteria easily defeated Lloyd and told him to go home... But despite her best efforts at persuasion, Lloyd refused to leave. 

"Please take me as your apprentice, until I get strong enough to defeat you!" 

So began a one-sided relationship between master and apprentice. Will her time, which has remained frozen for so long, begin to move again? A master-student love fantasy between a lonely former noble lady and a prodigy prince!

title: The Villain's Beloved Daughter
alt_title: 악당의 소중한 따님, Akdangi Sojunghan Ttanim, The Villain's Precious Daughter, La preciosa hija del villano, Драгоценная дочь злодея, 悪党公爵の愛娘, 恶人奶爸的宝贝女儿, 恶棍的宝贝女儿, 惡徒的寶貝女兒
description:
My name is Rosaria von Valencia, but I didn't always have this name. According to a book I read, I'm supposed to be murdered in place of the saint, Cordelia, just because I look like her. I decided to run away to avoid ever meeting my future killer, Duke Valencia, but ended up running into him as he was on the brink of death. After I saved him in the hopes of being spared, he adopted me as his daughter! Now that my new dad's spoiling me with love, does this mean I'll get to live until the end?

---
It's already unfair that I suffered greatly because I closely resembled the saint, but why did the villain kill me without any mercy at all? No, actually, it said in the book that I was really bound to die. 'My life is already ruined. Of all things, why do I have to be the one to die a ridiculous death?' There's still hope! I haven't met any of the characters yet so I'll just run away! But why did the villain collapse in front of me...?

With a lot of effort, I barely saved the life of the villain who was on the brink of death. But now he's saying that he wanted to adopt me as his daughter and raise me to be a saint?! Just like that, I decided to become his daughter for a few days before leaving quietly.

"My daughter is a genius. There's no child who is more angelic in this world other than my daughter."

...I think I have coaxed my dad too well. Even the guys who originally followed the real saint started to pay attention to me. What went wrong? Aren't you guys supposed to hate me?!

---
**Original Web Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/55069889), [Naver](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8231327), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/3885006486)

(to) kohyuu (v. infinitive form) When one is surprised and excited, their breathing begins to kohyuu. (see: hyperventilation)
Summary: High school first-year Yuu is an ardent admirer of Head Prefect Atori, and in order to get her attention, Yuu begins to act like a delinquent. 
But while her intention is to appeal with her "badness" and "coolness," her simple-minded facade is seen through by Atori, who teases and treats her like a small animal...!?
A totally not "bad" delinquent girl's 4-koma school life manga!
genre: Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Nikumaru

title: Kodomo Dorobou
alt_title: こどもどろぼう
description:
Minori is the only daughter of the Sano family, a family that is the picture of happiness. 

One day, Minori returns home after cheerfully forgetting something as usual, and encounters a burglar who has been breaking into the house. She falls from the balcony, and to her surprise, she and the thief switch bodies!

Until they get each other's bodies back, they begin a strange four-person life: father, mother, daughter, and thief.

A disturbing, heartwarming comedy begins!
genre: Comedy, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Yamabuki (山吹)

title: Oyako de Kaiten Sushi ni Iku Hanashi
alt_title: 親子で回転寿司に行く話, A Story About Going With My Dad to a Conveyor Belt Sushi Restaurant
description: A short story about a little girl and her dad getting some sushi.
genre: Oneshot, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Kakeru☆

title: Hiiragi-san is A Little Careless
alt_title: ちょっとだけ抜けちゃう柊さん, Hiiragi-san is a little careless.
description: Kotori-kun, who falls in love with his classmate Hiiragi-san at first sight, somehow wants to get close to her. Hiiragi-san is quite an earnest and lovely girl, but… She’s surprisingly a little careless--! This is about the charming school life of a careless girl and a pure boy who gets led on everyday by her -- a romantic comedy that’s a wee bit H sometimes but warm and fluffy to death.
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Urano Ritsu

title: Tokoshie × Bullet - Shin Minato Koubou-sen
alt_title: Tokoshie x Bullet - The Battle at Shin Minato, Tokoshie×Bullet The Battle at Shin Minato, 永久×バレット 新湊攻防戦, 永久×バレット: 新湊攻防戦, The Battle at Shin Minato
description: In this story, unidentified giant weapons will destroy the world's metropolises in 2029. The masterminds of this unprecedented destruction are known as "Tokoshie". They call themselves weapons when they go out on the streets of the cities with their overwhelming powers and disappear as soon as they are done with them. A decade has passed since then. A certain military company is developing a combat drone with the ability to fight the Tokoshie, and a certain millionaire figure goes underground to discover the secret of the Tokoshie's eternal life. Another specific girl goes on a journey to fight the Tokoshie, sworn in as her parents' enemies. In short, this is the chronicle of an endless struggle between humanity and its greatest enemy ever.
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Drama
author: Morion Airlines

title: Counterattacking System Available At The Grand Ascension Stage
alt_title: 大乘期才有逆袭系统, Dacheng Qi Cai You Ni Xi Xitong, Only in the Mahayana Period Does the Counterattack System Exist
description: Jiang Li, after crossing over, discovered he possessed no cheat abilities so he had no choice but to diligently cultivate. Five hundred years later, he became the strongest in the Nine Provinces. Suddenly, a system appeared, claiming it could help the host go from the Qi Refining stage to becoming the number one in the Nine Provinces. Jiang Li stared at the first task, lost in thought. “Host, please defeat your cousin (at the sixth level of Qi Refining).” “Your system seems to have quite a delay, doesn’t it?”
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: 猪画

title: Tanbo de Hirotta Onna Kishi, Inaka de Ore no Yome da to Omowareteiru
alt_title: 田んぼで拾った女騎士、田舎で俺の嫁だと思われている, All My Neighbors are Convinced the Female Knight from My Rice Field is My Wife, I Found a Female Knight in a Rice Field, in the Countryside They Think She’s My Wife
description:
Jin Mita, a farmer living in a small countryside town, discovers an unconscious female knight in his rice field one morning. She calls herself Seraphim, and she seems to have come from another world. She has no knowledge of this world and nowhere to go. Unable to bear seeing her like this, Jin offered to take her in, but apparently the people around him think that Seraphim is his wife...!?

A slow life in the countryside begins with a beautiful female knight!

(Source: Magazine Pocket)

alt_title: ディノサン, Dinosaur Sanctuary
description: In 1946, someone discovered an island where dinosaurs had survived into the present. Through breeding and genetic manipulation, humans managed to increase their population and supercharge their popularity! Until, well... the unfortunate accident, when people's attitudes soured on the idea of visiting dinosaurs. This story follows a rookie zookeeper who is newly hired at Enoshima Dinoland, a struggling dinosaur sanctuary, and the fascinating creatures who need specialized love and care!

However, the halcyon days come to an end, when she crosses her path once again with the person who left an unfading mark both on her neck and life five years ago...

An RPG-style high school comedy set in present-day Japan, centering around Shiromado Hijiri, a very serious White Mage, and Michibikari Yuuto, a motivationless Hero.

Watch as they futilely struggle to raise the level of the hopeless Hero, day in and day out, in order to one day defeat the Demon Lord.

alt_title: 최초의 헌터, 末世英雄传说, Первобытный Охотник
description:
When monsters attack the world, a small portion of the population discovers special powers that help them fight these monsters. Of this group, one man stands out above them all. Taehun Kim’s experience as a special forces soldier makes him a deadly hunter of monsters, both human and non-human. But when a magical artifact prophesizes Taehun’s death several years in the future, he must fight to change his fate, and the fate of the world. Can Taehun and his team survive this apocalyptic wasteland?

title: The Great Catsby
alt_title: 위대한 캣츠비 제, Widaehan Kaetcheubi
description:
Catsby, twenty-something nobody, loses his girl-friend to another man. A richer man. His pal Houndu treats him to wine, women and song, but there's no forgetting the lost Persu. The thousand humiliations of youth are poured upon Catsby, who feels far too much to begin with, and whose prospects go from bad to worse.

Now he's petrified by his father, now drunk on the floor, now freaking over a blind-date, now convinced it's all for nothing. And that's just volume one of this groundbreaking new series. No detail however vulgar or delicate is left out as the angst of youth is beautifully dissected.
genre: Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Doha Kang

title: Love For Sale
alt_title: 100万ウォンのロマンス, Baegman-won-ui Lomaenseu, Любовь за миллион вон, 백만원의 로맨스, 1 Million Won Romance, 百万情事, 百万罗曼史
description: "Will this make you happy?" Namwoo wakes up one night to find bills sprawled all over his room - along with the hazy memory of a handsome stranger. Even in his wildest dreams, all Namwoo wants is to have enough money to survive each month. Si-eon, on the other hand, has everything he could ever want except happiness. Intrigued by Namwoo's humble wishes, Si-eon offers him the money he wants - the catch being, he has to date him.

description: The seventh life, finally bloody revenge! Ryu Hee-gyeom, who helped the shaman in trouble, receives five lives. He dies in vain in all five lives, and Ryu Hee-gyeom comes back to life again. In his repeated life, he only wants revenge for the traitor, and due to some variable, he returns to the seventh. His life flows differently from his memory. “Since I got married, whether I kill or live, the queen is now my person.” Somehow, she becomes the only queen of the king and starts to be favored... “If you try to escape, cut off your leg.

title: Plaything
alt_title: Plaything: The Toy of a Grand Duke
description: A robust and naive mercenary, Ilrick, accidentally killed the son of the leader of his unit, who was after Ilrick's body. After he believed that he had successfully concealed his crimes, Ilrick received the summon of an unexpected individual. With flowing silver hair, the individual was the most handsome man Ilrick had ever seen in his life- the Grand Duke of Miros. The duke graced a chillingly beautiful smile on his face as he spoke to Ilrick. "Isn't it only correct for you to be the one asking me to fuck you up?"

alt_title: 퍼펙트 바디 파트너, Perfect Body Partner
description: Recently, Siwon has been lively. This is because he has fallen inlove with Soyoung, a therapist he had met after receiving physiotherapy. Siwon has appeared quite a few times in front of Soyoung, but Soyoung doesn't give out affection easily. Siwon, who is faced with constant rejection, always keeps a smile on his face. This makes Soyoung look at him with an unknown smile on his face.
genre: Long Strip, Boys' Love, Sexual Violence, Web Comic, Full Color

alt_title: The Eminence in Shadow, Восхождение в тени, 陰の実力者になりたくて！, 숨은 실력자가 되고싶어서, I Want To Be The Eminence In Shadow!, To Be a Power in the Shadows!
description:
Just like how everyone adored heroes in their childhood, a certain young man adored those powers hidden in shadows. Ninjas, rogues, shadowy mentor types, that sort of deal.  
After hiding his strength and living the mediocre life of a NPC by day while undergoing frenzied training by night, he finally reincarnates into a different world and gains ultimate power.  
The young man who is only pretending to be a power in the shadows… his subordinates who took him more seriously than he expected… and a giant organization in the shadows that gets accidentally trampled…  
This is the story of a young boy who had adored powers in shadows possibly eventually reigning over the world of shadows in another world.
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Comedy, Martial Arts, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Aizawa Daisuke

title: Buddy Go!
alt_title: バディゴ！, Buddy Go!
description: Shizuku Ishiai, a 2nd year middle school student, loves dancing, but is bad at expressing herself, so she crossdresses and posts videos of her dances on the popular website "Smile Douga," under the alias "Ai." And she had declared the "dancing prince," Hayate, her rival. But, after a few unexpected events, and her attempts to best him, she's somehow thrown into an idol unit with him; furthermore, a MALE one?!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, School Life
author: Kurosaki Minori

title: Ooi! Tonbo
alt_title: Hey! Tonbo, オーイ! とんぼ
description:
The story begins with Igarashi, who was disqualified as a pro golfer after a certain "incident" and thus moves to Kagoshima Prefecture's Tokara Islands to step out of the limelight. On these islands known as "Japan's last unexplored wilderness," he encounters a naive girl named Tonbo.

As it turns out, these supposedly unexplored islands have a homemade golf course, where Tonbo plays every day. She demonstrates genius-level prowess, playing every kind of shot with just one golf club, a 3-iron. Igarashi is amazed at Tonbo's talent, even as he harbors doubts about her only using a 3-iron. Yet, hidden deep in Tonbo's heart lies a painful, sad past….
genre: Sports, Slice of Life
author: Ken Iwasaki

title: Kage no Jitsuryokusha ni Naritakute! Shadow Gaiden
alt_title: 想要成爲影之實力者-沙雕小劇場, 陰の実力者になりたくて！ しゃどーがいでん, The Eminence in Shadow: Shadow Side Story, I Want To Become The Eminence In Shadow! Shadow Side Story
description:
An official spin-off of the the super famous fantasy "The Eminence in Shadow".  
OP main character × isekai reincarnation × misunderstandings!? This is the beginning of a spin-off of the super-famous web novel isekai fantasy "The eminence in Shadow".  
Cid is a boy who reincarnated in another world, and decided to enjoy a scenario of being "the eminence in shadow, someone who meddles with the story from the shadows, and exhibits his true power in secrecy". Thus unfolds the story of him and the secret organization he leads—shadow garden—as well their their pleasant friends! An easy-going 4-koma manga starts right here and now!

description:
The girl I fell in love with is… an alien!? I, the class president, happened to fall in love with my classmate, the eccentric Haru. I confessed my feelings, but her true identity was an alien who came to Earth to survey it.

“I still like you!”

I started going out with Haru, but now I have a further “secret” to keep…

title: Isekai Yakkyoku
alt_title: Parallel World Pharmacy, Аптека в ином мире, 異世界薬局, 이세계 약국, 異世界藥局, Isekai Pharmacy, Pharmacy in Another World, Other World Pharmacy
description:
A young pharmacologist and researcher in Japan died from overworking, and was reincarnated in a Medieval Parallel Europe. He was reincarnated as a 10-year-old apprentice to a famous Royal Court pharmacist, had attained an inhuman skills of ability to see through disease, material creation, and material destruction.  
  
In a society in which dubious medical practice are rampant, price gouging thru the monopoly of the pharmacist guild, and good medicine aren't available to the commoners. He was recognized by the Emperor at that time and opened a Pharmacy at the corner of the town. He will wipe out the fraud that has swept the world, and deliver to the commoners a truly effective medicine that was developed using present day pharmacology. Thus the boy pharmacist will cheat by using his previous knowledge to create innovative medicines while helping the people of the parallel world, a story about living his new life to the fullest this time.
genre: Reincarnation, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Medical, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

He was scared and tried to sneak away from him, but he suddenly grabbed his wrist and dragged him into the cafe....

description:
***"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."***

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people? A cute yet hard-working success romantic comedy begins here!!

title: 100-man no Inochi no Ue ni Ore wa Tatteiru
alt_title: 100万の命の上に俺は立っている, 나는 100만 명의 목숨 위에 서 있다, I'm Standing on a Million Lives, Я стою на миллионах трупов, 我立于百万生命之上, 我立于百萬生命之上, I'm Standing on 1,000,000 Lives
description:
Yotsuya Yuusuke along with his classmates Shindou Iu and Hakozaki Kusue have been transported to a strange and unknown world inhabited by mythological creatures. As soon as they arrive, they meet somebody calling himself the Game Master who then grants them a time-limited quest. To aid them in this quest, he also bestows Shindou and Hakozaki with the roles of a Magician and a Warrior while Yotsuya is randomly granted the role of… a Farmer?!  
This is how a hectic life of adventuring began for three students who now have no choice, but to complete random quests for several phases in the fantasy world if they want to stay alive and protect the real world from the demons and monsters they encounter.

---

description:
Entering a new series! The adventure of the strongest demon lord is far from over.  
  
At the lowest floor of the dungeon, the Demon Lord came face to face with a presence that appears to be the creator of this world.  
His next destination is the demon territory where there's an ongoing rivalry between devils.  
  
A new, incredibly energetic and cheerful high school girl has joined the gang. Once again, our character's bustling personalities and their idiosyncrasies will clash with each other.  
  
The long-awaited comical sequel of a comic adaptation of the popular fantasy, full of misunderstandings!

title: Uchuujin no Kakushigoto
alt_title: 宇宙人のかくしごと, Secret of the Alien, 外星人的隱瞞之事, Extraterrestrial Secrets
description:
The girl I fell in love with is… an alien!? I, the class president, happened to fall in love with my classmate, the eccentric Haru. I confessed my feelings, but her true identity was an alien who came to Earth to survey it.

“I still like you!”

I started going out with Haru, but now I have a further “secret” to keep…
genre: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Romance, Gore, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Aliens, Tragedy
author: Hamita

title: Isekai Yakkyoku
alt_title: Parallel World Pharmacy, Аптека в ином мире, 異世界薬局, 이세계 약국, 異世界藥局, Isekai Pharmacy, Pharmacy in Another World, Other World Pharmacy
description:
A young pharmacologist and researcher in Japan died from overworking, and was reincarnated in a Medieval Parallel Europe. He was reincarnated as a 10-year-old apprentice to a famous Royal Court pharmacist, had attained an inhuman skills of ability to see through disease, material creation, and material destruction.  
  
In a society in which dubious medical practice are rampant, price gouging thru the monopoly of the pharmacist guild, and good medicine aren't available to the commoners. He was recognized by the Emperor at that time and opened a Pharmacy at the corner of the town. He will wipe out the fraud that has swept the world, and deliver to the commoners a truly effective medicine that was developed using present day pharmacology. Thus the boy pharmacist will cheat by using his previous knowledge to create innovative medicines while helping the people of the parallel world, a story about living his new life to the fullest this time.
genre: Reincarnation, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Medical, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Takayama Liz

title: Plum Candy Love
alt_title: 자두사탕러브
description: "Let's go out with me." While Ki Young Hyun, a timid model student, was leaving school early, the person he bumped into in an alley was Daehan, who was famous for being a bully at school. He was scared and tried to sneak away from him, but he suddenly grabbed his wrist and dragged him into the cafe....

alt_title: 真夜中ハートチューン, Finding the girl behind the voice., Midnight Heart Tune, Полуночный мотив сердца
description:
***"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."***

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people? A cute yet hard-working success romantic comedy begins here!!

After that, he starts going out with her and gets to know her better. Her second hobby, as it turns out, is carrying around scissors in her panties 
and cutting paper into flowers… or whatever else is getting on her nerves…

K-League Third Division

As he suffered from mounting debt, he inherited his late grandfather's British football team without notice.
He tried to sell the club and start a new life...

What? 150 billion won in debt alone?

Jungwoo is trying to pay off his debts alone as the club owner's coach….

title: Gakuen Alice
alt_title: Alice Academy, 学园爱丽丝, 学園アリス, 愛麗絲學院, 爱丽丝学园, 爱丽丝学院, 퍼니퍼니 학원 앨리스
description: Young Mikan runs away to Tokyo to follow her best friend, Hotaru, who has been enrolled in an exclusive, secretive private school for geniuses. But it turns out that Alice Academy is a lot more than meets the eye. If Mikan wants to stay by Hotaru's side, she has to both pass the strange "entrance exam" and face the even greater challenge of befriending her very odd new classmates. Whether it's Hotaru's gift for inventing gadgets, the cranky Natsume's fire-casting ability, or Professor Narumi's control of human pheromones, everyone at the school has some sort of special talent. But what ability, if any, does Mikan possess? Mikan is going to have to rely on her courage and spunk if she's going to stay in school, or even stay alive!
genre: Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Higuchi Tachibana

alt_title: Skip & Loafer, Долой безделье!, スキップとローファー

Iwakura Mitsumi always had big dreams, of leaving her small town, advancing to a top tier university, and then contributing to the country before retiring back to her home town. So focused is she on her goal that she is oblivious to all the other ways she comes up short, much to the chagrin and concern of her friends and family. Can a naive country girl make it in Tokyo?  
  
Nominated for the 2020 Manga Taisho Award, came in third behind the winner Blue Period and second place, Spy x Family.

title: Doteihen Reijou ni Hyoui Shita 800-nen Mae no Akujo wa Hissori Seishun o Tanoshinde Iru
alt_title: ど底辺令嬢に憑依した800年前の悪女はひっそり青春を楽しんでいる, The 800-Years-Old Villainess who Possessed a Low-Ranking Lady Peacefully Enjoyed her Youth, La villana de 800 años que posee a una joven de poder bajo disfruta pacíficamente de su juventud
description:
Nora, who had been sealed for 800 years for threatening to destroy the world, was very bored. One day, she heard the voice of a girl—Cecily—wishing to die, and was awakened. By that time, she'd grown feeble, and her body had shriveled. Thus, Nora proposed to Cecily.

"If that's the case, would you lend me your body? In exchange, I promise that in a year, you'll have a friend, a lover, a warm family, and promising future prospect for your perfect restart!"

The "Incorrigible Villainess," Nora, was resurrected in the body of the "Withered Grass Lady," Cecily.
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Slice of Life, Adaptation

description: The setting is Roubai Private Academy, a prestigious girls’ middle school in the country. For Akebi Komichi, donning this school’s sailor uniform is a dream come true. Her middle school dream life is finally beginning! Verdant open countryside vistas. The slowly flowing time of youth. With a gentle touch, the genius artist Hiro brings you this simple school tale… now enrolling!
genre: Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

title: Kawaii nante Kiitenai!!
alt_title: カワイイなんて聞いてない！！, You're My Cutie, Кто сказал, что ты милый?, 我才没听说过他这么可爱！！
description:
Madoka is obsessed with shoujo manga—specifically manga that features younger, innocent guys who fall for their Senpai. So she should be thrilled when a gorgeous kohai comes to work at her father’s restaurant…except he’s rude and standoffish, and wants nothing to do with her. But when she protects him from some extra-pushy fans, he finds that maybe he’s found someone letting his walls down for…!

---
Madoka is a high school girl who loves cute younger boys. One day, Shikura arrives as a part-time worker at her parents' diner! Shikura is beautiful and handsome, but he's not super nice?! She thought she would never like him, but the way he sometimes looks is agonizingly cute! How can she not really like him?!
genre: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Harufuji Nakaba

It's hard to be a bottom, but it's hardest to be a domineering bottom who forces the top into dual-cultivation!

title: Sanctuary
alt_title: Убежище, サンクチュアリ, 圣堂教父
description: Sanctuary is a political thriller and crime story that featured two childhood friends, Akira Hojo and Chiaki Asami, who are ruthlessly struggling to set a new paradigm of living in Japan. However, the two friends took radically different paths (playing Rock Paper Scissors to decide who does what): Akira chose the dark path and joined a Yakuza gang, while Chiaki strived to become the youngest member of the Japanese Diet. Being survivors of the Cambodian killing fields, the two characters developed an unmatched aggression and survival instincts, helping them to achieve their common ultimate goal: making Japan their own sanctuary.

So on his deathbed, he wished only to be reborn into a peaceful world...and was sent straight to modern-day party-central, Tokyo! Can even a brilliant strategist like Kongming adapt to the wild beats and even wilder party people?!
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Historical, Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Music
author: Yotsuba Yuuto

title: Waka-chan wa Kyou mo Azatoi
alt_title: 和歌ちゃんは今日もあざとい, Waka-chan Is Pushy Again, A Hidden Side to my Crush
description: Tomoya is a college freshman on a mission to finally get his first ever girlfriend, but with one small problem: he's still a virgin! While he's gotten close with the beautiful and charming girl Waka Sakuraba in his club at school, he can't wrack up the courage to take the first step and ask her out. One day, Tomoya stumbles upon a hidden side to his crush Waka...
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Shimamura

title: Koibito Ijou no Koto wo, Kanojo Janai Kimi to.
alt_title: 人以上のことを、彼女じゃない君と。, Being More than a Lover to You, Who Isn't My Girlfriend, How to Be My Ex-girlfriend's Friend, Cómo ser el amigo de mi exnovia
description:
Fuyu Yamase, un joven adulto cansado de su agotador trabajo llama a su ex novia en la universidad, Ito Minase, para tomar unos tragos. Comieron, rieron, recordaron anécdotas de la universidad; eso hizo que Fuyu piense que esa relación con Ito era perfecta, sin embargo, tragos van, tragos vienen y terminaron ‘haciéndolo’. 

Arrepentido por lo sucedido, Fuyu trata de disculparse con Ito pero ella piensa que está bien lo que sucedió, ya que no hicieron nada malo, al contrario, fue algo divertido porque ambos se sintieron cómodos. Ito estaba cansada de lo complicado que es era ser en la vida por ser una adulta, por lo que ambos deciden tener una relación donde simplemente se diviertan sin preocuparse por el trabajo o el amor.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Mochizaki Yuba

title: Sakamoto Holidays
alt_title: サカモトホリデイズ, Праздники Сакамото
genre: Action, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Okawa Tetsu

title: Bungo
alt_title: BUNGO―ブンゴ―
description: In a town with no baseball team, young Bungo spends his days throwing the ball he received as a gift against a wall until Yukio Noda, Japanese representative youth baseball player, appears before him and an unexpected showdown ensues! After a chance meeting in middle school, these two enroll in Seio Senior where they struggle to make it to Koshien with everything they have.
genre: Sports, Drama, School Life
author: Ninomiya Yuuji

title: Medaka Kuroiwa is Impervious to My Charms
alt_title: My Charms Are Wasted on Medaka Kuroiwa, 黒岩メダカに私の可愛いが通じない, Куроива Мэдака не понимает моей привлекательности, Mis encantos no funcionan con Kuroiwa Medaka, 我的可爱对黑岩目高不管用
description:
Kuroiwa Medaka was born in a temple and is currently a monk in training. Because of his temple's rules, he can't interact with girls - and what's more, he doesn't even know how to regularly socialize with them. Mona, the "queen bee" of the school, however insistently tries to make him fall in love with her, but he always ignores her in order to maintain the rules of his temple.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10032/episode/312982) (U.S. Only)
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Kuze Ran

title: Kanojo to Kare no Kankei - Heibon na Hayakawa-san to Heibon na Miura-kun no Hibon na Kankei
alt_title: 彼女と彼の関係 〜平凡な早川さんと平凡な三浦くんの非凡な関係〜, Her Relationship With Him, Hayakawa-san and Miura-kun, Relationship between the couple
description:
"I wish I had a girlfriend, I don't even care who—"
"Really? Anybody? Even me?"

Kaho, who has never had a boyfriend before, wanted to have a male-female relationship.
Takumi, who wanted a girlfriend, just happened to be talking about it in front of her.
A heart-throbbing coming-of-age love story!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Eiko Mutsuhana

title: Sica Wolf
alt_title: 시카 울프, シーカウルフ, 魔法狼少女
description: On a mission to find the two most important people in her life, Sica steps foot outside the Magician's Tower for the first time ever! She soon meets Karsus, a mercenary swordsman who looks like her first love. Despite being confused for someone else, Karsus offers to help find the people Sica's looking for if she helps him with his work. Thus the two begin their adventure ― one that will change not only the fate of the Empire but also their hearts! First love or Karsus... who will Sica choose?
genre: Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Coin (동전)

title: Kakkou no Iinazuke
alt_title: カッコウの許嫁, A Couple of Cuckoos, 뻐꾸기 커플, 杜鹃的婚约, 杜鵑婚約, Обрученные, Сведённые кукушкой, Una Pareja de Cucos
description: Nagi Umino was mistakenly switched at birth, and now attends a prestigious private high school. One day, he has a chance meeting with Erika Amano, an incredibly high society highschool girl who claims she's on the way to meet her fiancé, and who asks/forces him to be her fake boyfriend. Neither of them, at the time, understood the significance of their meeting for Erika was the girl Nagi was switched at birth with, and Nagi was Erika's soon-to-be fiancé! The curtain raises on a romantic comedy of intertwined fates that begins with being switched at birth!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Yoshikawa Miki

title: Cooking Sorcerer
alt_title: 요리하는 마법사, The Cooking Wizard
description: A food-loving tattooist, YooJung. After losing consciousness due to a sudden accident she opens her eyes to find herself possessing ‘Sylvia’, a character from the novel she read. In addition, she happens to meet ‘Felix’, the hero of the novel, who, due to the abuse of his stepmother, suffers from anorexia and will soon turn the continent into blood. In order to eat more delicious food, to cook more easily, Sylvia inscribes magic circles on to her body. The new magic circles that are born through her fingertips bring a new breeze to the continent where magic-beasts are rampant.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Cooking, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Purple Lemon (퍼플레몬)

title: King's Proposal
alt_title: 王様のプロポーズ
description:
The boy’s strongest first love, a witch who rules over the world with her body and strength! Kuozaki Saika. The most powerful witch who has been saving the world from destruction every 3XX hours, and the director of the magicians’ school.

“…I entrust you, my world…”

And then… the first girl the boy ever loved died, entrusting her body and power to Kuga Mushiki.

Instructed by the servant of Saika, Kuga Mushiki is tasked with attending school as his now-deceased lover so that no one finds out the truth…

He’s feared by his classmates and even his teachers. His life becomes even more troublesome as he reunites with his younger sister who asks for counseling about her love for her own brother- him!
genre: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Tachibana Koushi

title: Innocent Rouge
alt_title: イノサン Rouge ルージュ, Безвинный: Помада, 纯真之人 Rouge, 이노센트 루즈
description:
The eve of the French revolution, 1772:  
The eldest brother of the Sanson family, Charles-Henri, has grown as an executioner, while his sister Marie-Joseph has been living freely in Versailles. But then Marie-Joseph's first love, a man named Alain, is killed by aristocrats. The histories of innocents plunges into the arc of the crimson revolution, Rouge.

---
* **Won the 24th Japan Media Arts Festival Excellence Award in 2021**
genre: Thriller, Award Winning, Historical, Action, Psychological, Survival, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Tragedy
author: Sakamoto Shinichi

title: Hakoiri Ojou-sama to Shoumin na Ore no Yaritai 100 no Koto
alt_title: 箱入りお嬢様と庶民な俺のやりたい100のこと, 100 Things a Sheltered Young Lady Wants to Do With Me, a Commoner
description:
Sanada Yuki, meets Tenkoin Junna, a young lady who ran away from home because she hates her life without freedom. He gives her a notebook and advises her to write down what she wants to do and together they will make it happen, but then she gets picked up by the police. Yuki wants to be by Junna's side even if they live in different worlds!

*"I want a friend" 
"I want to hold your hand" 
"I want to be your lover."*

A love comedy between a commoner and a young lady who make their wishes come true is about to begin!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Taiyou Hikaru

title: Boku wo Shirita Sugiru Shimizu-san
alt_title: ボクを知りたすぎる清水さん, Shimizu-san who wants to know me too much, Shimizu-san quiere conocerme demasiado
description:
Atago Gato is a shy and reclusive high school boy. One day, while preparing for the school festival, a cute and cheerful classmate named Shimizu Roman finds out that he is aiming to become a manga artist. Isn't that amazing? The popular girl, who seems to live in a different world from him, takes an interest in him and asks him a lot of questions he never expected! When he confesses a traumatic experience after being criticized on SNS... Shimizu-san tries to help him overcome it in a slightly strange way...? A youthful romantic comedy in which a cheerful girl and a gloomy boy struggle to make manga!

(Source: AniList)
genre: Romance, Comedy
author: saku

title: Ten no Ryuu Chi no Sakura
alt_title: Dragon in the Sky*Cherry on the Ground, Ten no Ryuu, Ten no Ryuu * Chi no Sakura, Ten no Ryuu*Chi no Sakura, 天の竜*地の桜, 天之龍*地之櫻
description:
Sakura Karukaya liked her life: she was just a high schooler who loved rhythmic gymnastics, being raised by her older brother and sister. However, both of her siblings were hiding secrets about themselves and Sakura that would make her realize that the world around them was not what it seemed. Now, with the help of a mysterious dragon named Yoiyami, Sakura will have to confront these forces and the power within her if she wants to rescue her beloved brother and sister.  
  
[PL] Sakura lubiła swoje dotychczasowe życie. Była smukłą i wysoką dziewczyną ze zdolnościami do gimnastyki artystycznej. Jednak jej życie zmieniło się, kiedy dowiedziała się, że jej świat został zbudowany z iluzji…
genre: Romance, School Life, Fantasy, Mystery
author: Sumomo Momo

title: Dantoudai no Hanayome - Sekai wo Horobosu Futsutsuka na Tatsuki desu ga.
alt_title: 断頭台の花嫁 世界を滅ぼすふつつかな竜姫ですが。, Bride on the Guillotine: The Dragon Princess Who Destroys the World, La profecía de la princesa de la destrucción
description:
A "dragon" appears from a container that fell in front of Dazai Ryunosuke's eyes.

The disastrously beautiful "dragon", Rinne Irako, had been condemned to death as a world-destroying calamity, and was being transported to a place of refuge.

Rinne Irako was sentenced to death and transported. But as fate would have it, the "dragon" girl had a miraculous encounter with a boy, and her destiny was about to change drastically.
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Murasaki Daigo

title: Destiny Unchain Online ~Kyuuketsu-ki Shoujo to natte, Yagate『Aka no Maou』to Yobareru You ni Narimashita~
alt_title: Destiny Unchain Online 〜吸血鬼少女となって、やがて『赤の魔王』と呼ばれるようになりました〜, Destiny Unchain Online: After Becoming a Vampire Girl, I Eventually Became Known as "Crimson Demon King", Destiny Unchain Online 〜成为吸血鬼少女，不久后被称为『红之魔王』〜, Destiny Unchain Online 데스티니 언체인 온라인 〜흡혈귀 소녀가 되어, 이윽고『붉은 마왕』이라 불리게 되었습니다〜
description: Mitsuki Kou is such a feared PVP gamer that he's earned the nickname "Crim the Headhunter" in some circles. His next game to take over? "Destiny Unchain Online", a brand new VRMMO game developed by none other than Kou's father. But, no new game on release day is without its bugs - namely, Kou glitches to the middle of nowhere, and his vampire avatar is turned into a girl!  A story for all of the people who through games have met new friends and aimed for the top... start!
genre: Genderswap, Action, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Vampires, Adaptation
author: resn

title: Mirai no Football
alt_title: Future Football, Mirai's Football, มิไร ลูกหนังข้ามเวลา, 未来のフットボール
description: While on a soccer tour, Toudou Mirai is involved in a shipwreck accident. When he comes to, he finds himself in 19th Century England. With him being saved by a player of the local soccer team named "Durham", Eddie, it seems Mirai will be joining "Durham", a team with their sights set on joining the world's first ever professional league… What with slipping through time, will Mirai ever make it back to the 21st Century?! This is a science fiction soccer story bringing the true talents of playing soccer straight to you!
genre: Historical, Sports, Supernatural
author: Yamatoya Eko

title: Arrogant Slave
alt_title: 高飛車ドレイちゃん, 고압적인 노예
description: At the market, a man stumbles upon a particularly arrogant slave...
genre: Historical, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Hamita

title: Hen na Ie
alt_title: 変な家, The Strange House
description:
I’ve always had a fascination with the occult; you might even call it my specialty. I’ve been brought in as a consultant on many supernatural and strange mysteries. But nothing could have prepared me for this house. It seemed so ordinary at first, except for that one room. It had no doors, no windows, and was tucked away, leaving anyone to think it was just a wall. I knew that there was something more to it. It shouldn’t be there, it shouldn’t exist, and yet…

Just what is this house, and what dark secrets does it hold?
genre: Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Uketsu

title: Isekai Shikkaku
alt_title: No Longer Allowed In Another World, Дисквалифицирован по жизни, 異世界失格, 異世界失格, Disqualified from Otherworldliness
description:
A second life in another world with cute girls by your side and video gamey powers–sounds like a dream, right? Not so for a certain melancholy author, who would quite literally rather drop dead.

Honestly, all the fantastical adventure is just getting in the way of his poetic dream of finding the perfect place to die. But no matter how much he risks his hide, everything seems to keep turning out okay.

Will our terminally depressed hero find a new lease on life in this cheerfully bleak isekai comedy?

---

Inspired by the famous Osamu Dazai's book Ningen Shikkaku (No Longer Human/Disqualified From Being Human).
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Monsters, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Noda Hiroshi

title: I Am the Master in This Life
alt_title: 이번 생은 내가 주인입니다, Ibeon Saengeun Naega Juinimnida, Ibeon Saeng'eun Naega Juin'ibnida, Helena: Master of the Guardian Stone, I'm the Master of This Life, Я хозяйка этой жизни, В этой жизни я буду властвовать, 今生我做主, 这辈子我是主人, 這輩子，我要當主人, 這輩子是主人, 今世我為主宰, 今度の人生は私が主人公です
description:
The guardian stone of the family appeared to me. To me, the illegitimate child, not my half-sister who is my enemy. Since then, my treatment changed. It really felt like I was part of the family. However, as I died, I realized that it was all an illusion at the hands of my fiancé. That everything he did for me was a scheme by my half-sister to take the guardian stone.

[Don't you want to take revenge on those who thoroughly deceived and killed you?]

I decided to accept the devilishly sweet offer. This time, I will definitely get the guardian stone and become the head of the household. I will give you back as much or more than what I suffered. Until then, I will believe no one. But-

“From now on, no matter what happens, you must never stop and run.”

The image of him trying to save me, his eyes running in despair, couldn't be erased from my mind. The fiancé I loved was looking at me as I died, but why were you running to me with those eyes. You, who I thought was my sister's person... I want to know where your sincerity lies.

---
Helena Croisen, bastard child of the family, thought she would finally be acknowledged when the power of the guardian stone manifested in her. Little did she know, a conspiracy was going on behind her back — one that would end with her beloved fiancé stabbing her in the heart. As Helena draws her final breath, a mysterious voice speaks to her. “Do you wish for vengeance?” Next thing she knows, she’s gone back two years in time! Will Helena be able to avoid the same tragic fate this time around?

---
[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=55886614)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4%EB%B2%88-%EC%83%9D%EC%9D%80-%EB%82%B4%EA%B0%80-%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%B8%EC%9E%85%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2917), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59111743)

genre: Historical, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Rascca

title: Shino to Ren
alt_title: 志乃と恋, Shino and Ren, 시노와 렌, Сино и Рэн
description:
"I can't... take it... any longer..."

"She's mine."

The quiet and gentle Shino and the lively tomboyish Ren are lovers.
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life
author: Chigusa Minori

title: Otome Game no Hametsu Flag shika nai Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei shite shimatta...
alt_title: Bakarina, My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom!, Hamefura, Destruction Flag Otome, I Reincarnated into an Otome Game as a Villainess With Only Destruction Flags..., 乙女ゲームの破滅フラグしかない悪役令嬢に転生してしまった..., 轉生成女性向遊戲只有毀滅END的壞人大小姐, 转生成为了只有乙女游戏破灭Flag的邪恶大小姐
description: I recovered my past memories when I was hit on the head by a rock. I am Katarina Claes, the eight year old daughter of the duke. In a feverish nightmare, in which the prince’s fiancee was determined, I have realized that this is the otome game from the previous life. Also, I have turned into the villainess that interfered with the romance of the capture targets… If the heroine got a happy end, I would be exiled, while if she got a bad end, I would be killed by the capture target… I have no happy end!? Why is it only bad!? Somehow I have to avoid the destruction end, and reach old age peacefully!!
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Romance, Comedy, Reverse Harem, Video Games, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Yamaguchi Satoru

title: The One
alt_title: 独领风骚, 獨領風騷
description:
Cane Lele was born into the fashion industry. Her mother, Ye Fei Yi, was Taiwan's top model, and her father was also a model, until a tragic airplane crash left Lele without parents. Therefore, it is no surprise that Lele hates the industry, thinking it superficial and unnecessary.  
  
Raised by her maternal grandmother, Lele reaches seventeen before she is sucked in by her mother's sister, Ye Fei Hong, a fashion model agent (and former model), convinces the reluctant Lele to model. Lele had been adverse to the whole idea, until she sees a photo shoot of popular American model Angus Lanson, and she begins to see modeling as an art form.  
  
When Aunt Fei Hong's magazine editor invites Angus Lanson to a meeting of all the top fashion ambassadors, Lele is invited to meet him and is very curious. She does not know that Angus' twin elder brother, Eros Lanson, is secretly accompanying his brother. This obviously leads to confusion and is the start of a charming story of Lele's goals: fashion in NYC, becoming a top model, and love?
genre: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Lee Nicky

title: The Lady's Butler
alt_title: Geu Agassiui Jibsanim, 그 아가씨의 집사님, お嬢さんの執事, 那小姐的执事
description: Harboring an obsession with the second male lead of the novel series *The Flower Holds a Sword*. Like always I write a commend about Lancelot and went to sleep. But something is off?! When I woke up my *favorite character* called me "milady" and brightly smiled at me! I think I won the lottery. Or I saved earth in my previous life. If you do good stuff in your past life you'll have good luck in your next life. If it's not that how could this even happen? This lottery that I won, I should use it properly. I decided I'll make my *favorite character*'s happiness my number one priority.
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Ha Yaeji

title: Fraction
alt_title: フラクション
description:
The first half of the book is made up by the titular story, a serial killer thriller that gets all kinds of meta and crazy as it progresses. The second half of the book consists of a short interview with Kago (and Ryuichi Kasumi, a Japanese crime fiction writer) and a number of short stories.  
  
(Source: Caterpillar)
genre: Psychological, Sexual Violence, Horror, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Kago Shintaro

title: Digimon Tamers
alt_title: Digimon Zero 3, デジモンテイマーズ, 數碼寶貝03 馴獸師之王, Digimon 03: King Of Tamers
description:
When three Digimon fans – Rika, Henry, and our lead Takato – suddenly find themselves with "real" Digimon, they discover a living creature under your care is far harder to deal with than a few pixels on your TV screen. The kids try to be Digimon 'Tamers,' aka Digimon caretakers, but they all seem to have different opinions on what that should entail. Rika thinks Digimon should fight, Henry thinks they should never fight, and Takato … seems to be somewhere in the middle.  
  
Being a Tamer isn't just about believing one thing or another. It's about learning and adjusting for the good of everyone else. But they have a long way to go, and their problems are just beginning.

(The English translation is based off the script from the FoxKids version of the anime.)
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Adventure, Video Games, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Yu Yuen Wong

title: Subaru
alt_title: 昴 スバル, 昴, Dance! Subaru, Dance Subaru, 舞吧！昴
description: A small five-year-old girl named Subaru no longer has time for friends and play. Why is this? Her twin brother Kazuma is dying… and gradually forgetting everything. Even Subaru. And so the girl visits him every day, talking with him and dancing for him, trying to make him remember her. And he always does by the end of the day. Encouraged by a friend to join ballet classes, the girl does so and falls in love with the dance.
genre: Psychological, Sports, Drama
author: Soda Masahito

title: Giant Ojou-sama
alt_title: Oriko the Giant, Гигантская дама, ジャイアントお嬢様
description:
I can't believe my ojou-sama is so huge!  
  
Fujido Oriko is the buxom young head of the Fujido Zaibatsu, a group that has a monopoly on Japan's vending machine industry. And serving at her side is her personal butler, the eccentric Dr. Sebastion.  
  
When a monster suddenly attacks the city, Dr. Sebastion slips his ojou-sama an experimental energy drink his team in R&D has been developing. As a result, she quickly finds herself growing into a giantess, matching the attacking kaiju in size! Will she be able to stop his rampage, or at the very least, keep her dignity intact?  
  
*[The pre-serialization version was the winner of Shounen Jump's Dec 2020 Bronze Rookie Award. The current serialization is on Sunday Web Every.]*
genre: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Comedy
author: Nikumura Q

title: Cleric of Decay
alt_title: Priest of Corruption, Priest of Decay, 부패의 사제, El Sacerdote de la Corrupción, The Priest of Corruption
description:
Not all job classes are created equal!

Marnac was pulled into a game while trying to play as one of its worst job classes, Cleric of Decay. Now he’s the only cleric of the Order of Decay, serving a goddess who’s been reduced to an animated hand that repeats the word “MURDER!”

Will the Order’s last cleric become powerful enough before the prophecy of “the end” comes true?
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Video Games, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Bori (III)

title: Vinland Saga
alt_title: Сага о Винланде, ヴィンランド・サガ, 海盜戰記, 海盗战记
description:
As a child, Thorfinn sat at the feet of the great Leif Ericson and thrilled to wild tales of a land far to the west. But his youthful fantasies were shattered by a mercenary raid. Raised by the Vikings who murdered his family, Thorfinn became a terrifying warrior, forever seeking to kill the band's leader, Askeladd, and avenge his father. Sustaining Thorfinn through his ordeal are his pride in his family and his dreams of a fertile westward land, a land without war or slavery… the land Leif called Vinland.  

---
- **Won the Japan Media Arts Award Division Grand Prize in 2009**
- **Won the 36th Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2012**
genre: Thriller, Award Winning, Historical, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Military, Gore, Drama, Horror, Slice of Life, Tragedy
author: Yukimura Makoto

title: Boku wa Onee-chan no Omocha
alt_title: 僕はお姉ちゃんのおもちゃ, I Am My Sister's Toy, I Am My Big Sister's Plaything
description:
A special collaboration between Yoshida Morohe and Yuzuki Ryouta… a gyaru older step-sister and a younger step-brother with communication apprehension!!

Aonuma Aira is a 13-year-old with no romantic or friendly relationships. But one day, due to his parent's remarriage, the high-schooler Misa becomes his step-sister! She's a completely unknown entity to him, and gets way too close way too fast.

Moreover, her hobby is… makeovers? So she starts making him over until he's turned into a pretty girl!

What's in store for him after he's become his step-sister's plaything?
genre: Crossdressing, Shota, Gyaru
author: Yoshida Morohe

title: Fate/Grand Order: Fujimaru Ritsuka Doesn't Get it
alt_title: Fate/Grand Order 藤丸立香はわからない, You've Lost Ritsuka Fujimaru
description: Ritsuka Fujimaru—humanity's last master. It would not have been possible to restore humanity without him. However, he does have a shortcoming... he is far too honest! A slapstick comedy in which Fujimaru's simple questions sway the heroic spirits!
genre: Sci-Fi, Comedy, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Tsuchida

title: Fake Saint of the Year: You Wanted the Perfect Saint? Too Bad!
alt_title: Фальшивая святая, отброс года. ~Идеальная святая? Нет, всего лишь подделка!~, 偽聖女クソオブザイヤー～理想の聖女？　残念、偽聖女でした！～
description:
[The Eternal Scattering Flowers: Fiore Caduto Eterna] is a game ill-suited of being known as a galge, as the main heroine would – regardless of the chosen route – meet her demise.

Fudou Niito, a resident of Japan, went to bed dissatisfied with the ending of the game. When he next awoke, he found himself in the body of the game’s hated fake saint, Elrise. Confused, but with an understanding that Elrise’s actions would spell disaster for many lives in the future, he took advantage of the situation and acted to change the course of history.

As a result, despite her rotten personality, Elrise was adored by those around her as a perfect saint. Furthermore, the game itself was intrinsically linked to his original world and changed accordingly to suit Elrise’s actions. Without any knowledge of what the hell was going on, the fake saint Elrise continued to alter her fate.

A saint on the outside, but a man on the inside.

The transmigrator was a piece of shit and the person he transmigrated into was also a piece of shit. A combination of shit and shit would cause an accident – to create the greatest fake saint shitshow of the year!
genre: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Mystery, Adaptation
author: kabedondaikou

title: Aashi to Watashi - Gal Yuri Anthology
alt_title: あーしとわたし。ギャルｘ百合アンソロジー, あーしとわたし。　ギャル×百合アンソロジー (カドカワデジタルコミックス), Me and, I. Gal x Yuri Anthology
description: A collection of Gal x Yuri stories by various popular artists.
genre: Traditional Games, Romance, Anthology, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Ouchi

title: SK8R'S
alt_title: Sk8rs, Skater's, Skaters, スケーターズ
description: A group of wild, unruly teenagers who become friends due to their shared passion for skateboarding.
genre: Comedy, Sports, Slice of Life
author: Tojitsuki Hajime

title: Fuzoroi no Renri - Side Stories
alt_title: 不揃いの連理, Rationalization of Irregularities, 티격태격의 연리
description:
From Newtype site:  
  
Our ages are different, our ways of life are different, everything is different. But… I just want to be with you!  
Because I've never been in a miserable, tragic romance, I can say that unrequited love is fine…  
I don't know why I fell in love with this person…it's a mystery!  
  
They have different personalities, different ages, different ways of thinking, different looks, different everything.  
This is the story of girls who clumsily make up for what's lacking in the other.  
  
T/N:  
These are side stories. Not a rewrite of the original serialized twitter comic. It builds up on what happens in the main series in a longer format. It eventually merges with the main series in the volume edition.
   
The kind of stories these are is all in the title!  
  
不揃 (fuzoroi) means uneven, irregular, but also incomplete. 連理 (renri) is "entwined relationship".  

So, these are stories of intimate relationships between "incomplete" girls that somehow complete each other, against all odds.
genre: Comedy, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life
author: Mikanuji

title: KOUJIRO
alt_title: 光路郎
description: Kojiro is the new English teacher at Sakaue High School. He is a foreigner with blonde hair and blue eyes, he also goes to school by riding his surfboard daily. This is the story of a free-spirited teacher who came across the sea to his mother's homeland.
genre: Comedy, Martial Arts, Drama, Delinquents, Slice of Life
author: Muraeda Kenichi

title: Uzaki-chan wa Asobitai!
alt_title: Узаки хочет тусоваться!, 宇崎ちゃんは遊びたい!, 宇崎酱想要玩耍!, 우자키 양은 놀고 싶어!, Uzaki-chan Wants to Hang Out!
description: Annoying! Cute! But Annoying!  Shinichi Sakurai is a grumpy-faced, athletic and quiet college student who just wants to be left alone,  but he is frequently teased by his cute, stacked underclassman Hana Uzaki, whom he has known since high school.     Sugoi Dekai means something along the lines of "impressively huge."
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Take

title: EGO ERIS - The Swordman's blood
alt_title: エゴ・エリス－剣奴の血, EGO ERIS - 剑奴的血, EGO ERIS - 검노의 피
description:
The time is AD 75, during the Ancient Roman Empire.
Imprisoned in the Colosseum is a criminal named Aaron.
The Colosseum, which serves not only as a venue for gladiatorial battles but also for the execution of criminals, is the citizens' ultimate entertainment facility.
However, Aaron, who is deemed a 'criminal deserving death,' carries a burden deeper than anyone else, never to be killed, never to die.
This is the story of a man consumed by revenge, defying his 'fate.'
A historical spectacle unfolds, depicted with extraordinary craftsmanship. Let the show begin!
genre: Historical, Action, Survival, Martial Arts, Gore, Tragedy
author: Shimizu Shun

title: Lookism
alt_title: 外見至上主義, 看臉時代, 외모지상주의
description:
Park Hyung-Seok is an unattractive loner who wakes up in a different body. Now tall, handsome, and cooler than ever in his new form, Hyung-Seok aims to achieve everything he couldn't before.

How far will he go to keep his body... and his secrets?
genre: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Crime, Martial Arts, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Park Tae Joon

title: Maigo Kyuujo wa Ryuu no Miko no Okiniiri Ryuukakoku Koukyuu Jikenchou
alt_title: 迷子宮女は龍の御子のお気に入り ～龍華国後宮事件帳～
description:
¡Un romance misterioso entre una doncella novata y un apuesto eunuco! Desde una edad temprana, Rinka ha sido burlada y maltratada por los aldeanos debido a su extraña habilidad ocular. Su única fuente de apoyo ha sido su hermana, la única que la comprendía. Sin embargo, un día, su hermana desaparece misteriosamente del Palacio Interior donde trabajaba.

Rinka se convierte en una doncella del Palacio Interior del Reino Ryuka para buscar a su hermana, pero pasa los días sin pistas. Un día, Rinka se encuentra con el apuesto eunuco Kouren, envuelto en la luz plateada. ¿Qué misterioso romance se desencadenará en este Palacio Interior?
genre: Historical, Romance, Drama, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Ayatsuka Kinoto

title: Iseikai Tensei
alt_title: イセイカイテンセイ, 異星界転星, Isekai Tensei, 異星界轉星
description:
Noah, the last survivor from Earth, aims for a new universe on the spaceship that was handed down to him by his mother who was a scientist. What he arrives at is a planet where living things possess magic. When he is out doing field work, he meets a girl who proclaims herself as the demon lord's daughter.  
  
The cyborg youth will traverse a planet full of mysteries in this iseikai sci-fi fantasy.
genre: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Magic, Isekai, Aliens
author: Ooyama Sanpo

title: Onee-san wa Joshi Shougakusei ni Kyoumi ga arimasu
alt_title: Onee-san is into Elementary School Girls, お姉さんは女子小学生に興味があります。
description:
From the mangaka of Hshs Sasero!!, the comedic story about a high school teacher, who happens to be a lolicon, and the girl she babysits with her roommate!

title: Masters of Lightning Knives
alt_title: 비뢰도, Lightning Swords, 飛雷刀, Меч разящего грома, Lightning Degree
description:
A young orphan was alone in the world until he meets the master of a secret form of martial arts. To learn these otherworldly techniques, he will need to endure years of his sadistic teacher’s grueling and weird training. But why does he have to do laundry, cook meals, or play instruments to learn martial arts anyway?! If he can survive long enough (and if his massive ego doesn’t get in the way), he just might be able to wield the unstoppable lightning knives. Will he make the cut or be sliced down to size?

title: The Price Is Your Everything
alt_title: 대가는 너희의 모든 것, The Princess Is Your Everything
description: Transported back to her first academy days, Nerys Truydd revisits a life marred by betrayal and torment. Exploited and poisoned by her own family and husband, her demise was met with a vow to curse those who wronged her. Now granted a second chance, Nerys vows to rewrite her fate. As she navigates her past, memories of those who hurt her flood back. Determined and fueled by retribution, she seeks to reclaim all she lost. Can she overturn her tragic past and emerge victorious from the shadows of her betrayal?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Gonesse

title: Sousei no Tenken Tsukai
alt_title: 双星の天剣使い, Heavenly Sword of Twin Stars, Usuario de la Espada Celestial de las Estrellas Gemelas
description: Known not only as the young lady of the distinguished family of Chou that safeguards the northern regions of the Empire, but also as accomplished in the literary and military arts, as a woman of unparalleled beauty and intelligence, Hakurei is a young, beautiful girl adored by the people. “It has been---10 years since I saved you, and we started living together. I want to be the one to have your back.” “...Man, what a troublesome Young Lady you are!” The one to save me, Sekiei, the undefeated hero from 1xxx years ago who was reincarnated, from the brink of death was her. Ever after that, we have continued to live and train together in the Chou Family as siblings. However, time has brought the maelstrom of war. The war against the foreign race begins--- “Did you see the swordmanship of the young master?!” “And his arrows never miss the target either?!” I shall make use of my past life as a master martial artist and together with Hakurei, we shall be peerless as we accomplish great things!! The reincarnated hero and the beautiful young women’s warring, sword fantasy begins!!
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Action, Military, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Nanano Riku

title: Jii-san to Baa-san Wakagaeru
alt_title: A Story About a Grandpa and Grandma Who Returned Back to Their Youth, История о Дедушке и Бабушке, которые снова стали молодыми, おじいさんとおばあさんが若返った話。, じいさんばあさん若返る, Un Abuelo y Una Abuela que Regresaron a su Juventud, 할아버지 할머니 회춘하다, Jiisan Baasan Wakagaeru
description: This story is about Ine and Shouzou, two pensioners well into their 80s who are mysteriously returned to their 20s one night.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Araido Kagiri

title: Daisan Koujo no Bannou Shitsuji
alt_title: 第三皇女の万能執事, Soy el Mayordomo Multiusos de la Tercera Princesa Imperial, The Third Princess's almighty butler
description:
Roht, un mago genio que ejerce la magia defensiva más fuerte del mundo, es el devoto mayordomo y guardián de la princesa más linda y cabeza hueca del mundo, Krell. Diariamente, él la cuida, apreciando sus adorables reacciones mientras maneja su lengua afectuosa pero afilada. Un día reciben una solicitud para proteger el tesoro nacional, la “Llave Mágica”. A medida que se embarcan en resolver este asunto, gradualmente los lleva a un evento importante que sacude el destino del país y sus propios destinos.

"Mi mayordomo definitivamente me protegerá, ¿verdad? “¡Comienza la historia de la princesa más fuerte y linda, Krell, y su devoto mayordomo de lengua venenosa pero multiusos, Roht!
genre: Action, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Agui Kou

title: Himeno-kun wa Hime ni Naritakunai
alt_title: 姫野くんは姫になりたくない, 姬野君不想當公主, Himeno-kun doesn't want to be a Princess
description:
Himeno-kun has become the princess of his boys' school because of his face and the surname "Himeno".
Just when he was thinking of how to get rid of this position, Yurine Himekawa, a transfer student with a feminine face and an elegant aura appeared! Himeno tries to push his "princess" title to him, but...?
genre: Comedy, Boys' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

description: When the daughter of a shaman gets "strung up" with a centuries-old vampire, is it love or something more sinister that binds them? From Narae Lee, artist of the hit OEL manga ’Maximum Ride,’ comes the story of two misfits and their quirky, fantastical romp to find one another.

title: Rockman-san

description: Much time has passed since his battle with Dr. Wily, and Rockman has grown up in a peaceful world. Working as a dentist at the dental clinic opened by Dr. Right, Rockman struggles in his daily life with the allies he once fought with!

title: Arafoo Otoko no Isekai Tsuhan Seikatsu
alt_title: The Daily Life of a Middle-Aged Online Shopper in Another World, アラフォー男の異世界通販生活, 四十左右男的異世界網購生活, Жизнь 40-летнего мужчины в другом мире, The Mail Order Life of a Man Around 40 in Another World, 中年男的异世界网购生活
description:
The story of a middle aged man doing whatever he wants with the power of 1-click online shopping!  

Kenichi, a single man in his 40s, is transported into another world for no apparent reason. As he tries to escape a dangerous forest teaming with monsters, he realizes he has the power to access to a huge online store.

By using this power to exchange goods he found in this new world for cash, and then buying modern ones off the internet, he was able to quickly create a very popular business. However, his goal is to have a slow and leisurely life. Instead of growing his business even more, he decides to settle down and live off of the power of Jeff Bezos.

The mail order life of a middle aged man in other world begins now!

[web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2945eg/) (jp)

---
genre: Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

title: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray
alt_title: Umamusume Cinderella Gray, ウマ娘シンデレラグレイ, Девушки-пони: Серая Золушка
description: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray is a spin-off title of the Uma Musume project by Cygames. It follows Oguri Cap through her time at Kasamatsu Training Center Academy and on her journey of becoming a legendary horse girl.

title: Dawn of the Dragon
alt_title: 새벽, 구름, 강, Saebyeok, Gureum, Gang, Dawn, Clouds, River
description:
"You have to get married."
Hyowoon, a dragon that has gone into hibernation for nearly 300 years at the Yooshin group which subserved as the most mysterious being above all spiritual creatures, woke up from the long sleep to find his companion (lover). Yoo Taehyuk, the second son of the Yooshin group, decided to find the dragon instead of his younger sister who was expected to be the companion. 
"Well, I'll take it as a business, and give it a try."
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Majungji (마증지)

title: Record of Ragnarok: The Apocalypse of the Gods
alt_title: 終末のワルキューレ禁伝 神々の黙示録
description: Zeus, supreme chairman of the Council of Valhalla, announces to the gods twelve of the thirteen fighters set to participate in Ragnarok--and is met with the dissenting voices of those who were not chosen. However, Zeus has foreseen this, and immediately declares the holding of another tournament to decide the final spot on the Ragnarok lineup, one which will break the taboo on gods fighting one another. Thus begins the "Revelation" of the untold side of *Record of Ragnarok!*
genre: Action, Demons, Martial Arts
author: Naruse Otsuhiko

title: Beni Tsubaki
alt_title: Crimson Camellia, 紅椿妃, 베니츠바키, 紅椿妃, 红椿妃
description: Kisshouin Tsubaki aka the "Crimson Camellia" wants to satisfy her occultistic curiosity by having a hands-on experience with every Yokai she can find.  Let's follow her in her travels, accompanied by her trusted cameraman Yokomizo-kun.
genre: Monsters, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Takahashi Hirona

title: Giri Choko Girai no Danjo
alt_title: 義理チョコ嫌いの男女, A Man and a Woman Who Hate Obligatory Chocolates
description:
"You realize that these aren't just obligatory chocolates, right?"

Obligatory chocolate is the kind that you give to people you don't even like, just because it's a Valentine's Day tradition. Aya, a beautiful office lady who is often misunderstood because of her lack of visible emotions, was complaining about it to her boss Takaki, as they walked to the train station together after work. However, Takaki told her, "That's too bad, because I was really looking forward to getting chocolates from Aya, even if it's just obligatory…"

As they parted ways, Aya hands Takaki a box of chocolates. Takaki is confused, because he thought she didn't like giving out obligatory chocolates…

"Senpai, are you really that dumb?"

Winner of the 3rd Toaru Nichijou Manga Award, it's a sweet romantic comedy that will satisfy your heart and your sweet tooth!
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Kurotama

title: Koisuru Kichikujima
alt_title: Love Love Evil Land, 恋する鬼畜島, Love Love Freak Island
description: Love is absolutely forbidden! Kaworu, the "public disciplinary commissioner of justice," uses a chainsaw to purge all the men of their sins in order to protect the purity of the girls! Standing in Kaworu's way is the "boy with high femininity," Takahisa, and Kaworu's sister, Mari, the "demon public disciplinary commissioner." In this parallel world of "Freak Island" set in Santa Maria Academy, a storm of blood and love is about to... erupt!!?
genre: Romance, Comedy, Gore, School Life, Shota, Slice of Life
author: Hokazono Masaya

title: Bloodline
alt_title: 血族BLOODLINE, 血族BLOODLINE：聖魔虛像篇, Bloodline: The Illusory Noble Demon, 血族Bloodline：圣魔虚像篇
description: Yeren, who dreams of being a vampire hunter, is unwittingly caught in the crossfire between a vampire girl and the Holy lands. As a temporary blood servant, he doesn't know what to do when the hatred and strife between them have been ongoing for thousands of years… This is a story about Lilo·Ai, the last vampire.
genre: Thriller, Loli, Monsters, Action, Ghosts, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Horror, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color
author: Aiou

title: Megunda Koi ni Koiwazurai
alt_title: 芽ぐんだ恋に恋わずらい, Love Sickness in a Budding Love
description:
"I love you, Haru-nii. I want to be with you forever."

Daichi, the son of the restaurant owners from Haru’s part-time job, has loved Haru since he was in elementary school. Haru loves him like a younger brother, but when Daichi, now in high school, kisses him like he used to as a child, Haru finds himself unable to accept his "I like you" from Daichi as honestly as he used to. Lastly, Haru couldn't look directly at Daichi naked body now he that he has a body of a grown man and is in high school...!? The story of a young puppy x an indecisive and timid older man that grow up doting on each other☆
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Nira Kaneyuki

title: Tsuki ga Michibiku Isekai Douchuu
alt_title: Moon-led Journey Across Another World, TSUKIMICHI - Moonlit Fantasy -, Лунный бог, приключение и другой мир, 月が導く異世界道中, 月光下的异世界之旅, 달이 이끄는 이세계 여행길, Dali Ikkeuneun Isegye Yeohaenggil
description: High school student Misumi Makoto is called into a fantasy world by the god Tsukuyomi, in order to be a hero. However, powerful others in this world aren't as thrilled to have him there, and they kick him to the edge of the world just as Tsukuyomi declares that he must leave Makoto to find his own way. Now it's up to Makoto to find his own way!

description:
Due to an accident, the protagonist Varius died and was reincarnated. He was shocked to find in this new world, his former job as a Tamer in the previous world was acknowledged as a low class job in this new world.  
  
Utilizing his knowledge from his previous life as a basis, he then applied unique buffs to his beasts, taking back the ultimate power that he once possessed.  
  
With this power in his hands, he sought to start his life as an adventurer. However-  
  

[Webnovel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7251fq/)

title: Koi wa Ahare ni! - Joryuu Sakkatachi ni Yoru Renai Dairi Sensou
alt_title: 恋はあはれに！ ～女流作家たちによる恋愛代理戦争～
description:
A Love Comedy of Love Running in the Faculty of Letters, Spun with Japan's Oldest Romance Novelist.

Kazuya Aizuki is a university student in the Japanese Literature Department of the Faculty of Letters. Suddenly, Murasaki Shikibu, a well-known character in The Tale of Genji, appears in his life! He is forced to live together with Murasaki Shikibu, who seems to have been transported from the Heian period, but it is revealed that he has feelings for Hanano Kozue, another classmate in the Japanese literature department who lives in the next room, and Murasaki Shikibu gives him some pointers on love! While learning Heian-style advice from Murasaki Shikibu, Kazuya somehow receives a waka poem from Kozue and becomes suspicious. In fact, a great man appears in Kozue's life, just like Kazuya...?

----
Note: Previously a oneshot published in Dragon Age issue 2/2023 on January 7, 2023.

Hailed as the hero for leading his country to victory from a great war, the blind Sword Saint Adel is now in despair. Unfortunately, he failed to protect his benefactor, Princess Euphinea, whom he dedicated his entire life to. 

"I want to meet the princess once again," he muttered, wishing deeply that his prayers would be answered. A mysterious being, having heard his plea, granted his prayers, and he was sent back to the past, to a time when the princess is still alive. 

Unexpectedly, the Sword Saint (♂) has been transformed into a super-duper cute Sword Saintess (♀), and her heroic tale of unrivaled power will once again take place.

High school student Ooishi Kyou is afraid of women.

Suddenly, five girls confessed to him. Among them, four are creatures called Koibami - beings that devour human romantic feelings. If he has his romantic feelings eaten by these girls, he will never be able to love again.

However, he cannot abandon the feelings of the one who confessed to him for real - Kyou decides to find the one he truly loves among the five! A brain-shaking, romantic comedy suspense begins!
