The katana can talk and swiftly informs him that it is Hotarumaru, the legendary national treasure of Japan thought lost during World War II. The wakizashi is too young to have a voice, so Souji names it Sakura. This is the story of Souji and Hotarumaru's journey through a new world as he seeks to achieve … a sword harem?

description:
One day, Yuzuru Takasegawa — a first-year high school student — is urged by his grandfather to go on an arranged marriage meeting, insisting that he wants to see his great-grandson before he dies.

However, not wanting to bear the weight of a fiancee at the tender age of a freshman in high school, Yuzuru tries to avoid the arranged marriage meeting by imposing an irrational condition that, “If she is Blonde Haired, Blue Eyed, Fair Skinned with big boobs, only then I will think about the marriage”.

But somehow, he finds the girl who meets the conditions that Yuzuru has put out, and he reluctantly ends up going to matchmaking only once.

And on the day of matchmaking, it was Arisa Yukishiro, a beautiful girl with reputation at school, shows up on the scene. [adapted from Novel Updates]

title: God-Slaying Copycat
alt_title: 神殺しの模倣使い, Godslayer's Imitator
description:
"If it’s to protect someone close to me… then I’d even kill a god."

Half a century ago, Dungeons, Monsters, as well as people who had received special abilities commonly referred to as [Skills] appeared. Those people were referred to as Adventurers and challenged dungeons in search of dreams and riches.

Kisaragi Tsukasa is one of these adventurers. However, he has received an inferior skill and was often treated as trash. One day, he was tricked by his peers and was thrown into a dangerous dungeon.

What awaited him at the other end was the Mythical monster, the God-Eater Fenrir. In despair over the overwhelming power difference, Tsukasa was prepared to die. That was when the master of the dungeon, Loki, appeared before him.

“Welcome to my castle.”

Thanks to Loki, Tsukasa’s skill evolved to become [Copycat]... A unique boy-meets-girl story woven into a modern battle fantasy is about to begin!

title: Yona of the Dawn
alt_title: Иона: Девушка, стоящая в лучах рассвета, Йона на заре, Рассвет Ёны, Рассвет Йоны, 拂晓的尤娜, 晨曦公主, 暁のヨナ, 새벽의 연화, Yona: The Girl Standing in the Blush of Dawn
description:
Yona is the sole princess of the Kingdom of Kouka, living a luxurious and carefree life as a princess should. She has it all: the finest clothes and cosmetics, the most divine sweets, a loving emperor as a father, and the hottest cousin crush, Soo-won, any girl could ever hope to have. Now, if only her bodyguard, Son Hak, weren't so annoying towards her, and if her hair weren't so red…  
But her nearly perfect world quickly shatters as the man she loves, Soo-won, murders her father and the path to his ascension to the throne is assured. Son Hak escapes with Yona, and they lead a life on the run from that point on.  
  


---

title: OMORI
description:
After something changed his life four years ago, Sunny has not left his house once, living in his own reclusive bubble. Hoping for a fresh start for her son, his mother decides to move their family out of town. 

However, when his childhood friend Kel re-enters his life, Sunny finds himself thrust back into a world he once knew. With only three days before the move, the duo come across familiar faces as they go through town — reawakening a dark past that Sunny has tried so hard to forget.

In this world, this is merely an urban legend, but, 10 years ago, Reito's brother was killed by a werewolf. Since then he has spent his life as a lone detective in order to expose the truth behind werewolves. Under such circumstances, he meets his estranged nephew for the first time in 10 years. Reito was briefly surprised to see that Yoru, who used to be a crybaby, is now a dashing university student who towers over him. Shortly after, Yoru suggests that Reito should hire him in the detective agency...?!

Kamui takes pride in his top-notch psychic abilities, but the way he exorcises ghosts is rather unusual!

Kotesashi Kouyou is an outstanding masseur, and aspiring sports doctor. Aiming to obtain a scholarship for medical school, he begins attending Seiwa High School, a sports powerhouse, this spring. As his family is poor he has to work as the hostels' manager, where he is also allowed to stay, to pay for his school expenses. Here he meets high school girl athletes, each with their own individual quirks. As the hostels' new manager, Kotesashi must now take care of their physical and mental needs!

Sports club high school girls and massages! The massage love comedy begins!

There are a lot of people who enjoy sex with a great deal of alcohol and music! And among them is Inuta's favorite idol, Misora. In front of this unusual sight, an impulse that he's never felt runs around Inuta's body!!

description: Hiel was ridiculed for having a useless crest and was exiled to a remote island. When he grabbed an pickaxe to reclaim the island, the true effect of his crest was revealed. With his production cheat he will reclaim this uninhabited island and start his life in paradise.

title: Kuriko to Biyori
alt_title: くりことびより
description:
Sojiro, employed at a confectionery company, and his wife, Makoto, have joyfully opened their home to a foster child, Kuriko. But there's a catch – Kuriko seems to communicate mostly with a simple "mhm," perhaps due to nerves.

Sojiro, who has vague memories of his own early childhood, struggles to bridge the gap between him and Kuriko. However, Kuriko harbors a deep fascination with Sojiro's special talent – crafting delectable sweets! The art of confectionery becomes the thread that weaves this family closer together.

Join this heartwarming journey of a seemingly disconnected parent and child as they evolve into a bonded "family".

He's usually a brash man, but his voice is sweeter than usual, his kisses are fierce and devouring, and his caresses are gentle, as if he's touching something broken. This is the first time I've ever felt something like this.

Akira's partner from her student days, the designer Nachi, suddenly appeared before her. For some reason, Akira had kept her distance from him, but Nachi asked her, "Why did you run away from me?" Nachi presses her...? The body is honest. She didn't want to feel it, but she's going to come...! Is he touching me like this just to get back at me? Or....

After seven years of service, he's left with a meager severance pay of 10 million won. But Yu Ji-han possesses a unique ability - 'Sampling' - which allows him to see probabilities. 


[Probability of the "Very Fun Guild" growing into a large guild]

[99%]

"I will surely surpass you all!"

author: GGULBEOM

title: Futago no Ane ga Miko to shite Hikitorarete, Watashi wa Suterareta kedo Tabun Watashi ga Miko de aru.
alt_title: Мою сестру-близнеца приняли как Мико, а меня бросили, но может, это я была Мико, 双子の姉が神子として引き取られて、私は捨てられたけど多分私が神子である。, 쌍둥이 언니가 무녀로 거둬져서, 나는 버려졌지만 아무래도 내가 무녀인 듯하다, My Twin Sister Was Taken as the Miko and I Was Thrown Away but I'm Probably the Miko
description:
Lerunda has always been treated unfairly, constantly compared to her twin sister, whose personality is bright and beautiful. One day Lerunda was thrown away into the forest, abandoned by her parents when her sister was taken over to the Great Temple as a child… In disappointment, the strongest monster Griffon in the forest and a Sky Horse helped her lonely person…  


---

Alternative Raw: [ComicWalker](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_MF00000220010000_68/)
genre: Monsters, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Ikenaka Orina

title: Fire Punch
alt_title: ファイアパンチ, 炎拳, 파이어 펀치, Огненный удар
description:
In the not-too-distant past, the Ice Witch blanketed the world in snow, starvation and madness, leading the inhabitants to seek their salvation in fire. With that, an unusual destiny unfolds for two young orphans, Agni and Luna, blessed with the ability to regenerate. But will this ability prove to be more of a curse than a blessing?

Nominee for the 2017 Manga Taisho Award.
genre: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Fujimoto Tatsuki

title: Jigokuraku
alt_title: Hell's Paradise, Адский рай, 地狱乐, 地獄楽, 地獄樂, ジャンプコミックス
description:
Gabimaru the Empty, a former ninja assassin feared as a heartless husk of a man, spends his days on death row wondering when an executioner skilled enough to so much as harm him will arrive, as he thinks nothing of seeing an end to his meaningless existence… Or so he thought. 
Then the lady executioner, Asaemon the Beheader, rekindles his hope with an astounding proposition. 
If he ever wishes to see his beloved wife again, he must embark under the auspices of the shogunate on a perilous voyage to the mysterious mystic island said to house the elixir of immortality. 
Should he be the one among many rival death-row fiends and scoundrels to find the elixir, he'll earn a full exoneration, and, more importantly, a chance at an ordinary married life with the light of his life: the woman who made the world seem not so ugly. 
What awaits them is a journey like no other!
genre: Historical, Action, Romance, Adventure, Gore, Drama
author: Kaku Yuuji

title: Sachiroku 〜Sachi’s Book of Revelation〜
alt_title: Sachi’s Records 〜Sachi’s Book of Revelation〜, サチ録　～サチの黙示録～, Записи Сачи: Книга откровений Сачи
description: ‘Humanity’s Judgment’ — a process by which an angel and a demon meticulously pass judgment upon a human, and the final score determines the fate of mankind. But this time, the chosen subject is the incredibly mischievous 6-year-old elementary school student, Sachi Ueno?! Just how will the unconventional living arrangement of an angel, a demon, and a human shape the future of humanity?
genre: Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Delinquents, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Chanta

title: Rugby Rumble
alt_title: 最強の詩
description: The Japan under-16 rugby team—nicknamed the Perfect Squad—shattered the power balance of high school rugby after sweeping the world cup. With so many former Perfect Squad members in their home prefecture, Rikuzen High’s rugby team has given up all hope of victory and now takes a laid-back approach to training. Enter transfer student and rugby novice Kinzan Yamada. He may be new, but he’s ready for the world of rugby. The question is whether they’re ready for him...
genre: Sports
author: Miyata Daisuke

title: Ghost Fixers
alt_title: ゴーストフィクサーズ, Исправители призраков
description: Following a certain event, Mikurigaoka New Town transformed into a crucible of supernatural phenomena known as GHOSTS! In said town lives Hifumi, a middle school boy, who one day encounters a girl who just moved in... Help "correct" the supernatural in this action-packed tale from Yasuki Tanaka, creator of "Summer Time Rendering"!
genre: Action, Ghosts, Supernatural
author: Tanaka Yasuki

title: Princess’s Hundred Ways of Martyrdom
alt_title: 公主的一百种殉国方式, A Hundred Ways for a Princess to Be a Martyr, 100 formas de martirizar a la princesa
description: The night before the girl group was formed, Yu La was pushed by someone and transmigrated into the mysterious ancient kingdom of Adalante, which has long disappeared in history, and simultaneously entered the body of a vicious princess who has the same name as herself. Based on the book "The Mystery of the Fall of Adalante" that she read before she transmigrated, Yu La recalled that all the speculations about the fall of Adalante were related to the princess' evil deeds, and that the time of the fall of the country was also the time of the princess'death. Either she dies or she changes the history! Countdown to extinction, see how this little sister turns the tide in Adalante~
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
author: 青墨苍穹

title: Captain Kid
alt_title: Капитан Кид, キャプテンキッド, 海盜王子
description: In the 19th century, there lived a young pirate king, feared enough to be called the “Devil of the Sea”. His name is Captain Kid! With his mysterious guardian sword, Black Lightning, he sails the seven seas aboard his vessel, the Golden Drake!! What awaits him? Is it hell, or the furious waves of the ocean?! The adventurous tale of Kid and his band of rogues begins here!!
genre: Historical, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic
author: Uno Hiroshi

title: Digimon World Re:Digitize Encode
alt_title: デジモンワールド Re:Digitize Encode, デジモンワールド リ:デジタイズエンコード
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Hongo Akiyoshi

title: The Dilettante
alt_title: 딜레탕트, Dilettante (Jin Soye)
description:
Stay until you're drunk on me. One day, top counterterrorism agent Hana Lee receives news of her twin brother's passing. Unable to accept the death of her only living relative, she sets out to uncover the truth. Along the way, she gets tangled up with the mysterious Eunseong Yoo and the cold-blooded mafia boss, Giulio Parenti.

Note: The English webtoon was released as R15, it's not R19 like the original novel. It is not confirmed if the Korean release will have a mature (R19) version. This series is the sequel to 페어 트레이드 (Fair Trade) which does not have a webtoon adaptation. The 2nd ML in this story is the ML in The Dilettante
genre: Thriller, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Crime, Mafia, Drama, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color
author: Jin Soye (진소예)

title: Riso no Otoko
alt_title: The Ideal Man, 理想のオトコ, 理想的男人
description: The story begins when a man ten years younger, a man of the same age, and then a man ten years older appeared in front of our heroines, who had taken a break from love. A coworker, a husband, a colleague, a one night stand… Do they truly understand their feelings, and are troubled by being together? You don’t have to be with your soulmate… Is it enough to be with a man who fits your ideals?
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Chika

title: Fate/Grand Order -mortalis:stella-
alt_title: Судьба/Великий приказ: Смертоносная Стелла, Fate/Grand Order -mortalis:stella- 剎那星辰, Fate/Grand Order mortalis stella, フェイト／グランド オーダー－モルターリス：ステラ－
description: The official adaptation of the TYPE-MOON phenomenon that has become one of the most popular mobile games in the world! The year is 2016, and glitches found in humanity’s past threaten the sustainability of its future. The Chaldea Security Organization - tasked with preserving human history for as long and as strongly as possible - has developed a new method of time travel to repair these events, stabilizing humanity’s future. But when an unknown threat pushes mankind to the brink of extinction, young recruits Mash Kyrielight and Ritsuka Fujimaru find themselves at the helm of the rescue mission: Obtain the Holy Grail in a face off against fate itself …
genre: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Loli, Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Zombies, Samurai, Magical Girls, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: TYPE-MOON

title: Bungou Stray Dogs Official Anthology
alt_title: 文豪ストレイドッグス 公式アンソロジー ～麗～, 文豪ストレイドッグス 公式アンソロジー ～華～, 文豪ストレイドッグス 公式アンソロジー ～凛～, 文豪ストレイドッグス 公式アンソロジー ～暁～, 文豪ストレイドッグス 公式アンソロジー ～奏～, 文豪ストレイドッグス 公式アンソロジー ～睦～
description: A collection of Bungou Stary Dogs one-shots chapters by various manga artists.
genre: Action, Comedy, Anthology, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Asagiri Kafka

title: Drug Store Tenin Sacchan no Nichijou
alt_title: ドラッグストア店員さっちゃんの日常, Daily Life of Sa-chan, a Drugstore Clerk
description: A series between the expressionless drugstore clerk, Sa-chan, and her boisterous childhood friend who's head over heels over Sa-chan but hesitant in confessing his love for her. Join them in their romcom-packed everyday life working at a drugstore.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Izumi Rei

title: Haiiro no Onmyouji
alt_title: 灰色の陰陽師, Gray Exorcist, Exorcista Gris
description: Sabatora, a boy whose parents were killed by Kuragari, works as an Onmyoji for the Public Security Bureau to get revenge. His only comfort is Kyue, a Kuragari who lives with him. Kyue, who has lived with Sabatora since he was a small child, is a kind and gentle soul who is like an irreplaceable member of Sabatora's family. One day, however, Kyue is attacked by Seto, a colleague from the Public Security Bureau who hates Kuragari. In a pinch, Sabatora and Kyue undergo an unexpected transformation.(natalie.mu)
genre: Action, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Nekono Hachioki

title: Boku ni Korosarero
alt_title: 僕に殺されろ, Die By My Hand
description: Yuu Yakushimaru, a truant junior high school student, spends his days hating his bullying classmates and sarcastic life guidance teachers, and dreaming of one day killing them all. When he gains the "power to kill" and discovers that the people he hates are monsters that he can "kill" - the killing spree will never stop!　Non-stop horror suspense, the curtain rises!
genre: Thriller, Psychological, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Uguisu Sachiko

title: Boukensha ni Naritai to Miyako ni Deteitta Musume ga S Rank ni Natteta
alt_title: 冒険者になりたいと都に出て行った娘がSランクになってた -黒髪の戦乙女-, Моя дочь, отправившаяся в столицу захотев стать авантюристом, достигла S-ранга, 想當冒險者的女兒到首都當了等級S的冒險者, 想当冒险者的女儿到首都当了等级S的冒险者, My Daughter Left the Nest and Returned as an S-Rank Adventurer
description:
Retired adventurer Belgrieve thought he was done with excitement... but his peaceful life is upended when he discovers a baby abandoned in the nearby woods.

As her adoptive father, he teaches his new daughter Angeline everything he knows about the adventuring life—a past he had thought long forgotten after he lost his leg in battle. Angeline idolizes her father and wants to follow in his footsteps, so she leaves home for the big city.

As the years pass, she ascends the ranks, eventually becoming renowned as an S-Rank adventurer: the Black-Haired Valkyrie. But it turns out that being the best comes with its own struggles, and she can barely catch her breath between battling fiends.

With everyone turning to her for rescue, can Ange get out ahead of each new disaster and finally reunite with her beloved dad?
genre: Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: toi8

title: Jitsu wa Ore, Saikyou Deshita?
alt_title: На самом деле, я самый сильный?, 実は俺、最強でした？, Am I Actually the Strongest?
description:
To be reincarnated into another world with the promise of a "cheat" power is one thing... but to be reborn as a baby, and then left for dead after your royal parents think you're powerless? That's another thing entirely!

Now the newly-born Reinhart — or Hart to his new friends — must find his way through a dangerous world. But luckily, he's got magic that's quite literally off the charts!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10050/episode/322262) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/am-i-actually-the-strongest/)
genre: Reincarnation, Loli, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Sumimori Sai

title: Kumakura-san to Boku
alt_title: クマ倉さんと僕, Me and Kumakura-san
description: The 100% transparent mob character Hachiya-kun. The highly communicative and popular Kumakura-san. But, when she removes the bear mask, she becomes extremely shy, unable to talk to anyone, and she likes Hachiya-kun...?! A coming-of-age love comedy.
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Haruno Kamiharu

title: I Turned Off The Pain Perception Setting!
alt_title: 통각 설정 꺼놨다니까요?, I Said I Turned off The Pain Perception Setting!, I'm Telling You, I Already Turned Off The Pain Perception Setting!
description:
**Pain Perception 0, Capture rate is 100!**

A virtual reality game with pain perception set to '0'.
I was the first to clear all endings, and started the final 100th playthrough... but something is off.

Suddenly, I have a strange disease with a terminal setting, and the capture target characters are starting to worry about me.

"I don't feel any pain, so should I pretend to be sick?"

Before I knew it, to the capture target characters, I became a noble hero enduring pain and sacrificing for world peace.

Since it has come to this, the concept for this playthrough is a terminally ill hero throwing herself for the world!

I must end it with a happy ending. This is my last playthrough in my life!
genre: Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Yoo Eunwoo (유은우)

title: Hybrid
alt_title: 사기캐
description:
the Grand Hybrid, born from the union of angels and demons, is believed to possess the highest lineage among hybrids. When awakened, this extraordinary being, known as the ‘Apex Hybrid’, is said to have the power to blow up the universe.

Contrary to Jake’s desire for a simple and ordinary life, angels and devils eventually seek him out as the ultimate ‘Apex Hybrid’. They employ various strategies to convince him to join their respective sides.
genre: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Hooressha (후렛샤)

title: Legend
alt_title: Легенда, レジェンド, legend魔獸師傳說, 레전드
description: Reiji Saeki was living in a north-eastern countryside town and lost his life in an accident during summer vacation. But before he knew it, a mysterious ball of light appeared in front of his eyes in a world of whiteness. Being a magician from a parallel world, that ball of light is looking for someone qualified to inherit the magic they had created in order to prevent it from being lost. Reiji, who took on that suggestion, lives in the parallel world Elgin, with a new body and powerful magic.
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Animals, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Kannazuki Kou

title: Tsukushitagari na Uchi no Yome ni Tsuite Derete mo Ii ka
alt_title: 尽くしたがりなうちの嫁についてデレてもいいか？, Can I Brag About My Very Devoted Wife To You?, 我可以對無比賢惠的妻子撒嬌嗎？, Can I Be Loving Towards My Wife Who Wants To Do All Kinds Of Things?, We Started A So Sweet Newlywed Life
description: There's the flower of Takamine High, Hanae Riko, whom every boy admires. Then, there's the plain boy, Niiyama Minato, who got proposed to by that most beautiful girl in school. Without knowing what's happening, the curtain on their newlywed life rises! For some reason, my bride, who's too cute and happily follows me around everywhere, refuses to leave my side...
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Ononata Manimani

title: Today Once Again, the Assassin Cannot Win Against the Girl He Picked Up!
alt_title: 今日も暗殺者は拾った奴隷少女になかなか勝てない
description: An assassin decided to bring home a slave girl from a mission to raise her to be an assassin.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic
author: Yaki Tomato

title: Yorozuyama Juban Shobu
alt_title: 萬山十番勝負, Yorozuyama's Ten Bouts
description:
Yorozuyama Goro, a hero known as the monster of the Heisei era, has appeared after winning five consecutive tournaments from the makushita stage!! A man with extraordinary strength who will never become a yokozuna or an ozeki...
What is his true intention?…!?
genre: Sports, Martial Arts
author: Okamura Kenji

title: Tonari no Neko to Koi Shirazu
alt_title: となりの猫と恋知らず, The Feline Neighbor and the Unversed-in-Love, となねこ, 與貓相鄰尚不識戀
description: Minato Seno, who has always been very shy since he was young, struggled to make friends during his first few days of high school. He also never got a glimpse of his classmate Nekozane-san's face, as she was always asleep at the desk next to him. However, one day after school, a chance encounter revealed a side of Nekozane-san that was completely different from the one Minato knew in the classroom.
genre: Animals, Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Akinoko

title: Song of the Sky Pacers
alt_title: 步天歌
description:
(In a made-up dynasty) During the Chen dynasty, Consort Jing gave birth to a pair of fraternal twins under the rays of sunlight. The prince was born with a cinnabar mole between his eyebrows, while the princess was born with six fingers.

Fortune and misfortune appeared at the same time, causing the twins to experience entirely different fates as they were forced to leave their family. The heavenly tribulation is approaching, will the two twins who were separated from birth ever get to be reunited? What methods would they use to fight against their destinies?

---

**Note:** This is the **page style** version of [Song of the Sky Pacers](https://mangadex.org/title/7226ef70-592f-42b5-a3ff-8b91af15d97f)
genre: Historical, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Xia Da (夏达)

genre: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

title: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken
alt_title: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime, Regarding Reincarnated to Slime, In Regards to My Reincarnation as a Slime, О моём перерождении в слизь, 关于我转生后成为史莱姆的那件事, 転生したらスライムだった件, 전생했더니 슬라임이었던 건에 대하여, Aquella vez que me convertí en Slime
description:
The ordinary Mikami Satoru found himself dying after being stabbed by a slasher. It should have been the end of his meager 37 years, but he found himself deaf and blind after hearing a mysterious voice.  
He had been reincarnated into a slime!  
  
While complaining about becoming the weak but famous slime and enjoying the life of a slime at the same time, Mikami Satoru met with the Catastrophe-level monster “Storm Dragon Veldora”, and his fate began to move.

---

- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10044/episode/317350) (U.S. Only), [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/233-that-time-i-got-reincarnated-as-a-slime), [Azuki](https://www.azuki.co/series/that-time-i-got-reincarnated-as-a-slime), [Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/587), [Manga Planet](https://mangaplanet.com/comic/618e32db10673)
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Samurai, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Fuse

title: THE Runway
alt_title: THE 런웨이
description:
I had a one-night stand with my boss?!
Jian Yoo is an editor at a fashion magazine. She frantically ran to Paris after hearing that her boyfriend is two-timing.
Not knowing better, she made a rash decision to sleep with a stranger she had just met there…
Three months later, the editor-in-chief of Jian’s company flew in from their headquarters in France. However, that man…. turned out to be the one Jian spent the night with!!
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Office Workers, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Domi  (도미)

title: Kappa Shounen Benisuke
alt_title: カッパ少年紅介〜昭和妖怪恋物語, 河童少年红介~昭和妖怪恋物语~
genre: Romance, Fantasy
author: Ikeda Akuri

title: Mousou Sensei
alt_title: 妄想先生, Delusional Teacher
description: The beautiful English teacher Momoko Irosaki receives what she thinks are the lustful gazes of her male students every day... or so she misunderstands!? What goes on in the school life of a teacher who inadvertently indulges in fantasies full of allure...?
genre: School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Yuzuchiri

title: Invasion Of The Moonlight
alt_title: 侵占月光
description:
Yue Ling and Chong Yao are both trained under Tai Shang Xian Jun, they get along really well until Chong Yao inherited the throne of the Emperor. Everything seems to have changed since then... 
Vicious but loyal Emperor X Gentle water god.

description: My bias is the City God! It's a story about how a non mainstream boy with unfortunate genetics causes all sorts of trouble in a peaceful city while chasing after the City God... "It doesn't matter if they're a ghost or a monster, nothing can stop my bias Xuming God! Not even the God himself!"
genre: Thriller, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Boys' Love, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: 汤十碗

title: Dangerous Love Between Brothers
alt_title: 兄诱弟不恭
description: Playing Dumb Sterella Brother vs Beautiful, Strong, Miserable White Dragon Brother. Top Omegan white dragon Shou Yue killed the mafia boss, Si Xian, but saved his only son -- Si Mojue, and raised him like a younger brother. Unbeknownst to him, Si Mojue was an Alpha Sterella, only playing the part of a nice brother in front of Shou Yue, doing his best to become the person closest to him to avenge his father's death... An avenger, a murderer, and when the secret is revealed, what will they do?
genre: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Military, Drama
author: 红茶

title: Roxana
alt_title: 여주인공의 오빠를 지키는 방법, Yeojuingongui Oppareul Jikineun Bangbeop, Roxana: The Way to Protect the Female Lead's Older Brother, The Way to Protect the Female Lead's Older Brother, How to Protect the Heroine's Older Brother, Как защитить старшего брата главной героини, ロクサナ〜悪女がヒロインの兄を守る方法〜, 保护女主角哥哥的方法, 如何保护女主的哥哥, 守护女主的哥哥, 保護女主角哥哥的方法, 如何保護女主的哥哥, 守護女主的哥哥
description:
Kidnapping, murder, and risqué relationships! Within the scandalous pages of *The Abysmal Flower*, the downfall of Roxana Agrece's criminal family is already foretold. So when Cassis Pedelian, the heroine’s older brother, is kidnapped by Roxana's father, she can either wait for the heroine's revenge... or take matters into her own hands, since Cassis is the key to her survival. But with deceitful characters on all sides, can Roxana and Cassis trust each other enough to bring down the brutal Agreces?

---
I accidentally took possession of someone in a 19+ reverse harem novel.

The problem is that I became Roxanna Agriche, the older sister of the sub-villain. My damn father kidnapped the heroine's brother. Now, is the only thing left to meet a terrible end from the vengeance of the heroine?

But what if I can avoid that horrible development?

“I'm also interested in this toy.”

"I'll protect you until you can get out of here safely."

The heroine's brother, Cassis Pedalian, will definitely be able to pay me back later.

---

**Note:** Please be advised. This work contains somewhat sadistic expressions and portrayals of bloodshed due to the nature of the genre. There are images that may make you feel a little uncomfortable, so please take note. Additionally, this is **not** smut; it's just R15.

title: I Raised My Husband Wrong
alt_title: 남편을 잘못 키워 버렸다
description:
The Bloody, Murderous Ghoul, the Mad Dog of the Battlefield…
The countless nicknames of Libertisha, who was driven into war from a young age.

After the war ended, she received an offer to marry a duke, and her partner was...

"Who the hell are you? Get lost."

Little did she know it would be a child!

They were eventually wed after many trials and tribulations. However, during a mission she became trapped in an unknown space. Once she finally made it out, ten years had passed outside.

But now...

"Stay with me, Leti."

Where did my little kitten-like husband go? Now my all-grown-up husband is obsessed with me?!
genre: Long Strip, Fantasy, Full Color
author: 다라빛

title: The Trapped Beast
alt_title: 困兽之染, The Stain of the Trapped Beast, 困獸之染
description: Once a prince of a fallen nation, but due to the defeat in war, he could only be reduced as a prisoner and become plaything for the powerful people of the victorious nation. Xing Mu, who endured the humiliation and disguised himself as an Omega, was on a mission of revenge and restoration of his homeland. However, his biggest obstacle was the helpless second prince of the enemy nation — a beautiful omega who was marked by him in an accident. Therefore, the love and hate between the two, accompanied by the dark surge of revenge, tightly entangled together...
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Rui Si (锐思)

title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure - Moscow Calling (Doujinshi)
alt_title: JJBA: Moscow Calling, Moscow Calling
description:
Moscow Calling takes place in Russia in 2000. This story is about Georgiy Lastochkin, an 18-year old Russian student with mysterious stand. Living in Vladivostok, he studies at a local university, and happens to have a crush on one of his classmates. On one end he has to deal with his everyday life as a student - on the other, he needs to deal with the mysteries of his Stand.  
  
One day he begins travelling throughout Russia, all the way from Vladivostok to Moscow! There are sure to be faithful friends and clever enemies, comedy and drama, and of course - Stand battles. Learn what it means to be a Russian Stand user in JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Moscow Calling!  
  
Italian summary:  
||Moscow Calling è ambientato nella Russia del 2000. Il protagonista di questa storia è Georgiy Lastochkin, uno studente diciottenne russo con uno stand misterioso. Visto che vive a Vladivostok, studia all'università locale, e si prende una cotta per una delle sue compagne di corso. Da una parte deve affrontare la sua vita da studente - dall'altra, deve avere a che fare con i misteri del suo stand.  
  
Un giorno inizia a viaggiare per tutta la Russia, da Vladivostok a Mosca! Incontrerà dei fedeli amici e dei nemici intelligenti, una drammatica commedia, e ovviamente - battaglie con stand. Impara cosa significa essere un portatore di stand russo in Le bizzarre avventure di Jojo: la chiamata di Mosca!||
genre: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Self-Published, Doujinshi, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Viktor Akusov

title: Alpha Buddy
alt_title: 알파친구
description:
Back then, it was not only the two of us.
Me, you, and him.

That guy, who always hovered in the periphery of my first love Omega's sight, was an Alpha without pheromones.
The winner of that first love was naturally me, the Alpha with pheromones,
And now, that guy, Seong Jewon, is just another member of our friend group.

I thought our days would continue to pass by peacefully,
But when I got my hands on a candle that can recreate any desired pheromone,
Our relationship began to flow in an unexpected direction.

I thought I was recalling the pheromone of my first love,
But why is it that I remember that guy more clearly?
Can someone tell me why?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Confeito Planet

title: Onban Kikou
alt_title: 音盤紀行, Record Journey, Record Travelog
description: The secret of the record left by my grandfather, the underground record shop dealing with forbidden pop music, and the old jukebox in the diner of the near future. A collection of short stories that traces the memories and feelings contained in the records.
genre: Historical, Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery, Music
author: Kezuka Ryouichirou

title: Otaku ni Koi wa Muzukashii
alt_title: ヲタクに恋は難しい, Love Is Hard for Otaku, Wotakoi: Love Is Hard for Otaku, Так сложно любить отаку, 宅男腐女恋爱真难, 阿宅的戀愛太難, 오타쿠에게 사랑은 어려워
description: Narumi Momose has had it rough: every boyfriend she’s had dumped her once they found out she was an otaku, so she’s gone to great lengths to hide it. When a chance meeting at her new job with childhood friend, fellow otaku, and now coworker Hirotaka Nifuji almost gets her secret outed at work, she comes up with a plan to make sure he never speaks up. But he comes up with a counter-proposal: why doesn’t she just date him instead? In love, there are no save points. [Kodansha]
genre: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life
author: Fujita

title: Saikyou Skill "Inochigoi" de Kuyashii Kedo Musou Shichau Moto Maou-sama no Sekai Seifuku Katsudou
alt_title: 最強スキル「命乞い」で悔しいけど無双しちゃう元魔王様の世界征服活動, Her Strongest Ability Is Begging for Mercy, the Frustrating World Conquest Adventures of a Former Demon King
description:
Village girl Chelsea, who is beloved by everyone, is actually the reincarnated ex-Demon King.
However, when she reincarnated, for some reason neither her magical powers nor skills were inherited, and she was forced to live as a normal human being.

Humiliating days continued until one day, the remnants of the Demon King's army appeared to loot the village. Hunted down by her former subordinate, who did not realize her true identity, Chelsea finds herself in a perilous situation. Then, a skill finally manifests! The name of that skill is "Begging for Mercy"!?
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls
author: Murata Shinya

title: Burning Kabaddi
alt_title: 灼熱カバディ
description:
The story centres on first-year high school student Tatsuya Yoigoshi, a former ace soccer player who dislikes sports. 
He gets invited to join the team for an Indian contact sport called Kabaddi. 
He scoffs at the idea at first but becomes interested after watching a kabaddi practice.
genre: Action, Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Musashino Hajime

title: Sekai ga Hajimaru Asa ni Umi wo Mito
alt_title: 世界が始まる朝に海を見た, I saw the sea on the morning the world began
description:
Ao lives with his father, who has a bad drinking habit, in a town with a beautiful view of the sea. He spends his time trying to be as inconspicuous as possible, both at his high school and at home, as if he's holding his breath. One day, while on the way home from school, he meets Minato smoking a cigarette on the station platform. Minato, who works at a bento shop in spite of his blonde hair and piercings, can't stand the fact that Ao eats food from the convenience store every day, so he offers him a suggestion: "Instead of making you a bento every day, comment on my cooking"...?
The story of two young men who meet in a seaside town, and their once-in-a-lifetime true love.
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Awayama Wawa

title: The Choice
alt_title: 선택, Seontaeg, 選択
description:
To save one, she'll kill the other.
A miraculous, 1-in-200,000 chance birth of conjoined twins. The probability of their survival? Less than 5%. Born with just one heart between the two of them, the Kang sisters face a sinister fate: for one to survive, the other must die. Their mother faces a horrible choice. How would you decide?
genre: Thriller, Psychological, Long Strip, Medical, Horror, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Seam

title: The Café Terrace and Its Goddesses
alt_title: 女神のカフェテラス, Терраса-кафе богинь, Megami no Kafeterasu, Goddess Café Terrace
description:
Kasukabe Hayato has been accepted to Tokyo U on his first try. Receiving news of his grandmother's death, he returns to his childhood home, Cafe Terrace Familia, for the first time in three years to find five strange girls there who claim to be "Grandma's Family"! Hayato's unexpected life in a seaside town with these five girls of fate begins here!  
  
In this handsome harem under one roof by Koji Seo of *Suzuka*, *Kimi no Iru Machi*, and *Fuuka*, which girl will you fall in love with? A seaside love comedy with too many heroines!

---

Touri, a High schooler who was Transported to another World, was immediately banished due to his Elementary Level Job, 'Appraiser'.
But there's more to his Job...!? The Curtains of the Other World Fantasy  Survival using Appraiser Skill Opens!

description: Kon lives in a world that bugs out regularly. But with Kasane, a researcher who studies these phenomena, he knows that each day will at least be interesting!
genre: Sci-Fi, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Nakatani Nio

title: Marriage Gray
alt_title: マリッジグレー, Серый брак, 想不通可爱老婆为什么要与我结婚, 매리지 그레이, Maeliji geulei
description: My wife is suspicious!! Why did she marry a guy like me…? Ordinary average guy Tsuchioka Naotsugu ended up with Yoshino, who's perfect in all angles of beauty, know-how, and sociability. It's not "marriage blue" it's everyday life questioning over things, so it's "marriage gray" newlywed life, go!
genre: Romance, Slice of Life
author: Wadachi Taira

title: She is mine
alt_title: 佔有姜西
description: The elite private tutor, Min Jiang Xi, who is good at "pretending", managed to clinch the CEO Qin Zhan as a client. He, who hates women flocking towards him, warns that "he simply lacks a tutor, not a girlfriend". As he instructed, she is courteous and distant, never crossing the boundaries. But one year later, a drunk Qin Zhan states that "I won’t force you to like me, so don’t force me to not like you. I can’t do it". Can she, who doesn’t believe in love, find it with him?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Full Color
author: Yubuyu

title: Kiss The Bride
alt_title: 亲吻新娘, 키스 더 브라이드
description:
Shin Jae-Won attended the World Camp hosted by the Spanish King as a tennis player in his Junior Year.  
  
Jae-Won meets Javier, an unusually conspicuous participant in the World Camp.  
  
“When are we going to practice?”  
  
There are always people (especially women) around him.  
  
Then, Jae-Won, who happened to stumble upon Javier one night during practice, ended up spending the night alone. The more he faced his whimsical, pure side, the more his heart began to beat…  
  
“I hate this kind of things…”  
  
Jae-Won’s first love ended as fast as a Siesta.  
  
A decade later, they meet again Spain.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: ZIG

title: Yome wa Hakoiri Musuko
alt_title: ヨメは箱入り息子
description:
Having lived as the second son of a temple, worshipped as a deity, and being a sheltered boy capable of transforming into a snake, Sei finally decides he's had enough of this life, and sets out to run away from home! Not being used to human society, Sei gets worn out and escapes to a grassy field where he meets and is helped by Murasaki, the reptile enthusiast college student. As the sheltered boy who longed to be "normal", Sei takes this chance to befriend the unfriendly and hard-to-read Murasaki, but their co-habitation life is riddled with misunderstandings…?! The two experience their first love together in a hot and cute love comedy!

**Note:** Chapter 5 (Shisuke ga Nattenai!) is not scanlated.
genre: Animals, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Supernatural
author: Ueda Niku

title: Who Saw the Peacock Dance in the Jungle?
alt_title: クジャクのダンス、誰が見た？, Who Saw The Peacock's Dance?, Who saw the peacock dance in the jungle?
description:
A former cop was murdered on a snowy Christmas Eve night. The suspect was arrested & the case appeared to be closed.

However, a letter left by the murdered former cop to his daughter sets the case back on track. It said, "If any of the following persons are arrested or prosecuted...they are falsely accused." And on that list was the name of the suspect who was arrested for killing her father...
genre: Crime, Drama, Police, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Asami Rito

title: Akari to Kare wa Nayamashii
alt_title: あかりと彼はなやましい, Akari and He Are Envious, 아카리와 그는 괴롭다
description:
"Can you, a straight man, fall in love with me?"  
  
His two (straight) friends got together. The openly gay high schooler Akari is somehow displeased with that. Is it envy? Or is it jealousy? …… What the hell.  
  
"Someday, I'll definitely find someone to love too…!"  
  
Having eagerly gone to a gay bar, the one he meets there is an irritating adult wielding a fair argument!?
genre: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love
author: Tsurukame Mayo

alt_title: Death Terminal

alt_title: だれでも抱けるキミが好き, I Like You Who Can Have Sex With Anyone, I like you who can have sex anyone., Me Gustas tú, que Puedes tener Sexo con Cualquiera, 喜欢来者不拒的你

Gotou, a virgin high school boy, has a crush on his affectionate gal classmate, Agawa. But one day after school, he catches Agawa having sex with Takayama in an empty classroom. Gotou is devastated, but he soon learns that not only did she have sex with Takayama, Agawa is a slut who'll have sex with anyone who asks. Even…‽

alt_title: ももくり, Момокури
description: Yuki Kurihara is a girl who has finally been granted her wish of dating her crush Shinya Momotsuki (Momo). At first glance, she just looks like a normal but very cute girl. However, she is in fact a maniac over Momo, taking notes of his activities and never missing the chance to see him in a cute moment. Momo, on the other hand, is inexperienced in love, and just wants to make Yuki happy.

author: Kurose

title: Saint Seiya - Next Dimension
alt_title: 聖闘士星矢 NEXT DIMENSION 冥王神話
description: Saint Seiya: Next Dimension - The Myth of Hades, also known as simply Next Dimension, is an ongoing manga written and illustrated by Masami Kurumada. It is a prequel and continuation to his manga series Saint Seiya; placed during the previous "Holy War" between the deities Hades and Athena and their respective minions, the Specters and the Saints, during the 18th century in the franchise's fictional chronology. It is published by Akita Shoten in the weekly magazine Weekly Shōnen Champion at irregular dates. It is also known by its alternate subtitle Galaxy Myth (銀河神話 Ginga Shinwa?), which is used during publication to refer to the segments of the storyline set in the 20th century, as opposed to the Myth of Hades subtitle, which refers to the segments set in the 18th century.
genre: Action, Martial Arts, Supernatural
author: Kurumada Masami

title: Neko x Neko
alt_title: Bottom x Bottom, ネコ×ネコ, ネコ×ネコ beginning, ネコ×ネコ hopeful, ネコ×ネコ wedding
description:
In high school, Keita Tsukiji was slender and had feminine features. He confessed to an upper-classman who had his ideal body build, Satoshi Murakami, and they started going out.   
  
Three years have passed. The two of them started living together, but there was one big change… Keita had matured and grown to be really manly! Anxious about what Satoshi, who used to be straight, thinks about the situation, Keita is distracted during sex. On the other hand, Satoshi is concerned that he cannot make love to Keita in the same manner that he used to. And then, one night, an aroused Keita pushes Satoshi down…?!
genre: Romance, Boys' Love
author: Tatsumoto Mio

title: Eleceed
alt_title: 일렉시드, Элисед, エレキシード, 觉醒吧，铲屎官！, Electricidad veloz
description:
Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place – one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a …um… decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoo’s super powers and Kayden’s uber-smarts, they’re out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

title: Kimi to Picopico
alt_title: きみとピコピコ, 和你一起打游戏, You & Picopico, You & Bleep Bloop
description: Oota, an otaku, joined the game club to live his ideal high school life. That was when he met by chance the freshman gal, Ageha Onisaki!! They dive straight into playing video games, but Ageha's choices are the Famicom (NES), the Super Famicom (SNES), and the Megadrive (Sega Genesis)! Who the heck is this person!? Playing a wide range from famous to retro games, the gal and the otaku start their heart-throbbing life!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Video Games, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Yuzuchiri

title: S.L.H - Stray Love Hearts!
alt_title: S・L・H ~ストレイ・ラブ・ハーツ~, S・L・H ストレイ・ラブ・ハーツ!, S.L.H, S.L.H追寻失落的心, SLH, Stray Love Hearts!
description: On the eve of her sixteenth birthday, Kozue Hiyoki is visited in her dreams by a man who steals her heart- literally! Determined to find him and retrieve her stolen heart, Hiyoki, with the color of the man's hair and the tattoo on his chest as her only leads, enrolls in the S-Hall dormitories of St. Nazareth Academy, but quickly realizes that its residents are not at all like she expected… For starters, they're all guys! There, Hiyoki soon discovers that she has the ability to look inside her dorm-mates' dreams, which may be the key to uncovering the identity of the thief who stole her heart…. But perhaps her biggest challenge is that most of the guys won't let Hiyoki into their rooms, much less their hearts!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Reverse Harem, School Life, Supernatural
author: Shouoto Aya

title: Kimi no Na wa.
alt_title: Your name., Твоё имя., 君の名は。, 너의 이름은
description:
The story is set one month after a comet has fallen for the first time in a thousand years in Japan. Mitsuha, a high school girl living in the countryside, wants to live in the city because she is tired of life in the country. Then, there's Taki. He's a high school student living in Tokyo with his friends while working as a part-timer at an Italian restaurant. He also has a strong interest in fine arts involving architecture. One day, Mitsuha dreams of herself as a young man. On the other hand, Taki also has a dream where he is a female student attending high school in the countryside. What's the secret behind their dreams?

---

description: Determined to defeat all canines, Shiro is a cute little white cat with a selfish attitude who’s unwillingly picked up off the streets by Kuro’s owner. Kuro is the large black dog who vows to protect Shiro, but one day after the two are all grown up, Shiro suddenly goes into heat!
genre: Boys' Love, Fantasy
author: Noda Nonda

title: Aru Hi Totsuzen, Gal no Iinazuke ga Dekita
alt_title: ある日、突然ギャルの許嫁ができた, One Day, I Suddenly Got Myself a Gal Fiancée​, One Day, Out of the Blue, I Got a Gal's Forgiving Wife
description:
"Hey, hey, why are you always pretending to be asleep?"

Miran Katsuki, a positive gal who reigns in the upper class of the school caste, often asks Shuji Nagasawa, an otaku. I was confused by her suggestive behavior, but she unexpectedly announced that she was his fiancee!?

A school romantic comedy between two polar opposites, Yin and Yang, has begun!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: Kazuki Izumiya

title: Apple Parfait - One-Loli Yuri Anthology
alt_title: アップルパルフェ おねロリ百合アンソロジー
description:
The relationship between "girls" and "women".
A completely new yuri anthology of "onee-and-loli" stories, all by different authors.

Cover: Kawaku

**Chapters**:
1. **Mashiro-chan's future lover** (Mashiro-chan no Mirai no Koibito, ましろちゃんの未来の恋人) by Itou Hachi
2. **Midnight funeral Where I can't let it be found** (Zettai ni Bare te wa Ikenai Soushiki 24-ji, 絶対にバレてはいけない葬式２４時) by Canno
3. **Scent and reflection** (Kaori to Kaze, 香りと影) by Terayama Den
4. **The Place Where We Belong** (Futari no Ibasho, ふたりの居場所) by Hazuki
5. **My Little Sister's Loved One** (Imouto-chan no Daisuki na Mono, 妹ちゃんの大好きなもの) by Izumi Kirifu
6. **Koma-chan and Sensei's Time** (Koma-chan to Sensei no Jikan, こまちゃんとせんせいのじかん) by kurimo.
7. **Failure** (Dame na Hito, だめなひと) by Masanaga
8. **A Dream of Spring on a Tatami Mat** (Ichi-jou Shunmu, 一畳春夢) by Sakasana
genre: Loli, Romance, Anthology, Incest, Girls' Love, Harem, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Masanaga

title: Perfect World
alt_title: Идеальный мир, パーフェクトワールド, 完美世界
description:
Kawana Tsugumi works for an interior design company. She goes to a drinking party at a client's architectural office and happens to meet her first love. He's more handsome than ever and it isn't until he's leaving that she realizes something has changed: Ayukawa is in a wheelchair.  
  
[From MU]
genre: Award Winning, Psychological, Romance, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Aruga Rie

title: Yankee JK KuzuHana-chan
alt_title: Delinquent high school girl KuzuHana-chan, Yankee high school girl KuzuHana-chan, ヤンキーJKクズハナちゃん, 不良JK華子醬
description:
At the beginning of the academic year, Saotome Hodaka enrolls into Moteshiro Prefectural High School, a former all-girls school that had recently integrated, but discovers it has a male to female ratio of 1:359! 

While most might think of this as a paradise, the majority of the students are delinquents and Saotome immediately finds himself being extorted by some of the more aggressive girls. However, he is inadvertently saved by Hanako Kuzuryu, a beautiful delinquent who just wants to be left alone.

Is this the start of a new friendship? And how will Saotome's life unfold in a school full of troublesome women?
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Delinquents, Gyaru
author: Sogabe Toshinori

title: Is a Mother in Her 30s Like Me Alright?
alt_title: アラサーママの私でいいの？, 三十多岁当妈的我也可以吗？, I'm around 30 is it OK with me?, С такой матерью как я, которой за 30, всё ли будет хорошо?
description: A 32-year-old single mother is told by her neighbor, a university student around 20, that he likes her. Thing is… he's not particularly *shy* about why he likes her.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Neko Mattan

title: Hanninmae no Koibito
alt_title: 半人前の恋人, Blooming Love, Цветущая любовь, Неопытные возлюбленные, Недостаточно опытные возлюбленные, Half Serving Lover
description: One day, when I was making school supplies in the art room, a very scary-looking girl was staring at me…!? Crafts girl vs. art boy romantic comedy!!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Kawada Daichi

title: The Wicked Ladies in Waiting
alt_title: Bad Maids, 나쁜 시녀들
description: Julia, who was born an orphan, was killed in exchange for falling in love with the Young Master of the Marjoram Family. But when she opened her eyes, at the same location as any other day, she was rescued by the Commander of the Imperial Army, ‘Carus’... She was hit by a curse of being unable to die, and this is now her eighth life. After realizing that she would be stuck in the loop forever if she didn't take down the Marquis, she became a servant within the Palace to utilize the Royal Family’s power to demolish the Marjoram Family in her eighth life. “Isn’t this how we’re supposed to plot revenge?”
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Cotton

title: Kimi ni Sasageru Otokomae
alt_title: 君に捧げる男前, My Manhood for You
description: "I'm going to tell you I love you every day!" A younger handsome guy confesses his love on their first meeting! An uneven love story between a good looking boy and a manly girl begins.
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Fuminosuke

title: This Sweet Online Date Is a Disaster
alt_title: Sweet Online Dating Has Been Overturned?!, ネット恋愛で神展開！？, 甜甜的网恋翻车了！？！, 甜甜的網戀翻車了！？！
description: I was helping my sister win the heart of the game's top-ranked player, but it turned out to be a total disaster! I was even ridiculed by that gaming master!!! I guess no one can defy Murphy's Law! Just as the game was loading... Ding! Notice: Your husband is now online!
genre: Long Strip, Comedy, Boys' Love, Video Games, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Island Project (岛上project)

title: Fall in Love With the Substitute
alt_title: 白月光他愛上替身了？！, The White Moonlight fell for his Stand-in?!, Has He, the White Moonlight, Fallen For a Substitute?!
description:
Su Yichen is the kept substitute lover of the Big Boss, Gu Hanzhou, taking the place of the Boss' White Moonlight, Pei Suyue. Everyone thought that Su Yichen's love was selfless and humble, unaware that it was all due to his superb acting skills and that the Boss was merely just his ATM. 

In an unexpected turn of events, the White Moonlight returned to the country earlier than expected and even stayed at the Big Boss' house. 

The very first day he moved in, the White Moonlight said to the Substitute: "Susu, Leave Gu Hanzhou and come with me!"

*White Moonlight - A person you long for but cannot have; unforgettable first love
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Web Comic, Full Color
author: 荣华富贵

title: Kimi wa, Nina Janai
alt_title: きみは, ニーナじゃない, You Are Not NINA!, きみは ニーナじゃない
description: The only solace for this young man, who has withdrawn into his own shell after a heartbreak, is watching his "idol" on stream. Then one day, he suddenly finds himself hiding from a girl who turns out to be his "idol"...? A life-changing romance between a heartbroken boy and a streamer begins!
genre: Romance, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: You2

title: 0.0000001% Demon King-nim
description:
The 72 Demon Kings, who received the order to destroy the earth, each went through a trial by the Great Demon King Astrea. Those who passed the trial earned the title of Demon King, and each Demon King was granted special powers by the Great Demon King.

So far, each Demon King had been granted extraordinary abilities. When Karos became a Demon King, he received a power from the Great Demon King, but… 

“Great Demon King, no matter how much I think about it, there is a problem with my power.”
“Problem?”

Among the Demon Kings with extraordinary abilities… Karos received the [Gacha] ability. 

“Gacha as the power of a Demon King? How am I supposed to rule the world with Gacha?!'”
genre: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Yuwol

title: You Shou Xi Hua
alt_title: You Shou QnA
description: Youshou Xihua- a non-canon, spinoff slice-of-life mini-theater of the Youshou Yan Manga unrelated to the main plotline. Go read the main story [here](https://mangadex.org/title/151bca3e-db98-4ad2-8d8d-239943b91437/you-shou-yan).
genre: Animals, Long Strip, Comedy, 4-Koma, Full Color
author: 靴下猫腰子

title: Toilet-bound Hanako-kun
alt_title: Туалетный мальчик Ханако-кун, 地縛少年 花子くん, 地缚少年花子君, 지박소년 하나코 군, El Chico del Baño Hanako-kun, Hanako-kun el Fantasma del Baño, Hanako-kun y los Misterios de la Academia Kamome, Toilet-bound Boy Hanako-kun
description:
"Hanako-san, Hanako-san… are you there?"  
At Kamome Academy, rumors abound about the school's Seven Mysteries, one of which is Hanako-san. Said to occupy the third stall of the third floor girls' bathroom in the old school building, Hanako-san grants any wish when summoned. Nene Yashiro, an occult-loving high school girl who dreams of romance, ventures into this haunted bathroom… but the Hanako-san she meets there is nothing like she imagined! Kamome Academy's Hanako-san… is a boy!  
  
**Note:** Volume 0 includes the original pilot version of Jibaku Shounen Hanako-kun and the debut oneshot of Aida Iro - Dear My Living Dead.

Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **Hanako si Arwah Penasaran** (2019)
- Korean release by 루트미디어 as **지박소년 하나코군** (2019)
- Polish release by Studio JG as **Hanako : duch ze szkolnej toalety**
- Turkish release by Gerekli Şeyler Yayıncılık as **Tuvalet Hayaleti Hanako-Kun** (2022)
genre: Thriller, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: AidaIro

title: Boy's Abyss
alt_title: Бездна подростка, 少年のアビス, 소년의 어비스, World End Boy Meets Girl, Юношеская бездна, 少年的深淵, El Chico del Abismo, Chico en el abismo, El abismo del joven
description:
In a town with nothing, in the middle of a daily life with seemingly no signs of change, high schooler Reiji Kurose was "just" living. Family, dreams for the future, childhood friends were all binding him down to that city. He thought he would "just" keep on living like that.

Until he met her.

Is there hope in living? Is there light waiting ahead?

It's the start of a boy meets girl series which reflects the "now."
genre: Psychological, Romance, Survival, Sexual Violence, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Tragedy
author: Minenami Ryo

title: Yancha Gal no Anjou-san
alt_title: Озорная Гяру Андзё-сан, やんちゃギャルの安城さん, 擅长挑逗的安城同学, 淘气辣妹安城, 顽皮辣妹安城同学, 장난치는갸루 안죠 양, Jangnanchineungyalu Anjyo Yang, Anjo the Mischievous Gal, The Mischievous Gal Anjou-san, Mischievous Gal Anjou-san, Mischievious Gal Anjou-san
description:
Seto is a completely ordinary and somewhat boring high school student. Yet, for whatever reason, his errant gyaru classmate Anjou just won't leave him alone! The serious Seto and energetic Anjou make a contrasting duo, but Anjou doesn't seem to mind, as she has too much fun teasing him. On the other hand, Seto has a hard time dealing with all of her endless antics; little does he realize that his humorous reactions are precisely the reason Anjou enjoys his company.

But… just how much of her flirting is merely an act?
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Katou Yuuichi

title: Kizokuka Sannan no Nariagari Life
alt_title: 貴族家三男の成り上がりライフ: 生まれてすぐに人外認定された少年は異世界を満喫する
description:
After losing his life in an accident, an ordinary young man finds himself in the afterlife, where he meets the Creator God who rules over another world!?

Reborn by the God’s power as the third son of a noble family, named Alrain, he is showered with love by his family and grows up healthily. However, even after his reincarnation, numerous deities keep coming to see him one after another.

Favored and blessed abundantly by these gods, Alrain eventually realizes he possesses powers far beyond human capabilities. Wanting to live a low-key life, Alrain hides his abilities and enrolls in a magical academy, enjoying a fun school life in this new world. But trouble doesn’t leave him alone.

Assassins from dark guilds, foolish nobles plotting to overthrow the kingdom, and even demons defying the gods appear, throwing his life into chaos. In the face of such turmoil, he can no longer stay silent!

To resolve the kingdom-wide uproar, he unleashes his ‘god-class’ powers!
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Fuka Mihara

alt_title: きみは, ニーナじゃない, You Are Not NINA!, きみは ニーナじゃない

title: The Romcom Where the Childhood Friend Won't Lose!
alt_title: OsaMake, Osananajimi ga Zettai ni Makenai Love Comedy, 幼なじみが絶対に負けないラブコメ
description:
My childhood friend Shida Kuroha seems to have feelings for me. She lives next door, and is small and cute. With an outgoing character, she’s the caring Onee-san type, this being one of her greatest strengths.  
  
…But, I already have my first love, the beautiful idol of our school, and the award-winning author high school girl, Kachi Shirokusa! Thinking about it rationally, I should have no chances with her, but, while walking home from school, she only talks to me, with a smile even! I might actually have a chance, don’t you think?!  
  
Or so I thought, but then I heard that Shirokusa already has a boyfriend, and my life took a turn for the worse. I want to die. Why is it not me?! Even though she was my first love…As I was drowning in despair and depression, Kuroha whispered.  
  
—If it’s that tough for you, then how about we get revenge? The best revenge ever, that is~
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Adaptation
author: Shuichi Nimaru

title: Forced to Be an Invincible Saintess
alt_title: Invincible Goddess, 被迫成为开挂的无敌圣女
description: The true identity of the saint that is worshipped by all the people in the kingdom is actually an average boy? With the beautiful priest, the big breasted knight, and the loli doctor at the side, the road of a saintess is really difficult...
genre: Genderswap, Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Xingkong She

title: The Cold Beauty At School Became My Pet Cat
alt_title: 知的でクールな後輩美女、俺の飼い猫になる, 知性冰山美人学妹成了我的猫
description: The real identity of my beautiful kouhai who acts cold most of the time but gets shy when she wears a pair of cat ears is..?
genre: Animals, Romance, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Ino Shishi

title: Welcome to Japan, Elf-san!
alt_title: 日本へようこそエルフさん。, Welcome to Japan, Elf-san!, Welcome to Japan, Ms. Elf!, Добро пожаловать в Японию, Эльф-сан!, 歡迎來到日本，妖精小姐, 精灵来日
description:
Kitase Kazuhiro is an ordinary salaryman who always leaves the office on time. Though this is Japan, so perhaps he's not really ordinary after all. What's truly strange comes after that; Every night, he takes a shower, changes into his pyjamas and has a good night's sleep. Then he dreams of a fantasy world, and only wakes up when he dies or sleeps in that world. One day, he's killed after stumbling onto a dragon's lair. "A nightmare," he sulks, until he finds his elf friend in his bed.  
  
Curious to see an elf waifu experience daily life in Japan? How's it like to walk with every man's fantasy on the streets of Tokyo? This manga is for all you elf lovers out there!  

- [Official LN (EN)](https://j-novel.club/s/welcome-to-japan-ms-elf)
genre: Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Makishima Suzuki

title: Housekeeper in a Dungeon
alt_title: 던전 안의 살림꾼, ダンジョン家事師は断れない！, Deonjeon An-ui Sallimkkun, Housekeeper in the Dungeon, The Homemaker of the Dungeon, The Housekeeper in the Dungeon
description:
From Baka-Updates:
The return of good looks! And cooking skills on top?!

Lee Heena, an ordinary South Korean office worker, age 25.

Today, another ordinary day completely lost in overtime… is what she thought. Then she suddenly awakened. And then just as suddenly fell into a dungeon.

“God, Buddha, Allah! Please let me awaken as a fighting-type hunter! If possible, a strong one!!”

From the desperate wish, the system responded.

[Congratulations!]

[You have awakened as a hidden class, ‘Housekeeper’ (D)!]

Although Heena’s skills in Plucking Herbs (C), Exterminating Pests (D), This is the Taste of My Magic Touch (D) are very useful in daily life, can she survive with these skills?!

But, what’s this?

Kang Jinhyeon, South Korea’s No. 1 ranking S-Class hunter, tried his hand at flirting.

“I will leave everything I have to you.”

“Hunter Kang Jinhyeon…”

“Yes. Will you take responsibility for me?”

“Why do you ask me to be your housekeeper in such a weird way?!”

Is the simple and ordinary daily life that Heena dreamt of okay?! With a talking snail and moving pet plants ♥
The delightful romance fantasy〈The Housekeeper in the Dungeon〉!
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy
author: Canção Hwang Geum

title: Forbidden Ishinomori
alt_title: オトナな石ノ森, Adult Ishinomori
description:
Seinen One-shot compilation containing 15 one-shots, published between 1968 and 1976, with an emphasis on themes of eroticism and SF.

Chiefly contains works published in Gekiga magazines.
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Anthology, Crime, Philosophical, Drama, Police, Slice of Life, Tragedy
author: Ishinomori Shotaro

title: Drawing Romance
alt_title: 사각사각 로맨스, Sagak Sagak Romance, Хрустящая любовь
description:
Chan-Woo finds it difficult talking to Sul-Hee, who always seems to be angry about something. However, what he says to her actually makes her heart beat like crazy! A sweet, romantic story of a young couple’s first love!

(Source: Toptoon Plus)

**Links:**
- Promotional Video - [YouTube](https://youtu.be/YB-GVf_HXLk)
- Defunct Official English - [Toptoon Plus](https://toptoonplus.com/comic/100306)
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Chocochip (말초코칩)

title: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon
alt_title: Kobayashi-san's Maid Dragon, Дракон-горничная Кобаяши-сан, 小林さんちのメイドラゴン, 小林家的妹抖龙, 코바야시네 메이드래곤, 小林家的龍女僕, Дракорничная госпожи Кобаяси, Кобаяси-сан ти но мэйдорагон, The maid dragon of Kobayashi-san
description:
Kobayashi lives alone in an apartment, until one day, Tooru appears and they end up living together. Tooru looks down on humans as inferior and foolish, but having been saved by Kobayashi-san, she does everything she can to repay the debt and help her with various things, although not everything goes according to plan.  
A mythical everyday life comedy about a hard working office lady living with a dragon girl.  


---
- [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%B0%8F%E6%9E%97%E3%81%95%E3%82%93%E3%81%A1%E3%81%AE%E3%83%A1%E3%82%A4%E3%83%89%E3%83%A9%E3%82%B4%E3%83%B3)
genre: Loli, Monsters, Comedy, Magic, Girls' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Shota, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Cool-kyou Shinja

title: The Demon King Who Lost His Job
alt_title: Jobless Demon King, 失业魔王, The Laid Off Demon King
description: He is the Demon King who was impeached. She is the brave hero who was laid off because of a failed expedition. Bound by destiny, the two of them embark on an adventure to repay their debts.

description: In 1888, a number of prostitutes were murdered in London, by someone known only as "Jack the Ripper". The murderer takes to the streets each day, looking to slit some unfortunate woman open... The past of Jack the Ripper, the English gentleman who represented the human side in the fourth round of the struggle between God and mankind known as Ragnarok, who was one of the top-three most popular characters in the character poll, is finally revealed!

title: Katainaka no Ossan, Kensei ni Naru: Tada no Inaka no Kenjutsu Shihan Datta noni, Taisei shita Deshi-tachi ga Ore wo Hottekurenai Ken
alt_title: From Old Country Bumpkin to Master Swordsman: My Hotshot Disciples Are All Grown Up Now, and They Won’t Leave Me Alone, 片田舎のおっさん、剣聖になる～ただの田舎の剣術師範だったのに、大成した弟子たちが俺を放ってくれない件～, 乡里别大叔剑圣, 鄉下的大叔成為劍聖～只不過是鄉下的劍術老師，但功成名就的弟子們不放過我的事～, Мужчина средних лет из глубинки становится мастером меча. «Я был просто сельским учителем фехтования, но мои преуспевшие ученицы не захотели оставить меня в покое!»
description:
Beryl Gardinant, a self-proclaimed “humble old man,” is a sword instructor at his dojo in a rural, backwater village. In his younger years, he dreamed of glory as a master swordsman, but those days are long behind him. Out of the blue, he receives a visit from a famous former pupil who brings him world-shattering news—he’s been appointed as a special instructor for the knights of the Liberion Order! With his life now turned upside down, Beryl travels to the capital and reunites with some of his former students: elite knights, an ace wizard, and even an adventurer who’s attained the highest guild rank possible. But why do they all want his tutelage?! As far as he’s concerned, they clearly don’t need him anymore. Can Beryl live up to his new position? And will he ever get a moment’s peace away from his adoring students?!

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/from-old-country-bumpkin-to-master-swordsman-my-hotshot-disciples-are-all-grown-up-now-and-they-won-t-leave-me-alone)
genre: Action, Martial Arts, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Shigeru Sagasaki

title: Umisaki Lilac
alt_title: 海咲ライラック
description:
Even though he’s such a good-for-nothing…
Why is my heart racing like this!?

Hazuki Umi is a caring middle school student, beloved by everyone who lives on the island.
In contrast, Inoue Fuuta has done nothing but be lazy at home ever since he moved to the island to open up a guesthouse.
An overwhelming age difference of 15 years lies between them. 
He has no delicacy, he isn’t reliable at all…
And yet, his words always manage to make her heart race, her face flush---

The age-gap romance between a pure middle school girl and a boring 30-year old man begins now!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Kenmotsu Chiyo

In the yet-to-be-invaded Holy Land of Bahal, after a concerted effort to counterattack mankind, he succeeds in creating a "corpse knight" who never dies and a "power source" that can move him, thus reviving the gladiatorial "Gunther" as a "corpse knight."

title: Saikyou Onmyouji no Isekai Tenseiki ~Geboku no Youkaidomo ni Kurabete Monster ga Yowaisugirundaga~
alt_title: The Reincarnation of the Strongest Exorcist in Another World, 最強陰陽師の異世界転生記 ～下僕の妖怪どもに比べてモンスターが弱すぎるんだが～, 最強陰陽師的異世界轉生記 ～怪物比我的下僕妖怪弱太多了～, 最强阴阳师的异世界转生记, The Reincarnation of the Strongest Onmyoji ~ These Monsters Are Too Weak Compared to My Youkai~
description:
Haruyoshi Kuga’s power as the strongest exorcist is all for naught when he is betrayed by his closest ally. With his dying breath, he casts the secret Spell of Reincarnation — when he next opens his eyes, he finds himself in a different world altogether, reincarnated as Seika Lamprogue, the son of a family of magic scholars!

He quickly learns that the magic in this new world is quite unlike the sorcery he learned in his past life and that he can’t use it. Fortunately for him, with his mastery of curses and the hordes of youkai at his disposal, he doesn’t need to. 

Haruyoshi (now Seika) is determined not to repeat his past mistakes in his second life by smartly laying low and avoiding flaunting his power. Yet accomplishing his goals and without drawing attention to himself proves to be easier said than done — will his powers be enough to live a happy life?! 

---

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/the-reincarnation-of-the-strongest-exorcist-in-another-world)

description:
Innocent man framed for murder and sentenced to death. Released 17 years later after his name was cleared. The times have changed. Yeop has changed. His friends and family have changed. Nothing is the same anymore. The harsh reality surrounding him turned Yeop from a grateful young man to a stoic, skeptical person. And now, he wants to exact revenge on everything that worked together to ruin his life.

(Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

alt_title: クラスメイトの元アイドルが、とにかく挙動不審なんです。, The Idol Girl in My Class Is Acting Suspiciously
description: Saegusa, who retired from idolry when she went to high school, is good-looking and intelligent. She is always cheerful and friendly, and is the most popular person at school. Takuya, however, knows a certain side of the highbrow Miss Saegusa. Today, too, a suspicious-looking woman in a dubious disguise appears at the convenience store where he works part-time. She is, in all likelihood, that Saegusa-san...?

title: I'm Nobody's Shadow
alt_title: Cuando deje de ser tu sombra, 당신의 그림자를 그만두었을 때, When I Stopped Being Your Shadow, No Soy la Sombra de Nadie
description:
He was the hand of God, the painter of the century. My husband became the best artist in the empire.

And I was his shadow.

Even when my work went viral under my husband’s name, even when people spoke ill of me behind my back.

It was still good. Because I loved my husband.

But on our wedding anniversary.

“You are the only person I truly love.”

I witnessed my husband whispering his love to my best friend.

At the very moment when my husband saw me discovering his infidelity, his face contorted viciously and pushed me away.

“Where are you raising your voice to your husband?!”

I realized.

I realized that that man had never loved me.

So I decided to become the evil wife they spoke of.

*

“I have a special story for you.”

Ines suggested in a strained voice.

A man as beautiful as God turned his eyes gently to her.

“It’s a special story, our newspaper won’t print the case if it’s not good enough……..”

“It’s the fall of the painter known as the Hand of God…”

Ines continued in a tense voice.

“Isn’t this good enough a scandal to be published in Elton, the greatest daily newspaper in the empire?”

“Then what does Countess Brighton gain from the scandal?”

“My life.”
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Rana

title: Dr. STONE
alt_title: Доктор Стоун, Профессор каменного века, ドクターストーン
description:
Imagine waking to a world where every last human has been mysteriously turned to stone…  

One fateful day, all of humanity was petrified by a blinding flash of light. After several millennia, high schooler Taiju awakens and finds himself lost in a world of statues. However, he's not alone! His science-loving friend Senku's been up and running for a few months and he's got a grand plan in mind—to kickstart civilization with the power of science!
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Inagaki Riichiro

title: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni - Kataribanashi-hen Comic Anthology EX.
alt_title: ひぐらしのなく頃に 語咄し編 コミックアンソロジーEX．, Когда Плачут Цикады: Глава о Сборнике Историй
description:
Kataribanashi-hen (語咄し編 Storytelling Chapter) is a compilation of winning fan stories for the Higurashi no Naku Koro ni series from the Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Contest (ひぐらしのなく頃に大賞).

Notably, the eight artists involved with the 10 main arcs of the manga all illustrated for at least one of the stories included in the novel volumes, while Karin Suzuragi and Jiro Suzuki even illustrated the cover arts for the manga volumes and Yutori Houjyou and Mimori each did the manga adaptation of a story. Among the other artists, Kei Natsumi, Soichiro, and Akai Higasa would later be involved with other works from 07th Expansion including Umineko no Naku Koro ni and Rose Guns Days. 

Some stories were adapted into a manga series named Kataribanashi-hen Comic Anthology EX (語咄し編 コミックアンソロジーEX Kataribanashi-hen Komikkuansorojī EX).
genre: Comedy, Anthology, Drama, Horror, Mystery
author: Sou Ichirou

The start of a literally larger-than-life romcom!

title: Dance in the Vampire Bund
alt_title: ダンスインザヴァンパイアバンド, 吸血鬼同盟
description:
After millennia in hiding, Mina Ţepeş, the princess of the ancient covenant and ruler of all vampires, wants change. Using the vast wealth of the Ţepeş line, she has paid off the entire gross national debt of Japan and in so doing, gained the authority to create a "special district" off the coast of Japan that is to become the future haven to vampires the world over!   
  
Now, on the eve of the landmark press conference announcing the existence of vampires to the world, terrorists and rival factions are plotting to assassinate Mina Ţepeş before she has a chance to make her world-changing announcement.
