title: The Violinist of Hamelin
alt_title: ハーメルンのバイオリン弾き, 魔法提琴手, Violonist of Hameln
description:
Pandora's Box led a cursed existence. Through the curiosity of a woman, evil was unleashed and very nearly covered the world in darkness. Miraculously, humanity managed to seal Maou Kestra back into the box, but only with immense sacrifices. Even without their lord, the demons are still a formidable force that has only grown stronger with time, locked in the abandoned capital of the North, Hameln. Fifteen years have passed since that fateful battle…  
  
Enter Hamel, a travelling minstrel who is so self-centered that he'd sooner cook his guardian crow (and family friend), Oboe, than go hungry for even a minute. Welcome to the world of music and hilarious insanity that is the Violinist of Hameln. Watch as Hamel takes cheap shots at his opponents and bashes pigeons with his giant violin and turns them into dinner.  
  
How WILL the world be saved from Maou Kestra (it's a pun for orchestra, if you haven't noticed) with a hero such as this?
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Music, Tragedy
author: Watanabe Michiaki

title: Rairairai
alt_title: 雷雷雷, ГромГромГром
description:
It's been 50 years since the war with aliens.

Sumire Ichigaya is 18 years old. To pay off her debts, she works for a company that exterminates space pests. One day, Sumire's daily life changes drastically when she is kidnapped by a UFO! The voice of someone in her head, "space vermin attacking" and even a military company is after her!
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Military, Drama, Slice of Life, Aliens, Supernatural
author: Yoshiaki Kei

title: Catherine's Key to a Happy Life
alt_title: 버림받고 즐기는 소박한 독신의 삶, Rejected Lady Enjoying a Modest Life, The Abandoned Bachelorette Enjoys Her Simple Life, A Delightful Simple Life of a Single, After Leaving Home, La sencilla vida de soltería disfrutada después de ser abandonada
description:
Catherine did not want much.

Even if she did not have luxurious clothes and shoes, she was alright with her hideously frayed bedroom curtains and her shoes that were so worn at the soles it was different in height.

It had been two years since she started enduring it for the sake of her late mother.

She no longer felt the need to do that.

"Alright, I'll leave."

Catherine was tired of everything.

***

"Are you the Pope's watchdog? You've done well coming all the way here."

The man who intruded her home was drenched from head to toe.
She could see mud squished beneath his black leather boots.

Unbelievable.
To think he would drag in not grass, but mud, while she was cleaning the floors!

"You've got quite the disguise. Even I was almost fooled into thinking that you're just an ordinary city woman---"
"Wipe it."

She pushed the rag she held onto the man.

"Why are you looking at me so foolishly? I told you to wipe the floor. And it's not proper to show your sword when it's our first time meeting each other. Is it not enough that you intruded that you would want to be reported for attempted murder?"
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color
author: Gamju

With everyone's memories having been altered, Boruto finds himself being hunted by his own village. After escaping with Sasuke, what future awaits Boruto...?

alt_title: Find an idol, アイドルを探せ
description: Chikako Fujitani (18), 1st year at the Hanano Women’s College starts living alone at the same apartment as Kanro (An aspiring mangaka from the same school.) and Chiaki (A bus guide who pretends to be a college student to get a man.) While on the “Country-Bumpkin” tour she encounters Iwata, reconnects with her middle school crush, Nagae, and meets the landlady’s son, Makoto. It’s the kind of story about the bold and flimsy feelings of college students on an awkward, realistic love.

alt_title: Seraph of the End: Vampire Reign, Последний Серафим, 終わりのセラフ, 终结的炽天使
description: One day, a mysterious virus appeared on Earth which killed every infected human over the age of 13. At the same time, vampires emerged from the world's dark recesses and enslaved mankind. Enter Hyakuya Yuuichirou, a young boy, who along with the rest of the children from his orphanage, are treated as livestock by the vampires. Even in captivity, Yuuichirou dreams big. He dreams of killing vampires. He dreams of killing them all.
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Romance, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Gore, Drama, School Life, Vampires, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Kagami Takaya

title: Fight Club
alt_title: 파이트 클럽
description:
Minchan lived life as supreme alpha. A friend recommended to Min-chan, who felt bored with this life, join <Fight Club>, where someone's worth is judged solely by their martial arts skills. Minchan started with a light game and then participated in the game himself. When he gets tired of constantly winning in martial arts, he ends up losing to Tae-wook, who is smaller than him and an omega.

Minchan approaches Tae-wook with resentment for the defeat he experienced for the first time in his life, but his pride is even more hurt by his attitude, which seems to show no interest in him. Then one day, a heat cycle hits Tae-wook, and Minchan jumps at the chance to spend the night with Tae-wook... The beginning of a love fight with physical confrontations!
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Sports, Web Comic, Full Color

description: Bonus stories following the convicts featured in Baki's death row inmates arc after the events of Baki's second manga. Released in the "Baki" series' 2018 shinsouban as mutual promotion with the anime.

author: Itagaki Keisuke

title: Kanzen Kaihi Healer no Kiseki
alt_title: The Path of the Perfect Evasion Healer, 完全回避ヒーラーの軌跡, 완전회피 힐러의 궤적, 完全迴避補師的異世界軌跡, Путь целителя с идеальным уклонением
description: A college student, Sakurai Hiroki was summoned to another world to defeat the Demon Lord. And since he got “Priest” as a job, his starting Recovery Stat was more than enough to heal any wounds, so he dumped all of his Stat Points into Evasion. In other words, he’s aiming for an Evasion Healer who will never get hit by enemy attacks. But unfortunately, people in that world couldn’t understand his ideal! The King got angry against him and labelled him as useless almost immediately! And thus, the story of how Hiroki become an odd Healer who can even avoid Dungeon Boss’ attacks with ease has started!!
genre: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Puni-Chan

title: High Society
alt_title: 상류 사회, High Class Society, High Society (Gyeonwoo), 상류사회 (견우)
description:
**"Please sell me. I will become the most expensive lady in Sant'nar"**

Tired of the troubles brought about by his political marriage, debauchee Cesare coincidentally enters into an unusual  contract Adel, a shoeshiner from the slums.

The deadline is three months.

Expecting this to be his liberation from the tedious strategic marriage, Cesare finds himself becoming increasingly concerned about Adel, who behaves unlike any woman he has ever known...

"In the first place, didn't you bring me here to get me engaged to Sir Ezra?"
"That's right."

Cesare replied obediently for a moment before bursting into a sharp laugh.

"But why do I feel so disgusted?"
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Sexual Violence, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Gyeonu (견우)

title: Buta Kizoku wa Mirai wo Kiri Hiraku you desu
alt_title: 豚貴族は未来を切り開くようです
description: The glory of the past is long gone. Once hailed as a prodigy, now mocked as the “Pig Noble” due to his arrogance and appearance, Herbert, the son of a ducal family, falls into despair upon receiving a letter through temporal magic from his future self, revealing a tragic fate twenty years ahead. However, determined to face the self he had long avoided, the “Pig Noble” resolves to struggle and use temporal magic to carve out a different future for himself!
genre: Action, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Shinkosei

title: Tensei Shitara Koutei deshita ~Umare Nagara no Koutei wa Kono Saki Ikinokoreru ka~@COMIC
alt_title: 転生したら皇帝でした～生まれながらの皇帝はこの先生き残れるか～@COMIC
description:
An ordinary Japanese man reincarnates as Carmine, the emperor-at-birth. At first glance, it seems like the typical cheat life with guaranteed success, but his reincarnation in the Bungdalt Empire, however, the Emperor is a position constantly under threat of assassination by the nobles.

To the nobles, the Emperor is nothing more than a useful puppet—a palanquin that can be discarded at will. This is the reality that Carmine faces.

The masterminds behind the assassinations spare no mercy, even against children, but Carmine remains unfazed, having studied history and being well-versed in political maneuvering in his past life. Not only does he manipulate people’s hearts with fake tears and innocent smiles, but he also brilliantly outwits them using advanced magic! The young trickster's challenge as he aims to create an empire overflowing with smiles of its people thus begins!

Watch as the spirited young emperor revive his empire while constantly trying to survive!
genre: Reincarnation, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Kushinada Irue

title: Sensitive Boy
alt_title: センシティブ・ボーイ
description:
Kaede, a victim of past sexual abuse, is obsessed with becoming "normal" ...  

A bittersweet story about a boy facing coming-of-age questions about love, sexuality, complexes, and other troubles.
genre: Psychological, Romance, Sexual Violence, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

title: Seven Ninja of the Imperial Guard
alt_title: Seven Ninja of Efu, 卫府之七忍, 衛府の七忍, 衛府之七忍
description:
With the power of the shogunate, Ieyasu, the supreme ruler of Japan, holds sway over the Sengoku Era. Those who refuse to follow his whims are doomed to be put to death by the god of war, Kibitsuhiko-no-Mikoto. But behold! Seven shadows are still rampant in this ruthless world. Are they men? Beasts? Petals? The wind? No, they are the seven blades of the Efu–the grudgeful ninja!  
  
Note: The Efu were the personal guards of the Emperor of Japan and his palace before the Feudal Era, following the establishment of Ritsuryō.
genre: Historical, Action, Ninja, Martial Arts, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Supernatural
author: Yamaguchi Takayuki

title: Road to Kingdom
alt_title: Road to the Kingdom Slave Swordsman the Rise of Heroes - Harem Life, 王国へ続く道 奴隷剣士の成り上がり英雄譚（ハーレムライフ）, Дорога в королевство
description:
This is the story of a young slave gladiator in an underground arena. He doesn’t know about his past or how he got to where he is, only that his name is Aegir, and that he is strong.  
  
One day he kills the boss and escapes the arena, joining a band of mercenaries as a new recruit. During one mission, they encounter the vampire, Lucy, who slaughters the band with her inhuman strength. After learning that Aegir only knows how to kill, Lucy lets him stay at her house, educating and taking care of him.  
  
Two years pass, and on the day of Aegir’s departure, they both exchange a promise that if Aegir becomes a king and owns the land of Erg forest, he can come and take her as his woman. Making this his life goal, Aegir set out on a journey to become a hero, a king, and found his own kingdom.
genre: Action, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Adaptation
author: Yumizu Kai

title: Black Guardian
alt_title: 검은 후견인, Dark Guardian
description:
"I was going to make a bet on whether your soul would be corrupted."
"When you become an adult."

The demon "Luce", also known as Lucifer, Satan, the King of Hell, etc., plans a bet with God over Elijah, who possesses a rare pure soul.
On the day he meets Elijah for the first time, Luce tries to give up the bet after Elijah discovers his true identity, but Elijah holds him back.

"I just have to choose between him and you, don't I?"
"Don't give up on me already."

Luce is impressed by Elijah's defiance and agrees to take him under his wing.
He visits Elijah from time to time and insists that he sign a contract with him when he comes of age.

The day Elijah finally becomes an adult, He makes an unexpected request to Luce...
genre: Demons, Boys' Love, Supernatural

title: Sakura Taisen
alt_title: Sakura Wars, サクラ大戦, 樱花大战
description:
The year is 1921, and this is a Tokyo where monstrous steam-powered robots crash a flower-viewing party only to be cut down samurai-style by a young girl in a kimono and traditional hakama pants.  
  
It's eight years after the horrific Demon War, and Japan is a peaceful prosperous place. Meet Ensign Ogami Ichiro, who has just graduated from the Naval Academy. He's assigned to a base in Tokyo, but soon discovers that his headquarters is the Imperial Theater and his first mission is collecting tickets at the gate. He gamely goes about his menial jobs at the theater, surrounded by beautiful girls who seem to know a lot more about what's going on than he does, but he's about to be swept into a roiling world of robots, demons, and hot girls in uniform.
genre: Action, Romance, Harem, Supernatural

Alice is a bright high schooler who had been taking care of her father, her only family. she is beginning to grow feelings for Ryuu, who is a son of the owner of the hospital where Alice's father is at. One day her father's condition drastically changed and she became alone in the world. She decides to join a project called venus project, and their unimaginable secret was…

Tadashi struggled, but with his serious personality and blessing from God, he will increase the scale of agriculture with Gungun. Former queens of persecuted elves, heroes of beastmen, and master craftsmen of dwarves gathered in search of supplies made by Tadashi. Agriculture, founding of the country, slow life! Lee Yoonsung and Park Dokyung grew up together in the countryside since they were young. Yoonsung became an actor by chance, but whenever he has time, he travels back and forth between Seoul and his hometown to see Dokyung, his first and unrequited love.

Dokyung cared for Yoonsung, who had cried a lot since he was young.
Yoonsung finds himself developing stronger feelings for Dokyung, and his body's responses are becoming more noticeable.
Fearing that his feelings would be exposed, Yoonsung tries not to show and resolves to remain at least a friend... -Madeleine Scans-

Sakuradaimon is the school's prefect. A prefect is a student who is authorized to enforce discipline. As a prefect, he's supposed to be a role model to other students, but unfortunately he's not perfect. Kohinata is one of the people who Sakuradaimon has tried to discipline into wearing appropriate school attire, but she has thus far been disobedient.

And so this is a story of the two interacting with one another.

alt_title: 일기예보 살인마
description:
Lee Saehyun fell into a deeply depressed state after losing his parents when he was still a child. Coincidentally, he meets a mysterious little boy named Yoonwo, who brings him peace of mind.

For years straight, the little boy would visit Saehyun's house once every week, which helped Saehyun pass time peacefully and comfortably.
However, suddenly after Saehyun began to meet other girls or go on dates, it would always rain, and there was no process in his romantic relationships.

But are these constant unfortunate and coincidental scenarios simply just coincidental? Or is this the work of someone up in the sky?

S-class guide Jin Hyo-seop joins the C-class guild 'Noapi' under the condition that he will only perform contact guiding.

He provides guidance to the C-class guild members, but something feels lacking, and the guild members keep getting injured somewhere.

Meanwhile, the guild master Andante, who is kind but sly, prioritizes and takes care of Hyo-seop more than anyone else. Gradually, Hyo-seop starts to open his heart to him.

"Why don't you want to do contact guiding? Oh, did you put something sweet there or something?"
"W-What are you talking about..."
"Can't you show me?"

Tatsuo, Hide, Satoshi and Aya worked together to cheat people out of money. They tended to target marriage services, where they con money out of people looking for love. They were good at it, until they crossed the wrong guy. Then they saw the world below the surface of dupes to cheat, when the 'collection agency' came for them with extreme violence.  
  
The person who takes Satoshi and Hide, and then Aya and Tatsuo, is a wild-eyed maniac who seems to get off on the torture. There may be hope for Tatsuo, though, because the man recognizes him. The torturer is "Akasada" a bullied kid that Tatsuo knew from school. Now Tatsuo and Aya have been pulled, against their will, into Aka's world. [tethysdust]

A skin-colored coming-of-age drama!

description:
Hyakkaou Private Academy. An institution for the privileged with a very peculiar curriculum. You see, when you're the sons and daughters of the wealthiest of the wealthy, it's not athletic prowess or book smarts that keep you ahead. It's reading your opponent, the art of the deal. What better way to hone those skills than with a rigorous curriculum of gambling?  
At Hyakkaou Private Academy, the winners live like kings, and the losers are put through the wringer. But when Yumeko Jabami enrolls, she's gonna teach these kids what a high roller really looks like!

alt_title: 遥かなるリング, 格闘少女伝説遥かなるリング
description:
(from [wikipedia.ja](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E9%81%99%E3%81%8B%E3%81%AA%E3%82%8B%E3%83%AA%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B0)):

Yu Takamine was fascinated by the female pro-wrestlers she saw as a child, and overcoming her parents' opposition, she auditioned for and passed the Tokyo Women's Pro Wrestling Association Match to become a pro-wrestler. 

However, this was only the first step to becoming a wrestler. 

This is the story of Yu, an amateur wrestler who is not particularly strong, and her growth as an apprentice, rookie, heel, idol, and senior wrestler as she explores various fighting styles.

It was Colin McCarthy, known as the biggest loser in the school. Then Ace accidentally discovers Colin in trouble and decides to help him. Falling for Ace, Colin starts to secretly follow him from that day onward. Eventually, Ace catches Colin in the act. He expected cold stares and scolding, but what he heard was unexpected."Let's have a secret relationship, Colin."

description:
In a world where opposites attract, a chance encounter sparks a connection between a serious black-haired girl and a charismatic blond delinquent, painting a cute tale of young love and friendships. As the series unfolds, their seemingly carefree lives take unexpected turns, delving into the shadows that haunt their lives. 

An artful blend of laughter and heartfelt moments, this manga tells about the complexities of youth, friendship, and your past catching up to you.

title: Ranker's Return
alt_title: 랭커의 귀환 (2021), Ranker's Return (Remake), ランカーの帰還, Возвращение ранкера, 榜上玩家的归还, Ranker's Return (2021)
description:
During the early years of the hottest MMORPG called Arena, the world’s top ranker Meleegod vanished after setting every possible record in the virtual world.

In the real world, this deathly melee damage dealer was the happy-go-lucky Kang Hyeonu, who simply deleted his character and quit his hobby to finish mandatory military service and inherit his father’s company.

This rosy future dissolves within two years when a business rival makes his father go bankrupt. Hyeonu struggles to make ends meet with a string of part-time jobs, but his best friend has a better idea. He urges Hyeonu to conquer the Arena once again and earn a cushy living as a gaming celebrity.

Vowing to strike it rich and avenge his father, the former Meleegod returns to the Arena as a newbie. Only this time, he’s out for blood!

description: In this world, It's only me who can get stronger by eating Magic Stones! At one point, I received an offer to have a smooth life reincarnation from the Goddess-sama… But the skill I got as a prize is Toxins Decomposition EX. Ugh, what a plain skill! It's so pitiful that even my own family makes fun of me… However, one day I realized that because of the effect of this skill, I can eat and gain power from Magic Stones! I've also been notified that I'm the prince from a neighboring country!? What awaits me in the castle are days of experimenting with Magic Stones and training, the perfect environment for me to become the strongest man there is… And to top it off, I received the Magic Stone of Dullahan! The story of a boy on the path to becoming a King while being chased by an assertive fiancee and Female Knights starts here!

title: Rocket Science Love
alt_title: 로켓 사이언스 러브
description:
I thought it was just platonic, spending the rest of our lives together as nothing more than friends… That was until Han Jei broke the news: “Seojin, I’m getting married.” 

Seojin, who was adopted to Germany when he was a child, has maintained a 15 year long relationship with Jei. When confronted with the prospect of Jei’s marriage, he realizes he’s in love with him. Working as a pilot, Seojin moves back to Korea in an attempt to run away, but his plan starts to unravel when Jei boards the flight to follow him. The two find themselves living together in Korea as Jei’s wedding date rapidly approaches. 

“Seojin, you’re not acting like this because of me, are you?”

As Seojin tries to push Jei away due to his emerging desires and Jei wishes to rekindle their precious friendship, they spend more time with each other and the tension between them begins to arise…

He was prepared to die in the face of the evil god's attack, and was supposed to meet his end...However, at that moment, his unique skill "Inventory" activates, and he finds himself turning the tables on the evil god. Surviving, Elt sets off for his home village to inform his childhood friend of his safety, but on the way, he encounters a powerful monster walking through the forest—however, as he prepares to avoid the confrontation, he spots a fainted girl right next to the creature! A royal welcome upon this world! The success fantasy starting with a sacrificial hero!

description:
Chiaki is handsome, academically gifted, athletic, and born into a wealthy family with a beautiful sister. Despite his seemingly perfect life, he faces a persistent problem: he's never been lucky in love and struggles to capture the attention of girls. Determined to turn things around in high school, he wakes up one morning to a surprising transformation—he has turned into a girl!

He is shocked to find out that he has lost the appearance he was so proud of, but when he looks in the mirror, he sees a very cute girl in the reflection. He immediately goes to show it off to his twin sister Kaede, who happens to be very popular with the girls, but there is also something very strange happening to her...

title: Urareta Henkyou Haku Reijou wa Ringoku no Outaishi ni Dekiai Sareru
alt_title: 売られた辺境伯令嬢は隣国の王太子に溺愛される, The Young Lady of a District Count Is Sold and Forced to Dote on the Crown Prince of the Neighbouring Country, The Young Lady of a District Count Is Sold and Forced to Dote on the Crown Prince of the Neighboring Country, 被卖掉的的边境伯爵大小姐却被邻国王太子所溺爱, 被賣掉的的邊境伯爵大小姐卻被鄰國王太子所溺愛
description:
"What a boring world this is."

A noble society where it is common sense for women to marry a nobleman from a good family and dote on their husband for the rest of their lives. Anna, the young daughter of the Harmich family, has grown tired of such a world. Rather than having fantasies of marriage, Anna, who is obsessed with the art of war, dreamt of appearing on the battlefield alongside her father. However, after being invaded by their neighbouring country, Albion, Anna's father departed for the battlefield for his last and final time. On top of that, the eldest son was taken as a war prisoner. In dire straits, the Harmich family decides to offer their second daughter, Anna, to the neighbouring country!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy
author: Ogura An

title: The Mafia Nanny
description: Being an Elite Nanny is simple: protect the charge, obey the principle, and don’t get emotionally attached. Easier said than done when Davina’s first client is a dangerously compelling Venetian underboss who’s determined to get under her skin. What he wants from her, she can’t imagine, but Gabriel Angelini drags her back into the glittering world of organized crime she thought she’d left behind forever. She might get answers about her past if she digs deep enough, but can she protect Mikey from his father’s ambitions and keep her heart from getting tangled up in their treacherous web?
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Mafia, Office Workers, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Violet Matter

title: Fights Breaking Through The Heavens
alt_title: Battle Through the Heavens, BTTH, Dou Po Cangqiong, Fights Break Sphere, Расколотая битвой синева небес, 斗破苍穹
description: In a land where there is no magic, a land where the strong make the rules and weak have to obey, a land filled with alluring treasures and beauty, yet also filled with unforeseen danger. Xiao Yan, who has shown talents none had seen in decades, suddenly lost everything three years ago - his powers, his reputation, and his promise to his mother. What sorcery has caused him to lose all of his powers? And why has his fiancée suddenly shown up?
genre: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Harem, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Tian Can Tu Dou

title: Journey To The West
alt_title: Westbound, Westbound Discipline, Xi Xing Ji, Xīxíng Jì, 西行纪, Westward, 西游
description: The original journey to the west to retrieve the Sutra was a conspiracy plotted by the Heavens! Just after a few decades, the Sutra has vanished. The Heavens search for the Sutra with plans to use it with corrupted intentions. In order for the Sutra to not fall into the hands of Heaven, the journey to the west will begin once again.
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Wuxia, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Cheng Kin Wo

title: Koharu to Minato: Watashi no Partner wa Onna no Ko
alt_title: 小春と湊 わたしのパートナーは女の子, Koharu and Minato: My Partner is a Girl, Happy Life with my Girlfriend, 小春和湊, 小春和湊
description:
A sweet essay by a real-life couple, that attracted a lot of attention on SNS, is now being serialized on Yuri-Hime!

Koharu and Minato are a long-distance couple who finally got the chance to live together. Their lovey-dovey daily life, even with a 10-year age difference, will heal you from the fatigue of modern life...!
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, Slice of Life
author: Hiaruron

title: Bai Ze's Bizarre Collection
alt_title: Bai Ze's Bizarre Records, Необычная коллекция Бай Цзэ, 白泽异闻录, 白澤異聞錄
description: A bespectacled pervert girl named Ling Yun discovered the domineering side of the seemingly weak and handsome Bai Ze. Thus, everyday was spent catching demons it was full of fear and welfare!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy
author: Sanshen Studio

title: Tokyo Ghoul:re
alt_title: Токийский гуль: Перерождение, トーキョーグール-:re, 東京喰種: re, 도쿄구울:re, 東京喰種:re, Tokyo Ghoul: re
description:
Two years have passed since the CCG's raid on Anteiku. Although the atmosphere in Tokyo has changed drastically due to the increased influence of the CCG, ghouls continue to pose a problem as they have begun taking caution, especially the terrorist organization Aogiri Tree, who acknowledge the CCG's growing threat to their existence.  
  
The creation of a special team, known as the Quinx Squad, may provide the CCG with the push they need to exterminate Tokyo's unwanted residents. As humans who have undergone surgery in order to make use of the special abilities of ghouls, they participate in operations to eradicate the dangerous creatures. The leader of this group, Haise Sasaki, is a half-ghoul, half-human who has been trained by famed special class investigator, Kishou Arima. However, there's more to this young man than meets the eye, as unknown memories claw at his mind, slowly reminding him of the person he used to be.  


---
genre: Action, Psychological, Gore, Horror, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Ishida Sui

title: Gift of Poison
alt_title: ドクの贈物
description: Gift Hisono is a gifted painter cursed with financial woes. On the brink of finishing his latest work, his trusty palette knife suddenly snaps! In a desperate attempt to afford a replacement, he steals paint from his close friend and fellow art club member, Taima. This act of theft witnessed by another club member, Kadomi, marks the beginning of his poisonous downfall...
genre: Psychological, Drama, Web Comic
author: Dodotan

title: Youchien Wars
alt_title: GUERRA EN EL JARDIN DE INFANTES, 幼稚園WARS, Youchien WARS, Kindergarten WARS, Детсадовские войны
description:
Welcome to Kindergarten Noir, an exclusive school catering to children of the global elite!

Rita, one of the teachers, has been on the hunt for a boyfriend but has had absolutely zero luck so far. One day, an assassin comes after one of the children... and he’s totally dreamy?!

Dive into this action-packed rom-com as it unfolds inside the world’s "safest" kindergarten!
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Samurai, Mafia, Gore, Drama
author: Chiba Yuu

title: Gokurakugai
alt_title: 極楽街, Район Гокураку, 极乐街, Paradise District, Райский Район, Gokuraku District
description:
Gokurakugai, a bright and bustling working class district with a hidden dark side. In this area without order, Tao and Alma work as troubleshooters for hire. Their missions involve helping a young boy find his lost friend, a person who disappears without a trace, and disfigured animal corpses.

All the while, the evil spirits who live in the shadows bring out a different side to these troubleshooters!
genre: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Crime, Drama, Delinquents, Supernatural
author: Sano Yuto

alt_title: Импульс мира, ワールドトリガー, ワートリ, 境界触发者, 境界觸發者, World Trigger
description:
A gate to another dimension has burst open, and from it emerge gigantic invincible creatures that threaten all of humanity. Earth's only defense is a mysterious group of warriors who have co-opted the alien technology in order to fight back!  
  
**Please Note:** Chapters 111-114 are only available as licensed versions.
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Ashihara Daisuke

title: Shiba Inu Rooms
alt_title: シバつき物件
description: The highly popular one-shot is finally back!! A newly built 1LDK apartment with rent of 4,800 yen! The reason is the "earthbound spirit of a Shiba Inu"...!? A heartwarming comedy about a cool and sightly awkward high school girl, Kori, and a quirky Shiba Inu spirit, Mu-chan, begins!
genre: Comedy, Supernatural
author: Omori Esu

title: Cross Manage
alt_title: Kurosu maneji, クロス・マネジ
description: "Hard working" or "passionate" was not in Sakurai's vocabulary and joining a team sports in school was out of the question. But one day, he accidentally walks in on his female classmate Toyoguchi naked in the locker room and in return for keeping it a secret from everyone else, he is forced to become the manager for the female lacrosse team. Toyoguchi is passionate about lacrosse and was responsible for creating the team for the school. Sakurai reluctantly begins his role as manager but is slowly drawn into Toyoguchi's personality and begins researching and enjoying the sport. The once lazy Sakurai who was scared of failure now learns to put himself out there and put serious effort into something worthwhile.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Sports, School Life
author: Kaito

title: TS Eiseihei-san no Senjou Nikki
alt_title: TS衛生兵さんの戦場日記, Genderswapped Medic's Battlefield Diary, TS Medic's Battlefield Diary
description:
An ex-pro gamer of the FPS genre (♂) reincarnated in a fantasy world filled with magic... Only to learn that what greeted him was not a scene from one's dreams, but a muddy battlefield full of bullets flying to and fro! Moreover, he's now an orphan girl named Touri Noel?!

After her aptitude for healing magic was discovered, she decided to volunteer in the army as a second-class medic, all to raise money for the orphanage where she was born and raised. However, without even getting magic training, she was attached to an assault squad, repeatedly fighting on the most cruel battlefields of the "Western Front."
The mission given to her was to become the personal medic of the frontline's ace, Garback, and not let him die at any cost. But he turned out to be the worst commander, who will try to get results whatever the cost, even if it means the death of his subordinates!

On the battlefield, mired in unreasonable orders and violence, Touri's fierce battle for survival continues...
genre: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Action, Sexual Violence, Magic, Military, Isekai, Drama, Medical, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: Masaki Tama

title: Not So Shoujo Love Story
alt_title: Un Shoujo no tan Shoujo, Historia de amor no tan Shoujo
description: Romance-super-fan Rei-chan is ready for her first boyfriend and she knows just who it'll be: the most handsome boy in school, Hansum Ochinchin. But her plans for the perfect love story are derailed when the most popular girl in class declares herself a rival....for Rei's heart?! This is the year her not so shoujo love story begins!
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Girls' Love, Web Comic
author: Curryuku

title: Yumenashi-sensei no Shinroshidou
alt_title: 夢なし先生の進路指導, Yumenashi-sensei's Guidance Counseling
description: A former Career Consultant, Takanashi, now works for a school as a Guidance Counselor. During Career Guidance meetings, he gives headstrong students data and tells them the realities of the world around them, hoping that they rethink their dreams. Because of that, students begin to call him "The Dream Crusher".
genre: Psychological, Sexual Violence, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Kasahara Masaki

title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 7 - Steel Ball Run
alt_title: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 Part7『スティール・ボール・ラン』, JoJo: SBR, JoJo的奇妙冒险 第七部 飙马野郎, Невероятное приключение ДжоДжо — Часть 7: Гонка «Стальной шар», 조조의 기묘한 모험 7 부 : 스틸 볼 달리기
description:
In the American Old West, the world's greatest race is about to begin. Thousands line up in San Diego to travel over six thousand kilometers for a chance to win the grand prize of fifty million dollars. With the era of the horse reaching its end, contestants are allowed to use any kind of vehicle they wish. Competitors will have to endure grueling conditions, traveling up to a hundred kilometers a day through uncharted wastelands. The Steel Ball Run is truly a one-of-a-kind event.  
  
The youthful Johnny Joestar, a crippled former horse racer, has come to San Diego to watch the start of the race. There he encounters Gyro Zeppeli, a racer with two steel balls at his waist instead of a gun. Johnny witnesses Gyro using one of his steel balls to unleash a fantastical power, compelling a man to fire his gun at himself during a duel. In the midst of the action, Johnny happens to touch the steel ball and feels a power surging through his legs, allowing him to stand up for the first time in two years. Vowing to find the secret of the steel balls, Johnny decides to compete in the race, and so begins his bizarre adventure across America on the Steel Ball Run.
genre: Thriller, Award Winning, Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Animals, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Sports, Martial Arts, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Military, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Araki Hirohiko

title: Karada Sagashi Kai
alt_title: Body Search Solution, カラダ探し 解
description: Una misteriosa chica informa a Rumiko que pronto morirá. En ese momento, su tranquila vida cotidiana da otro horrible giro... La leyenda que circula en la escuela sobre la "chica de Rojo" se hace realidad y ella y sus amigos son atacados. Comienza así una nueva búsqueda del cuerpo, que debe completarse en solo siete días. Secuela de "Karada Sagashi".
genre: School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Welzard

title: Karada Sagashi
alt_title: Body Search, Looking for the body, カラダ探し, 寻找身体, 신체 찾기
description: Look forwards to the ghost story of the red person. "Hey, Asuka… search for my body". At school in the middle of the night, Asuka and her friends search for the scattered body-parts. If they don't find the entire body, the 9th November is repeated and the red person will continue to kill them. Who is the red person? Why is Haruka asking them to search for the body-parts?
genre: Psychological, Sexual Violence, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Welzard

title: BLINDFOLD
alt_title: Блайндфолд
description: Esta historia está situada en el año 2054. La detective Celia Mine está trabajando en un extraño caso de asesinato, un proceso en el cual hace una nueva amiga...
genre: Long Strip, Comedy, Crime, Self-Published, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Mashersan

title: Livingstone
alt_title: Камень души, リヴィングストン, 魂石, LiveStrong, Living Stone
description:
At the beginning of the 20th century American Doctor, Duncan MacDonald, engaged in a series of unethical experiments. Those experiments concluded that should one suffer a death not ordained by fate the human body lightened by an average of 30 grams, the weight of a man's soul stone.  
  
Today, two men, Sakarai and Amano, are in the hunt to find people who are about to die before their time and either prevent their unnatural death or recover these stones, "Livingstones."
genre: Psychological, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Maekawa Tomohiro

title: The Wizard of Eden
alt_title: 에덴의 마법사, Eden-ui Mabeopsa
description: One day, a circus troupe came across the street from Eden's school. Passing by the barracks, Eden meets the ring master of the troupe, Luke. Eden, who feels guilty for Luke for a certain childhood incident, recognizes him at one glance. However, Luke does not recognize him, and Eden felt upset leads him to getting drunk at the circus welcome party. The two accidentally spend a passionate night and quickly become close. Enamoured by Eden's cute and unguarded natural, Luke, who has lived a prosperous and carefree life so far, can't stop himself from falling for him. Eden is also attracted to Luke, who has grown up to be serious and cool, unlike when his young self, but the rumours about him being a Casanova leave him uneasy.
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: bandi

title: Home Room
alt_title: ホームルーム, 班会
description: High school student Sachiko is bullied daily and is the recipient of constant unpleasant pranks in class. The culprit is unknown, however, in truth, to Sachiko those days were not particularly painful. That is because her beloved Aida-sensei is there to save her. Bright, handsome, and with a strong sense of justice, he is popular with everyone. Of course to Sachiko he is her special hero. However, Aida-sensei has a secret…
genre: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Drama, School Life
author: Chiyo

title: Off Track
alt_title: 오프트랙
description: Cha Gunmu' , who infiltrates the after-party of L Company's shareholders' meeting to find clues about Red Diamond, encounters 'Yeon Taeoh', the youngest son of the Yeonsun Group and a genius racer. While chasing the target, Gunmu witnesses Taeoh drinking alcohol laced with drugs, and ends up saving him and missing the target. In the hotel where the drugged Teoh was laid to rest, something strange happened to the drugged Taeoh...? “Why don’t you bear all your responsibilities to the end?” Gunmu, who was helplessly caught up in Taeoh’s actions, leaves the hotel room disgusted by his arrogant attitude and vows never to see him again, but he hears that his target, Red Diamond, is related to the Yeonseon Group... “This debt will be properly repaid later.” Would this be just a moment of burning pleasure or a tenacious and brutal relationship?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Web Comic
author: Ro (로)

alt_title: Isekai Furin part 2, 異世界不倫Ⅱ～導かれし人妻たちと不器用転生勇者～, Isekai Affair 2
description:
An office worker, Yuuto Aida, witnesses his wife's affair at home!  When he jumps out of the house, he gets hit by a truck and is reincarnated in another world as a hero!!  However, due to the misunderstanding about Goddess Reincarnation, he only had one skill, it was a skill that could captivate other people's wives!!

(MTL)
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic

title: Saihate ni Madou
alt_title: 最果てに惑う, Lost at the Farthest Ends, Perdido en los extremos más bajos
description: After his little sister was raped and killed herself, a teenage boy took revenge and killed her rapist in return. Seven years later the boy's released from prison, determined to kill himself due to insufferable guilt but then he's confronted by the rapist's daughter. A dramatic tale of guilt and atonement.
genre: Loli, Psychological, Sexual Violence, Drama, Tragedy
author: Momoyama Hato

title: Safe Sex
alt_title: セーフセックス, 安全X行为, 安全性行为
description: Ai and Yuu went to buy condoms in "Safe Sex". The time goes back a little to their first encounter! A new type of everyday romantic comedy that only adults can understand.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Mori Moriko

title: Bungou Stray Dogs: Dazai, Chuuya, Juugo-sai
alt_title: Bungou Stray Dogs - Dazai, Chuuya, Fifteen years old, 文豪ストレイドッグス 太宰、中也、十五歳, Bungou Stray Dogs - Dazai, Chuuya, 15 años, Bungou Stray Dogs - Dazai, Chuuya, age fifteen, Великий из Бродячих Псов: Дазай и Чуя, 15 лет
description: Not long after Ougai Mori takes the reins of the Port Mafia, his accomplice Osamu Dazai has a dreadful run in with Chuuya Nakahara, a boy known as the Sheep King who is capable of manipulating gravity. But when strange rumors about the mysterious being Arahabaki start spreading throughout Yokohoma, the duo must put aside their differences and get to the bottom of things. Before they achieved infamy as the fearsome pairing Twin Dark, Dazai and Chuuya were just boys. Was their first encounter a harbinger of hope, or an ill omen of things to come...?
genre: Action, Crime, Mafia, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Asagiri Kafka

title: My Second Life as an Idol
alt_title: 기레기와 함께하는 연예계 생활
description:
From failed idol to hailed idol!
Flop idol Yongmin dies an unfortunate death but is given a second chance at life in the body of Ian, a super hot rich kid with a voice to match. At his side, he finds Jin, a mysterious soul tasked with guiding Ian to becoming a certified star. But is it really all smooth sailing from here?
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Music, Full Color
author: PJ

title: Agnes Mask
alt_title: アグネス仮面
description: Professional wrestler Yamamoto Shingo returned to Japan from a 5 year training trip in the US and Mexico, only to be greeted by his now defunct wrestling company: Yamato. He's come to find out that as soon as the president of the company passed away, the rival wrestling group Imperial Japan Pro Wrestling (IJPW) took down Yamato. Shingo is forced to seek revenge for Yamato by challenging the president of IJPW. One thing led to another, and now Shingo has been half-forced into working under IJPW as the new wrestler from Brazil: Agnes Mask.
genre: Action, Psychological, Crime, Sports, Adventure, Tragedy
author: Hiramatsu Minoru

title: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: Bangaihen - Toaru Kyuuka no Sugoshikata
alt_title: 転生したらスライムだった件　番外編～『とある休暇の過ごし方』～, That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Extra Story - How to Spend a Certain Vacation, О моём перерождении в слизь: Дополнительная история - как провести отпуск
description:
**Warning:** This Spinoff manga has spoilers from the Light Novel.

After successfully completing the Founding Festival, which includes meetings with the leaders of various countries, a martial arts tournament, technology presentations, and the unveiling of the underground labyrinth, the peaceful daily life in Tempest has returned. Then, Veldora begins to say, "I'm also thinking of developing magic beasts", and the three of them, including Rimuru and Hinata, who are interested in developing new magic, head for the Magic Tower, the sacred place of magic...?

This work is based on the Light Novel, and the timeline is from the end of Volume 9 to the beginning of Volume 10.
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy
author: Fuse

title: I Became the Mother of the Bloody Male Lead
alt_title: 피폐물 남주의 엄마가 되었다, I Became the Bloodthirsty Male Lead's Mother, I Became the Mother of a Bloody Male Lead, I Became the Mother of the Tragic Male Lead
description:
When I opened my eyes, I became Sheriel, the mother of the male protagonist in the novel, A Wasteland Without Blood or Tears. In the original novel, the male lead, Cardicel, was famous for being cruel, so I looked at him with trepidation, thinking he would be different from the beginning, but what was this? My son, who will soon become the lead male protagonist, is so cute.

“We can’t let such a cute child grow up to be a person who imprisons and harms the female lead!”
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Peril

title: Yipin Di Nu
alt_title: First Miss Reborn, 一品嫡女, Return for Revenge
description: When she was hit by labor pain, what greeted her wasn't words of comfort but vile accusations of infidelity. Killed in defense of her unborn baby, she vowed to take revenge on them all… and God granted her a second chance. However, it seems that she's not the only one brought back. Who's that silver-haired guy in mask? Why does he seem to know her every move, yet still willingly provide unconditional help regardless?
genre: Time Travel, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Bai Su

title: Today's Walk
alt_title: Last Walk, 今日のさんぽんた
description:
The story of a dog, Ponta, and his walker, Rieko.

---
**Support the author's:**

title: Chocolat no Mahou
alt_title: ショコラの魔法, 魔法巧克力專門店, 쇼콜라의 마법, The Magic of Chocolate
description:
The "bittersweet, mysterious story" revolves around Chocolat Aikawa, a chocolatière who runs a shop called Chocolat Noir. She can grant wishes to the troubled people who visit her shop — if they give her something precious in exchange.  
  
In the *Chocolat no Mahou* (The Magic of Chocolate) series:  
  
V.01 - *Chocolat no Mahou*  
V.02 - *Bittersweet*  
V.03 - *Creamy Sugar*  
V.04 - *Dark Spice*  
V.05 - *Evil Essence*  
V.06 - *Fruity Flavor*  
V.07 - *Guilty Crunch*  
V.08 - *Honey Blood*  
V.09 - *Ice Shadow*  
V.10 - *Jewel Syrup*  
V.11 - *Knocking Egg*  
V.12 - *Love Flake*  
V.13 - *Melty Night*  
V.14 - *Nutty Carnival*  
V.15 - *Odd Cake*  
V.16 - *Phantom Decoration*  
V.17 - *Queen Candy*
V.18 - *Romantic Flambé*
V.19 - *Salty Leaf*
V.20 - *Tricky Beans*
V.21 - *Under Glace*
  
- Doraje Koibitotachi no Kiseki  
  
[See AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=12566)

genre: Animals, Romance, Magical Girls, Magic, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

title: Marriage and Sword
alt_title: 메리지 앤 소드, Sword & Marriage, Брак и меч, Брачный союз и меч, マリッジ＆ソード～令嬢剣士の政略結婚～, 玛丽奇与剑, 婚姻与剑, 瑪麗奇與劍, 劍與婚姻
description:
House Targael, the sword of the Emperor and the glory of the Empire. House Targael, whose name was respectable, was doomed. They weren’t just doomed, they were destroyed. Just to make ends meet, Elze hides her identity and goes to war. After returning home, Elze, who made a name for herself through her amazing swordsmanship and gained a fortune, thought that all she had to do was live a happy life. Unexpectedly, a political marriage was arranged by the Emperor’s orders! Her partner to be was Shan Kiraxus, deputy commander of the Imperial Army, whom she had saved in the war…

---
After my family fell on hard times, I, Hergenes Targael, disguised myself as a male mercenary named Herge to make money. Along the way, I rescued and met Shaun Kyroxus, a formidable ally who I abruptly left when I was needed back home. Sometime later, I am now part of an arranged marriage with none other than... Shaun?! He's dying to see Herge again, and it's only a matter of time before he finds out! I'm not sure if this marriage will work out, and what do I do when he finds out?!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A9%94%EB%A6%AC%EC%A7%80-%EC%95%A4-%EC%86%8C%EB%93%9C/2883), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58522832)

**Official Translations:**

author: SAHA (사하)

title: Hori-san to Miyamura-kun
alt_title: Horimiya Webcomic, Хори-сан и Миямура-кун, Хоримия: Вебкомикс, Хоримия: Ёнкома, 堀さんと宮村くん, 堀桑与宫村君, Hori-san and Miyamura-kun Webcomic
description:
The original story which the popular manga series Horimiya is based on.  
  
It's said that youth is bittersweet, but maybe it's just bitter? Kyoko Hori is a flashy high school girl, who, despite her ostentatious appearance, excels in academics and loves her family. Izumi Miyamura is a bland high school boy, who, regardless of not wanting to stand out in class, secretly wears piercings outside of school and has a large body tattoo. One day, Miyamura finds Hori's little brother injured and helps him back to Hori's house, where the relationship between Hori and Miyamura begins with Hori's discovery of Miyamura's secret, and his of her's.  
  


---
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic
author: Hero

title: Girlfriends
alt_title: 여자친구, ガールフレンド, 女朋友, Girl Friends, GFs, Romance Or Friendship, Love Or Schoolmates
description: High school is shaping up to be much different than what Young had imagined. First of all, the girls and boys are in separate buildings, which means Young’s got zero chance of casually running into her handsome, dreamy, kind, sexy, gorgeous crush, Bitna. Second, there’s a psycho chick in Young’s class…that no one else knows about! And to make things worse, she is Bitna’s dream girl. Young must find a way to get back at psycho chick and win Bitna’s heart…but luck is not on her side and things quickly spiral out of control.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Cheonggeon

title: Shin Sekai Birudauzu ~Kurasu 24 "Karada" de Ikkinokore~
alt_title: 新世界ビルダーズ～クラス24「体」で生き残れ～, New World Builders: Survive with Class 24 "Body"
description: All of the students from Midorishino High's class 2-C are killed in a bus accident during a school trip. However, they are reincarnated as monsters in another world. Will the 24 reincarnated "bodies" of classmates be able to survive in a world ruled by a select few influential people with powers known as "gifts"?
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic
author: Saimaru Bamyuda

title: My Reason to Die
alt_title: 내가 죽기로 결심한 것은, Naega Jukgiro Gyeolsimhan Geoseun, The Reason I Decided to Die, What I Decided to Die For, 私が死を決めたのは, 我为之离开的理由, 我之所以決定去死
description:
Ji-o’s luck runs out when she gets injured before the tryouts for the national taekwondo team. In the middle of facing what seems to be the biggest crisis of her life, she meets Gyeol, a mysterious boy who changes her life forever. He’s the definition of a bad boy with a good heart, and she finds herself unable to resist his charms. However, she might be playing with fire as he’s someone who’s involved with the wrong crowd. Is falling for Gyeol worth the risk?

---
Ji Oh, a senior in high school who was injured ahead of the National Taekwondo Competiton, is facing late puberty. Cha Gyeol, who met Ji Oh while having all sort of bad thoughts, is completely swoon over by Ji Oh with her dazzling smile. However, the people around Cha Gyeol are somehow dangerous for her to go head over heels with him. Her mind knows that she should be wary of him but she could not stop her interest towards Gyeol. Is it alright for her… to like him?

---

title: Suterare Elf-san wa Sekai de Ichiban Tsuyokute Kawaii!
alt_title: 捨てられエルフさん は世界で一番強くて可愛い！, The Abandoned Elf is the Strongest and Cutest in the World!
description:
“Dear top players, this game is a real parallel world. If you reincarnate and save the world, any wish you have will be granted.”

Former popular voice actress Ayano responded to the proposal from the goddess. In order to shine as a voice actress once again. Reincarnated as the strongest species of high elf, she aims to “clear the game” in the parallel world with the strongest and cutest kemo-eared heroine using her gaming knowledge, but –!?
genre: Reincarnation, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Tsukiyo Rui

title: The Villainess Is Adored by the Crown Prince of the Neighboring Kingdom
alt_title: The Villainess Is Being Doted on by the Crown Prince of the Neighboring Country, 悪役令嬢は隣国の王太子に溺愛される
description:
Tiararose was supposed to be disengaged and exiled from the country.

“This was the Otome game I had played!” She realized on the day before the story’s ending――…….

Shall I wait for the judgment? But, I did not do anything too cruel……. Thinking so, the ending continues.

But, during the judgement――something that was not possible in the game happened. The neighboring crown prince courted the villainous daughter Tiararose.
genre: Reincarnation, Romance, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Puni-Chan

title: Sakusei Byoutou Zen-nennrei-ban
alt_title: Semen Extraction Ward All-Ages Version, 搾精病棟　全年齢版, 榨精病棟　全年齡版
description:
Yamada was hospitalized after breaking both hands, to make things worse, due to a unknown condition he has to ejaculate every three hours. The ward is full of evil nurses. Will Yamada be able to live and be discharged from the hospital?

TLDR: Guy has busted hands, gets sent to hospital for chronic ejaculation, guy gotta get his nuts busted by busty whacko nurses.
genre: Comedy, Harem, Medical
author: Sakusei Kenkyuujo

title: Gakuen THE iDOLM@STER 4-koma Comic
alt_title: Gakum@s 4-koma, Gakumas 4-koma
description: A whole new THE iDOLM@STER branch - Gakuen THE iDOLM@STER. This comic introduces about characters and stuff in Hatsuboshi Academy.
genre: Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Music, Full Color
author: Bandai Namco Entertainment

title: At the Northern Fort
alt_title: 北の砦にて
description:
Paw pads wrapped in white fur. Fluffiness around the neck. 
A bushy tail. A rounded figure that was the very definition of fur ball! 
A certain Japanese girl had been reincarnated into such a fox cub, Milfiria.
Milfiria was told to watch the house by her mother, as she left for the capital. 
However, unable to bear with the loneliness, she decided to follow her mother
but lost her way until she reached a fort protected by strong knights.
genre: Reincarnation, Animals, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Mikuni Tsukasa

title: Houkago no Idol ni wa Himitsu ga aru
alt_title: The After School Idol Has a Secret, 放課後のアイドルには秘密がある, У школьных айдолов есть свои секреты, 放学后的偶像有一个秘密
description:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Amane Kashiko

title: Fly Me to the Moon
alt_title: 플라이 미 투 더 문, FLY ME TO THE MOON〜宿命を超える運命〜, 奔向月亮
description:
The prince isn't always charming.
Before Jeongyeon even has a moment to process the tragedies in her life, she's thrown into the world of the Clansmen, a group of terrifyingly inhuman beings. Without any hope or expectations, she takes her first step into this monstrous world. Will she be swept off her feet or just swept away?
genre: Thriller, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Vampires, Full Color
author: Ma goyoung

title: RaiRaiRaise
alt_title: 雷々来世
description: High school student Nanase has a dream that he keeps seeing. That dream contained memories of his past life and there, Nanase was a knight who faithfully served his precious master. Nanase doubts whether those memories are real, but one day, Leo—his master—transfers into his class as Reo. Reo also has memories of his past life and is simply happy to reunite with Nanase. However, he forgot the most important thing. To Nanase, he is the last person he wants to see—
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Nojiro Guri

title: Hungry Heart
alt_title: Hungry Heart - Wild Striker, ハングリーハート
description: Kyosuke Kano has lived under the shadow of his successful brother Seisuke all his life who is a professional soccer player. Tired of being compared and downgraded at, he abandoned playing soccer until a boy from his new high school discovered him and asked him to join their team. Kyosuke joins it and befriends two other first year players named Rodrigo and Sakai with the dream of becoming professional soccer players themselves.
genre: Thriller, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Takahashi Yoichi

title: Fuwari! Don patch
alt_title: ふわり! どんぱっち, Gently! Don Patch
description:
A slice of life series taking place in an alternate universe from the main Bobobo series, focusing on Beauty's everyday with... Donpatch!? 

A parody of moe series.
genre: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Sawai Yoshio

title: Kampfgruppe Zbv
alt_title: カンプグルッペZbv, カンプグルッペ ZBV
description: In the German army during their battle with the Soviets, there was a combat unit (the Kampfgruppe ZVB) that fulfilled their duty and their obligations over and over again.
genre: Thriller, Historical, Action, Military, Tragedy
author: Kobayashi Motofumi

title: The Witch and the Mercenary
alt_title: 魔女と傭兵, Majo to Youhei, WITCH AND MERCENARY, Ведьма и наёмник
description: Zig—a tall, broad-shouldered mercenary—participates in a witch hunt. Following a fierce duel with the deadly witch, he becomes privy to her desire. “I want you to protect me,” she requests, tired of having her life trivialized. Seeking a place to survive, the witch and the mercenary set their sights on an unknown continent!
genre: Monsters, Action, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Chouhoukiteki Kaeru

title: Hidden Love: Can't Be Concealed
alt_title: Secretly, Secretly; But Unable to Hide It, Hidden Love, 偷偷藏不住, My Secret Crush
description: That year, someone secretly wormed their way into Sang Zhi's heart and she fell in love with her brother's friend Duan Jiaxu. That older brother has beautiful peachy eyes and casually calls her a "kid". That spark of surprise when they first met made Sang Zhi want to slowly get closer to him, but the 7-year age difference felt like an insurmountable gap that she couldn't cross over. Not knowing when it started, the crush buried at the bottom of her heart sprouted, and slowly, it spread into his heart too...
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Guo Xiao (郭晓)

title: Detective Conan - Ame wa Furanaide Kure (Doujinshi)
alt_title: Detective Conan - Please Don't Rain (Doujinshi), 名探偵コナン - 雨は降らないでくれ (Doujinshi)
description: Detective Conan DJ (Pairing for KenjixJinpei)
genre: Oneshot, Boys' Love, Doujinshi
author: Shikiya (しきや)

title: Justice for the Villainess
alt_title: Where Is Justice for the Villainess?, Where the Villain's Loyalty Lies, Why Would a Villainess Have Virtue?, 악녀에게 의리가 어디 있어, Why Would a Villainess Have Virtue, 悪女に義理などありません
description:
Charlotte had dedicated everything to the Emperor in the past... However, what she got in return was stone-cold betrayal and freezing loneliness.

But, while she had been awaiting her death after being confined in prison, a questionable man appeared in front of her!

"Could you help me murder the emperor?"

Charlotte, who had danced with a sword for the Emperor, meets Ruslan and is reborn as 'Juju.' Now, her sword is directed at the Emperor. And the two who had met as comrades start bearing feelings that go beyond just that...

A romance that blooms in a revenge story that's extravagant and strategic!

The story of the strong-willed and charismatic villainess, Charlotte!

"Why would a villainess have virtue?"

---
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romantic-fantasy/no-loyalty-villainess/list?title_no=3707)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/81743)
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: CHEON Ee-eol (천의얼)

title: Kimagure Orange Road (Official Colored)
alt_title: Kimagure Orange Road - Digital Colored Comics, Johnny y sus Amigos, Kimagure Orange Road, KOR, Orange Road, きまぐれオレンジ★ロード, きまぐれオレンジ☆ロード, きまぐれオレンジロード, きまぐれオレンジ★ロード カラー版, Kimagure Orange Road (Colored)
description: KOR is the story of the Kasuga family, but mostly the oldest son, Kyosuke (who narrates), as they move to a new town after being found out to be a family of ESPers. Kyosuke meets a pretty young girl as he counts the "100 steps" (there may only be 99) that lead to his new school and is immediately smitten. However, the pretty young girl, named Ayukawa Madoka has agreed to help her best friend Hiyama Hikaru win Kyosuke. Thus, a love triangle is born.
genre: Official Colored, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Matsumoto Izumi

title: V-idol-live!
alt_title: Vドライブ!, V도라이브!
genre: Sci-Fi, Virtual Reality, 4-Koma, Slice of Life, Music
author: Nekonyan

title: Sushi-ya VS Ojousama
alt_title: 寿司屋VSお嬢様, Sushi Chef vs. Lass
genre: Comedy, Doujinshi, Cooking
author: Mizu Asato

title: Tokedase! Mizore-chan
alt_title: Melt Away! Mizore-chan, Растай, Мидзорэ-тян!, とけだせ! みぞれちゃん, 녹아내려라! 미조레 쨩
description: Follow the antics of a snowman turned Yuki-Onna hellbent on destroying the sun with the help of a child named Himari and her Aunt Koharu.
genre: Comedy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Tabi Hanao

title: The God of High School
alt_title: God of High school, GoH, The God of Highschool, Бог Старшей Школы, Царь горы, 高校之神, 갓 오브 하이스쿨, Кат Обы Хаи Сыкхуль, ゴッド・オブ・ハイスクール
description:
While an island half-disappearing from the face of the earth, a mysterious organization is sending out invitations for a tournament to every skilled fighter in the world. If you win you can have ANYTHING you want.  
They're recruiting only the best to fight the best and claim the title of The God of High School!
genre: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: PARK Yong-je

title: Ichigo-chan on Sundays
alt_title: 日曜日のいちごちゃん, A First-Year High School Boy Whose Hobby Is Cross-Dressing, Strawberrylike Moment on Sundays.
description:
An ordinary high school boy, Yamano Itta, indulges his cross-dressing hobby by transforming himself into a beautiful girl named "Ichigo" once a week! One day, "Ichigo" ran into Kisaragi, a popular boy at school, and their sweet-and-sour romance will begin......!

Note: Originally self-published on Twitter as "女装が趣味の高1男子" (Josou ga Shumi no Kou 1 Danshi, Crossdressing High School Freshman), the first chapters were collected for commercial publication by Comic Pool on 2022-05-20 with the new name.
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, Crossdressing, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Chichikaka Ike

title: Ochikobore Kenja wa UR Skill Keishousha de Nariagaru
alt_title: 落ちこぼれ賢者はURスキル継承者で成り上がる, The Fallen Sage Rises to Power with the UR Inheritor Skill
description:
In a world where dungeons connected to another world have appeared, people who awaken to mysterious powers and defeat monsters for a living are called adventurers. 

Yuto Kirishima draws the jackpot job of Sage, but for some reason, his magic power is zero! He is looked down upon as the weakest Sage who can't attack. Ultimately, he is abandoned by his companions and used as a sacrifice. Just then, a mysterious choice appears before him. 

"Do you want to perform this action?"

When he answers, his abilities awaken and the UR skill [Inheritor] activates. This skill allows him to use the techniques of past sages! 

With the strongest skill in hand, the story of his struggle to rise as the strongest adventurer begins!
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Magic, Fantasy
author: Arato Ara

alt_title: 또 다른 길, Tto dareun gil, 2023 루키 단편선

title: Black Lagoon: Sawyer the Cleaner - Dismemberment! Gore Gore Girl
alt_title: BLACK LAGOON 掃除屋ソーヤー 解体！ゴアゴア娘, Черная лагуна: Расчленяющая уборщица Сойер! Окровавленная девушка
description: Sawyer is a cleaner who takes on the task of disposing of unwanted people in Roanapur, a city of vice where the mafia and other scoundrels thrive. Her daily life is depicted in a funny, sometimes horror-filled, sometimes action-packed, and even fantastical way as she goes about her work with her beloved chainsaw in hand. Her good friends and fellow freelancers Shenhua and Lotton, as well as familiar characters from the main story, such as Revy and Rock, also make appearances!

description: Sawyer is a cleaner who takes on the task of disposing of unwanted people in Roanapur, a city of vice where the mafia and other scoundrels thrive. Her daily life is depicted in a funny, sometimes horror-filled, sometimes action-packed, and even fantastical way as she goes about her work with her beloved chainsaw in hand. Her good friends and fellow freelancers Shenhua and Lotton, as well as familiar characters from the main story, such as Revy and Rock, also make appearances!
genre: Action, Comedy, Crime, Mafia, Military, Gore, Police
author: Hiroe Rei

title: Isekai Tensei Shitemo Shounen Manga no Shujinkou wa 1-milli mo Burenai
alt_title: 異世界転生しても少年マンガの主人公は1ミリもブレない!!!
genre: Action, Isekai, Fantasy, Delinquents
author: Umezawa Haruto

title: Leveling Murder
alt_title: レベリング・マーダー
description:
One day, Onitsuka Yamato, an office worker, kills another man who attacked him. When he took that man's life, a sound effect rang in his head informing him of his own strengthening and the acquisition of a spell. 

He had become a "murdelizer", a being whose level goes up when he kills someone. 

Yamato resolves to survive - even if it means killing people, kill someone within a week or else he will die.
genre: Action, Crime, Gore, Supernatural, Mystery
author: sudekuma

title: Spice & Wolf: Merchants Meet City Life (Doujinshi)
alt_title: 狼と香辛料: 商人と都市生活の出会い, Spice and Wolf: Merchants Meet City Life (Doujinshi)
description:
Kraft Lawrence, a 25-year-old traveling merchant, who meets Holo, a female wolf deity of wheat. Holo is known for blessing the harvest, but as humans have become more self-reliant and learned better farming methods, she has become a folktale. Lawrence and Holo travel together, with Holo helping Lawrence as a business partner in exchange for him taking her back to her home of Yuetsu. (Google AI)

In between Books 5 and 6 (LN). Holo and Lawrence are transported to the modern world, after receiving guidance from God himself, they make their way to their apartment. While walking there, Holo wanders where Col is, Lawrence, taking advantage of the situation, playfully teases Holo about her concern for Col.
genre: Time Travel, Comedy, Self-Published, Isekai, Doujinshi, Slice of Life
author: Khrono_03

title: Trapped in a Cursed Game as an NPC
alt_title: 망겜 속에 갇혔다 근데 이제 NPC를 곁들인, Trapped in a Cursed Game, but Now With NPCs
description:
I'm going to live a normal life!

...said Shari Azriel, the apothecary of the Dover village.

Then one day, I realised that I possessed an NPC in a video game! I've been locked up here for two years, and I only just noticed.

If I can't get out of the game...
"A, in their 20's, was found starved to death while playing VR games."
This could be what I'm remembered as!

"I have to get out!"

However, it was too late when I came to the realisation that... I can't log out because of an error!

That means, the only way out would be approaching the male lead, "the Lord of Nightmares," and helping his comrades defeat the final villain. So I have no choice but to wait until the game ends...

The difficulty level, the story, the likelihood of failure in such a heinous game, a game that nobody won before...

"The Lord of Nightmares has a strong urge to kill you."

Somehow, I believe that dying by the male lead's hands would be faster.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Magical Girls, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Gwon Gyeoeul (권겨을)

title: Hajime no Ippo - The First Step
alt_title: Fighting Spirit, Первый шаг!, はじめの一歩, 第一神拳, 더 파이팅
description:
Makunouchi Ippo is an ordinary high school student in Japan. Since he spends most of his time away from school helping his mother run the family business, he doesn't get to enjoy his younger years like most teenagers. Always a target for bullying at school, Ippo's life is one of hardship. One of these after-school bullying sessions turns Ippo's life around for the better, as he is saved by a boxer named Takamura. He decides to follow in Takamura's footsteps and train to become a boxer, giving his life direction and purpose. Ippo's path to perfecting his pugilistic prowess is just beginning.

Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics as **Fight!! Ippo** (2006-ongoing)
genre: Action, Psychological, Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Morikawa George

title: In the Land of Leadale
alt_title: リアデイルの大地にて
description:
The last thing she can remember is her life support beginning to fail. Her body had suffered terribly after a fateful accident and the only freedom left in her life came from the VR world of Leadale. Now she finds herself in a country very similar to Leadale and 200 years have passed.  


---

title: Joshi BL (Anthology)
alt_title: 女子BL
description:
1) Shoujo C 「少女C」 by Hideyoshico  
(From Must Be Endless) I’m nothing special, but Koizumi-kun is a very special guy whose looks and personality are seriously those of an angel. He’s our idol. This popular pair was introduced in "High School ☆ Lullaby" (Gesu BL).  
  
2) Tamaisan, Koi to Yuujou「玉井さん、恋と友情」 by SHIMURA Takako  
Sequel to Okite Saisho ni Suru Koto wa  
  
3) Donyoku no Hana 「貪欲な花」 by NISHIDA Higashi  
(From Must Be Endless) Greedy Flower: My precious, beloved children… When two shady salesmen come knocking on her door, what’s reflected in old lady Tanaka-san's eyes is… Thinking her life is almost over, the feelings of another time are resurrected in Tanaka-san's heart.  
  
4) Kami no Doutokuron Teki Shoumei 「神の道徳論的証明」 by FUMI Fumiko  
Later included in Josou Danshi to Menhera Oji-san  
  
5) Watashitachi wa Byplayer 「わたしたちはバイプレーヤー」 by Harada  
(From Must Be Endless) We’re Supporting Actors: There are love stories that you can’t say how they got so complicated. A three-way struggle with an ultra-popular woman, an ultra-popular man, and a guy with a plain face. The martial arts of love! (also included in Nega)  
  
6) Haihai, Kawaiine 「はいはい、かわいいね」 by KOBATO Mebaru  
Tomo is disgruntled over her trouble in landing a boyfriend, and comes to complain at her brother's gay bar where she meets the standoffish Yuragu.  
  
7) Natura-turaly 「ナチュラチュラリィ」 by ICHIKAWA Kei  
(from Must Be Endless) We thought the world would forever continue with just the two of us. Twins Aki and Kana are always together. Then something steps between them…  
  
8) Stockholm 「ストックホルム」 by ITOI Nozo  
She's been kidnapped by two strange men, but she knows what they're doing in the next room…  
  
9) Taneda-kun to Tsukiai tai「種田くんと付き合いたい」 by Tamekou  
  
10) Oribonchan to Otokonoko 「おりぼんちゃんと男の子」 by Blue Chome
genre: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Anthology, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life
author: Nishida Higashi

title: Seishun no After
alt_title: After Youth, 青春のアフター, 青春过后, After the Memories
description: Makoto Toba hates everyone in his class. Everyone except Sakura Toowa, an introverted high school girl who lives with her grandma and loves video games. But one day, Sakura disappears right in front of Makoto. Makoto continues to visit the site of her disappearance on the anniversary for the next 16 years. That is, until Sakura comes back from the time slip she was stuck in, and to her not a moment has passed. Now at 32 with a girlfriend, Makoto has to take care of his 16-year-old childhood crush. What could possibly go wrong?
genre: Time Travel, Psychological, Romance, Video Games, Drama, Supernatural
author: Midori no Ruupe

title: Counter Cube
alt_title: 공유몽, Lucid Dream, Shared Dream, Dream-Sharing, Борьба в кубе, 共享梦境, 夢境大逃殺, シェアード・ドリーム～共有されし夢～
description:
What if there exists another world beyond lucid dreaming? That is where those who have been stolen of their dreams gather. Do Shi-Eon, who escapes reality by lucid dreaming, loses his dream and falls into the space of 'Shared Dream.' Now he must fight to reclaim his dream.
