title: Me & the Devil Blues
alt_title: Я и Дьявольский Блюз, 俺と悪魔のブルーズ
description:
Legend has it that if you take your guitar and stand at a crossroads at the witching hour, the devil will appear. 
He'll grab your instrument, play a song, and hand it back to you. 
You'll walk away an expert bluesman, but you'll have to pay the price: your immortal soul.
genre: Historical, Demons, Psychological, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Adventure, Drama, Horror, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Music, Tragedy
author: Hiramoto Akira

title: Ore no Dankon ♡ Sacrifice
alt_title: 俺の男魂♡サクリファイス, Sacrifice of My Manly Soul ♡
description:
In order to lose my family's debt (4 billion), I decided to go to a girls' school by dressing as a woman, as per the order of "a pervert who loves romantic comedy and has too much power". School life is full of confusion, but fortunately, in the midst of misfortune, all the members of the student council are "men" who go to girls' schools in the same circumstances. Can you win a peaceful school life despite the perverted old man who wants romantic comedy troubles?

(source: mangaupdates)
genre: Psychological, Crossdressing, School Life
author: Hasabe Soutsu

title: Yuri!!! on Ice - Love x Ree x Baby (Doujinshi)
alt_title: ユーリ!!! on ICE - Love×Ree×Baby (Doujinshi)
description: Pairing : Katsuki Yuuri x Victor Nikiforov
genre: Oneshot, Boys' Love, Doujinshi
author: K2Company (Kodaka Kazuma)

title: Castle 2: Pinnacle
description:
Kim Shin, a special killer who gathered men from all over the country and made the Organization 'Baek-Yi' to destroy the absolute power 'Castle' of the underworld.

Through a negotiation he got inside the Castle and started working with the enemy... Will Kim Shin be able to take down the Castle and complete his revenge as he hoped.
genre: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Crime, Martial Arts, Mafia, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Jeong Yeon (정연)

title: Dosanko Gal wa Namaramenkoi
alt_title: 道産子ギャルはなまらめんこい, Досанко-гяру чудо как милы, 도산코 갸루는 참말로 귀여워, Hokkaido Gals are Super Adorable!
description: Shiki Tsubasa has just moved from Tokyo to Hokkaido in the middle of winter. Not quite appreciating how far apart towns are in the country, he gets off the taxi at the next town over from his destination so he can see the sights around his home, but he is shocked when he learns the "next town" is a 3-hour walk away. However, he also meets a cute Dosanko (born and raised in Hokkaido) gyaru named Fuyuki Minami who is braving 8 degrees celcius below 0 weather in the standard gyaru outfit of short skirts and bare legs!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Ikada Kai

title: Machi and Oboro
alt_title: おぼろとまち
description: From Miyagi to the bustling life of a Tokyo high school, Machi Nishina wanted anything but the ordinary. Her wish is granted in the most unexpected way when she encounters Oboro Kasumi, a classmate harboring a secret, who ends up following her home...?! A new era of friendship and youthful comedy unfolds!
genre: Ninja, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic
author: Ishito Yuura

title: Fight Class 3
alt_title: Gyeoggi 3 Ban, Gyeok Gi 3 Ban, 격기3반
description:
A world in which Korea is the global capital of combat sports. At Nam-Il High School where the best and most talented students of martial arts reside, Jiu Ji-Tae suddenly finds himself thrust into their midst despite being a total weakling.  
  
By neutralizing his physical shortcomings through jiu-jitsu, can he rise to the top of the fight classes?  


---
genre: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Tragedy
author: 2hakkk

title: Kirby of the Stars: Pupupu Hero
alt_title: 星のカービィ プププヒーロー
description:
Kirby, the gourmand who will suck up anything, has come to the peaceful land of Pupupu!
"Pleased to eat you! I'm Kirby!"

The slapstick and lively days are about to begin, involving Chilly, who has come to live with Kirby!
genre: Comedy, Video Games, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Mikamaru

title: Kaji Ryuusuke's Agenda
alt_title: 加治隆介の議
description:
Kaji Ryusuke is a second son of a great politician. However, his father and brother both pass away from a car accident. Now, those who supported Ryusuke's father want Ryusuke to carry on the family business as a politician. At first, Ryusuke tries to get out of the responsibility, but he eventually enters an election to become a politician.  
The manga chronicles Ryusuke's rise in the world of Japanese politics.
genre: Drama, Slice of Life
author: Hirokane Kenshi

title: Yoru no Namae o Yonde
alt_title: 夜の名前を呼んで, Call the Name of the Night
description: Deep in the forest, a curious pair resides: a young girl Mira, whose affliction leads her to call forth darkness whenever she's in distress, and her physician Rei, determined to seek a cure. Each day, she works to remember the light and bring back the person she used to be. But a sudden visit from Rei's friend, who harbors an interest in Mira's illness, may be the end of their peaceful days…
genre: Medical, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Mitsuboshi Tama

title: Let Me Suck It
alt_title: Let Me Suck In, 렛미석인
description: Vampires, the closest beings to demi-gods, are living in harmony with human civilization. Edward (nickname: Eddie), a vampire with weak supernatural powers, approaches Joshua, a nerdy and easy-looking prey. Eddie’s expectations are sky-high as he watches Joshua obediently follow after him, but there seems to be a misunderstanding about Eddie sucking WHAT?!
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Fantasy, Vampires, Full Color
author: Fresa Pie (파이)

title: In Another World With My Smartphone
alt_title: В другом мире со смартфоном, 带著智慧型手机闯荡异世界, 异世界和智能手机在一起, 異世界はスマートフォンとともに。, 이세계는 스마트폰과 함께, Исэкай ва сума:тофон то томо ни, 帶著智慧型手機闖蕩異世界。, 攜手機漂異世 (Classical Chinese)
description: After a freak accident involving some lightning winds up zapping him dead, 15-year-old Mochizuki Touya wakes up to find himself face-to-face with God. "I am afraid to say that I have made a bit of a blunder" laments the old coot. But all is not lost! God says that he can reincarnate Touya into a world of fantasy, and as a bonus, he gets to bring his smartphone along with! So begins Touya's adventure in a new, anachronistic pseudo-medieval world. Friends! Laughs! Tears! Inexplicable Deus ex Machina! He sets off on a journey full of wonder as he absentmindedly travels from place to place, following whatever goal catches his fancy. The curtains lift on an epic tale of swords, sorcery, and smartphone apps!
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Mecha, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Patora Fuyuhara

title: Boss in School
alt_title: 보스 인 스쿨, 極道高校生
description:
Seth Kwon was a born fighter. But due to his promise with his mother, he decides to stop fighting, even in self-defense… Everything changes when his father dies and leaves him with a single message: “stop getting your ass kicked”.

(Source: Toomics)

---

title: Solte the Traveler
alt_title: Solte of the Far Reaches, World End Solte, 最果てのソルテ, 终末的索鲁特
description: Though magic has been forbidden for many long years, the effects of spells woven in bygone wars still remain in pockets of corruption blighting the world today. To uncover the secrets in the hidden reaches of this world and become the wise-woman of her dreams, "Lucky" Solte sets out for adventure!
genre: Magical Girls, Adventure, Fantasy
author: Mizukami Satoshi

title: Drawing: Saikyou Mangaka wa Oekaki Skill de Isekai Musou Suru!
alt_title: ドローイング 最強漫画家はお絵かきスキルで異世界無双する！, Drawing: The Greatest Mangaka Becomes a Skilled “Martial Artist” in Another World, 作畫 最強漫畫家利用繪畫技能在異世界開無雙！
description:
Akira Kamishiro was a very successful manga author, who was diagnosed with blood cancer one day. He regretted the way he lived, where he could only build up empty relationships. Angry at his mother for asking him to send her some money, he died in a car accident. He was given a chance to choose his new mother and reincarnate in another world.

Akira, not wanting to have a repeat of his past life, decided to choose an ordinary but safe life.. He was reincarnated as Akira, the only son of a magic store, with his previous life's memories. He had no talent for swordsmanship or magic, but he didn’t care as he was still loved by his family. At one point, he realized that he can embody various things by "drawing a picture". That's when he noticed his cheat ability...!?
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy
author: Im Dal-Young

title: Welcome to the Ballroom
alt_title: 舞動青春, Добро пожаловать в танцевальный зал, ボールルームへようこそ
description:
An ordinary middle school student, Fujita Tatara couldn't find any objective in life and spent his days idly.   
One day, a group of delinquents picks a fight with him and he is saved by a mysterious man.  
After that, the man surprisingly takes him to a ballroom dancing class. While being inspired by a girl dancer who goes to that school, Hanaoka Shizuku, and her partner, a genius dancer, Hyoudou Kiyoharu, Tatara starts dedicating his youth to dancesport.  
  
Note: 6th and 8th Manga Taisho Award nominee.  
  
Link:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18982)
genre: Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Takeuchi Tomo

title: Nejimaki Kagyu
alt_title: ねじまきカギュー, 螺旋卷钩生, 네지마키 카규, 螺旋捲鉤生
description:
Negizawa Kamo and Kagyuu Jyuubee; two childhood friends who made a fated promise to each other are once again reunited as Kagyuu reaffirms her dedication to defending Kamo's dream, and her own, with the monstrous power of her martial arts. However, they soon discover that force alone is not enough, it's character, individuality, that rules this school and pits the students against each other in a brutal contest of dueling personalities vying for supremacy. Because in this school, those with the superior strength, the superior character, are king, and those whose individualities are overwhelmed are discarded. Join Kagyuu, Kamo, and their companions as they struggle to overcome the hidden evils lurking within this school, and discover the voice of each other's hearts and true desires.  
  
Do not edit genre to Shounen, series serialized in a seinen magazine (Weekly Young Jump)

genre: Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Harem, Drama, School Life, Horror
author: Nakayama Atsushi

title: Oshinobi Dousei
alt_title: お忍び同棲, Тайное сожительство, Living With a Kunoichi
description: Tae, a beautiful 17-year-old girl, and Kotaro, a serious office worker. These two seemingly happy people have a secret they can't reveal to anyone - the rival ninjas of Iga and Kouga secretly live together in this laid-back romantic comedy!
genre: Demons, Romance, Ninja, Comedy, Web Comic
author: Ponto Gotanda

title: Slow Loop
alt_title: Медленная петля, スローループ, 슬로우 루프, 슬로우루프
description:
When Hiyori - a young girl whose deceased father taught her the joys of fishing - headed out to sea for some alone time, she never thought that she would encounter another girl there.  
After a while, this girl - named Koharu - and her end up fishing and cooking together, and they get to know each other a bit in the meantime. During their brief time together Koharu finds out that the reason that Hiyori went out to sea that day was because she's hesitant towards meeting her new stepfamily that same evening. But what a coincidence! Koharu is also meeting her new family tonight! "No. It can't be a coincidence…" Follow these two 'sisters' and their new life together!  


---
genre: Animals, Sports, School Life, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Uchino Maiko

title: The Lord Has Hidden Intentions
alt_title: 君心不良
description: I treated you like a brother, but you treated me like a love rival! You stole every girlfriend I ever had! I just wanted to get married and have a baby, why is that so difficult?! A black-hearted white lotus vs. straight guy. A wild omegaverse fantasy,  that's both sweet and seductive~~
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Isekai, Fantasy, Full Color
author: 简简单

title: Mutou Black
alt_title: 無刀ブラック
description:
Wandering traveler Kurotsuki Yukiji goes from town to town enjoying the women, food, and culture each has to offer. He is the master of the Kurotsuki style martial art where instead of using brute force, it uses the aiki form where you use the opponent’s strength and manipulate their force against them. It focuses on settling the conflict without hurting both sides and harnessing the “bladeless soul.” Yukiji is traveling to perfect this style and trouble usually finds him although going by his outward appearance, he looks like a peace-seeking man.   
  
The oneshot was released in issue 20/2012 of Weekly Shounen Jump.  
The serialization for this series begins from issue 24/2013 of Weekly Shounen Jump.
genre: Historical, Action, Martial Arts
author: Nonoue Daijirou

title: The Monstrous Duke's Adopted Daughter
alt_title: 괴물 공작가의 계약 공녀, Gwemul Gongjagga'eui Gyeyag Gongnyeo, Goemul Gongjagui Gyeyang Gongnyeo, The Monster Duchess and the Contract Princess, The Monster Duchess and the Contract Lady, The Monster Duchess and Contract Princess, 魔女的逆袭 Witch's Counterattack, 魔女的逆袭, Witch's Counterattack, 魔女的逆襲, Княгиня чудовищ и принцесса по контракту, 怪物公爵と契約公女
description:
Leslie’s life as the youngest daughter of the Sperado noble family was always used for the betterment of her sister, Eli, who is betrothed to the Crown Prince of the kingdom. After a failed attempt to extract the black magic within Leslie by sacrificing her to transfer it to Eli, Leslie knocks on the door of the monster Duchess Salvatore and, battered, bruised and desperate, pleads for the Duchess to adopt her?!

---

The Speràdo family line possesses a secret: shadow magic. But it's been 100 years since someone last wielded it. When Marquis Speràdo tries to sacrifice Leslie for her favored sister Ellie, little does he know that this awakens the power of darkness in her instead. To escape her family's greed and abuse, Leslie's out to make a deal with the Monstrous Duke: adopt her, and her powers will be at the duke's disposal. Will Leslie escape her parents' cruel grip, or succumb to their evil exploits?

---

**Note:** Chapter 130 is marked by the author as the end of the main story, and Chapters 131 to 150 is listed as an epilogue and flashback-origin story for Duchess Salvatore and her family.

title: The Snow Queen
alt_title: 눈의 여왕, Queen of Snow, The Snow Queen (Gongma), 눈의 여왕 (아마긴)
description:
In a not-too-distant future, there lies a royal city where a tyranny of nobles, greedy for power and self-interest, prevails, using the weakened royal authority as an excuse. Among them, Ray Arisa lives in a shabby bookstore in a corner of a brothel alley, where the lowest class of people resides. He would have been able to take care of himself, but a terrible illness has been following him, and poverty has been his only family for a long time. The only painkiller that spares Ray from the pain is finding a partner at a gay bar for a one-night stand, engaging in sexual pleasure.
One day, after engaging with two large men who were interested in him at the same time, one of them started to infiltrate Ray’s life little by little. Contrary to his straight appearance, a man with promiscuous sex habits approached Ray without hesitation and did him a favor for no known reason. After being sweet-talked by a man who has everything suspicious about him, Ray ended up continuing the relationship with him despite knowing that the man is like a sugar coated poison.
genre: Long Strip, Boys' Love, Sexual Violence, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

alt_title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Official Card Game Structures, 遊☆戯☆王 OCGストラクチャーズ, 遊☆戯☆王 オフィシャルカードゲーム ストラクチャーズ, 遊戯王 OCGストラクチャーズ, 遊戯王 オフィシャルカードゲーム ストラクチャーズ
description:
Shoma Yusa, a new kid who moved to Tokyo with his sister, learns how to make friends through Dueling and creating Structure Decks.  
  
*This series is based on the real life Yu-Gi-Oh! OCG (Official Card Game, known in the west as TCG) and how to build the best deck, based on the latest rule- and banlist.*

title: A Dance of Swords in the Night
alt_title: 칼에 취한 밤을 걷다, Kare Chwihan Bameul Geotda, In the Night Consumed by Blades, I Walk, Sword Fanatic Wanders Through the Night, 醉剑夜行, 刀に酔った夜を歩く, Camino en la Noche Consumido por las Espadas
description:
The Mystic Lunar Dance Troupe took in Jin Sohan as an orphan, and he spent his childhood with them. But one day, one of the four great demons, the Venom Demon, discovered that he was special and kidnapped him. After all kinds of tests, he decided to raise him as his disciple. Ten years later, Jin Sohan tried to look for traces of the Mystic Lunar Dance Troupe, but the Sword Dance Troupe had already been destroyed at the hands of the Unorthodox Faction that’s now ruling over his hometown.

---
Kidnapped as a child to be trained in the art of poison, Sohan Jin returns to his hometown in search of the group of New Moon Sword Dancers who raised him. However, upon his return, Sohan discovers the sword dancers have been defeated by a nefarious sect that now rules the area, with some members having been abducted. What would have been a heartwarming reunion transforms into a quest for revenge as Sohan begins his search for the remaining sword dancers, and he’s willing to poison anyone who gets in his way.

---

alt_title: Please Marry Me With Divorce in Mind, 結婚しよう。離婚前提で。
description:
After turning 30 as a NEET, Kyosuke was kicked out of his parents' house. 
That's when Rui, his closest friend, proposes a solution: to get married, then divorce!


A guy and girl who've been 'just friends' for around a decade decide to enter a pretend marriage.
He's a romantic and she's just a pragmatic girl.  A pair unsuited for marriage.
What will they discover after 100 days together?

title: Marriage of Convenience
alt_title: 결혼 장사, 결혼장사, Gyeolhon Jangsa, The Wedding Business, A Marriage of Convenience, Брачный бизнес, 結婚商売, 错把结婚当交易，却意外的甜蜜？, 婚姻买卖, 婚姻這門生意, 婚姻買賣, 婚姻交易
description:
Bianca de Arno was a ruthless countess in the Kingdom of Sevran, infamous for being a wicked and selfish wife. While her husband, Count Zachary de Arno, bravely risked his life out on the battlefield, she sat at home and spent his money. It wasn’t until her final day that Bianca realized the error of her ways. Before she died, Bianca prayed for a second chance, swearing she would do better, and woke up in her 19-year-old body. With her second chance, Bianca starts to see everything in a new light... starting with her husband.

---
Bianca de Blanchefort. The wife of Zachary de Arno, thrown out of Arno family after his death due to her self-indulgent, frivolous, and immoral behavior. She had nowhere to go, the Blanchefort family having already fallen to ruin, and was more or less kicked to a convent out in the border. A woman who ultimately met her end on a cold stone floor. A villainess with no honor: that was Bianca’s life before she went back in time.

===
“Is this truly reality? Did I really travel back to the past?”

This was neither a dream nor a hallucination. This feeling of hunger, fatigue, the vivid sense of everything around her… This was all real. If this was indeed reality… If God truly gave her one more precious chance…!

‘I’m going to carry out a business. A marriage is a business in the end. Zachary’s child will be the perfect source of financial support. I’m sure my dowry will remain safe too. I won’t have to lose the Blanchefort or Arno territories to that damned viscount either.’

Then whether it be through seduction or persuasion, she needed to give birth to her husband, Zachary’s child.

“How much was my dowry exactly?”

“400 calves, 900 pigs, 100 units of silverware, 300 rolls of silk, 2 crates of jewels, and a portion of a territory… Equivalent to a two-year budget for the Arno county.”

“Don’t you think you should compensate for that?”

---

title: Asumi-chan is Interested in Lesbian Brothels!
alt_title: 彩純ちゃんはレズ風俗に興味があります！, 彩纯对蕾丝风俗大有兴趣！, 彩純對蕾絲風俗大有興趣！, 아스미는 레즈비언 업소에 흥미가 있습니다!, ¡Asumi-chan está interesada en burdeles de lesbianas!
description: Sweet but awkward college student Asumi never got over her childhood crush on her old friend Mai. Their first and only kiss couldn’t have gone worse. So when she learns that Mai may be working at a nearby brothel, she sets her sights on redemption! But there’s one catch: none of the women on the brothel’s website use full photos or real names. Thus begins a journey of self-discovery and sexual exploration as she sets out to find her one that got away.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Harem
author: Itsuki Kuro

title: Wind Breaker
alt_title: Windbreaker, Wind Breaker (Nii Satoru), Ветролом, ウィンドブレイカー
description: Haruka Sakura wants nothing to do with weaklings—he's only interested in the strongest of the strong. He's just started at Furin High School, a school of degenerates known only for their brawling strength—strength they use to protect their town from anyone who wishes it ill. But Haruka's not interested in being a hero or being part of any sort of team—he just wants to fight his way to the top!
genre: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Nii Satoru

title: Skill Ga Nakereba Level wo Ageru ~99 Ga Kansuto No Sekai De Level 800 Man Kara Sutato~
alt_title: If You Don't Have the Skills, You'll Have to Level Up: Start at Level 8 Million in a World Where 99 is MAX, スキルがなければレベルを上げる～９９がカンストの世界でレベル800万からスタート～
description: The main character "Ryuya"  is told that he has no skills and is abandoned by his friends. The only way for him to compete with those possessing skills is to raise his level. After five years of training in the forest, he has raised his level to 8 million. Due to his excessively high level, he is beyond the reach of skilled humans, demons, or even gods. This is a story of a simple hero who feels guilty for not having skills, and how he helps others.
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Drama, Fantasy
author: Okazawa Rokujuuyon

title: No Office Romance!
alt_title: 사내연애 사절!, No Dating Allowed in the Office, I Refuse to Have a Love Affair!, Sanae Yeonae Sajeol!
description:
Is first love a big deal? If we met that first love as adults, would we really still feel the butterflies? With a first love who is a friend who is also a co-worker, beyond this reversely developed relationship is the true belief of "No to Office Romance!"

Namsoo of <Romance 101> meets Dooboo of <One-of-a-Kind Romance>! Masters of romance fusing up to deliver this romantic comedy!
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers
author: DooBoo (두부)

title: 3000-Nen Fuuin Sareta Maou no Kikan ~Saikyou no Tenseisha wa Sekai Seifuku wo Mezasu~
alt_title: 3000年封印された魔王の帰還～最強の転生者は世界征服を目指す～, The Demon Lord who Returned after 3000 Years: The Strongest Reincarnator Aims for World Domination
description:
"Humanity is nothing but a nuisance to us demons."

A boy who was once bullied was reincarnated into another world as the Demon Lord Noct, aiming for world domination. However, just before reaching this goal, he and his army generals were sealed away through a cunning scheme. Then, 3000 years later, Noct finally succeeds in breaking the seal.

When had finally freed himself, he found a world in which monsters attack humans and where those same humans oppress the demons. Shocked by the current state of the world, Noct, along with his fellow Demon Lord Army comrades, once again begins to move to achieve world domination.

To this end, he first rescue demons who are about to be sacrificed and then they seek revenge against humanity.

"Kneel before me, world. My servants, march."

The world conquest of the strongest Demon Lord is about to begin!
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Full Color
author: Mikado Tetsurou

title: Watashi no Ue ni Ukabu "Akuyaki Reijou (Hametsu suru)" tte Nandeshou ka?
alt_title: 私の上に浮かぶ『悪役令嬢(破滅する)』ってなんでしょうか？, What does "Villainess (Doomed)" floating above my head mean?
description:
While attempting to do good deeds, she seemed to have entered the prince's doting route!

Louise, the count's daughter, for some unknown reason, can see letters above people's heads. Written above her own head are the words, "Villainess (doomed)." To change that, Louise aims to be a good-natured noblewoman. However, when she is pressed by Sylvile and tells him truthfully that his descriptor reads, "Love interest: Second Prince (Easy)" his interest is piqued and they become betrothed. Furthermore, he offers her a promise, "To make you feel at ease, I'll show you that I can change my descriptor."
genre: Romance, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
author: Hitomaru

title: Seasons of Blossom
alt_title: Cheongchun Blossom, Youth Blossom, 청춘 블라썸
description:
Children who are beginning their youth.  
Their growing pain on their way to spring.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color
author: HongDuck (홍덕)

title: Straight or Not
description: He is a sunny, hilarious, positive and obscure actor. He is a composed generous and graceful general manager. Because of a strange request, they began a long journey of attracting each other. What should they do? Nonsense, of course becoming lovers.
genre: Long Strip, Boys' Love, Office Workers, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Iie Star

title: I Fell Into a Reverse Harem Game!
alt_title: 역하렘 게임 속으로 떨어진 모양입니다, Yeok Harem Game Sogeuro Tteoreojin Moyangimnida, It Looks Like I've Fallen into the World of a Reverse Harem Game, It Seems Like I Fell Into a Reverse Harem Game, 逆ハーレムゲームの中に落ちたようです, 偶然开启女尊游戏, 好像掉进女尊游戏了, 絕色公主的後宮遊戲
description:
Reset, and game set.

When I opened my eyes, I was in a different world. I had become the game's villainous princess who was feared by all. Not to mention… Completely naked men I didn't even know were approaching me left and right!

“Are you cold? Shall I warm you up with a hug?”

“Oh? Have you not had enough yet?”

Seriously, what’s up with this situation? And just how the hell am I going to get out of this freaking game?!

---
I woke up in a strange bed, with not just one, but two lovers beside me! In this game of love, affection, and deception, I’m Elvia, the Imperial Princess, with a gaggle of men vying for my favor. Sounds great, right? Except this means I'm also stuck as the villainess while the main character is my manipulative maid, Arielle! She’s out to bring me down, and she’s got plans for my harem of men. But I know all her secrets, because I can see her player notifications. Can I beat her at her own game?

---

title: Amarimono Isekaijin no Jiyuu Seikatsu: Yuusha ja Nai node Katteni Yarasete Moraimasu
alt_title: 余りモノ異世界人の自由生活～勇者じゃないので勝手にやらせてもらいます～, Free Life of a Leisurely Otherworldly Person: I’m Not a Hero, So I’ll Do Whatever I Want
description: Shinichi Sagara, a black corporate warrior. After overcoming a nightmare of consecutive workdays, he finally got on a bus to return home, but unexpectedly, he got transferred to a different world. A young goddess on her knees, “I’m so sorry! I’m sorry! I am really sorry!!” The story unfolded with a climax. I escaped from the country that treats the otherworlders like company slaves and set out for freedom. I changed my name from Shinichi to Shin and moved to another country to live a slow life. But I had to take care of the stupid prince, hunt and gather, rant at the stupid prince, raise my adventurer rank, listen to the goddess complain, discipline the stupid prince, rant at the stupid prince again, then contribute to society…. So, this is the beginning of my slow life in another world.
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Fujimori Fukuro

title: The Money Kid
alt_title: 銭っ子
description: A little-known classic, brought to you by the mangaka of Dokaben and Abu-san and the creator of Apache Baseball Team, Zenikko is a gritty look at money and capitalism, and one kid’s attempts to game the system in his favour.
genre: Sports, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Hanato Kobako

title: The Poisonous Healer
alt_title: 독 먹는 힐러, Dok Meongneun Healer, Poison-Eating Healer, Sanador Devorador de Venenos
description:
In a world where monster hunters are hailed as heroes, Cheon Haesun has been treated like an outcast because of his abnormal looks. As if that wasn't bad enough, a pack of monsters attacks his neighborhood on the day he discovers he's dying from an unknown illness!

With his sister's sacrifice, Haesun survives and somehow awakens to become a Poisoner, a rare hunter with toxic healing abilities.

But will his poisonous powers cure Haesun's illness and guarantee a normal life he's always dreamed of?
genre: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Park Kyeong-won

title: Lilies, Voice, Wear Wind
alt_title: 百合と声と風纏い
description:
A high school girl who has never known love meets an older woman with a secret...
A junior in high school, Matoi Noshita has never liked anyone and is fed up with being involved in her younger sister's and friends' boyfriend situations.
One day, she meets Yuriko, who has just moved from Tokyo. At a local driving school, she asks her to drive her home on her motorcycle.
Matoi is perplexed by her own curiosity about a woman whose name she does not know and where she lives.
"What on earth is this feeling I am having for the first time...?"
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Renmei

title: Onna dakara, to Party wo Tsuihou Sareta no de Densetsu no Majo to Saikyou Tag wo Kumimashita
alt_title: Sexiled: My Sexist Party Leader Kicked Me Out, So I Teamed Up with a Mythical Sorceress!, 因为是女人，所以被赶出队伍，所以和传说中的魔女组成了最强的搭档, 女だから、とパーティを追放されたので伝説の魔女と最強タッグを組みました
description:
Tanya Artemisiov is a talented Mage-class adventurer who just got kicked out of her party by a sexist scumbag. So what's a girl to do? Go to the wasteland and blow stuff up of course! One small problem though: she inadvertently frees a mythical Sorceress named Laplace who was sealed away for the past 300 years...

Surprise! Turns out this so-called "wicked" Sorceress is actually pretty cool. Laplace wants to start a party of her own, Tanya wants revenge, and the solution is obvious: team up. It's time to kick ass, kiss girls, and dismantle the patriarchy!
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Girls' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Kaeruda Ameko

alt_title: 女騎士とケモミミの子, The Lady Knight and the Beast-Eared Child, Female Knight and the Kemonomimi Child, Female knight and the Kemonomimi child
description: A different world where demons are rampant and murderous. Olivia, a female knight, lives with her apprentice Noah, an animal eared child. A tale of a master and apprentice growing up, adventuring and being healed by the strong bond between each other.

title: Kaminaki Sekai no Onee-chan Katsudou
alt_title: Onee-chan Activities in a Godless World, Деятельность сестрёнки в мире без богов, 神無き世界のおねーちゃん活動, 無神世界中的姐姐活動
description:
The first spin-off of the popular otherworldly manga "Kaminaki Sekai no Kamisama Katsudou" (Kamisama Activities in a Godless World), which will be broadcasted as a TV anime in 2023!
　
In a world where the concept of God does not even exist, a woman as precious as a "god" has been reborn! In search of her beloved brother, Yukito, the strongest sister goes on a rampage in another world - the myth of the onee-chan has now begun!
genre: Reincarnation, Comedy, Incest, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy

alt_title: ろくなことを言い出さない彼女

title: Digimon Liberator
description:
The Digimon card game has evolved.
After a year-long closed beta test, "Digimon Liberator," a futuristic and fully immersive game that allows players to enjoy card battles in the metaverse space of Lacuna, has finally been officially launched.

Shoto Kazama, a boy who has never been able to win a card battle because of his habit of giving up on things easily, enters the world of Liberator through the invitation of his childhood friend, Arisa Kinosaki.

Encounters with wild Digimon. Battles with NPCs who have gone rogue. These various happenings set the wheels of fate in motion.

This is a story about "Digimon" and the "world".
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Full Color
author: Bandai Namco Entertainment

title: Furoufushi Shoujo no Naedoko Ryokouki
alt_title: 不老不死少女の苗床旅行記, The Depravity Records of an Immortal Girl., The Immortal Girl's Nursery Travelogue, The Nursery Travel Report by a Immortality Girl
description: The journey of a genius girl who became immortal to grant her dreams of being bred to different species of creatures in order to fulfill her curiosity.
genre: Monsters, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Luna Usagi

title: Happiness Meal
alt_title: しあわせゴハン
description:
A man relaxing with a can of beer when a winter storm hits. A man, burdened with personal strife, finds solace in a bowl of ramen. 

A Silent Manga, each chapter is a self-contained glimpse into the life of an ordinary person, and how the meals they eat lift their spirits.
genre: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking, Tragedy
author: Uonome Santa

title: Turning the Mad Dog Into a Genteel Lord
alt_title: 미친개 도련님 만들기, 狂犬な彼を貴公子に変えてみせます!
description: Diarin, a priestess without any noteworthy family background or connections, always gets the toughest assignments. So when her boss tells her to help Ceres, a war hero, reintegrate into society, she decides to stop being a pushover and get as much as she can out of it, including a juicy promotion. But upon reaching Ceres' manor, she’s greeted by a growling hound instead of a human. Tasked with the impossible job of turning the mad dog into a proper gentleman, she dedicates herself to caring for him. But his unexpected obsession with her was never part of her plan.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Mystery, Full Color
author: V_An

title: Sunshine After The Clouds
alt_title: 曇りのち晴れ
description:
Web Zenyon 4P Toppa (Breakthrough) Manga Award, Up-And-Coming Award. Theme: Hero.

A glimpse into the unlikely friendship between a standoffish boy and a boy who always keeps him company.
genre: Oneshot, Award Winning, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Music
author: A.O

title: My Roommate Isn't From This World
alt_title: 同居人がこの世のモンじゃない 連載版, My Roommate Isn't Of This World - Serialized Version, Мой сосед по комнате не из этого мира, 同居人不是这个世界的东西
description:
The young man's new apartment is haunted, but as it turns out, even the dead have their own personal shortcomings… issues of the flesh included.    
For the dead have lingering desires, and are more susceptible to the world of the living than what one may think. There's anger, there's hate, there's curiosity… and there's love too.    
Here he finds a ghastly girl who observes him quietly, certainly desiring *something*…  
(No wonder the rent is cheap!)

Note: this is the serialized version of the Pixiv webcomic.
genre: Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Horror, Web Comic, Supernatural
author: Nakamura Enjitsu

title: Yojouhan no Ibara Hime
alt_title: 四畳半のいばら姫
description:
*By Seishun Scans: WARNING! This series contains scenes that may depict sexual harassment, attempted sexual assault, and/or verbal abuse. Reader discretion is advised!*

---

Shinra has a mother who rarely comes home. Everyday, she pinches her pennies just to survive. Rai, a popular guy from her school keeps bothering her, and she’s getting sexually harassed by the manager at her part-time job. After finally coming home after 2 months, Shinra’s mom promises to stay with her. Rai unexpectedly shows up at Shinra’s part-time job and sees her being sexually harassed. He urges her to quit, but she refuses. Shinra comes home only to find out that her mother has disappeared once again
genre: Psychological, Romance, Reverse Harem, Drama, School Life
author: Sato Zakuri

title: Monogatari no Kuromaku ni Tensei Shite
alt_title: 物語の黒幕に転生して, 物語の黒幕に転生して～進化する魔剣とゲーム知識ですべてをねじ伏せる～, Reincarnated as the Mastermind Behind the Story, Reincarnated as the Mastermind Behind the Story: Overwhelm Everything With the Ever-Evolving Demon Sword and Game Knowledge
description:
There was a globally popular game called *The Legend of the Seven Heroes*. Ren cleared the sequel of that game at the fastest record in the world, and thus he obtained a bonus special data. However, no matter where he looked inside the game, he could not find the data. The moment where Ren was about to give up the search, he decided to start playing the second round of the game.

Suddenly, a notification message “Do you want to start a special story?" appeared on the screen.

When Ren chose “Yes” without hesitation, he lost consciousness, and when he woke up, he was a baby. —Could it be that he was reincarnated as one of the heroes in *The Legend of the Seven Heroes*? Ren, who thought such a thing was impossible, could not believe his ears when he heard his name from his mother's mouth. It was the name of a classmate who betrays the heroes in the middle of the story.

Of course, he wishes to live in peace. But he meets a saint whose life he's supposed to take, and doesn't. Furthermore, he ends up saving a character (the boss of a great noble family) who was supposed to die. All of these things creates a development that he doesn't know about coming to play…

---
**Original Web Novel:** [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816700427572694145),  [Syosetu](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1862hs/)
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Yuuki Ryou

title: Haisen Higeki
alt_title: 敗戦悲劇
description: Each chapter focuses on a character who recalls the experiences of the WW2: a survivor of the Special Attack Units who remembers an old promise, an old man tortured by his remorse or an old woman who still has the potassium cyanide that they gave in Manchukuo after the end of the war. Witnesses, participants or victims of one of the most dramatic episodes in history.
genre: Historical, Military, Drama, Tragedy
author: Nozoe Nobuhisa

title: Teisou Gyakuten Sekai no Doutei Henkyou Ryoushu Kishi
alt_title: 貞操逆転世界の童貞辺境領主騎士, Virgin Knight who is the Frontier Lord in the Gender Switched World, 貞操逆轉世界的童貞邊境領主騎士, Virgin Frontier Lord Knight In The Chastity-Switched World
description: After being reincarnated into another world where the chastity and moral values of men and women are reversed and women rule the land, Faust was raised by his mother as a rare male knight. He's quick to become a war hero with many achievements under his belt, but because he inherited his way of thinking from his previous world, there's a certain severe pain in his groin day in and day out when faced with the likes of a scantily clad Queen who may as well be in the nude or the sexual harassment of the well endowed Duchess he calls a friend, among others...
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Michizou

title: Kemono no Gochisou, Hijoushoku
alt_title: 獣のごちそう、非常食
description:
When he was young, a herbivore named Hakka was picked up by a carnivore named Daiya when he was caught in a trap and was unable to move.
Daiya decided to keep him as "emergency food," but as they spent time together, they began to feel as if they were family.
Ten years pass and the two become adults.
Daiya still thinks of Hakka as family, but he realizes that Hakka's feelings are different from his own.
genre: Animals, Boys' Love, Fantasy
author: Tanakamori Yokota

title: Hoshi no Ouka
alt_title: 星の謳歌, ほしうた
description:
A new coming-of-age series from from Liberum, whom you might know for Soushi Souai.

Friends, lovers, fashion and hanging out after-school...
For Hoshino Ouka, a gal who grew up in the city those are important things. But when she unexpectedly had to move to the country side town 'Yutakamachi', everything she hold dear vanishes...? In an unfamiliar town the fresh and tender days of youth begin!
genre: Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Liberum

title: unOrdinary
alt_title: unOrdinary
description: The world is not perfect. Learning to deal with its flaws is just a normal part of life. But there comes a point where these imperfections spawn a crushing realization… that something needs to change…
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: uru-chan

title: Onegai, Nugashite.
alt_title: Please, Take It Off., 부탁이야, 벗겨줘, お願い、脱がシて。, 拜託了、脫下來吧。
description:
There is a curse on this school. It prevents the person who commits "impure acts" from taking off his or her panties. Only the right hand of the protagonist can break the curse and remove the panties, his name is Kamite.

Kamite tells the girls that they have been cursed and that he can take off their panties, but... obviously it is almost unacceptable for them to have any man take them off...!

This is how the girls end up in a lot of trouble. But if the panties are not removed, they can get into even more trouble...
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Supernatural

alt_title: 獄卒クラーケン, 獄卒克拉肯, 海怪狱卒, Hell’s Tormentor Kraken, El Kraken Carcelero, Тюремщик кракен

Controlling the Queendom of Sevek’s female prison with the Power of the Kraken!

title: Kurasu ≪Mushoku≫ no Eiyuu-tan ～Koushaku-ka o Tsuihou Sareta ga, Jitsu wa Nagutta Dake de Sukiru o Kakutoku Dekiru to Wakari, Tairiku Ichi no Eiyuu ni Noboritsumeru～
alt_title: クラス≪無職≫の英雄譚～公爵家を追放されたが、実は殴っただけでスキルを獲得できるとわかり、大陸一の英雄に上り詰める～, Class <<Unemployed>> Heroic Tale: Exiled from the Duke's House, but i found out that i can acquire skills just by punching and now i am climbing to the top of the continent ~, Chronicles of the Jobless Hero~Ousted From the Duke’s Manor, but With Skills Gained Through Punches, I Emerge as the Continent’s Ultimate Hero~
description:
In a world where Classes are bestowed by the gods upon everyone when they reach eighteen, the existence of Skills within these Classes tends to overshadow any hard work, setting one’s life path. Within this imbalanced system, Lythe, who trained in hopes of becoming a Holy Knight, was heartlessly classified as Jobless during the Class assignment, resulting in his expulsion from the town by his father, the Duke. As he scraped by as a luggage boy, there came a day when the merchant caravan he was with got attacked by bandits. Lythe, attempting to save the child, engaged in a battle with the skillful attackers, accepting his impending death. Yet, a mysterious voice echoed in his head when he punched a bandit in his last act of defiance…

- [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9583gj/)  (jp)
- [Alternative Raw Link: Niconico](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/58563)
genre: Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation

title: Hoshi no Ouka
alt_title: 星の謳歌, ほしうた
description:
A new coming-of-age series from from Liberum, whom you might know for Soushi Souai.

Friends, lovers, fashion and hanging out after-school...
For Hoshino Ouka, a gal who grew up in the city those are important things. But when she unexpectedly had to move to the country side town 'Yutakamachi', everything she hold dear vanishes...? In an unfamiliar town the fresh and tender days of youth begin!
genre: Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

title: unOrdinary
alt_title: unOrdinary
description: The world is not perfect. Learning to deal with its flaws is just a normal part of life. But there comes a point where these imperfections spawn a crushing realization… that something needs to change…
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: uru-chan

title: Onegai, Nugashite.
alt_title: Please, Take It Off., 부탁이야, 벗겨줘, お願い、脱がシて。, 拜託了、脫下來吧。
description:
There is a curse on this school. It prevents the person who commits "impure acts" from taking off his or her panties. Only the right hand of the protagonist can break the curse and remove the panties, his name is Kamite.

Kamite tells the girls that they have been cursed and that he can take off their panties, but... obviously it is almost unacceptable for them to have any man take them off...!

This is how the girls end up in a lot of trouble. But if the panties are not removed, they can get into even more trouble...
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Supernatural

title: What's Our Hero Doing?
alt_title: 우리 용사는 뭐함?, Uli Yongsaneun Mwoham?
description:
Our protagonist, who cleared the extremely difficult of Vanta Black Ring a thousand times, awoke in the body of Ordinary Villager A (Hans) in Aram Village, in the tutorial area. 

Monsters were attacking the village! In the midst of life and death, he couldn't help but think of the hero named Cadis and how he'd show up and defeat the monsters - until that very hero died with a single attack. Just when he thought everything was over, he absorbed the hero's abilities!

What happened to the protagonist who wanted to survive comfortably beside the hero, exactly?
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Kim Danpung

title: Mr. Mallow Blue
alt_title: Mr. Blue, Mr.マロウブルー
description: Featuring a cynical beauty, a reclusive NEET, and an expressionless hot guy. A group of high school students and a NEET find themselves in a boarding school in which a story unfolds through the sudden meeting of those with jaded hearts and the misfits of society.
genre: Genderswap, Psychological, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Mystery

title: Bad End Mokuzen no Heroine ni Tensei shita Watashi, Konse de wa Renai suru Tsumori ga Cheat na Ani ga Hanashite kuremasen!?
alt_title: バッドエンド目前のヒロインに転生した私、今世では恋愛するつもりがチートな兄が離してくれません！？@COMIC, 转生成了即将进入坏结局的女主角，这辈子想要好好恋爱骗子哥哥却不愿对我放手？, 轉生成了即將進入壞結局的女主角，這輩子想要好好戀愛騙子哥哥卻不願對我放手？
description: One day, office worker Suzune (Reine) is reborn as Raine, the heroine of a "work-based otome game" that is too far away from romance. She wants to fall in love with a handsome man in this life! However, she finds herself in a world where there is a magical caste system, and to her surprise, she is the lowest rank! Her family treats her coldly and she is on the verge of being expelled from school. ...... Even so, she is undeterred by the "strong mentality" she has developed in her previous life. Practising magic, studying, and increasing the likability of her targets, she runs hard to avoid a bad end and get a sparkling school life! As Rene pushes forward with such a bright and positive attitude, her high-spec brother Julius, with whom she was supposed to be on bad terms, somehow begins to dote on her - or does he? A school fantasy about a strong mental heroine who is loved by everyone!
genre: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Kotoko (琴子)

title: Situation
alt_title: シチュエーション, Ситуация
description:
This is a one-panel manga that illustrates girls in different situations, such as "girls that changed seats next to the person they like" and "girls who eat a lot are cute."

This is a compilation of Twitter posts. This also includes a Twitter poll to see which girls the readers liked the most.

title: WcDonald's The Manga
description:
It's an exciting time in the WcDonald's Universe as the Savory Chili WcDonald's Sauce arrives! Whether it's a thrilling race or entering a portal to another world, our heroes will do whatever it takes to savor the mythical sauce to complement their WcNuggets. Follow their adventures with the limited-time sauce as a new story unfolds each week.

title: Musume Janakute, Mama ga Suki Nano!?
alt_title: 娘じゃなくて私が好きなの!?, 娘じゃなくて私(ママ)が好きなの!?, You Like Me, Not My Daughter?!, You Like Me (Mama), Not My Daughter!?, 喜欢的不是女儿而是我吗？, ママ好き
description:
“I will take in and raise this child.”

I'm Katsuragi Ayako, thirty-\*BEEP\* years old. It's been 10 years since I took in the daughter of my late sister and her husband. My daughter's now in high school and is getting on well with her childhood friend, Aterazawa Takumi. Maybe they'll start dating? Takumi's a really nice guy, so I'm all for it.

Eh? He has something to say to me? Is it something like “Please give me your daughter.”? No way, I'm getting ahead of myself.

“Ayako-mama…… I've always loved you. Please go out with me.”

“……You like me (mama), not my daughter!?”

A super pure-love romcom where long-held feelings explode!
___
[Alt Official Raw (Young Animal Web)](https://younganimal.com/series/5d1e949cd0b52)
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Nozomi Kouta

title: The Fable
alt_title: ザ・ファブル, 杀手寓言, Фэйбл
description:
A fabled genius at killing resides somewhere hidden in Tokyo. Taught since childhood to obey the orders of his boss, he is ordered to live in Osaka as a normal person for one year in order for the boss to lay low.    ---- **Won the 41st Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2017**

description: The "former" savior, Takeru Yamato, was summoned to another world and executed because of his strength. When he wakes up, he finds himself in Japan, where he spent time before being summoned. However, in the city, demons appearing from "gates" rampage, and those called hunters fight using magic. Returning from another world, Takeru decides to hide his powers and live, but...

alt_title: 異世界NTR～親友のオンナを最強スキルで堕とす方法～, 이세계 NTR ~절친의 여자를 최강 스킬로 함락시키는 방법~, 異世界NTR ～不被同伴發現地開後宮～, 異世界NTR～用最強技能令摯友的女人墜落的方法～, Isekai NTR: Sullying My Best Friend's Women With the Strongest Skill, NTR in Another World: Sullying My Best Friend's Women With the Strongest Skill, Исекай NTR
description:
This shitty world that's nothing but a trashy game, he and I will definitely escape it together. So, all these annoying women trying to take advantage of him are just a nuisance. What's worse, it seems like he's beginning to have some feelings for them.

That's why, for his sake, I'll eat them up first. But, just what is this power…?
genre: Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: Gorillan Do

title: Kagerou ga Yureteiru
alt_title: 陽炎がゆれている, The Heat Haze Is Swaying
description: One day, a transfer student named Atami suddenly appeared in the countryside. Everyone is intrigued by the rare existence of a transfer student. He hurt his leg as a result of an accident and is still suffering from the after effects. He is sincere to everyone, and those around him have always cared for him. On the other hand, Kamonomiya, who is part of the track and field club, is a straightforward and obedient person who is unable to tell lies. For some reasson, he is the only person who can see the true feelings of Atami, who thinks the current situation is '' depressing.'' It has something to do with their past together... A boy who wants to run and a boy who can no longer run meet and are growing into adults. A story of friendship that sweeps through youth.
genre: Oneshot, Psychological, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Kondenriki Kanao

title: The Boy in the All-Girls School
alt_title: Boy in Girl’s School, The Boy in Female School, Un Chico en la Escuela Femenina, Парень в школе для девушек, 女子学院的男生
description: My name is Qin Feng, 18 years old. Normally, I punish evil, promote good, fight for world peace, every day helping grandmothers cross the street, helping children who have lost their way home, saving lost maidens, etc … But until one day, I went forced to go to the legendary Chongnan Female School to study, thereby becoming the only boy in the school. Maybe in the eyes of others this is a paradise, but in reality an unimaginable future will …
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Chu Dao

title: Akumade Kujaku no Hanashi desu.
alt_title: あくまでクジャクの話です。, It's just a story about peacocks.
description:
Kuji Yakurou is a teacher who was cheated on and dumped by his girlfriend because of his "lack of masculinity". Shouldn't the world be gender-free? He is in anguish, and then Akano, a model, influencer, high achiever, and head of the biology department, appears before him and asks him to be the advisor of the biology department. She then begins to explain why "masculinity" is necessary to be popular after all, using the flamboyant feathers of a peacock as an example of "biology"...! 

This is a biological comedy that confronts you with the brutal truth!
genre: Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Koide Motoki

title: Listen to My Voice!!
alt_title: 請聽我的聲音!!, 僕の声を聞いてほしい!!, Please Listen to My Voice!!, Услышь мой голос!!
description:
Ye QiaoWen, an older sister-childhood-neighbor of our protagonist whom he has always admired has just recently moved back.

But Deng XianHe, the protagonist, has just recently learned that she already has someone else in her heart — a fact that suffers Deng XianHe greatly.

Suddenly seeing his usually bright and capable older sister turn into someone who is always hesitant and confused, Deng XianHe chose to suppress his years-long feelings of love, anguish, and longing.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Yang Jizheng

title: The Duke of Death and His Maid
alt_title: Смертоносный герцог и его черная горничная, 死神坊ちゃんと黒メイド, The Duke of Death and His Black Maid
description:
In a large mansion lives a boy, an aristocrat who was cursed by the witch to "let everything he touches die." With him is his maid Alice, who besides serving him, likes to tease him. The boy who is interested in her doesn't mind the teasing, but not being able to touch her is painful!  
  
If they are unable to hold hands, how will their love ever bloom?
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Inoue Koharu

title: Legend of the End-of-Century's Gambling Wolf Saga
alt_title: 世紀末博狼伝サガ
description: In the world there is a gambler here named saga.

title: L.A.G
alt_title: Unlimited Passive, 언리미티드 패시브, LAG, Безграничные пассивные навыки, Limitless Passive Skills
description:
L.A.G, an unknown space where humans use abilities or skills through awakening, monsters appear on each floor and room, and missions are given accordingly.

The goal here is to reach the bottom. The protagonist repeats death and life countless times in the unknown space L.A.G. However, in this life, he has the ability to own unlimited passive skills and finally has a chance to escape there.

However, unlike what he has been through so far, he will not know an inch of the future as L.A.G continues to change. This is a desperate survival story in which no one can be trusted and continues to survive the hellish L.A.G, where there is no end in sight, and fights for escape from the bottom.
genre: Thriller, Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Survival, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Apiro (아피로)

Masks are art, dance is martial arts!
The despised mask dancer 'Bongsan' follows the map left by his master
To stop the monster tiger 'Saphung Black Tiger' who wants to become king
He sets out on an adventure to find the legendary 'Human Mask'...
genre: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Full Color

title: Yuusha ni Zenbu Ubawareta Ore wa Yuusha no Hahaoya to Party wo Kumimashita!
alt_title: 勇者に全部奪われた俺は勇者の母親とパーティを組みました！, 被勇者奪取全部的我，和勇者的母親組成了隊伍！, 被勇者踢出队伍的我，最后和他们的妈妈组队了！, The Hero Took Everything from Me, So I Partied with the Hero’s Mother!
description:
A young man wants to marry the mothers of the hero's party!

As a member of the hero's party Ceres, has set out to defeat the demon king. But one day, he was suddenly dismissed by the hero, and he had to leave the party.

All alone, Ceres sought to find a domestic slave to take care of him. What he saw at the slave market was Shizuko, the hero's mother, being sold as a slave?!

The unreasonably expelled young man's Isekai mama harem is born!!
genre: Reincarnation, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: Ishino Yassan

title: Record of Ragnarok
alt_title: World's End Valkyrie, Повесть о Конце Света, 終末のワルキューレ, Valkyrie of the End, 終末的女武神, Los Registros del Ragnarok, Valkyrie Apocalypse
description:
The story begins when the gods call a convention to decide whether to let humanity live or die, and settle on destroying humanity. But a lone Valkyrie puts forward a suggestion to let the gods and humanity fight one last battle, as a last hope for humanity's continued survival. 13 gods will fight against 13 human champions in one-on-one battles to decide whether humanity lives or dies.

title: The Story of a Delinquent Girl and a Serious Boy
alt_title: 不良少女と真面目少年の話, 不良少女与死正经少年, 不良少女與正經少年的故事
genre: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Morita Shunpei

title: Ryoushin no Shakkin wo Katagawari shite morau Jouken wa Nihon Ichi Kawaii Joshikousei to Issho ni Kurasu koto deshita.
alt_title: 両親の借金を肩代わりしてもらう条件は日本一可愛い女子高生と一緒に暮らすことでした。, I'm Gonna Live with You Not Because My Parents Left Me Their Debt But Because I Like You, 替我父母偿还债务的条件是与日本最可爱的女高中生同居。
description:
The main character, Yoshizumi Yuya, was being pressured into paying off the debt left by his parents who had fled abroad. It was his classmate, Hitotsuba Kaede, chosen as the cutest schoolgirl in Japan, who saved him from this crisis of life and death. However, there was a catch. The condition required to fulfill in return for taking over his debt was — “In return for the loan, you have – to live with me.”

“Why did that happen?!”

Yuya’s daily life collapsed on this day.

“Yuya-kun. Let’s take a bath together.”

“Yuya-kun, please be my hug pillow.”

“That’s enough, Hitotsuba-san!”

The slapstick love comedy between the beautiful, but easy-going Hitotsuba Kaede and the serious and hard-headed Yoshizumi Yuya, starts now!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Amane Megumi

title: The Gentle Goblin's Bird
alt_title: A Kind Goblin's Bird, 상냥한 도깨비의 새, 優しい夜叉の鳥, 小鳥依鬼的柔情
description:
"Won't you become a Goblin's bride?"   
  
In Yang-an, the capital of the Shun Dynasty Empire, there are rumors of a Goddess who sings a song that grants your wishes in your dreams if you visit a certain pharmacy. To confirm this, Sa Heonyoung, who disguises his status as a member of the royal family, goes to find the Goddess of the rumors. After listening to her song, he yearns for her, as if he is suffering from an illness…  
  
A man who must kill his own identity under a goblin's mask; and a woman who has no name or a lover, and lives only for the revenge in her mother's will. A mournful love story between a man and a woman who are the only ones who can fully understand each other.

title: Danshi dato Omotteita Osananajimi tono Shinkon Seikatsu ga Umaku Ikisugiru Ken ni Tsuite
alt_title: 男子だと思っていた幼馴染との新婚生活がうまくいきすぎる件について, Regarding my Married Life with a Childhood Friend Whom I Thought Was a Boy Going Way Too Smoothly
description: Shuichi, a high school student, ended up marrying his childhood friend whom he thought was a boy. At their reunion after 10 years, his childhood friend Yuika had transformed into a beautiful girl, which initially made Shuichi quite nervous. However, as time passed, he gradually grew accustomed to the sense of closeness as best friends—and thus, their love story as an ideal couple with a charming touch of innocence begins!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

title: Netoge no Yome ga Ninki Idol Datta: Cool kei no Kanojo wa Genjitsu demo Yome no Tsumori de Iru

description: Kazuto Ayanokoji is an ordinary high school boy. He spends his days playing online games as a hobby. description:
Dungeons appeared in the world five years ago. Police and military are unable to enter these enigmatic spaces, and entry is permitted solely by the free will of individuals aged 15 and above. Leveling up is possible, fantasy items can be acquired, and for some, the transformation can lead to becoming astonishingly beautiful.

Yuuta Rokujou has lived a life of being bullied since his kindergarten days. Due to this, he decided not to attend Dungeon High School that everyone else went to, rather, on his fifteenth birthday, he decided to challenge a dungeon alone.

This story is about how Yuuta, under such circumstances, became stronger than anyone else, becoming one of the twelve individuals capable of moving the world, known as the ‘Twelve Heroes.’

Shortly after entering the school, Saeki kissed him and said, ``You're cute,'' as a new member of the club, and he suddenly approached him. The days carry on as normal, until one day, her routine chat with Danae takes a different turn: "What?! You can remember the today that happened yesterday too?" Super serious and uptight high school student Koutaro Suzuki and his obnoxious gyaru kouhai Sorako Mozu get along like cats and dogs. She spends her days tormenting him, while he spends his days getting outraged by her. However, the two of them share a secret...that they're living together as fiancés!! Under the condition that Koutaro marry Sorako, who comes from a wealthy real estate family, they've agreed to buy his father's company and save it from going under!!

Having to deal with Sorako, who uses this and that (and you know what) to torment him, can Koutaro make her yield and successfully marry her?!

I was born with the ability to enter other people's dreams. And I thought that in this life, I would have an easy life as a count when... 

"I don't think Lady Miena will survive this winter." 

Another life with a limited lifespan... To make matters worse, my family is going broke trying to save me. Before I die, I need to pay back our debt and all the money wasted on me! I was just trying to collect useful information and money before passing away when... 

"Who are you?"

"An angel... no you don't look quite right..."

"You entered my dream without a hint of fear."

I fear I have entered a dream I should've have touched.

He immediately sets his sights on one of his classmates, the kind and beautiful Lily Amane, but ends up in way over his head when it turns out Lily has some secrets of her own!

Matthew is just another parasite in the chaotic dungeon city of Gray Neighbor. People say he’s a lazy weakling who gambles and drinks away all the money he gets from his keeper, princess knight Arwin. 

Or so people say...

But the truth is, no one in this town knows what he’s really like — a ruthless protector who works in the shadows and will do whatever it takes for the sake of his mistress.

alt_title: S級ギルドを追放されたけど、実は俺だけドラゴンの言葉がわかるので、気付いたときには竜騎士の頂点を極めてました。, I've Been Kicked Out of an S-Rank Guild. But Only I Can Communicate With Dragons. Before I Knew It, I Became the Greatest Dragon Knight
description:
A super-class dragoon group-Cyril, a boy who was banished from the S-class guild "Lindworm" for some reason. What he had hidden was... the ability to "talk" with the dragons, which was unconventional!

Cyril who met unique dragons and launched his own guild. Perhaps because of its extraordinary qualities, the level of the guild soars at the fastest rate in history! Cyril, whose arm was recognized, will make a name for himself as a non-standard dragon knight.

title: Itoko no Ko
alt_title: いとこのこ, My Cousin, My Young Cousin
description:
His more-than-friends, less-than-lovers cousin is so cute that he could die!!!!? 

Nozomu is a boy staying at his uncle's house over summer vacation. In the countryside, where there are no convenience stores, or any busses even, the boy has a problem. That problem is his younger cousin, Sou! He’s being led around by this tanned, energetic girl day after day and can’t show her the dignity befitting his older age! 

On top of that, whether intentional or not, he’s getting flustered by Sou’s inviting demeanor. Eventually, Nozomu couldn’t take his eyes off Sou and is falling more and more under her spell...!!? With a “cousin” like this, his reason is having a hard time hanging on! 

This is a romcom with a guy who’s going under from all his tanned cousin’s teasing!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Incest, Slice of Life
author: Inuchiku

title: Electroid Arrow
alt_title: Electric Man Arrow, 電人アロー
description: A young boy named Toshio and his friends, while exploring an abandoned factory, are taken captive by gangsters. Toshi unwittingly discovers a signal device that will summon the cyborg superhero Electric Man Arrow. Arrow comes to the rescue, and, after vanquishing the gangsters' giant robot, entrusts Toshio with the signal device. However, the gangsters' mysterious leader X Fighter learns of this and uses Toshio in his plot to frame Arrow for a string of deadly sabotages. When Arrow finally confronts X Fighter for an explosive showdown, the shadowy link between the two superhumans is finally revealed. In the final chapter of this volume, Arrow faces an entirely different sort of problem, what to do with a gigantic dinosaur that scientists have discovered deep below the earth.
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Animals, Drama

Nikaidou Susumu, 35, has been unsuccessful in the professional test for 10 consecutive years, despite receiving support from his club.

What awaits him in the future, as he is unable to give up the title of professional golfer, is either heaven or hell...

Dias fulfilled his parents' will to help others, and kept fighting on the battlefield to that end. Now known as the "Savior Hero" from his long wartime career, he was rewarded with a vast territory from the king. After having met the horned Kijin (鬼人) girl Aruna who lives there, he begins his new slow life as a lord, seeking to thrive in spite of increasingly realizing that he was rewarded with the short end of the stick.

description:
Sera, a sexually curious salaryman, has newly set his sights on Ryo, a new employee at his favourite bar.
He tries to talk to him about sex, a new kind of pleasure, but Ryo is popular with men and women of all ages and has a lot of experience.
But he can't catch on, and when he pesters him, Ryo gets mad and teaches him about the pleasures of the backside...

title: "Tsukiuta." Gekijouban RABBITS KINGDOM THE MOVIE
alt_title: 「ツキウタ。」劇場版RABBITS KINGDOM THE MOVIE, "Tsukiuta." The Movie RABBITS KINGDOM THE MOVIE
description:
—A certain winter day.
Mutsuki Hajime, the leader of the idol unit “Six Gravity,” (a.k.a. Gravi) associated with Tsukino Talent Productions, aimlessly dropped by a secondhand bookstore and encountered Shimotsuki Shun, the leader of their sibling unit “Procellarum” (a.k.a. Procella). The two of them reached out to the antique classic which was thought to be the original work of the stageplay they would be starring in.
“Rabbits Kingdom”—
Though it should have been his first time hearing the title, a strange bothersome sensation befell him, almost as if it were stuck in the back of his head. To the perplexed Hajime, Shun gently smiled. “......Ah, this is... quite a nostalgic and beloved... story of us from another world.”
This is an “if -what if-“ world – a story of a kingdom in some other world.
genre: Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Fujiwara (Movic)

title: Kimi ni Aisarete Itakatta
alt_title: I Wanted to be Hurt by Love, You Loved Me So Much It Hurt, Я хотела бы быть обиженной твоей любовью, 君に愛されて痛かった, 被你所愛、真的很痛, 너에게 사랑받아 아팠다
description:
Kanae is a girl who is struggling to fit in with the popular clique at her high school. Because she had been bullied in middle school, she has developed an acute inferiority complex that had led her to engage in questionable after-school activities in order to feel wanted.   
  
In comes Hiroshi, a high-school baseball star who became drawn to her after finding her crying during a group date at a karaoke bar. Thus begins an unhealthy relationship between a mentally unstable high-school girl and a jock.  


---
genre: Psychological, Romance, Sexual Violence, Drama, School Life, Tragedy

Fourteen years later, a boy named Bai Ya encounters an invasion by a mysterious nightmare demon. After experiencing numerous crises and battles, Bai Ya continues to grow and embarks on an adventurous journey full of danger and excitement, exploring unknown worlds.

title: Apricot Fuzz

description:
After school, the secret talk between girls starts today, too. The class madonna, Nanba Rinon, confides to the introvert Furutsuji about the violence she's suffering on a daily basis from her father... To indulge herself in the pleasure of self-pity. 
And Furutsuji who comforts Rinon with deep compassion. However, there's malice lurking inside that smile...
She's realized Rinon's XX.

description: Chitose, a high school student living in Okinawa, fell in love with Koushou, who lives in Tokyo. “I’m going to transfer to Tokyo!” with feelings of great love in one hand she flies out of Okinawa! The direction of their love is of course a mutual one, right!?
