alt_title: Nozomi and Kimio, Нозоми и Кимио, ノゾ×キミ, ノゾミとキミオ, 美男和小希
description:
Suga Kimio finds himself hiding in the girls locker room, unable to move or escape the situation as the girls in his school crowd in. Although he originally had no ulterior motives, he found himself panicking as he heard the girls coming in and hid in a locker. Komine Nozomi, one of the shy girls in his class finds him, but surprisingly covers for him. Perplexed but glad, Kimio goes home.  
  
Later that night, he gets a text from Nozomi who happens to live across the way on the same floor of the complex they both live in. She blackmails him into agreeing to show each other’s bodies when she texts him. Kimio has to abide by Nozomi’s insane demands or risk ruining his school life so they both start their little peep show through each other’s windows…  
  
Nozo x Kimi: 2-nensei-hen is the second season of the series, but continues the chapter count from the previous magazine.  
  
[See AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=16241)
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Honna Wakou

title: Lip Service
alt_title: リップサービス
description: "This is what it means to be cool." A detective action story featuring 3 skillful individuals handling problems, one of which is a woman who specializes in wearing all kinds of disguises.
genre: Action, Mystery
author: Yuki Oni

title: Yancha Gal no Anjou-santachi
alt_title: やんちゃギャルの安城さんたち, やんちゃギャルの安城さんたち高1編
description: The misadventures of the mischievous gal Anjou-san and her friends. Non-canon.
genre: Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Katou Yuuichi

title: Insomniacs After School
alt_title: 君は放課後インソムニア, Бессонница после школы
description:
Nakami is a studious but cranky and antisocial high schooler who gets on his classmates' nerves. However, his bad attitude comes from the fact that he has a sleeping disorder, and frequently spends nights on end without a single minute of sleep. During the preparations for the school festival, he is begrudgingly sent to the school's astronomy observatory to gather cardboard boxes, a place which is said to be haunted by the dire happenings of the now defunct Astronomy Club. He finds the isolated place a haven ripe for him to sleep, but while rummaging around, he stumbles upon his classmate Magari Isaki sleeping inside a toppled-over locker.   
  
Isaki, unlike him, is a personable and popular girl at class, but who also hides her own problems with insomnia. Looking for a middle ground, they find that there's comfort and ease in sleeping together, so they resort to make the observatory their own private cubby to sleep… Have they found the comfort they're looking for?
genre: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Ojiro Makoto

title: Mega Man Battle Network
alt_title: MegaMan NT Warrior, ロックマンエグゼ, 록맨 에그제, Mega Man.EXE
description: The year is 200X, an age where everything is covered with computer networks, and everyone in the world has a "PET" mobile terminal. Hikari Netto, a grade school student at Akihara Elementary, is in perfect harmony with his NetNavi, Rockman, and is obsessed with Net Battles. But then, he gets caught up in an incident involving World Three (WWW), a criminal organization that stages cyber-terrorist attacks. Finally, the Ministry of Science is taken over, and Netto's father is taken hostage. In order to save his father and stop WWW's plan, he confronts the Dream Virus, the most powerful computer virus fused with the "Ultimate Program."
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Video Games, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Takamisaki Ryou

title: Koakuma Kyoushi Psycho
alt_title: A Little Devil Teacher, 小悪魔教師サイコ
description: A captivating new teacher, Miss Kasai, arrives at a troubled classroom. The previous teacher had been hospitalized after a tragic attempt at self-harm, driven to despair by student bullying. "My goal as a teacher is to bring joy to my students," she says with a laugh, before turning her attention to addressing the bullies in her own unique way. However, the students are about to discover that Miss Kasai is not to be underestimated. Could Miss Kasai be hiding a darker side?
genre: Psychological, Crime, Survival, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Delinquents, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Mitsuishi Megane

title: Will You Like Me?
alt_title: 你会不会喜欢我
description:
This is a relaxing comedy manhua with cute penguins as the MCs. Some of them are shy, some are loveable, some are mischievous... But they all have short arms and legs with no waist. Even though it's not easy living in the Antarctic with its cold weather and slippery floors, they make do by catching fish, playing, and waiting for their happiness. 

"I'm very terrified, but if I love you enough, I'll find the courage to confess. If I can't get your response the first time, then I'll try a hundred times, a thousand times, even ten thousand times."
genre: Animals, Long Strip, Comedy, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: 喃东尼

title: Hotpot Family
alt_title: 火锅家族
description: Unexpected endings, mind-blowing stories, so-cute-you-could-die hotpot ingredients... You'll laugh everyday until you get abs!
genre: Long Strip, Comedy, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: 火锅家族

title: Utsumi-kun no Koi no Uta
alt_title: 内海くんの恋のうた
description:
"Wouldn't you like to hear my love song?"

Shiori failed to make friends upon entering school, thus, she spends her time as a loner. The only support for her is the music of her favourite singer "Kanade," and she eagerly awaits the release of his new song. Then, by chance, she finds out that  this "Kanade" is actually her classmate, Utsumi! She can't believe she's about to meet her crush in real life, but to her suprise, once they're face to face, Utsumi asks her to be his girlfriend so he can experience love to be able to write a love song. 

A pure, heart-pounding love story that will make your heart skip a beat!
genre: Romance, School Life, Music
author: Kagamiya Lulu

title: The Saga of Tanya the Evil
alt_title: Военная хроника маленькой девочки, Колдунья в погонах, 幼女战记, 幼女戦記, 유녀 전기, 幼女戰記, Военный журнал маленькой девочки, The Military Chronicles of a Little Girl, La Saga de Tanya la Malvada
description:
A young girl fights on the frontlines in war. She has blonde hair, blue eyes, and nearly transparent white skin as she flies through the air and mercilessly strikes down her enemies. Her name is Tanya Degurechaff and speaks with a young girl's lisp while she commands the army.

Tanya used to be one of Japan's elite office workers, but because of a wrathful god was reborn as a little girl. Prioritizing optimization and career advancement above all, she will become the most dangerous entity among the Imperial Army's sorcerers.  

Adapted from Light Novel of same name.  

---

**Note:** Manga and Light Novel Licensed in English by Yen Press as "The Saga of Tanya the Evil".
genre: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Historical, Action, Psychological, Survival, Magic, Military, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Carlo Zen

title: Kimi no Tame no Curtain Call
alt_title: A Curtain Call for You, 君のためのカーテンコール
description:
Akutsu Sakura, a wallflower with no self-esteem to speak of, and Hiiragi Tsubame, a girl brimming with confidence and dignity. The meeting between these two polar opposites marks the start of their adolescence. 

A high school drama exploring façades and what lie beneath them, and the difference between imitations and the real thing.
genre: Sports, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life
author: Satou Shiho

title: Kaoru Watashi ni Kiss wo shite.
alt_title: Please Kiss sweet me, 香るわたしにキスをして。
description:
"You smell so good." "Sorry, but I might not be able to let you go."
 Touka, who secretly has a crush on her senior, is bewildered to find out he felt for her scent. Things develop quickly and she decides to support his dream of becoming a perfumer while they become dangerously close.
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Ichi Kotoko (壱コトコ)

title: Koi ni Mudaguchi
alt_title: Chatter About Love, 恋に無駄口
description: The romantic comedy centers on a high school boy who is wasting his youth.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Fukuyama Ryoko

title: Seishun Heavy Rotation
alt_title: The springtime of my life, 青春ヘビーローテーション, 청춘 헤비 로테이션, Youth Heavy Rotation, La primavera de mi vida
description:
Nao falls in love at first sight with the hottie prince Haruna-kun, who helps her overcome anxiety during the high school entrance examination. She safely gets into high school and feels that she’s fated to the guy sitting next to her. However, Haruna-kun is very popular and has a habit of saying “I hate girls who tell me they like me.”. Even so, Haruna-kun still messes with Nao.
Nao gradually falls in love with him as she gets to know him better. Haruna-kun may look mean, but he’s actually very kind.
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Minase Ai

title: Senki Kanshoku Symphogear ~Shirabemeshi~
alt_title: Feast of the Valkyries: ~Cooking with Shirabe~
description: An official spinoff of the Senki Zesshou Symphogear series! The divas' next battlefield is a warm gourmet comedy with the chief kitchen maid, Shirabe! Another Symphogear ballad, fresh from the kitchen.
genre: Comedy, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Agematsu Noriyasu

title: My Fiancé is in Love with My Little Sister
alt_title: My Fiancé falls in love with my sister., 婚約者は、私の妹に恋をする
description:
There my fiancé stood, gazing intently at my charming younger sister. When I saw them fall in love the moment they laid eyes on each other, I was hit with an overwhelming sense of déjà vu. Aah, again?
My fiancé had been in love with my younger sister even in my previous life. There was nothing I could do but watch it all unfold. And for some inexplicable reason, I’m the only one who keeps returning to that exact point in time. Trapped by fate. And yet, amidst the turns of the hourglass, I still find myself falling for him…
genre: Time Travel, Psychological, Romance, Fantasy, Villainess, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Hanabusa

title: Legends of Vithra
description: An unfortunate red haired girl woke up in a dark, strange world full of dangerous creatures. She finds herself on a journey with an odd companion: the resident supervillain who took her prisoner. Though moody and stoic, she finds the villainous woman is still somehow... intriguing? Join this unlikely pair as they travel through a fantastical world full of magic and monsters; a journey of thrilling danger and self-discovery.
genre: Action, Romance, Adventure, Self-Published, Magic, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Vithra

title: Confession Attack
alt_title: 고백어택, Gobaek Attack
description:
Hana was never first. Always because Han Geon Woo came in first every time!
Hana would do anything to best Geon Woo, even though she can't figure him out.
This time, she tried to shock him by confessing...
He believed and accepted the confession though? 
Does he like me?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: 늠개

title: Candy Flurry
alt_title: アメノフル, Конфетный Шквал
description: Toy Toy Candy--eat one of these magical sweets and gain candy powers. This isn't a dream, it's reality. And because of it, Tokyo was destroyed. Tsumugi is a lollipop user, the same candy that brought Tokyo to ruin. And she can't have anyone finding that out! But what will she do when she runs into a criminal sweets-user who's out of control?! This unique candy-coated battle comedy manga is now ready to snack on!
genre: Action, Comedy, Post-Apocalyptic, School Life, Delinquents, Police, Supernatural
author: Takegushi Ippon

title: Witch Craft Works
alt_title: Прикладное колдовство, ウィッチクラフトワークス, 위치크래프트 워크스, 魔女的使命
description: Takamiya Honoka, a regular student, sits next to Kagari Ayaka, the idol of the school, and a perfect girl in every way. Her fans are hostile to the extent of harassing anyone who gets close to their princess, so Takamiya-kun is always in trouble. One day Takamiya is suddenly attacked by an unknown force, but he is rescued by a powerful sorceress of fire, who happens to be… Kagari Ayaka herself!
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Drama, School Life, Supernatural
author: Mizunagi Ryuu

title: Ore no Level Up ga Okashi! ~ Dekiru Otoko no Isekai Tensei
alt_title: 俺のレベルアップがおかしい！ ～デキる男の異世界転生～, My level up is strange! ~ Reincarnation of a great Man in a Different World
description:
Zarmen, an adventurer who can't level up decides to retire from the adventurer business. Furthermore, in order to graduate from virginity, he decided to splurge on all the assets that he had diligently saved up since his reincarnation at a high-class brothel.

The woman who appeared in front of him was the finest woman he would ever have known. Thanks to her hospitality, Zarmen fully enjoys his first time, but at that moment, his ears hear a mysterious announcement...

[Impregnation confirmed.]
[Level up!]

"Does this mean that the more 'seeding' you do, the stronger you get?"

An extraordinary implantable foreign world adventure fantasy created by a bottom adventurer who has been at level 1 for many years levels up through sex!
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Shibamata

title: Monmusugo! ~Honnyaku Skill de Saikyou Monmusume to Isekai Seikatsu~
alt_title: モンむすご！〜翻訳スキルで最強モン娘と異世界生活〜, Monmusugo!: Living in Another World with the Strongest Monster Girls with Translation Skills
description: Amakawa Keisuke, a hapless corporate slave who suddenly dies, wakes up in a different world! He tries his best to enjoy life in another world, but he has only been given the bottom-tier skill "Translation" and on top of that, the most powerful monster was in front of him...!
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic
author: Kimimaro

title: Dragon Quest: The Great Adventure of Dai - Avan the Brave and the Demon King of Hellfire
alt_title: ドラゴンクエスト ダイの大冒険 勇者アバンと獄炎の魔王
description: The Demon King's army led by Hadler is attacking the world. The Kingdom of Carl and Princess Flora stand up to stop the invasion. And then there's young Avan! Another heroic story begins now!
genre: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Square Enix

title: Mikane and The Sea Woman
alt_title: ぼくと海彼女
description: It's not like I don’t belong here… One year ago, a young boy named Mikane moved back to a small island in Kyushu. The locals are warm, his father is brusque yet kind, and he has a good friend who worries for him. Despite having so much, Mikane feels dissatisfied and lonely. Then, one day, he saves a mysterious, beautiful woman from the sea. His meeting with this “onee-san” will drastically change his destiny!!
genre: Romance, Drama, Monster Girls, Web Comic
author: Aoko Kizaki

title: Toshiue Elite Onna Kishi ga Boku no Mae de dake Kawaii
alt_title: La Caballero de Élite Mayor es Tierna Solo Conmigo, My Elite Senior Dame Knight Only Acts Cute to Me, Older elite knight is cute only in front of me, 年上エリート女騎士が僕の前でだけ可愛い, 年上的精英女騎士只在我面前表現得可愛
description:
Haru is a 16-year-old recruit of the "Black Hawk" 4th Cavalry Unit of the Knights' Regiment under the command of Captain Karen, a profoundly beautiful and fierce 29-year-old swordswoman, who, unbeknownst to all the unit except Haru, is a pure maiden with exactly zilch experience with men. Being privy to this delightful side of her, Haru secretly henpecks her and teases her lovingly, which turns her into a flustered and heavily-armed tomato. Watch as he slowly inches his way into her heart as he dodges her longsword!  

- Light Novel: [Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/series/228090)
genre: Loli, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Military, Fantasy, Shota, Adaptation
author: Takata

title: Issho ni Kurashite ii desu ka?
alt_title: 一緒に暮らしていいですか？, May I Live With You?, Можем ли мы пожить вместе?
description: Hiromi Sonoda has no girlfriend, no job, and no home, until he finds a shared-house with very cheap rent and goes to check it out. However, the share-house has a certain condition... Kei Sasuga presents a new "Share House Romantic Comedy"!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Sasuga Kei

title: Ane ni Naritai Ane VS Yuri ni Naritai Imouto
alt_title: 姉になりたい義姉VS百合になりたい義妹, The Big Stepsis Who Wants to Be a Big Sister vs. the Little Stepsis Who Wants to Be Yuri
description: One day, Shio arrives home to find that her mother has gotten remarried and is going on a business trip with her new husband, leaving Shio with her new stepsister Kafka. Being only a day older than Kafka, Shio is concerned that Kafka will try to take the big sister position from her. Kafka, on the other hand, is determined to make Shio, who was her first love, fall for her.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Mori

title: Brandal
alt_title: Vagrant
description: Because his beloved was killed by a silat master, KOLOMENJENG returns to the silat world to find the culprit!
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Amir Maliq

title: Two sizes, too small
description: When a gentle giant meets a small ball of energy, only love can bloom. A sweet love story about the advantage and disadvantages of being tall and small.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Mizo

title: Strongest Fighter
alt_title: 도사강호
description:
Woken up from a date, he’s suddenly in a movie set? Wait, he’s been reborn as a baby martial artist!  
  
In Jongnam Clan, which was once one of the 9 strongest clans, he receives the name “Gunchung” and uses the knowledge of his past life to learn the true meaning of martial arts.  
  
When your perspective is different, your martial arts changes. Armed with knowledge, Gunchung brings about a new age of martial arts!
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: 기공흑마

title: Back Street Girls
alt_title: Из якудзы в поп-кумиры, 后街女孩, 後街女孩, 백 스트리트 걸즈, Back Street Girls ～ゴクドルズ～, バックストリートガールズ ～ゴクドルズ～
description:
A group of 3 yakuza failed their boss for the last time. After messing up an important job, the boss gives them 2 choices: Honorably committing suicide, or go to Thailand to get a sex reassignment surgery in order to become "female" idols. After a gruesome year long training to become idols, they successfully debut, with overwhelming popularity, much to their dismay. This is where their tragedy truly begins.  
  
Link:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20851) (anime)
genre: Genderswap, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Jasmine Gyuh

title: Toki Majutsushi no Tsuyokute New Game ~Kako ni Modotte Sekai Saikyou kara Yarinaosu~
alt_title: 時魔術士の強くてニューゲーム ～過去に戻って世界最強からやり直す～, The Time Mage's Strong New Game: I Returned to the Past to Rewrite It as the World's Strongest
description:
After 100 years of hard work, the hero, chrome, has become the world’s only Chronomancer. However, by the time he became the world’s strongest, all the people and towns he wanted to protect were lost.

And so the course he chose… is to go back to his childhood and start his life all over again…?!

This is the ultimate story of time-lapse fantasy!
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Sakaki Mochimaru

title: The Hundred Ghost Stories That Led to My Death
alt_title: 僕が死ぬだけの百物語, Boku ga Shinu dake no Hyakumonogatari, 我死前的百物语, 100 Ghost Stories to Die For, Hundred Ghost Stories of My Own Death
description:
One day, an elementary school child named Yuuma tries to jump out of his classroom window. His classmate Hina stops him and, in a bid to stall for time, asks him, “Do you know the round of a hundred ghost stories?” Hina tells Yuuma about a ritual where, if you tell a hundred ghost stories, you’ll see ghosts afterward. Learning this gives Yuuma a new lease on life. Chapter by chapter, he shares ghost stories with the reader, slowly but surely inching his way toward one hundred…

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
genre: Monsters, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Anthology, Gore, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Matono Anji

title: Remote Jugyou ni Nattara Class 1 no Bishoujo to Doukyo Suru Koto ni Natta
alt_title: When I Got to Remote Class, I Had to Move in With the Most Beautiful Girl in My Class, リモート授業になったらクラス1の美少女と同居することになった, Cuando empecé con las clases a distancia, tuve que convivir con la chica más guapa de mi clase.
description:
High school student Kanata Yoshino who was at his wit's end, meets Haruka Hoshikawa, the most beautiful girl of his class, who was waving her smartphone alone in a park in the middle of the night. She is bad with machines and doesn't know how to connect to the internet, and asks him to help. He ends up visiting her house, but little does he know, she has a secret purpose...!

The sweet and romantic cohabitation love comedy begins with the skilled invitation of the young lady!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Mihagi Senya

title: Usami-san wa Kamawaretai!
alt_title: うさみさんは構われたい！, 羽冴美同学想要被照顾
description: Usami Nagisa is a yankee who suffers from a supposed "rare disease" which causes her health to decline if she feels lonely. Sewa Natsuhito, the boy who sits next to her in class realizes this and keeps her company, but the only way Usami believes she can cure her "illness" is to make lots of friends, a process she might find quite difficult due to her aggressive looks and personality.
genre: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Hibaru Shunsuke

title: Koiseyo Mayakashi Tenshi-domo
alt_title: 恋せよまやかし天使ども, Fall in Love, You False Angels
description: Otogi Katsura has had a reputation for being a beautiful girl at school since she entered the school. She is also named president of the class committee, but the vice president, Ichi (Ninomae), is also reputed to be a pretty boy. Unlike her public face, Otogi Katsura is an outspoken character and a martial artist in her own right. She is attracted to the perfect Ichi, who is also perfect on the inside, but she wonders if he also has a dark side.
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Uzuki Coco

title: City of the Sun
description: In a crumbling and dystopian Lousiana, Rilind, a zombie, aims to help those cast out from society using a peculiar power- Magic "strings" which can heal wounds. However, his world begins to change when he makes the unlikely choice to save a vampire in distress. Rilind soon learns he's way in over his head when he learns she has a bounty on hers!
genre: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Zombies, Adventure, Self-Published, Gore, Drama, Horror, Vampires, Supernatural
author: Topnugg

title: Black Mirror
alt_title: 검은 거울
description:
Tae Joon suffered a traumatic event in his youth that led him to lose his childhood memories.  
  
While looking for a place to rent, he meets Jung Yeon Woo, who claims to have been his childhood best friend, and ends up becoming his housemate. After he moves in, Tae Joon starts having horrific dreams of countless hands groping his body or Yeon Woo giving him unfamiliar pleasures. Haunted by daily occurrences of these nightmares and hallucinations, he starts to fall apart. Despite being aware of Tae Joon’s situation, Yeon Woo feigns ignorance and pursues a sexual relationship with him.  
  
“You can do it while thinking of me. Just be honest with yourself and don’t hold back.” Although Tae Joon is disturbed by these turn of events, he can’t help but look forward to being further corrupted by Yeon Woo…  
  
Español:  
Tae Joon sufrió un evento traumático en su juventud que lo llevó a perder sus recuerdos de la infancia. Mientras buscaba un lugar para alquilar, conoce a Jung Yeon Woo, quien dice haber sido su mejor amigo de la infancia, y termina convirtiéndose en su compañero de casa. Después de mudarse, Tae Joon comienza a tener sueños horribles de innumerables manos tocando su cuerpo o Yeon Woo dándole placeres desconocidos. Perseguido por la ocurrencia diaria de estas pesadillas y alucinaciones, comienza a desmoronarse. A pesar de ser consciente de la situación de Tae Joon, Yeon Woo finge ignorancia y persigue una relación sexual con él. "Puedes hacerlo mientras piensas en mí. Sólo sé honesto contigo mismo y no te contengas." Aunque Tae Joon está perturbado por este giro de los acontecimientos, no puede evitar que se corrompa aún más por Yeon Woo…
genre: Thriller, Psychological, Long Strip, Boys' Love, Horror, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Muhwa

title: Amai Seikatsu
alt_title: 内衣高手, 甘い生活, 달콤한 생활, Sweet Life
description:
The complicated story of a young man who goes to work for a lingerie company. 
One of the very first harem manga, done by a former shojo mangaka known for his peculiar tendencies 
(was known to cross dress among other things) and serialized in the now defunct Business Jump.
 
Volume titles and Romaji equivalent:  
  
2. ランジェリーに恋してる♥ (Ranjerī ni Koishiteru ♥)  
- 愛の悩み (Ai no Nayami)  
- 恋模様みだれ髪 (Koi Moyō Midare-kami)

- よみがえる美 (Yomigaeru Bi)

- ユミカ・センセーション (Yumika Sensation)  
- セルフヌード (Self-nude)  
- 能力喪失 (Nōryoku Sōshitsu)  
- お嬢様の初体験 (Ojō-sama no Shotaiken)  
- 巴の目覚め (Tomoe no Mezame)  
- ぱんつのお披露目 (Pantsu no Ohirome)  
- 女優・佐倉澪 (Joyū Sakura Mio)  
- 弓香が女優 (Yumika ga Joyū)  
- 美人双子姉妹 (Bijin Futago Shimai)

- 触りのライセンス (Sawari no License)

description:
When Sasahara Shinta was suddenly summoned to another world with the objective of subjugating the Demon Lord, he makes full use of his cheat skill that sees people’s status and tries taking a look at the Princess who summoned him, but when he did, it says that the Hero is arranged to be assassinated after the Demon Lord’s subjugation.

That’s right, this is a shitty otherworld where the Hero’s life is treated like dirt!

To avoid being assassinated, Shinta pretends to submit, but…

description: Natsuki Subaru defeats the white whale and the archbishop of the "Sloth" deadly sin, and is reunited with Emilia. The two have reconciled after overcoming a painful breakup, but new turmoil awaits them...

alt_title: Naked Hero - An Exposed Adventure in Another World, 裸之勇者-異世界露出大冒險
description:
A third-year high school girl wakes up in another world. But she's naked!
Let’s go on a nude adventure in another world!

title: Did I Become Invincible After Confessing My Love to the Beautiful Ancestor?
alt_title: After Confessing My Love to the Beautiful Ancestor, Am I Invincible?, 表白美女宗主后，我无敌了？
description:
On a day marked by celestial upheavals and reversal of the cosmos, Lin Fan descended into the world. He instantly became the Prince of the Heavenly Sect and was taken in as a disciple by the founding ancestor.

Amidst an ordinary cauldron explosion, something unexpected occurred... Lin Fan regained his memories! He reincarnated? System? Favorability? Upgrades? Lin Fan suddenly woke up to reality, and with the system by his side to "help" him, he chose his first target to conquer: The ancestor of the Heavenly Sect.
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

title: Days
alt_title: Дни
description:
Two boys met on a stormy night: Tsukushi, a boy with no special traits at all, and Jin, a soccer genius. On that night, Jin drags Tsukushi into the world of high-school soccer.  
  
  
---
**Won the 40th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2016**
genre: Award Winning, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Yasuda Tsuyoshi

title: The Druid of Seoul Station
alt_title: 서울역 드루이드, Seoul Station Druid, 归来的异世界王者, Друид с Сеульского вокзала, ドルイド侵略, Druida de la Estación de Seúl
description:
What started out as an ordinary day turned upside down when an unknown catastrophe struck Earth, transporting Suho Park to a different planet. He eventually learns how to adapt and fight for his survival in this foreign world, but one day, just as suddenly as he was sucked into this new planet, Suho is pulled back to Earth!

 He quickly learns that return to life as he remembers it is no longer possible, as Earth is in constant battle with monsters who’ve managed to infiltrate the planet.

How will Suho fight against the monsters attacking Earth, and will he be able to survive this time with his current skills?

---

alt_title: [포스타입 앤솔로지 | 겨울] 크리스마스에도 야간근무! 크리스마스에도 야간근무!, [Postype Anthology | Winter] Working Night Shift Even on Christmas!
description: Go Ayoung lives a quiet life in the office, but unfortunately she is tormented by her boss, everything would change when one day she overhears a private talk of his and realizes an important secret.

title: Yeon Lok Heun
alt_title: Yeon Lokheun, 연록흔, His Majesty's Secret Heroine, 蓮禄昕～宿命の華～, 尹樂香, La heroína oculta de su Majestad
description:
Yeon Lokheun is a girl who grows up living as a boy learning martial and spiritual arts. She heads for the palace in order to clear the name of her father, a wanted criminal, where she meets the young Emperor Garyun. He promises to save her father's life in exchange for her lifelong services. After gaining Garyun's trust, she travels the world solving supernatural-like problems that arise in place of the Emperor. But how long can she continue this life without the others finding out that she is actually a woman?

---
Lokheun’s name means "happy morning," but her life takes a tragic turn when her mother is murdered and her father becomes a fugitive after exacting revenge. To save him, Lokheun devotes her life to Garyun, the dashing emperor who’s committed to right the wrongs of his father. Believing Lokheun to be a boy, Garyun is determined to mold her into an unsurpassed martial artist, even if it means sending her to hell. Their strained relationship turns into something more as Lokheun searches for the one thing she’s never had: a life befitting her name.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%B0%EB%A1%9D%ED%9D%94/2621), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=51793959)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/his-majestys-secret-heroine/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/76054)
genre: Monsters, Action, Ghosts, Long Strip, Romance, Martial Arts, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Crossdressing, Military, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

title: Kiyota-san wa Yogosaretai
alt_title: 清田さんは汚されたい, Kiyota-san Wants to Be Defiled
description:
Sumiko Kiyota is a plain, ordinary girl with a serious demeanor. While eating lunch alone as usual 
Yuki Shirakawa, the most beautiful and popular girl in class, calls out to her...
genre: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Furuta Tomohiro

title: Aishiteru Game wo Owarasetai
alt_title: 愛してるゲームを終わらせたい, I Want to End the "I Love You" Game, I Want to End This Love Game, I Want To End This “I Love You” Game, I want to end the game that I love, 想让“我爱你”游戏快点结束
description: Childhood friends who have been together since they were little. They both realize their feelings for each other, but are too close to be honest. What connects them is the "I love you game" that they have been playing since they were little. The end of their love is decided in this simple game where the winner is the one who makes the other embarrassed!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic
author: Doumoto Yuuki

title: Adatsubaki Yugamite Haguruma
alt_title: 仇椿ゆがみて歯車
description:
Hateful yet sweet encounter of swords and flesh. 

A young man named Kazuma insists on becoming a student of one Mamiya Tojirou, a renowned sword master. Though his true goal is revenge, he becomes enthralled by Mamiya's beautiful swordsmanship as well as the loneliness peeking from beneath the stern veneer. Meanwhile, Mamiya can't help but be charmed by Kazuma's youthful naivete even though he knows of his intentions. 

Soon the two men are drawn together by their irresistible passion for each other. However, the revenge match is imminent... A heart-stirring historical drama BL!
genre: Historical, Romance, Boys' Love, Martial Arts, Samurai
author: Fukiya Furo

title: Snow Prison
alt_title: 雪之牢笼
description: Zayn, a young man from the Omega wolf tribe, was framed with his father for killing the Commander of the Royal Guard, and was subsequently outcast and labeled as a wanted man. In order to search for his father and the truth, Zayn was forced to go on the run. However, whether it‘s Zayn’s fated mate who suddenly showed up, or his ‘younger brother’ who had been by his side since childhood, both men slowly develop the territorial desire to make Zayn their own…
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Jiuchuan Comics

title: Mobile Suit Gundam SEED featuring SUIT CD
alt_title: 機動戦士ガンダムSEED featuring SUIT CD
description: Adaptation of the Gundam SEED SUIT CD drama CDs by Yasushi Yamaguchi
genre: Sci-Fi, Comedy, Mecha, Drama, Adaptation
author: Morosawa Chiaki

title: Ore Igai Dare mo Saishu Dekinai Sozai na no ni "Sozai Saishuritsu ga Hikui" to Pawahara suru Osananajimi Renkinjutsushi to Zetsuen shita Senzoku Madoushi, Henkyou no Machi de Slow Life wo Okuritai.
alt_title: 俺以外誰も採取できない素材なのに「素材採取率が低い」とパワハラする幼馴染錬金術師と絶縁した専属魔導士、辺境の町でスローライフを送りたい。, The Assistant Mage Parts Ways With His Power Abusive Alchemist Childhood Friend and His Being Told to Have "Low Chance of Gathering Materials," and Wants to Start a Slow Life at a Town in the Remote Region, Only I Can Collect These Materials! ~ An Assistant Mage Who Broke up With His Alchemist Girlfriend After Her Harassment Wants to Lead a Slow Life in a Remote Town
description:
The Assistant Mage of the genius alchemist Ruby—Lloyd has an abnormally low chance of gathering materials for alchemy use. Hence, he is treated as baggage and is made to be the bottom of the entire country’s joke. 

Everyday is a day he is scolded by Ruby. It’s become too much of a despairing environment that he’s come to hate it. And so, he finally decided to part ways with her. 

However, unbeknownst to everyone was that the materials Lloyd gathered were all high-grade materials no one else could gather.

The mage, who was treated as “incompetent” and saw himself as such, now aims for an ideal easy going life!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Kitsune Gozen

title: Bishoujo ni Natta kedo, Netoge Haijin Yattemasu.
alt_title: I Became a Beautiful Girl, but I’m still an MMO Junkie, 美少女になったけど、ネトゲ廃人やってます。, Я превратился в красивую девочку, но решил стать задротом!, I've turned into a bishoujo, but I chose to be an online games addict!
description:
The story follows the High-schooler Futsu Jintarou, whose confession was rejected by his crush.

His misfortune continues, as news of a gender-change disease turns Jintarou into a beautiful silver haired girl. The shock of it causes him (her) to try to escape from reality by playing the VRMMO, Clan/Clan…

His game character Taro uses the same girl appearance as in the Real and the Alchemy skill, which most players call a trash skill.  
He meets lots of fellow adventurers, and becomes stronger within the game world of Clan/Clan’s slogan, ‘When one becomes an adventurer, they can fight, steal, control, explore, invent, create, and do anything as they like’.

He meets a wide variety of adventurers that help him (her) grow, Taro hides what happened to his (her) appearance as a bug to his friends who also play the game, and hides the fact that he (she) had become a girl in real life.

When summer break is over, he(she) will have to show their face at school.

This is about one of the best National-class adventurers, the story of the Alchemist who won a war without even taking a single step.  
When a normal high school student suddenly turns into a beautiful girl, what would they do?

The answer is to that is to become an online games' addict!
genre: Genderswap, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Hoshikuzu Ponpon

title: The Wi-Fi Love Story
description:
Two lonely persons, two different fates. Him, a weak guy that suffers from albinism and permanent near-sighted. Her, an unwanted child, ostracized at school because she doesn't speak Vietnamese... In a twisted fate, they found themselves connected through Wi-Fi Network Names, but will their relationship last?

Omake arts done by [Flygombal](https://www.fiverr.com/zamrutzh)
Cover arts done by [Artiya](https://www.fiverr.com/kazisain)
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Doujinshi, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: RonBWL

title: Majo Taisen - The War of Greedy Witches
alt_title: Война Ведьм, 魔女大戦 32人の異才の魔女は殺し合う, The War of Greedy Witches
description: Joan of Arc, the hero who saved France, was sentenced to be burned at the stake. But at the moment of her death, a demon sent her to another world. There, she found 32 women from across history, known as “witches.” With the addition of the final witch, Joan of Arc, Walpurgis Night begins: Only one witch can survive, and have her wish granted!
genre: Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Martial Arts, Samurai, Magical Girls, Magic, Fantasy, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Kawamoto Homura

title: GE ~Good Ending~
alt_title: GE: Good Ending, GE～恋爱成就, ＧＥ～グッドエンディング～
description:
Utsumi is your everyday student. He is also a boy that has always had a strong sense of what is right in the world. With nothing but innocence and a mind that longs for his "significant other," Utsumi takes on one of the toughest subjects: love. With the help of the devious and mysterious Kurokawa Yuki, will Utsumi learn how to be fortunate in the game of love? Only through the ups and downs of real life, and the assistance of his friends, will Utsumi be able to take a bite out of life and learn just what love is.

- Alternative English: [Kodansha US](https://kodansha.us/series/ge-good-ending)
genre: Romance, Harem, Drama, School Life
author: Sasuga Kei

title: Beloved by My In-Laws
alt_title: Beloved My In-laws, 사랑받는 시집살이, 备受宠爱的婚后生活
description: Reina, a fallen noble's second daughter, works tirelessly to support her family and seeks their love. Yet her life takes an unexpected turn when her desperate parents marry her off to a viscount she's never met to avoid financial ruin. But though she expects a harder life, Reina finds unexpected solace when she is welcomed by her caring in-laws. And then there is Felix, her charming husband-to-be, who has admired Reina from afar. As Reina navigates her new life, can she heal from the past and find the love she's always longed for in her new family?
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Tae So-Jung

description: A man was about to commit suicide and decides to search for a way to die in the internet, but then he found an odd site that asked a lot of questions and had a point based system that allows you to create skills and abilities for a character. He took interest in it and when he finished setting his character he was asked: "You will now be transported to a world with the settings you choose, coming back is not possible, do you still accept?" Without thinking much of it he pressed YES and found himself in another world with the skills and abilities he chose to have.

alt_title: That Person. Later on…, Позже этот человек..., その者。のちに…　～気がついたらＳ級最強 !? 勇者ワズの大冒険～
description:
Relaunched manga adaptation of the light novel "Sono Mono. Nochi ni…" drawn by Nariie Shinichirou.  
  
Wazu was an ordinary townsman who shut himself off in “Mountain”, because of an unfortunate course of events. After 2 years he decided to come down from the mountain to meet with people. But there are various misunderstanding about the “Mountain” which he shut himself off in. And then he meets with the people repeatedly. And after that. . .

title: Trinity Seven
alt_title: Trinity 7, トリニティセブン 7人の魔書使い, 트리니티 세븐, Trinity Seven - The 7 Magicians
description: Everyday is a normal day in the small town where Kasuga Arata lives. However, everything changed on the day of the Black Sun, and following it, a magician appears before him. The Black Sun caused the Breakdown Phenomenon which destroyed the town where he lives. Because of this, his normal life was artificially reconstructed by a Grimoire that his childhood friend had left. Just what is the purpose of the magician coming to the town? What will he do with the Grimoire's keepsake?
genre: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Supernatural
author: Saitou Kenji

title: Although Life May Deceive Us
alt_title: Even When Life Deceives Us, Have a Chance to Love Mr. Hi-So, Take This Chance To Love Mr. Hi-So, ลุ้นรักป่วนใจนายไฮโซ, 삶이 우리를 속일지라도
description:
"Once I enter university, I'll definitely study hard and change my life for the better!" Kam SaHam, a broke college freshman is bent on changing her life by pursuing Fashion Design. However, in a curious turn of event, she ends up pretending to be loaded amongst all the rich kids in high society (Hi-So). Will she get called out or could she somehow find love amidst this chaos?  


---

[Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romance/high-social/list?title_no=1636&page=1)
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Kim Ji Su

title: Sleepy Princess in the Demon Castle
alt_title: Сон в замке демона, 在魔王城说晚安, 魔王城でおやすみ, 마왕성에서 잘 자요
description: Sshhh! Princess Syalis is trying to get a good night's sleep. Some shut-eye. Forty winks. Catch some Z's. Long ago in olden times when people and demons lived together in—well, disharmony, really—a demon king kidnaps a human princess and imprisons her in his castle. Bereft, the princess's subjects beat their chests in anguish…until a hero arises to spearhead Project Rescue Our Princess! While waiting for her knight in shining armor, what's an imprisoned princess to do…? Teddy-bear guards with bat wings are all very well, but her dungeon cell is bo-o-o-ring! So, she decides to wile away the long hours by sleeping. Now if only she could get comfortable…and didn't suffer from insomnia…
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Kumanomata Kagiji

title: Their Phantom
alt_title: 她们的幻影
description: A shady undercover police officer x an innocent university student. In an accident, university student Song Xiao An is kidnapped and brought deep into the mountains, ripping her away from her peaceful and happy life. There, an undercover police officer named Zhou Si Han secretly takes care of her, and Xiao An thinks she can escape through her. However, she discovers that the policewoman is hiding a dark secret...
genre: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Horror, Mystery, Full Color
author: 冬日农民

title: I Scared the Divine Lord as I Handed over the Ancient Immortal Pill
alt_title: 开局上交太古仙药，我吓坏圣主
description: Bai Yifan has an ancient ring that allows him to travel freely between the Earth and the fantasy world, and he has discovered that "plants and animals" on the Earth will evolve into treasures when they are taken to the fantasy world. An apple evolves into an immortal fruit, an egg will hatch into a phoenix or an earth dog has the bloodline of a dragon. One could even use tobacco to manipulate the enemy to their advantage.
genre: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Isekai, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Cat March Culture

title: Tsuihou Sareta Tensei Juu Kishi wa Game Chishiki de Musou Suru
alt_title: 追放された転生重騎士はゲーム知識で無双する, The Exiled Reincarnated Heavy Knight Is Unrivaled in Game Knowledge
description:
“You good-for-nothing bastard. You are the son of a Sword Saint, yet you dare pull such a defective Class!?”

During the〈Divine Blessing Ceremony〉of the 15-year-old Elma who came from a lineage of Sword Saints, he had manifested a commonly deemed defective class known as the Heavy Knight. He had been deprived of his position as the next head of the Edvan Household and was then exiled. The Heavy Knight class had an unbalanced status and useless skills, to top it off, it was even said to be a class cowardly and indolent people have.

But, Elma knew better—that this world was the world of the game he had used to play before—and that the Heavy Knight class was the strongest class to exist. Elma made full use of the knowledge he had in his previous life and began his efficient walkthrough of the world he was reincarnated into.
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Nekoko.

title: Sengoku Komachi Kuroutan: Noukou Giga
alt_title: A Tale of a Small Town hardship in Sengoku Era - An Agriculture Comic, 戦国小町苦労譚 農耕戯画, 전국 코마치 고생담, 战国小町苦劳谭-农耕戏画
description:
One fateful day, a girl time slipped into the Sengoku Era. It was an abrupt enough event to be dubbed god’s whim, done to sate hellish boredom. The girl has no power to change the world.  
She was a very ordinary, common, and plain girl that can be found anywhere.  And that girl can do no more than a single thing...

Survive the Sengoku Era – that’s all.  
  


---

Adapted from [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8406bm/) (Raw)  
Light Novel: [Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/series/62898/)  
Alternative Manga Raw: [Pixiv Comic](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/3714)
genre: Time Travel, Historical, Action, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Military, Isekai, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Kyouchikutou

description:
***Only you are special.***

After school, Koutarou Nakayama returns to school to pick up something he forgot and finds Shiho Shimotsuki asleep in an empty classroom. Shiho is rumored to be Ryouma Ryuuzaki's crush, a popular boy who has formed a harem in his class, but she is always expressionless and no one has ever seen her smile.

But now, her fair skin is holding Koutarou's hand...?! The "secret relationship" between the heroine and the mob begins!

Youkai Mountain, Gensokyo. Even within this closed-off world, the tengu have their own closed-off, multilayered society. All Shameimaru Aya wants is to work on the scoop of a lifetime, but all around her, much more complicated schemes are afoot, and it seems they can't help but get in her way.

Long-running doujin series by Ashiyama, author of "The Gensokyo of Humans" and "The Magician Who Loved a Fake". Published in book form and for free on Pixiv.

Giving up his dreams, he is trying to find his way working part-time jobs. When all of a sudden, he wakes up 8 years in the past after an accident. Right before the ‘Stardust Project’ started! As the youngest (but most experienced), can he make it to the final lineup this time?

title: Koi wa Futago de Warikirenai
alt_title: 恋は双子で割り切れない, Love Between Twins is Indivisible
description: My family moved next door to the Jinguji family when I was six years old. From then until I was in the first grade of high school now, both parents were on good terms, and the twin sisters of the Jinguji family that I grew up with were my close friends as if they were like my own family. Ryumi, the sister who looks like a boy, and Naori, the otaku sister who is cute on the outside. And I'm Jun Shirasaki, who isn't afraid of being sandwiched between beautiful sisters with different personalities. Although I'm a novice in love, I don't have a special relationship and the changes continue. "Why don't you go out with me? How about we try dating?" These words from Ryumi eventually led us into a strange love triangle. The romantic comedy story of first love with twins begins!

Just when peace was promised, a person calling himself Jewelion suddenly appears, does not recognize peace, abducts the leaders of each planet, and forces people to kill each other. However, in this crisis, a super electromagnetic robot team including Con Butler V, Voltes V, and Deimos stands up!! The short story "Super Electromagnetic Machine Voltes V Episode 41: Aristocrats Strike Back" is also specially included!!

title: Nanashi no Tensei: Queen's Blade
alt_title: Nanashi's Rebirth: Queen's Blade, Nanashi's Reincarnation: Queen's Blade, ナナシの転生 クイーンズブレイド
description:
Nanashi Tadano [translates as "Typical No-Name"], an overworked young lady, is reincarnated as the unremarkable Nanashi in a world that looks exactly like her favorite anime, Queen's Blade Legend. It's an alternate world where sexy female warriors known as ‘Beautiful Fighters’ battle it out with inhuman skills known as ‘divine seals’.
Nanashi accidentally frees a legendary demon and becomes a beautiful fighter with a rather overpowered skill, the 'Shapeshifting Right Arm'.
She'd normally use her power to fight in this world, but...
"I'm not interested in duels. I'm satisfied as long as I can watch my favourite characters fight up close."
In this other world, where dueling is based on the harsh rule that ‘winners take all’, Nanashi's otherworldly life begins as she hides her mighty power in order to see her favorite beautiful fighters in action up close and personal!
(From: https://firecross.jp/ebook/series/541)
genre: Reincarnation, Official Colored, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Fantasy, Web Comic
author: Hobby Japan

---
Maid Refreshment "Comet Bug" stands quietly amidst the bustle of the city. This is a place where both master and lady can return anytime. It is a place where there are "maids" who will gently and calmly accompany the tired hearts of the customers. There, Pero, a new maid, is about to receive her first customer. A warm and sad love story that shines faintly at the maid refreshment shop open late at night.

title: Rooftop Sword Master
alt_title: El maestro de espadachin en la azotea, Oktapbang Sodeumaseuteo, 옥탑방 소드마스터, Oktapbang Sword Master
description:
After being beat up and put into a coma by eight of his classmates at Nun'Gwang Middle school, Se'young woke up after nine long months and found out that his father committed suicide by self-immolation in an attempt to get justice for what happened to him.   
  
As a result, the investigation re-opened and that attackers who tried to sweep it under the rug received a proper sentence for their crimes. But Se'young was unable to assuage the anger and fear he felt for the unjust world.  
Se'young thoroughly hid himself from this sort of world.   
  
The sun would rise and set, the seasons changed, and not once did he step outside of his home. But one day, a sudden and strange sound enticed him to open the door…  
  
Embedded in the center of the rooftop was a gigantic blade emblazoned with the words “War Sword” and with it, came the whispers of a God.
genre: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Comedy, Crime, Martial Arts, Adventure, Military, Gore, Fantasy, Delinquents, Police, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

alt_title: 推しが公認ストーカーになりました, My Favorite Idol Officially Became a Stalker!, 本命爱豆竟然是跟踪狂
description:
Romantic comedy between a popular idol and an idol otaku!

Rooting for the super popular idol Moco Nanami is the reason for living for 17-year-old idol otaku Sora Amano. Lately, he's been worried because his belongings have been going missing.

In the middle of this, Sora pursued and caught a suspicious person that was running away with his smartphone - but the identity of this person - is his favorite idol Moco Nanami!?!!?
genre: Psychological, Romance, Comedy
author: Seo Minosuke

title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
alt_title: Легенда о героях Галактики, Легенда о героях Галактики (Фудзисаки Рю), 銀河英雄伝説, 银河英雄传说, Legend of the Galactic Heroes (Fujisaki Ryu)
description:
New adaptation of the novel.  
  
The story is staged in the distant future within our own Milky Way Galaxy, approximately in the late 36th century. A portion of the galaxy is filled with terraformed worlds inhabited by interstellar traveling human beings. For 150 years two mighty space powers have intermittently warred with each other: the Galactic Empire and the Free Planets Alliance. Within the Galactic Empire, based on mid 19th century Prussia, an ambitious military genius, Reinhard von Müsel, later conferred Reinhard von Lohengramm, is rising to power. He is driven by the desire to free his sister Annerose, who was taken by the Kaiser as a concubine. Later, he wants not only to end the corrupt Goldenbaum dynasty but also to defeat the Free Planets Alliance and to unify the whole galaxy under his rule.  
  
In the Free Planets Alliance Star Fleet is another genius, Yang Wen Li. He originally aspired to become a historian through a military academy, and joined the tactical division only out of need for tuition money. He was rapidly promoted to an admiral because he demonstrated excellence in military strategy in a number of decisive battles and conflicts. He becomes the archrival of Reinhard, though they highly respect one another. Unlike Reinhard he is better known for his underdog victories and accomplishments in overcoming seemingly impossible odds and mitigating casualties and damages due to military operations.  
As a historian, Yang often predicts the motives behind his enemies and narrates the rich history of his world and comments on it. One of his famous quotes is: "There are few wars between good and evil; most are between one good and another good."  
  


---
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Adventure, Military, Philosophical, Drama, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Tanaka Yoshiki

title: Why Are You Obsessed With Your Fake Wife?
alt_title: 가짜 아내에게 왜 집착하세요?
description:
"You'd better not even dream of being recognized as my wife. There will never be an heir from a daughter of Balajit.”

Nadia couldn't agree more with his opinion.
Thank you, Marquis, be sure to keep your word.

“The Marquis said you had no intention of sleeping with me.”
“… … .”
“So, to ensure an heir, there's no other choice but to take a concubine... … .”

Nadia's head jerked at the sound of something crushing on her.
Then, out of the corner of her eyes, she saw that the table her husband was working on had cracked.

No, why did it suddenly break?

The next day, Zhao Mingxi really did leave to mooch off of someone else's luck. The small dog bowed his head down, and grumbled: "I'll let you cling to me, alright? Happy now?"

There, he stumbles upon Kaito Kiriyama, a boy shrouded by terrifying spirits. With a serious look in his eyes, Kaito vows he'll protect Yuuma. Despite Seto's gloominess, Kujou wanted to befriend him and approached him. Though initially bewildered, Seto, with zero love experience, was quickly knocked out by Kujou's smile…!?

That night, still troubled by this unknown situation, Seto began interacting with people as Rabi in-game and was shocked when "Jack," an old acquaintance, suddenly appeared. To his surprise, it was Kujou, the source of his worries! Determined to keep his IRL identity a secret (Rabi = Seto), and maybe a little too conscious of Kujou, he ended up having a wet dream about him – and then he even let that fact slip…!?

Gloomy bachelor x inexperienced otaku—a double life love comedy!

They have to keep it a secret to secure their jobs. What will happen to the relationship that is "more than friends but less than lovers"…

title: The Baby Prisoner of the Winter Castle
alt_title: 겨울성의 아기 죄수님, Baby Prisoner of the Winter Castle
description:
On the night the kingdom fell and the entire royal family was being executed, Clarisse, who naturally thought she would also die, heard something unexpected. 

“We cannot execute anyone who has not reached the age of eighteen. Instead, I will kill you the day you turn eighteen.” 

And so, Clarisse is given ten years to live. 
Clarisse then heads North as a “prisoner.” 
And she asks the Grand Duke for only one thing… 

“Um, is it okay if I take this friend with me? It’s my only friend.” 

But what Clarisse holds out is a rock? 

It’s a new life in the North! 
But this life as a “prisoner” keeps on getting better…?

alt_title: 야간개장
description:
After reuniting with someone who doesn’t even remember me, we became friends with benefits.
What’s even funnier is that after becoming friends with benefits, I secretly fell for him.

Jimin reunites with his old friend from swimming, Chanhyung, after becoming a college student. While Chanhyung is under the false assumption that Jimin is an older guy, the two become friends with benefits. Following this, although Jimin develops feelings for the kind and enigmatic Chanhyung, he cannot confess to him.

Even so, I thought that if I wasn’t too clingy, I’d be able to continue our relationship while pretending that I’m not who I really am.

“Uh, aren’t you Jimin?”

..Until I’m utterly caught like this.

“What?! I'm supposed to be the guardian of this tentacle monster?"
In a research facility specializing in monster biology, Monster Veterinarian Doha finds himself under a slimy assault from a pubescent tentacle monster.

During this encounter, the tentacle monster comes to recognize Doha as its 'maternal figure,' and he ends up becoming its guardian for a year, taking on the responsibility of its training.

However, controlling this tentacle monster, which has an insatiable sexual appetite, proves to be nearly impossible on his own. Eventually, for safety reasons, he is introduced to Kyunghwan, the son of the research facility's director, as his partner.

description:
A story about a kind man who deserves much better than what his little ambition has given him.   
  
Kane is a middle-aged and unambitious adventurer who, while in the middle of herb gathering, finds the rare item『Resurrection fruit』.  
  
Kane thinks about selling it and turn it into money, but he meets a girl seeking medicine to save her companion’s life. Since she looks like Altena, his late childhood friend, he gives it in exchange for small change.  
  
Actually, the girl is the strongest adventurer Anastrea, who people call The Sword Princess. The next day, Kane suddenly gets an invitation to join an S rank party, beats down the strongest and the worst monster, miraculously gains lots of money, and finally gets a confession by a 13 years old saint.  
  
Kane’s simple life will change completely because of his encounter with Anastrea.
