genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Sadoyeon (사도연)

title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Red Giant 03rd MS Team
alt_title: 機動戦士ガンダム 赤い三巨星
description:
A “red” comet, a black “three” binary star, and a blue “giant star” -- we are the “red three giant stars”!
Universal Century 0079 - December, the so-called "One Year War" has reached its final stage. After finishing the battle for Jaburo, the Zeon army "Wandering Group" was retreating. Somehow, they made it to space where their friends were... Meanwhile, a unit of the Federation Forces, the Red Three Giants, appeared!
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha, Adventure
author: Ejiri Tatsuma

title: Kimiiro × Liver ~Konya Mo Bell ni Oshiete Kudasai~
alt_title: キミイロ×ライバー ～今夜もベルに教えてください～
description: Runa Kusakabe is a university student with a severe communication disorder. In order to change her life, she transforms herself into "Bell" and starts a video streaming service. The naturally beautiful, big-breasted Bell receives some outrageous requests. She answers them in all seriousness, but then one after another, the most outrageous happenings occur!
genre: Comedy
author: Kamizuki Shiki

title: Mitsu Iro Devil
alt_title: Honey Colored Devil, Honey Devil, 蜜色DEVIL
description: Hashiba Rin lives together with her grandpa. One day, while she was praying to the gods at a shrine, a devil calling himself Char appeared. Char who seeks the “blood of a virgin” is perverted, ill-tempered, and pompous. He isn’t very straightforward, but the truth is that his kind touch is full of love, and while knowing an unforgivable a love before he knew it, his heart and body grew weak… The super popular “DEVIL” series from Love Paradise magazine is finally out in comic form!! Also includes original artwork and an extra story.
genre: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Supernatural
author: Miura Hiraku

title: The Wretched
alt_title: I Am the Bane of Others' Existence, 我，天煞孤星
description:
Ji YouChuan was investigating the mysterious organization Blaze in order to take revenge for his parents. 36 demons were released during one of the confrontation with Blaze and he signed a contract with the strongest demon, Chelsea.

He joined the “Wrath of Heaven” team for the sake of investigating Blaze even more deeply and to retrieve the 36 demons, but after getting betrayed by his teammates, the sacrifice of his friend, wandering the wastelands and various other incidents, Ji YouChuan and Chelsea will uncover the thousand-years conspiracy behind the Red Rain catastrophe!
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Yoousi

title: Give Me a Pat!
alt_title: 帮我拍拍
description: This is a comedy-romance story about a failed writer who meets a woman who comes from her past and becomes her roommate. She also has to deal with a famous voice actor who wants to adapt her book into an audio drama. Will she be able to adapt to this crazy situation and find true love? This is a work of fiction that mixes elements of fantasy, humor and drama, with a touch of chinese culture.
genre: Ghosts, Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Full Color
author: 七小皇叔

title: Beast Wheeler
alt_title: ビーストホイラー, Beast Wheeler
description: A sexy girl pole dancing at a down-town club meets a man who inserts a stash of cash in her thong... At the end of her shift, she finds that man thrown out and getting beaten due to his over-drinking and resultant inability to pay. The girl helps the man by paying for him and takes him to his workshop after talking things over. There, the girl finds a unique mechanical machine... What could this be?
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance
author: Umezawa Haruto

title: Listener ni Damasarete Dungeon no Sai Kasou kara Dasshutsu RTA suru Koto ni Natta
alt_title: リスナーに騙されてダンジョンの最下層から脱出ＲＴＡすることになった, The Listeners Tricked Me Into Doing an Escape RTA From the Lowest Level of the Dungeon!
description:
A dungeon explorer, or dungeon tuber, is a person who explores dungeons while streaming. On his first day of broadcasting, a rookie dungeon tuber, Sekai Kotoba, is accidentally transported to the lowest level of the dungeon, which he has not yet explored. The bottom level is a sea of lava, and he is suddenly doomed!

He is level 2, his skills are non-combat related, and he has no knowledge of dungeons. The only people he can rely on are the listeners on the feed!

Aim for the upper levels by relying on the comments!
genre: Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic
author: Koidanuki

title: I Love You Baby
alt_title: I love you baby
description:
You are the "first" of everything for me who is afraid of guys.  
  
A 7th grade girl by the name of Mirei is not allowed to do anything after school due to her strict parents, but one day she goes out on her own after her mom has left for work. That day, she meets a boy that seems to be younger than her. What will become of this meeting?
genre: Romance, Drama, School Life
author: Komori Mikko

title: I Don't Want to Be a Lady
alt_title: 레이디는 싫습니다, No quiero ser una dama, No Me Gusta La Dama
description:
Before being sold as the Crown Prince’s concubine, I proposed a contract marriage to the Duke.

“Will your father allow you to marry me?”
“Of course not. So there is only one way.”

“We have to make an accident.”

It will taste better when I break that mol*ster’s head.
I could shoot a gun at the alley gangster. Even the prince of the neighboring empire was also knocked out by me.

The man snorted.

“You’re so arrogant as the captive subject. I never knew that Count Bornes would be a jerk to his dog.”

I said with a smile, “Our mansion didn’t have a dog. Because the owner of the mansion is already a dog.”

This is the story of Arianne Bornes, who seemed to be a villainess but not a villainess.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Jeommyeon (점면)

title: Kyou mo Ashita mo.
alt_title: Kyo mo Ashita mo, Kyou mo Ashita mo, Today and Tomorrow Too, 今日も明日も。, 追逐夢想的每一天
description: Chika has always dreamed of becoming a manga artist since childhood. However, she comes from a family that requires every member to become a teacher in the future. Then, she meets Ryou, a manga artist, who also happens to be a friend from her childhood. She gets the chance to work part-time with him as his assistant. So, has her chance of chasing her dreams finally arrived?!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama
author: Emura

title: The View From My Room
description: A short story by musician Koji Tano, about a boy looking out his window.
genre: Oneshot, Self-Published, Slice of Life
author: Koji Tano

title: Kore Kaite Shine
alt_title: これ描いて死ね, Draw This, Then Die!, Draw this, then die!, Draw This, Then Die
description:
Yasumi Ai. She's a first-year high school student living on Izu Ōshima, an island that's part of Tokyo prefecture. She loves to read manga, but a certain event triggered her to start thinking about "creating" manga. She begins to think about "creating" manga. What is the world that awaits her? A manga by Minoru Toyoda, a manga artist who loves manga! The pain and joy of creating works of art. No expense is spared in this tale of growing up and manga adventure!

----
Note: Won the 16th Manga Taisho Award in 2023.
genre: Award Winning, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Toyoda Minoru

title: Nanjou-san wa Boku ni Dakaretai
alt_title: Nanjou-san Wants to Be Held by Me, 南條さんは僕に抱かれたい
description: From their worst encounter comes a story about their ultimate happiness! This romantic comedy explores the ups and downs of a serious relationship.
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Gyaru
author: You2

title: Takane no Hana wa Midaresaki
alt_title: 高嶺の華は乱れ咲き, 高嶺之華爛漫開, The Unattainable Flower's Twisted Bloom
description: She is the perfect student, beautiful, clever and with lots of friends… He is an ordinary boy in the class, staring at her from afar but one day he sees her in a very compromising situation! How will she react? The lives of these two will now intermingle with totally unexpected outcomes!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life
author: Itou Ei

title: The Villainess Can't Take Revenge on Her Reaper Father
alt_title: 悪役令嬢は死神パパに復讐がしたいのに！ ～人生2周目、パパの心の声が可愛すぎてまさかの愛され物語！？～, Even Though the Villainess Wants to Take Revenge on Her Reaper Dad ~This Is My Second Life, but I Can Hear What Papa’s Heart Is Saying and It’s Too Cute! An Unlikely Story about Getting Loved!?~
description: The villainess wants to take revenge on her reaper father! Capella Axicon, the daughter of two great dukes, faces a dire situation after being accused of murdering her fiancé, Prince Oberon. Seeking help from her only remaining family, her father, the Reaper Duke, she's met with his ruthless demeanor. "I want revenge on my father!" Her earnest wish is fulfilled after her execution as she's granted a new beginning as a baby. Surprisingly, she can now hear her father's heart which has turned too cute to be a beloved tale...? "Where in the world is that ruthless Reaper Duke? What's going to happen to my revenge?"
genre: Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Full Color
author: Yui Regina

title: The Overpowered Newbie
alt_title: 뉴비가 너무 강함, Слишком сильный нуб, The Newbie is Too Strong, Soy un Novato Demasiado fuerte
description: JaeJu (which means “skill” in Korean) grew up without parents in an orphanage skillfully, just like his name suggests. One day, he heard that the orphanage was having a hard time and would have to close in 3 years. While trying to raise money for the orphanage, JaeJu got an alert on his phone. On it, he saw a video of himself climbing the tower as a BJ (broadcasting jockey aka streamer). Seven years ago, a tower suddenly appeared and randomly took people into it. If you successfully complete the tower and become an “Awakened”, it’s only a matter of time before you get rich!
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: First Prize Lottery (일등복권)

title: Special Civil Servant
alt_title: 별정직 공무원
description: After failing the Grade Nine civil service exam four times and many twists and turns, Han Maru finally succeeded in becoming a special civil servant under the Ministry of Environment. Goodbye, gosiwon! Goodbye, convenience store lunchboxes! But the joy of passing was short-lived. It turned out to be a life-threatening national secret job?! Along with the yellow dust came the demons, creatures that kill and eat humans. The Grade 9 special civil servant job involved waging war against these demons! Han Maru’s life-threatening civil service career begins.
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Seo Jaewon

title: Resurrected Demon King
alt_title: Revive the Devil, 蘇りの魔王, Revived the Devil
description: After a long-standing battle between the demons and humanity, the Demon King Luruslia Nord was laid to rest at the hands of a hero. However, his soul continued to wander. After thousands of years, Luru awakened in a world devoid of demons. Moreover, he was reincarnated as a weak human! To search for his disappeared brethren and to understand the meaning of the new "life" he's been granted, Luru sets forth on a new adventure.
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Full Color
author: Okano Yuu

title: Dokushin
alt_title: 独身, El soltero, Single
description: Nuestro protagonista vive en una sociedad “abierta” donde amar al compañero, independiente del género u orientación, es el pan de cada día; pero a ojos de esta él tiene un problema: le gusta andar solo y no tiene el interés de buscar una pareja, algo que ellos no van a permitir.
genre: Oneshot, Psychological, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Avogado6

title: Reincarnation of the Sword Master
alt_title: 소드마스터의 환생
description:
At the threshold of life, a radiant white aura emerges. And… death! 

Yet, in a twist of fate, the man is once again granted a new life. With a newfound purpose, he sets out to complete his existence as an unfinished “Swordmaster” from his previous life.
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Drawways (Bongsoo)

title: My Daughter Is the Final Boss
alt_title: 내 딸은 최종 보스, Nae Ddar'eun Cheojong Boss, 我的女兒是最終頭目, 灭世女神今年5岁, Nae Ttareun Choejong Boss, Моя дочь — Финальный Босс, 俺の娘はラスボス, 灭世女神今年5岁, 我的女儿是最终的老板, 我的女兒是最終的老闆, Mi Hija es el Jefe Final
description:
Lee Seo-jun could only watch as his daughter, the witch Lee Seol-ah, turned into the wicked final boss who destroyed the world and brought upon his death. 

Though never a good dad, as he loses consciousness, Seo-jun gets a new quest.

[Change the future.] 

Upon awakening, he sees a 5-year-old Seol-ah standing before him. Now, Seo-jun must raise Seol-ah to avoid the misfortunes that originally turned her wicked and become the caring father she never had.

The price of failure? Only the end of the world.


---
**Alt. Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%B4-%EB%94%B8%EC%9D%80-%EC%B5%9C%EC%A2%85-%EB%B3%B4%EC%8A%A4/2964)

genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: geulsseunya (글쓰냐)

title: Gomennasai Ojou-sama, Ore wa Maid ga Sukinan desu
alt_title: ごめんなさいお嬢様、俺はメイドが好きなんです, Lo siento mucho Ojou Sama, pero a mí me gusta la sirvienta
description: Love Triangle Romcom about a rich girl in love with her servant but the servant is in love with the maid!
genre: Romance, Comedy
author: Hinokage Sora

title: Kodoku no Kochou wa Donna Yume wo Miru no ka?
alt_title: 蠱毒の胡蝶はどんな夢を見るのか？, What Does the Poisonous Butterfly Dream of?
description:
This world has been invaded by bugs.

With the appearance of the "Armored Bugs," mutating insect monsters that can overcome all modern weapons, humanity has been robbed of much of its living space. The only ones who can stand against such adversaries are the "Noble Butterflies," girls who harbor "Insects" that have gone through evolutions differing from the armored bugs.

One of the candidates to become a Noble Butterfly, Odamaki Ayumi, still suffers from the fact that she is unable to become one. Her best friend, who was supposed to be with her and was her object of admiration, has left her and no longer seeks her company.

Those days of despair came to an end when she was on the verge of death in a battle with armored bugs.
"Don't think that I... will die without doing anything!"

With the end near, the girl's body transformed into a butterfly one. And the flapping of her wings will bring about a revolution in the world...!
genre: Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Girls' Love, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Aliens, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Karasu Piero

title: Otona no Shoumei
alt_title: Erti Kedewasaan, オトナの証明, 恋爱身分证
description:
Tsubaki always appears experienced, but actually, she has never had a boyfriend even though she's already 16, and she's a real baby. She wants to quickly increase her love experiences, and become an adult! One day, she got called out by her math teacher, Shiina-sensei, and she was told that she'll have to take supplementary lessons. All alone in the math room with her sensei after school, Tsubaki's heart beat like crazy when she saw Shiina-sensei's facial expressions that were different from usual…?  
  
2. The Imprisoned Princess  
  
3. The Prince's Mantle  
  
4. The Upside Down Message
genre: Romance, Comedy, Anthology, School Life
author: Washio Mie

title: My Daughter Is the Final Boss
alt_title: 내 딸은 최종 보스, Nae Ddar'eun Cheojong Boss, 我的女兒是最終頭目, 灭世女神今年5岁, Nae Ttareun Choejong Boss, Моя дочь — Финальный Босс, 俺の娘はラスボス, 灭世女神今年5岁, 我的女儿是最终的老板, 我的女兒是最終的老闆, Mi Hija es el Jefe Final

alt_title: ごめんなさいお嬢様、俺はメイドが好きなんです, Lo siento mucho Ojou Sama, pero a mí me gusta la sirvienta

title: Kodoku no Kochou wa Donna Yume wo Miru no ka?
alt_title: 蠱毒の胡蝶はどんな夢を見るのか？, What Does the Poisonous Butterfly Dream of?
description:
This world has been invaded by bugs.

With the appearance of the "Armored Bugs," mutating insect monsters that can overcome all modern weapons, humanity has been robbed of much of its living space. The only ones who can stand against such adversaries are the "Noble Butterflies," girls who harbor "Insects" that have gone through evolutions differing from the armored bugs.

One of the candidates to become a Noble Butterfly, Odamaki Ayumi, still suffers from the fact that she is unable to become one. Her best friend, who was supposed to be with her and was her object of admiration, has left her and no longer seeks her company.

Those days of despair came to an end when she was on the verge of death in a battle with armored bugs.
"Don't think that I... will die without doing anything!"

With the end near, the girl's body transformed into a butterfly one. And the flapping of her wings will bring about a revolution in the world...!
genre: Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Girls' Love, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Aliens, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Karasu Piero

title: Otona no Shoumei
alt_title: Erti Kedewasaan, オトナの証明, 恋爱身分证
description:
Tsubaki always appears experienced, but actually, she has never had a boyfriend even though she's already 16, and she's a real baby. She wants to quickly increase her love experiences, and become an adult! One day, she got called out by her math teacher, Shiina-sensei, and she was told that she'll have to take supplementary lessons. All alone in the math room with her sensei after school, Tsubaki's heart beat like crazy when she saw Shiina-sensei's facial expressions that were different from usual…?  
  
2. The Imprisoned Princess  
  
3. The Prince's Mantle  
  
4. The Upside Down Message
genre: Romance, Comedy, Anthology, School Life
author: Washio Mie

title: Bocchi the Rock!
alt_title: Bocchi the Rock!, ぼっち・ざ・ろっく！, 愛好·扎·搖滾！, 爱好·扎·摇滚！, Одинокий Рокер!
description:
Hitori Gotou is a high school girl who's starting to learn to play the guitar because she dreams of being in a band, 
but she's so shy that she hasn't made a single friend. 
However her dream might come true after she meets Nijika Ijichi, a drummer girl looking for a new guitarist for her band.
genre: Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life, Music
author: Hamaji Aki

title: Captain Commando: The Greatest Hero of All Time
description:
Based on Capcom's videogame.  
In the year 2026, Metro City is at the mercy of a vicious gang of super-criminals, lead by the villainous Lord Scumocide. Only one fighting force can prevent total catastrophe by standing up to these mutant maniacs - the Commando Team! GINZU - the Ninja Commando! MACK - the Mummy Commando! BABY HEAD - the Baby Commando! And, of course, the man himself, CAPTAIN COMMANDO – the greatest hero of all time!
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Superhero, Martial Arts, Adaptation
author: Tabuchi Kenkou

title: My Sweet Enemy, Thy Name Is Husband
alt_title: 상냥한 원수와의 정략결혼, Forced Into Wedlock With An Affectionate Enemy, Political Marriage With a Friendly Enemy
description:
My husband, my nemesis. Till death do us part.

Canach Riadon — a slave who rose to become the emperor and the man I wed in my first life. Yet our ill-fated marriage left my family murdered and my homeland destroyed at his hands. Now given a second chance, I vow to succeed in this political marriage and save all I love... Or will his love save me first?
genre: Time Travel, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Slope

title: Sensei, Suki
alt_title: Geki Kawa Kyoushi, Ijiwaru na oni Kyoushi, Kiken na Hokeni, Onna Kyoushi no Ikenai Koi, Sensei, Suki., 先生、スキ。, 老師，我愛你。
description:
Please, teach me about things we can't do !  
  
#1. Ijiwaru na oni Kyoushi…a pretentious and cruel teacher give her private lessons after school?!  
  
#2. Geki Kawa Kyoushi…a morose girl with glasses and a handsome teacher = don't tell me it'll have some alchemy between those two?!  
  
#3. Kiken na Hokeni …A kind and gentleman teacher is in fact not what he seems to be…!!  
  
#4. Onna Kyoushi no Ikenai Koi…Though she's dreaming about an adult and handsome man, she'll become close to a high school boy…?!
genre: Romance, Anthology, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Aikawa Hiro

title: Hell Warden Roruv
alt_title: Страж Ада Рорув
description:
Hell, The last place in the cycle of birth. 
Where every soul has to pass. 
Filled with judgment and punishment, And "Roruv," the young daughter of the Hell Lord. 
She's in charge of the 4th Hell. 
And today, she acted out her part excellently. 
To give punishment to those hell animals. Until...
genre: Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic
author: Kanor

title: Suki na Ko ga Megane wo Wasureta
alt_title: 好きな子がめがねを忘れた, Моя возлюбленная забыла свои очки, 좋아하는 애가 안경을 깜빡했다, 喜欢的人忘记戴眼镜了, 喜歡的女孩把眼鏡忘記了, The Girl I Like Forgot Her Glasses, La chica que me gusta olvidó sus lentes
description:
Komura is a middle school boy who is head-over-heels in love with his next-seat neighbor Mie, a girl with terrible eyesight who just can't get used to carrying her glasses, often leaving them at home, or accidentally breaking them. He opts to help her as much as he possibly can, and through those efforts, she begins getting acquainted with his kindness. Will she reciprocate?

---
A delightfully charming romantic comedy about a boy who only has eyes for the girl who always forgets her glasses!

With the new school year comes a new homeroom, new classmates, and a new desk for the timid Komura. But any trepidation he might've felt quickly dissipates when he catches sight of Mie, his new seat neighbor.

Apt to quietly blurt out the most random things, the quirky Mie wears thick glasses that accentuate her lovely eyes, making Komura’s heart skip a beat!

Unfortunately, Mie is pathologically forgetful and can never seem to remember to bring her glasses to class. It's not all bad, though! Her resulting squinty, mean-girl face sends Komura’s heart into overdrive too!

While Komura is keen to help out and share his textbooks with Mie, will his heart give out from the almost daily strain of being up close and personal with his crush?!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Fujichika Koume

title: Sonna Muboubi dato Daichauyo? Yajuu Host no Dekiai Sex
alt_title: そんな無防備だと抱いちゃうよ？～野獣ホストの溺愛SEX～, Careful, Or I'll Catch You! -The Wild Playboy's Doting Embrace-
description: Fuuka Takano works part-time at a bar. One day, when she gets caught up in a fight between customers, Kai, one of the regulars, comes to her rescue. Kai is a playboy who works as a host?not exactly Fuuka's type. But, when she invites him to her place so she can treat his wounds, he makes her allow him to stay there as her kept man until he's healed. Surprisingly, he turns out to be gentlemanly and kind as he lives in her home, and he has Fuuka's heart racing. At least, until one night when his behavior makes a complete reversal! He pushes her down and starts touching her most intimate places, getting her more than ready for action. Once the main event begins, Fuuka feels so good, she loses control! This wild playboy's doting embrace is so amazing, he has Fuuka's body and heart melting!
genre: Romance
author: Kuromisa

title: Otoko Girai na Bijin Shimai wo Namae mo Tsugezu ni Tasuketara Ittai Dounaru?
alt_title: 男嫌いな美人姉妹を名前も告げずに助けたら一体どうなる?, What Happens When You Save Two Beautiful Sisters Who Hate Men Without Telling Them Your Name?, The Case About Two Sisters Becoming Extremely Obsessed With Me After I Saved Them, El caso de dos hermanas que se obsesionaron conmigo después de que las salvara
description:
Arisa and Aina are beautiful sisters who are famous for their dislike of men. Hayato, a classmate who happened to be involved with the two, will receive "special treatment" from the girls who are supposed to hate men―?! 

"I want to be a slave to Hayato-sama..."
"I want to fall in love and conceive his child."

The long-awaited comicalization of the unpredictable rich romantic comedy has started!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Harem, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: Myon

title: Hardcore Leveling Warrior: Earth Game
description:
"I’m... back!"

After a comet collides on Earth, a gaming world filled with monsters and dungeons becomes a reality. Amidst the chaos, Gong Won-Ho wakes up as Hardcore Leveling Warrior, an almighty game character with exceptional luck and power.

Once again, he will embark on a journey to become the strongest... but this time, on Earth!
genre: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Kim Sehoon (김세훈)

title: Genius Archer’s Streaming
alt_title: 천재 궁수의 스트리밍
description:
Yoo Sanghyun, once the youngest champion in a national archery competition and a highly promising talent, saw his dreams shattered by a tragic accident that rendered him unable to handle a bow ever again.

Now, as a fallen prodigy, he faced the additional setback of being fired from the company he had joined. In order to make a living, he took on the persona of Almond and embarked on a new path as a gaming streamer.

[You have selected the bow.]
*Swish! Thunk!*
[Headshot!]

“Are bosses supposed to be defeated in a single shot?”

His exceptional talent once again shines through! Returning as a streaming genius, he sets off on an entertaining journey of rebellion!
genre: Action, Long Strip, Sports, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Full Color
author: Mung Mung Kim

title: Gozen 0-ji, Kiss Shi ni Kite yo
alt_title: Kiss Me at the Stroke of Midnight, 午前０時、キスしに来てよ, 午夜0点前，来接吻吧
description: Hinana is a high school girl who wakes up at 5am to prepare for school every day. She's also the Student Committee secretary. While she's quite serious, in reality she actually dreams of one day finding herself a prince. When a famous actor, Ayase Kaede, shoots a movie at their school during golden week, the Student Committee's members have to act as extras. Hinana thinks Ayase is just like the prince of her dreams until she finds out that in reality he's actually a pervert who has a butt fetish? A comedy romance starts.
genre: Romance, School Life
author: Mikimoto Rin

title: Apocalyptic Chef Awakening
alt_title: 멸망한 세계의 취사병, Myeolmanghan Segyeui Chwisabyeong
description: Shin Young-jun, a sergeant chef, was greeted by the apocalypse just days before vacation. The battalion turned into chaos in an instant, and the communication network was cut off. Then something appeared before his eyes! [Congratulations on your awakening!] [Job: Novice Chef Lv.1] If I had been a warrior or an assassin, I would have tried to stand alone... What was assigned to him was chef, which is obviously a support job. There's nothing to be done if it's like this. "From here on, I will feed you."
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Cooking, Full Color
author: 마일드커피

title: Chicha Koi Nikki
alt_title: A little love story, ちちゃこい日記, Nuestra pequeña historia
description: Nakamura Yukiko is a 13 year old middle school student, who lives together with her mother and her big brother. Since her mother got a new job, her family has recently moved from a small village in the mountains to the local town. Yukiko, however, misses her friends from the village and has problems adapting to the fast-paced town life. Will she ever come to like her new home?
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Sawa Misono

title: Beloved by the Male Lead's Nephew
alt_title: 남주의 조카가 나를 너무 좋아한다, Namjuui Jokaga Nareul Neomu Joahanda, The Male Lead's Nephew Loves Me So Much, The Main Male Character's Nephew Really Likes Me, 大公殿下の甥っ子に懐かれてしまいました, 男主角的姪子超黏我, El Sobrino Del Protagonista Masculino Me Quiere Mucho
description:
One day, my life suddenly come to an end, but I reincarnated as a the villainess of a romantic novel who is obsessed with and stalks the male lead, ultimately getting sentenced to death for trying to kill the female lead. I decided to try to avoid that by leaving the capital and living peacefully in the countryside, however, my dad requested that I come back to the capital because there was a huge mess going: it was reported that the royal heir who was believed to have died 7 years ago is actually alive! The little prince also just so happens to be the nephew of the male lead, who is now looking for him!! I didn’t want to get involved with that but unfortunately on my way to the capital, I rescued a little beggar child who turned out to be the lost royal heir and who is now extremely attached to me. In the original story, the female lead was supposed to find him so she could have the opportunity to meet the male lead, but what will happen to my peaceful life now that the original flow of the story seems to be changing?!!

---
After being reborn as a stalker villainess destined to die for trying to kill Archduke Calix Elluiden's lover, Charlize Lienta fled from the capital to stay away from the archduke at all costs. But her plan goes awry when she returns a year later and rescues a poor boy on the streets... because he turns out to be Sasha, Calix's long-lost nephew! Given her infamous reputation as Calix's stalker, will Charlize succeed in returning Sasha without raising the archduke's suspicions?

---
[Original Web Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/58448925)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%A8%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%98-%EC%A1%B0%EC%B9%B4%EA%B0%80-%EB%82%98%EB%A5%BC-%EB%84%88%EB%AC%B4-%EC%A2%8B%EC%95%84%ED%95%9C%EB%8B%A4/3548), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/62000958)
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Mochapanna (모카판나)

title: Citrus +
alt_title: Citrus Plus, citrus+, Цитрус+, シトラスプラス, citrus～柑橘味香氣PLUS～, citrus～柑橘味香气PLUS～
description: High schoolers (and stepsisters) Yuzu and Mei have gone public with their relationship! The two are happy to be dating out in the open, but friends and family keep trying to butt in with advice. Can Yuzu and Mei figure things out on their own?
genre: Romance, Incest, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Saburouta

title: Goblin's Night
alt_title: 도깨비의 밤, Dokkaebi's Night, Night of the Goblin, Noche de Duendes
description:
“The complex of the boy, Choi Si-woo, is being overweight. Choi Si-woo runs and runs around his house until past midnight, and he encounters an old man on a walking trail. In the blink of an eye, the old man covers Choi Si-woo with the straw backpack he is carrying. Where Choi Si-woo had stumbled upon was an enormously wide ruined traditional Korean house (hanok).

At the edge of the spacious courtyard, surrounding him on the courtyard, there were numerous black shadows standing. To the bewildered Choi Si-woo, the old man speaks. Once every 666 years, a ceremony is held to select the king of Yokai and each Yokai in this world possesses one entry ticket for it. And Choi Si-woo is, in fact, a hybrid of a human and a goblin, inheriting the blood of an extinct goblin. Among the goblin folk, only Choi Si-woo possesses the entry ticket. As the sole survivor inheriting the blood of a goblin, the adventure of the half-monster boy, Choi Si-woo, begins.”
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Munsik

title: Shen Yin Wang Zuo
alt_title: Sealed Divine Throne, Трон, отмеченный Богом, 神印王座, 신인왕좌, Throne of Seal
description: While the demons were rising, mankind was about to become extinct. Six temples rose, and protected the last of mankind. A young boy joins the temple as a knight to save his mother. During his journey of wonders and mischief in the world of temples and demons, will he be able to ascend to become the strongest knight and inherit the throne?
genre: Action, Demons, Romance, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Tang Jia San Shao (神漫君)

title: I Became the Contract Daughter of the soon-to-be-ruined Family
alt_title: 곧 망할 가문의 계약직 딸이 되었다
description:
I thought I had regressed from this ragged life, but why has my time-limited life remained the same?
I'm ruined... is this how I should live my life...?

"This time, I'll get adopted by a normal family, and live in comfort for the rest of my life!"

Step by step, I'm going to take revenge against the one behind my death, and I'll protect what's left of my small and precious life!

However, did I put in too much effort?

"Anisha, you're perfect."

"I'm going to make this child a future professor."

All I wanted was to survive...

"Well, somehow, you’ve passed. I'll have to adopt this brat."

I ended up with a tycoon I didn't expect.
One whose household will be massacred in a few years!

How do I know that?
Me too! I didn't want to! Know that!

But what can I do? The milk has already been spilt.
I'll just live in bliss while acting as the real daughter during my 5 years contract, then I'll leave!

However...

"...I happened to pick this up on the way home."
"Father, you're the best!"
"I know."

...Something's wrong.

"I checked this out 'myself', and inspected it 'in person'. There's nothing to be grateful for."
"Father, you're a genius!"
"I know this too."

No, well, something's REALLY wrong.

**

I became fond of this unique and strange family, but...

"The five years contract we signed,"
"Let's nullify it."

While looking straight into my eyes, dad announced the termination.

"I can help you, but you'll still die anyway."

Not only that,
But death came under my nose too.

Will I be able to survive?
genre: Time Travel, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: SETE

title: Karakai Jouzu no (Moto) Takagi-san
alt_title: Skilled Teaser (Former) Takagi-san, Мастер дразнилок (Бывшая) Такаги-сан, からかい上手の（元）高木さん
description:
Takagi and Nishikata are now married and have a kindergarten-aged daughter named Chi. See how much some things have changed, and others have curiously stayed the same!  
  
*Note: The volumes collect the chapters in a different order than the web version. The chapters here follow the web numbering without any volumes.*
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Inaba Mifumi

title: Childhood Friend, Big Love
alt_title: 天使だった幼なじみ、再会したらギャルだった, My Angel Childhood Friend was a Gal When We Met Again, 幼馴染BIGLOVE
description: I once had a childhood friend who was an angel. However, when we met again, several years later, she had become a gyaru. A yuri story between two childhood friends.
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Gyaru
author: Kanno Fumi

title: Migawari Hakushaku no Bouken
alt_title: The Substitute Count Adventure, 替身伯爵的冒险, 身代わり伯爵の冒険
description:
Mireille is the daughter of a bakery owner and her twin brother Fred was adopted into another family when they were kids. One day a letter from her brother arrived, saying he was in love with another man’s woman. She replied, challenging him to be a man and claim the woman as his.  
  
Two months later, a beautiful young man named Richard, claiming to be a messenger from Fred, visits and tells her “I’ve come for you.” When the bewildered Mireille resists, he proceeds to kidnap her! It turns out that Fred has eloped with the crown prince’s fiance, and it is now her responsibility to impersonate Fred – the former Count of Bernhardt!
genre: Historical, Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing
author: Seike Mimori

title: Moritat
alt_title: Моритат, 모리타트
description:
"I woke up with nothing but fragments of memories from my life up to now. There was a man standing by my bed, who introduced himself as my lover. But one of my few recollections is of being left for dead in a snowy field by this very same man…  
  
Still, he looks like the only one who can provide me with the answers I need. Who the hell is he? What was the real relationship between the two of us?"
genre: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Boys' Love, Drama, Mystery
author: Li Seon Ui

title: Hibari's Morning
alt_title: ひばりの朝, 日波里的清晨
description: Teshima Hibari is a 14-year-old girl with a body that is more sensual than most girls her age. Her story includes the opinions and reactions of all of the people around her, as well as the actions of her own life. The chapters explore the thoughts and feelings of classmates and adults, men and women. The males often have romantic or sexual feelings for Hibari, while the women sometimes have feelings of inferiority or jealousy. Whether positive or negative, it seems everyone has a reaction to Hibari.
genre: Psychological, Romance, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Yamashita Tomoko

title: Ouran High School Host Club
alt_title: Гостевой клуб лицея Оран, Хост-клуб школы Оран, 桜蘭高校ホスト部, 櫻蘭高校男公關部, 오란고교 호스트부
description: One day, Haruhi, a scholarship student at exclusive Ouran High School, breaks an $80,000 vase that belongs to the "Host Club," a mysterious campus group consisting of six super-rich (and gorgeous) guys. To pay back the damages, she is forced to work for the club, and it's there that she discovers just how wealthy the boys are and how different they are from everybody else. [Viz]
genre: Romance, Comedy, Reverse Harem, Crossdressing, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Hatori Bisco

title: Bocchi the Rock! - Boniji the Rock! (Doujinshi)
alt_title: ぼにじ・ざ・ろっく！
genre: Oneshot, Girls' Love, Doujinshi, Slice of Life, Music
author: Rot

title: My Fair Neighbor
alt_title: My Fair Neighbour, マイ・フェア・ネイバー, 阳光邻居
description: Sakura Yuki and his neighbor, Momo were separated during Yuki's third year of high school because of a certain incident. Yuki thought that they weren't really friends considering that there was a 12-year age gap between him and young Momo. But 10 years later, Momo, now a high school student, becomes Yuki's neighbor once again. Momo is eager to be friends again but Yuki feels differently as he remembers things he buried in his heart long ago. Momo and Yuki battle their past and present to slowly become closer than ever.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Megumi Morino

title: A Girl's Trial
alt_title: Girl on Trial, 소녀재판, Sonyeojaepan, Girl’s Trial, Girl Under Trial
description: An unexpected series of trials begin for a girl who was close to the bottom of the school hierarchy. The winner gets a prize!
genre: Thriller, Long Strip, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Rusena (루즌아)

title: The Creator is on Hiatus
alt_title: I’ll be Taking a Break for Personal Reasons, Temporarily Closed for Work Reasons, 일신상의 이유로 잠시 휴재합니다, El creador está en hiatus
description:
My name is Yu Il-shin, and I'm a shitty, third-rate novelist.
My name might be "Only God" in Korean, but don't actually pray to me. It's just a name.

This one random day, I finally get my wish of awakening... but my ability is kind of strange.

I'm able to connect to a small world through my smartphone, where the weak ants there worship me as god!
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Kim Eui Sun

title: Akuyaku Onzoushi no Kanchigai Seija Seikatsu - Nidome no Jinsei wa Yaritai Houdai Shitai Dake na no ni
alt_title: 悪役御曹司の勘違い聖者生活～二度目の人生はやりたい放題したいだけなのに～, 悪役御曹司の勘違い聖者生活, The Misunderstood Saintly Life of a Villainous Scion ~ I just want to do whatever I want in my second life~
description:
Intending to Live a Carefree Life as a Villainous Heir, But Inadvertently Declared a Saint!?

"My path to domination starts here!"

Ouga Vellet, the eldest son of the infamous corrupt lordly Vellet family, is a reincarnated individual. Having been taken advantage of due to his kindness in his past life, he now revels in the life of a mischievous villainous heir. From then on, Ouga spared no compromise, pushing the limits of "tyranny" to achieve his ambitions.

He wanted power. He decided to deceive the expelled female knight captain and recruit her as a pawn. He desired a harem. He believed that by helping the oppressed commoner girls, they would readily accept him. He even saw potential in operating within the underworld. His plan was to start by squeezing the bad guys. Connections were also crucial. He aimed to excel in the Magic Academy. Thus, he envisioned his days as a carefree ruler (+effort) under the authority of his family... But things took an unexpected turn.

"Wow, Ouga-sama, you're amazing!"

...Just for "arrogant behavior," why does his reputation keep soaring without his control?

However, Ouga remains unaware. He doesn't yet know that this evaluation will become something beyond his own management. Where will the misunderstanding lead? A self-declared saint due to a misunderstanding about being a villainous heir? The curtain rises on a life of misconceptions and misconceived saintliness!
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Kinome (木の芽)

title: Contradict
alt_title: コントラディクト
description: A cocky and confident Yajima harbors dislike for Torikai, a cool and talented fellow trainee in the Rescue Team. The two constantly quarrel, but one day they cross the line while squabbling and end up sleeping together. Yajima regrets it, but at the same time he cannot get Torikai's pleading expression out of his head. However, because they have been rivals until now, he just can't bring himself to be honest with Torikai.
genre: Romance, Boys' Love
author: Oshima Kamome

title: Doukyonin wa Hiza, Tokidoki, Atama no Ue
alt_title: 同居人はひざ、時々、頭のうえ。, My Roommate Is a Cat, My Housemate Is Sometimes on My Lap, Sometimes on My Head, Домашний питомец, иногда сидящий на моей голове, До:кёнин ва хидза, токидоки, атама но уэ, мой сосед у меня на коленях, а иногда и на моей голове, 동거인은 무릎, 때때로, 머리 위, 同居人时而在腿上、时而跑到脑袋上。, 同居人是貓, 同居人時而在腿上、時而跑到腦袋上。
description:
Mystery writer Mikazuki Subaru, who isn't good at dealing with people, finds them to be a disturbance when it comes to building his imaginary world. One day, he chances upon a stray cat and feels inspiration strike so he brings the cat home as his muse. Can watching the inexplicable behaviors of a cat form material for a novel?

Featuring perspectives from the human's point of view as well as the cat's!

---
A socially awkward man X a cat he found Mystery writer Mikazuki Subaru, who isn’t good at dealing with people, finds them to be a disturbance when it comes to building his imaginary world. One day, he chances upon a stray cat and feels inspiration strike so he brings the cat home as his muse. Can watching the inexplicable behaviors of a cat form material for a novel? Featuring perspectives from the human’s point of view as well as the cat’s!

---

title: Maid Skater
alt_title: メイドスケーター
description:
Benihana is a young woman who always wanted to become a maid. Their perfectly pressed uniforms, their brilliant coiffed hair, their catlike dexterity when shredding on a skateboard, their tendency to smile no matter what chores they do…

Beg pardon? “Maids don’t skateboard?” Au contraire! A maid’s entire worth is in their shredding capabilities. All the greatest maids know how to skate - Mary Poppins, Mrs. Doubtfire, Amelia Bedelia, Tony Hawk… and now that Hana has finally become a maid, it’s time for her to follow in their footsteps!

A new serialization based on the author Suzushiro’s drawings of maids on skateboards!

**Warning: These maids are professionals - do not try their stunts at home. Always wear a helmet under your maid’s bonnet.**
genre: Comedy, Sports, Slice of Life
author: Suzushiro (すずしろ)

title: Gannibal
alt_title: ガンニバル, Ганнибал
description: When a police officer is posted to a remote village in the countryside, little does he realize he's encroaching on a community of cannibals…
genre: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Crime, Survival, Gore, Drama, Horror, Police, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Ninomiya Masaaki

title: UNDEAD
alt_title: UNDEAD -アンデッド, UNDEAD: Finding Love in the Zombie Apocalypse
description:
The world has fallen to ruin due to an unknown virus that brings the dead back to life as zombies that attack people.

Hikaru is a high school student who was attacked by his zombified mother. He escaped together with his childhood friend, Ai, whom he looked up to as an older brother. However, Hikaru is unable to accept the misfortune that suddenly befell him. On the other hand, Ai, who has watched over Hikaru since they were young…

Can love be obtained in
a world that has fallen into ruins?!

An apocalyptic BL to watch out for!
genre: Thriller, Boys' Love, Zombies, Gore, Horror, Tragedy
author: Tsuyuhisa Fumi

title: Strongest Level 1
alt_title: Unbeatable Level 1, Unbeatable Lv.1, 최강 레벨 1, Непобедимый первый уровень, Сильнейший первый уровень
description:
The raid failed. 

In a desperate situation due to the impending suicide bombing of the dungeon boss, Lee Gon-woo was betrayed by his teammates, and abandoned in the boss’s room. Just when he thought it was all over, a dagger suddenly fell into his hands. And from that moment his life changed dramatically.

His life was saved, but all the levels he gained with such difficulty have reset, making him level 1.

[You have caught a "mosquito". Your level has increased.]

"My level should have gone up, but why is nothing happening?!"
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Kim Dong-Hyuk

title: Koushaku Reijou ni Tensei shiteshimatta node, Mental Otome na Ore wa, Zenryoku de Onnanoko wo Tanoshimimasu
alt_title: 公爵令嬢に転生してしまったので、メンタル乙女な俺は、全力で女の子を楽しみます, Since I Have Been Reincarnated as the Daughter of a Duke, I, the "Girl Inside," Will Enjoy Being a Girl as Much as I Can!
description:
A humble man in his twenties suddenly dies and is reborn as the daughter of a duke in an 18th-century lookalike world where magic exists!
He is now living a second life as the adorable "Miranda Mirandiehl," who looks like a doll.
As he was always a "girl inside" with girlish interests, he accepted his reincarnation surprisingly easily.
And so, after being reborn as Miranda, he will enjoy his new life to the fullest!
What kind of encounters await him, and what lies ahead in his gender-swapped otherworldly reincarnation life?
genre: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Shachi

alt_title: アイドルマスター シャイニーカラーズ 事務的光空記録
description:
"283 Production" is a place where idols with striking personalities hang out and gather, a tiny yet lively agency that makes them feel right at home.
Dealing with phone calls, preparing documents, accounting expenses, and so on... With a job different from "producing", office staff are the ones who support idols who shine.
283 Production's office staff, Nanakusa Hazuki. Being a staff, a daughter, and an older sister, the experiences she gathered from her daily life and her feelings shall become the light to help the idols "shine". 
A new "Idolm@ster Shiny Colors" will begin to unfold──from the perspective of an office staff!

alt_title: Different World Foundation, Otherworld Nation Founding Chronicles, Покорение иного мира, 異世界建国記, 异世界建国记, 異世界建國記, 이세계 건국기
description:
A protagonist reborn in another world.  Apparently he had been reincarnated as an abandoned child.  Before his eyes were abandoned children like him.  In order to survive, he led them into farming.  Little by little, orphans gathered, and upon hearing rumors of a village, others began to migrate.

The group that had been nothing but children had become a village before anyone realized. Then various countries in the surroundings started to have an eye on it. This is the epic tale of the man who would later be known as the Divine Emperor.

title: Pizzicato no Nemuru Mori
alt_title: ピチカートの眠る森, Sleeping Pizzicato Forest
description: Emilie has lived a sheltered life. Longing for a life like the protagonist in her beloved novel who shares the same name, Emilie leaves home on her own and travels to the villa inherited from her great-great-grandfather on Hazama Hill. There, she finds a sleeping backpacker named Shura and many mysterious creatures!
genre: Romance, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Mystery
author: Yukimura Alto

title: Studio Cabana
alt_title: スタジオカバナ
description: Yukari Maki, a diligent high school girl. One day, she spots her classmate, Yusuke Kusaka, who was rumored to be a delinquent, singing a love song. Never having imagined such a sweet, yet sad, singing voice could come from him, Yukari was instantly captivated—without knowing that it would soon be the beginning of a sad, unrequited love.
genre: Romance, Drama, School Life, Music
author: Uma Aguri

title: Gachiakuta
alt_title: Гачиакута, ガチアクタ, Real Trash
description:
A slum where criminals' descendants live... People beyond the border look down and discriminate them as "tribal people." Ludo, an orphan boy, lives in the slum with his foster parent, Legt, and makes a living using his extraordinary physical abilities. However, one day, he was accused for a crime he didn't commit., and is thrown into the "abyss" which even the slum people fear.

---
Living in the slums of a wealthy town, Rudo and his foster father Legto try to coexist with the rest of the town's residents, but Rudo despises the wastefulness of the upper class. Ignoring the warnings from those around him, Rudo regularly rummages through the town's garbage in search of anything useful or valuable to save from the "Abyss"—a massive hole where anything considered trash is dumped, including people. Rudo's biological father was one such person, having been thrown into the Abyss after he was accused of murder.

One day, after running into a mysterious figure on the way home, Rudo returns to find Legto's dying body on the floor. He is immediately found at the scene by the authorities and is charged with murder. No one believes his claims of innocence, and he is thrown into the Abyss. Instead of dying, however, he finds himself in a strange, foul-smelling place surrounded by monsters made out of trash.

When Rudo is attacked by said monsters, he is saved by a man named Engine, who reveals himself to be a "janitor"—someone who uses special weapons called "jinkis" to combat these creatures. In order to get his revenge on the one who killed Legto, Rudo reluctantly becomes a janitor to fight his way back up and out of the Abyss.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10010/episode/325146) (U.S. Only)
genre: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Survival, Drama, Fantasy, Delinquents, Supernatural, Tragedy

title: Lillien of Turin
alt_title: 튜린의 릴리엔, Turin'eui Lillien, A Match Made in Mana, Leylin of Turin, Lily of Turin, Turin's Lillian, 重生，逆转悲惨命运的莉莉安
description: Lilienne Islar died an abusive mother, a neglected wife, and a cast-off stepsister. So when she suddenly opens her eyes again as her younger self, she decides to set things right with the people in her life. Luckily, her stepbrother's a secret softie who's easy to win over. Her fiancé, on the other hand, is a magic-powered war machine doomed for insanity. With an illness draining her mana daily, will Lilienne have the strength to save her future husband and maybe even the whole empire?
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Na Yoo Hye

title: Isso Anata ga Todome wo Sashite
alt_title: いっそあなたがトドメを刺して, Better You Give Me The Final Blow
description:
Ichika is a female college student who wants to have a normal relationship, but is often judged by her appearance. One night at a drinking party she attended, hoping to have a wonderful encounter, she met Kousei who was kind to her. She is attracted to him because they got the same interest, enjoys talking with him and he likes her just the way she is — but she didn't know he had a secret no one knows about. 

(Source: heartbuzz2d)
genre: Romance, Slice of Life
author: Seto Megumu

title: Fist of the Blue Sky: Regenesis
alt_title: 蒼天の拳 RE:GENESIS, 蒼天の拳 リジェネシス
description: The year is 1939 and the world is plunged into chaos during the onslaught of WWII. After completing the initiation ritual, the 62nd Successor of Hokuto Shinken, Kasumi Kenshiro, is called upon by the destiny of Hokuto. He embarks on a new journey to the Dutch East Indies (Indonesia) which is crawling with the Dutch Army along with an anonymous user who wields a mysterious fist!
genre: Historical, Action, Crime, Martial Arts, Adventure, Gore
author: Yatsu Hiroyuki

title: The Age of Arrogance
alt_title: 오만의 시대, Omane Sidae, The Era of Pride, City of Arrogance, Эпоха высокомерия, 傲慢の時代, 傲慢的时代, 傲慢的時代
description:
The lord of Pervaz, who led the 28-year war to victory, Asha Pervaz. 

For Pervaz, who was devastated by the long war, Asha heads to the imperial family to receive the victory reward promised by the emperor.  However, the only reward that came back was the "right to choose a marriage partner." 

As the best choice, Asha pointed out the Duke of Carlisle Haven, the first prince who had recently been deprived of the title of crown prince.  If she was refused, she intended to receive compensation from the emperor... 

"Marquise Perbaz. I will accept your marriage proposal." 

Contrary to expectations, the Duke of Carlisle accepted Asha's choice.  Promising tremendous support for Pervaz...!

---
After winning a long war, Asha Pervaz is expecting the emperor to compensate her with money. Unlike her expectations though, the emperor asks Asha to choose her own husband from a list of nobles. Asha chooses Duke Carlisle Haven, the emperor’s eldest son and former crown prince. Asha expects him to object and pay an alimony instead, but the duke actually agrees to marry her! He even promises to help Asha rebuild Pervaz. What does the duke really want? And will Asha get what she wants without getting embroiled in the growing royal conspiracy?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Lemon Frog (레몬개구리)

title: Arifureta Shokugyou de Sekai Saikyou
alt_title: Arifureta: From Commonplace to World's Strongest, Арифурэта, Арифурэта: Сильнейший ремесленник в мире, Стать сильнейшим благодаря обычной профессии, ありふれた職業で世界最強, 平凡职业成就世界最强, 흔해빠진 직업으로 세계최강, El más fuerte del mundo en una profesión mundana
description:
Among the class transported to another world, Nagumo Hajime is an ordinary male student who didn’t have ambition nor aspiration in life, and thus called “Incompetent” by his classmates.
The class was summoned to become heroes and save a country from destruction. Students of the class were blessed with cheat specifications and cool job class, however, it was not the case with Hajime, with his profession as a “Synergist”, and his very mediocre stats. “Synergist”, to put it in another word was just artisan class. Being the weakest, he then falls to the depth of the abyss when he and his classmates were exploring a dungeon. What did he find in the depth of the abyss, and can he survive?


---

title: Zashisu
alt_title: ザシス
description:
One day, junior high school teacher Yamauchi Umi sees a news report about a murder case. The murderer is Suzuki Yumi, a classmate from junior high school.

A few days later, Yamauchi's girlfriend, Tamahuri Yagisawa, a rookie editor of literary books, finds a work that closely resembles the murder in a novel that was unsuccessful in a public contest. The author's name is Haruto Saeki. Soon, just like in the novel, an invitation to a class reunion arrives for an old friend...

The first suspense horror volume by Masanori Morita!
genre: Horror, Mystery
author: Morita Masanori

title: Zatsu Tabi: That's Journey

description:
Chika Suzugamori, a rookie manga artist, has been getting rejected every time she submits a new draft.

On the verge of giving up, she suddenly gets the idea of going on a journey-

A journey that heals precisely because it's rough - the ultimate travel comic!

title: Isekai Bishoujo Juniku Ojisan to
alt_title: 異世界美少女受肉おじさんと, ファ美肉, Фантастический мир с обращённым в красавицу мужчиной и…, 이세계 미소녀가 되어 버린 아저씨와, With a Fogie Reincarnated as a Pretty Fantasy Girl, Life with an Ordinary Guy Who Reincarnated into a Total Fantasy Knockout
description:
Hinata Tachibana, a beleaguered 32-year-old office worker, and his handsome best friend Tsukasa Jinguuji were summoned to another world by a naked goddess. However, because of the goddess's mischief, Tachibana was turned into a peerless beautiful girl?! To get back his body, he has to go on a journey with his best friend to defeat the demon king!!   
  
However… will they be able to keep their hands off each other!?  
  
"An older man that became a beautiful girl" and "A handsome older man"! Let the madness-filled another world journey rom-com begin!!
genre: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Office Workers, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy
author: Tsurusaki Yuu

title: Isekai Saikouhou no Guild Leader ~Guild Saijaku no Boku da Kedo, Guild Members Zen'in no ai ga Omokute Guild o Yameraremasen~
alt_title: 異世界最高峰のギルドリーダー～ギルド最弱の僕だけど、ギルメン全員の愛が重くてギルドをやめられません～, Another World's Highest Guild Leader: I'm the Weakest in the Guild, But I Can't Quit the Guild Because of the Heavy Love of All the Guild Members
description: I thought that if I reincarnated, I would be able to build a happy harem and be peerless in another world...! ! The guild that was created on a whim has become the pinnacle guild of strong men. Moreover, except for me, everyone is handsome and beautiful. I'm the weakest in the guild... can I quit the guild now? The opening of the dark fantasy of the lethargic hero and the guild members who adore him at the level of worship――
genre: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Hinami Yui

title: Tsuihousareru Tabi ni Skill wo Te ni Ireta Ore ga, 100 no Isekai de 2-shuume Musou
alt_title: 追放されるたびにスキルを手に入れた俺が、100の異世界で2周目無双, I Got a New Skill Every Time I Was Exiled, and After 100 Different Worlds, I Was Unmatched, Unmatched in 100 Different Worlds — I Gain a New Skill Every Time I Get Banished, 每遭放逐就能獲得技能的我，在100個世界大開第二輪無雙, 每遭放逐就能获得技能的我，在100个世界大开第二轮无双
description:
An adventurer named Ed was exiled from his party because he was considered useless, but instead of being sad and upset he was actually happy!!?

It turns out that it's not without reason that he feels happy when he's exiled from his party, because every time he's been exiled he will receive a skill that makes him even more invincible...
- - -
Ed was given the crazy test of having to get expelled from 100 Hero parties in 100 different worlds before he could return to his original world. Finally a mysterious and divine entity said that he had achieved all the conditions to return to his original world.

However, as a final condition he is asked “Look at the fate of one of these exile worlds after you left.” and he is shocked by what he sees.

“Okay, I’ll do it! I’ll go down to these 100 worlds again and be banished with a good feeling!” Ed takes on a new challenge to make full use of the super-powerful “Exiled Skills” that were granted each time he was exiled, and this time ensure they all have happy endings.

Only this time he is accompanied to these 100 worlds by a former companion…
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: Hinoura Takumi

title: Onsaemiro
alt_title: 온새미로, Онсэмиро, 香炉奇缘, 溫塞米羅的愛
description:
To prepare for her audition to cast in the upcoming historical drama, “Muyoung Tower,” would-be actress Haeri visits the Buyeo National Museum, where she finds the “gilt bronze incense burner,” an old Baekje artifact. Thanks to her, Onsaemiro, the son of a god who had been lying dormant in the incense burner, awakens, and the cycle of fate starts to move once again…

genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life
author: Ryon

title: The Archduke's Fabulous Fake Marriage
alt_title: 그 대공의 화려한 결혼은 사기, The Archduke's Gorgeous Wedding Was a Fraud
description:
I possessed the body of the fourth villainess, Shay, who was miserably killed by the other villains for desperately clinging to the male lead.
However, the male lead suddenly offered me an enormous amount of money, in exchange for a contract marriage to help him escape various romantic advances.

"You have to be the most gorgeous and wicked woman in the empire, so that no one will dare to approach me."

...Isn't this marriage a fraud?
Was what I was going to say, but the amount of money he offered was too tempting to refuse. Alright, before the original female lead appears, I'll show them who's the crazy bitch here.

"Dear customer, I'll do my best to help you!"
 
I was confident this was the original plan, however...
This man, whose affection and warmth know no bounds, said he can't imagine a life without me!

I think I somehow ended up getting money, power and even love!
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color
author: 은려원

title: Hakobiya ni wa Omosugiru
alt_title: 運び屋には重すぎる, Too Heavy For The Courier
description: Bruno is a courier in a world of monsters and magic. He is a self-proclaimed cool guy who works with a very cold attitude due to his rebelliousness against his parent, but he is offered a new job to transport a magical baby... Innocence attacks the cool guy! A magical child drama one-shot!
genre: Oneshot, Monsters, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy
author: Yamori Maki

title: Black Winter
alt_title: 블랙윈터, ブラックウィンター, 凜冬暗夜
description:
One dark winter night, a boy was cursed and a girl was guilty.  
  
One fresh winter day,   
she sinned, and I also sinned.   
He said that if you commit a crime that night, you will receive a terrifying penalty.   
Was this the biggest punishment we would receive for breaking the taboo?   
I had to kill my loved ones…   
And I had to die at the hands of my loved ones.   
Crime and Punishment.   
Love and death as the two names make up a perfect match .  
  
You and I have suffered the most perfect punishment.  

---
13-year old Haesa watched as her world fell apart. Within a day, her best friends Muho, Muha, and Hwaye were gone, leaving her utterly alone in the cold winter forest—until she meets him.  
10 years later, can Haesa reunite with those she's lost, and uncover the truth of what really happened that fateful day?
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Chung-Na

title: Tensei Daiseijo No Isekai Nonbiri Kikou
alt_title: 転生大聖女の異世界のんびり紀行, The Casual Chronicles of a Great Saint, The Great Saint's Carefree Journey to Another World.
description:
Hirune Hanamaki is a 22-year-old office worker who fits your common isekai tropes - overworked, underappreciated, and fated to kiss the front of a truck barreling towards her at 80 kilometers per hour. When she comes to, she meets a goddess who tells her of her passing, and offers to provide her another chance.

Before she knows it, Hirune is whisked off to another world, now with the body of a little girl. She is picked up by a passing priest, who is amazed by her innate magical powers and suggests that she become a saint. Hirune, who wants nothing more than to live a lazy, carefree life, immediately accepts… only to find out that a saint actually does a LOT of work. 

Can Hirune work her way to becoming the ultimate saint, so that she can obtain a less rigorous work schedule?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10512/episode/347155) (U.S. Only)
genre: Reincarnation, Loli, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

title: Chasing the Wave
alt_title: 逐浪, Chasing Tides
description:
A mature and reliable Leader x A pure and frivolous Bubbly guy

Sui Yi claims that Ning Lan hasn't spoken a word in truth, and later discovers that even his "I don't like you" was a lie. He was crazy to consider this person as kind solely based on his pure and naive smile. His clear eyes were just like those of that person's...
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Yu Cheng

title: Mobile Suit Gundam: The battle tales of Flanagan Boone
alt_title: 機動戦士ガンダム フラナガン・ブーン戦記
description:
A new tragic tale from the "One Year War" unfolds. Flanagan Boone, a Zeon soldier, trained under his beloved Commander Garma Zabi, but then, the Gundam, the "White Devil of the Federation," appeared... A new One Year War begins from the perspective of Flanagan Boone, who appeared in the famous episode "Across the Atlantic Ocean
" (Episode 28) of the "Mobile Suit Gundam" anime!
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha, Drama, Web Comic, Tragedy

title: Karakai Jouzu no Takagi-san
alt_title: Skilled Teaser Ms. Takagi, Мастер дразнилок Такаги-сан, からかい上手の高木さん, 擅长捉弄的高木同学, 장난을 잘치는 타카기 양, Teasing Master Takagi-san
description:
*If you blush, you lose!*  Living by this principle, the middle schooler Nishikata gets constantly made fun of by his seat neighbour Takagi-san. With his pride shattered to pieces, he vows to turn the tables and get back at her someday.   And so, he attempts to tease her day after day, only to find himself falling victim to Takagi-san's ridicule again sooner than later. Will he be able to make Takagi-san blush from embarrassment even once in the end? English Chapters have been renumbered to their tank numbers, where applicable.*

---
- **Won the 66th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 2021**
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Yamamoto Souichirou

title: Undercover Darling
alt_title: 언더커버 달링
description: The daily life of Lee Jae, a hot-blooded police officer in a quiet rural village, is turned upside down by the reunion with his first love.Who would have thought that his first love, who had suddenly disappeared without a word one day, would reappear before him as a gangster?"Just bear with it a little longer. I'm going to do everything that I've been putting off today."Can he resist that dirty handsome face that he never wanted to see again?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Hot Fuzzy Comics

title: Shout Loud My Heart
alt_title: シャウト・ラウド・マイハート
description:
Feelings that cannot be put into words are put into music--

Gen, a university student who plays guitar in the rock band "Eve," meets a man named Mike at a live music venue one day.
He smokes cigarettes and talks about whatever he likes, making him seem like a shady guy.
But what Gen hears is a clear, straightforward, one-of-a-kind singing voice.

The next day, the two discover they are attending the same university.
Gen is normally not interested in other people, but Mike's voice is special.
Whether he's singing or talking, it slips into his heart.

If that voice were to woo him--
Before he knew it, Gen was even thinking about such things...
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, Music
author: Youga Reiri

title: The Kind Older Sister Is No More
alt_title: 착한 언니는 없다, There’s No Good Sister, Chakan Eonnineun Eopda, No More Nice Sis
description:
Irene has always been living in the shadow of her ill and frail sister, Riel. She believed that she could and had to do everything for her family… until Riel stole everything from her.

After realizing that there is no place for her in her home, and that she was never loved by her family, Irene decides to do her utmost to become independent, and in doing so, crosses paths with Noel Kristen, a man who has been subjected to a much similar fate…

“We may be able to save each other.”
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Selim

title: Gotou-san wa Furimukasetai! (Pre-serialization)
alt_title: 後藤さんは振り向かせたい, Gotou-san Wants Me to Turn Around, 後藤同學想讓你回頭
description: Gotou-san, the prettiest girl in school, tries to get the attention of Maeda-kun, who sits in front of her. She secretly harbors a crush on him, but Maeda, who lacks self-confidence, doesn't notice her feelings. What is the future of Gotou-san's unwavering love?
genre: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Mikipon

title: My In-laws Are Obsessed With Me
alt_title: 시월드가 내게 집착한다, The In-Laws Are Obsessed With Me
description:
My family and my husband killed me. Because of the inheritance. Returning to the past, I made up my mind.

“I have to protect my life and my inheritance.”

Grand Duke Lapireon of the cursed family. I offered him, who was not interested in property and women, a one year contract marriage. Now, all we have to do is get a divorce…

“Lady, do you think you can leave me now?”

My husband is weird.

“Would you like a land or a mine? Or an empire?”

“Sasha, did Theo do something wrong?”

“Mom, don’t leave me.”

“Sister… I can’t live without you.”

Even my in-laws began to obsess over me.

(Taken from NU)
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Han Yoon Seol (한윤설)

title: Kakeru
alt_title: カケル
description: When high school student Kakeru Daiba runs for long enough, he enters into a runner's high state that heightens his senses. When his crush, Natsume, disappears mysteriously one day he's forced to use his ability in ways he never expected.

alt_title: 重生之纣王不做大反派
description: Liu Nian enters a game called ‘Glory Continent’ and discovers after his death that he is the reincarnation of King Zhou. Enchanting beast-eared girls, cold and beautiful mature women, sweet and adorable lolis… a harem of beauties for him to choose from. In this life, he decides not to be the ultimate villain. He wants all the stunning beauties and to overturn the heavens in the new round of the Ultimate Venerate/God Battle, aiming to become the top deity!

alt_title: 正反対なわたしたち, Encounter Between Polar Opposites and Their Dogs, We are Opposites

A man and a woman with opposite personalities and two dogs meet while out for a walk.

 Fluffy small dog x chattering boyfriend,

 There is no doubt that you will be warmed by the gap moe that fills the screen!!

alt_title: 死なずの少女は百鬼と契る, The Immortal Girl and Her Contract With the Demon
description: Kamiya Yuiko, a girl who can see ayakashi and is unable die. Because of this, she spends her days alone, drifting apart from family and friends. Her life changes when she meets the so called "Demon Club", a number of boys possessing mysterious powers. A town that is protected by demons; a story of a fantasy school life begins to unfold.

title: Kono Kankei wa Gouhou Desu!
alt_title: This Relationship is Legal!, この関係は合法です!
description:
YES Sister, NO Touch!

Kouta, who is extremely siscon, decides to live alone in order to "escape from his little sister ". One day, however, he picks up a runaway girl named Ui, who is full of younger sisterly feelings. Although she looks and acts like a child, she is in fact a beautiful 19-year-old girl with big tits!

Protect his sister? or Crossing the line? The days of agony begin!
genre: Romance, Comedy
author: Aka Chihiro

title: Starting From Today I'll Work as a City Lord
alt_title: Become the Castellan in Another World, С сегодняшнего дня я лорд города, 从今天开始当城主, To Be the Castellan
description:
When a gaming otaku gains the power to cross over to other worlds, he will obviously have to figure out what to do with it! But what is this?! A domineering cat-woman elder sister, a loli fox-woman, a cuddly rabbit-woman younger sister… This isn't a zoo! Welcome to a world where the strong prey on the weak. Then again, it's all so wonderful! An authentic strategy game, a huge conspiracy crisis, this other world's hegemony is now loading, all waiting for thou scum…  


---

title: Alice-san Chi no Iroribata
alt_title: アリスさんちの囲炉裏端, У очага в доме Арису-сан, By The Hearth At Alice-san's Home, By the Furnace of Miss Alice’s House
description:
After ten years, Alice returns to her hometown from Tokyo to live alone in a traditional Japanese house with a sunken hearth. Harumi, her childhood friend, nervously meets her again after such a long time, but the warmth of the hearth with Alice is just as warm as it was in the past...

Next to the hearth in Miss Alice's house, let's have a leisurely meal together.

title: Shu yo, Omukae no Jikan desu
alt_title: 主よ、お迎えの時間です, My Lord, It's Time to Pick You Up, Milord, It's Time to Pick You Up
description:
Is my adorable little nephew the reincarnation of the demon king Lucifer?!"

Chris, a picture book author, takes in his nephew after the loss of his brother and sister-in-law during an accident. Noah is a strange and eccentric child with the ability to communicate with animals. One morning, overwhelmed with his new parental situation, Noah jumps into the road?! However, the person who saved Noah before it was too late was Harvey-sensei, the nursery school teacher, a demon with black wings and horns!! Revealing his true identity, the demon kneels down saying, “I have come to take you back, Lucifer-sama.”, announcing that Noah is the reincarnation of the demon king?!
genre: Boys' Love, Fantasy
author: Kano Ayumi

title: Heart Gear
alt_title: ハートギア, HEART GEAR
description:
Young teenage girl Roue lives a peaceful life with her "uncle", a gear named Zett. She spends her days exploring the ruins of the old world, destroyed by World War III two hundred years ago. During one of those explorations, she finds a strange cylindrical gear who calls himself Chrome, who for some reason doesn't have a "base program", which determines a gear's main purpose. Chrome may have to find that purpose himself in his new life with Roue and Zett…

alt_title: Η Παράξενη Περιπέτεια του JoJo, JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 1: Jonathan Joestar: His Youth, JoJo的奇妙冒险, ジョジョの奇妙な冒険, ファントムブラッド
description:
First story arc of the Jojo's Bizarre Adventure series.  
  
Jonathan Joestar, a young wealthy son living in Victorian England, has his life destroyed by a recently orphaned Dio Brando, who was taken in by Jonathan's father. Dio, who plots to drive Jonathan to insanity and inherit the Joestar fortune, becomes an unstoppable vampire that Jonathan must fight.

alt_title: Namanui Gyeyakcheonsa, 나만의 계약천사
description: After being traumatised from getting forcefully outed, Yeonho, a closeted gay, is a "single-for-life" who has never dated anyone. One day, Yeonho gets hit by a shooting star, and he woke up to see someone, who calls himself "Cupid", sharing his bed! The strange man promised to end Yeonho's one-sided crushes, but will he really…?

author: Han Soyoung

title: Climax Necromance
alt_title: クライマックスネクロマンス
description: On a battlefield where human soldiers and skeleton army soldiers engage in fierce battles. Azraila, a necromancer who kicks away the enemies around her, and Wraith, a black knight who follows her like a shadow, are confronted by their longtime nemesis Paraiso, when Ichika, a shaggy-haired woman in a sailor suit, is summoned to there.
genre: Monsters, Action, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy
author: Mizukami Satoshi

title: S-Class Hunter Doesn't Want to Be a Villainous Princess
alt_title: S급 헌터는 악역 공녀가 되기 싫습니다, S-geup Hunter-neun Agyeok Gongnyeoga Doegi Silseumnida
description:
**I'm done with romance, so send me home!**

Kim Yi-Young was just an ordinary civil service exam candidate in South Korea.
After studying for more than four and a half years, she finally passed, a truly ordinary person with nothing but reading novels here and there as a hobby.

However, on the day she went out for a celebratory meal after passing the exam, she got into a traffic accident and died, only to find herself reincarnated into the fantasy hunter novel she was reading.

To her, the "System" offered a way back home.
Determined solely to return home and cuddle her warm cat and adorable Maltese, Cerberus, she gained strength through dozens of regressions.
Signing contracts with the constellations of the original work and dying multiple times, she eventually succeeded in conquering the "Tower" of the original work and defeating the owner of the tower on the final floor.

Now, all that's left is to go home......

Or so she thought!

[Due to an error, instead of returning to the original world, we will reincarnate you into the author's new work!]

I don't need that! All I wanted was my sweet home!
Is that so difficult?! I even got rid of the Tower!?!?!

Moreover, romance fantasy?! Even in my previous life, I didn't care about romance, not one bit!
And to top it off, I didn't even reincarnate into my own body this time, but into the "villainess" of the book!

I'm not afraid of the threats in this world, but I'm worried about being forced into a romance quest.

Can I go home......?
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Assam (아쌈)

title: Beet the Vandel Buster
alt_title: Adventure King Beet, Beet, 冒险王比特, 冒険王ビィト, 少年冒险王Beet, 모험왕 비트
description:
It's the Century of Darkness where monsters known as Vandels rule the world, and the Vandel Busters are the only ones who can fight them. When a group of Busters are killed in battle, they pass on their magic Saiga weapons to Beet, making him the strongest Buster ever. But Beet won't just fight the Vandels–he wants to destroy them and finally end the Century of Darkness.  
  
**Notes:**  
Returned from a decade-long hiatus in 2016 after the artist was severely injured in 2006.

This time, it's not a journey to save the world, but a “death preparation journey” to look back on his life.

alt_title: くたびれサラリーマンな俺、7年ぶりに再会した美少女JKと同棲を始める, I, a Tired Office Worker, Start Living Together with a Beautiful Highschool Girl whom I Met Again After 7 Years
description:
Amae Yuuya, an office worker in his third year of employment, is completely exhausted by the daily grind. Then, for the first time in seven years, Yuuya meets Aoi Shiratori, a girl eight years younger than him who used to live in his neighborhood. She had grown up to be a beautiful JK girl who was good at housework, and she said to him,

“Yuuya-kun, would you like to live with me under the premise of marriage?”

Aoi desperately wants to live with Yuuya, her first love. Yuuya, who is puzzled, agrees to live with Aoi as a guardian for the time being, but Aoi’s aggressive approach makes him very nervous inside.

[Light Novel](https://firecross.jp/hjbunko/series/492)

title: Seiken Gakuin no Maken Tsukai
alt_title: The Demon Sword Master of Excalibur Academy, Demon's Sword Master of Excalibur School, 聖剣学院の魔剣使い, 圣剑学院的魔剑使, 圣劍學院的魔劍使, Мастер демонического клинка из академии «Святого Меча»
description: In the fantasy story, the demon king Leonis sealed himself away for 1,000 years in order to prepare for the final battle, but when he woke up, he found himself in the body of a 10-year-old boy. A beautiful young woman named Lisellia from the Holy Sword Academy then says to him, "Why were you locked up in such a place? It's OK now, this big sister will take care of you!" Under Lisellia's care, Leonis is shocked to see that the world has completely changed. Bewildered and confused, Leonis finds himself enrolling at the Holy Sword Academy.

title: Was Manager Seo Disposed of as an Industrial Accident?
alt_title: 서과장은 산재처리 됐을까, Manager Seo Industrial Accident, Seo-Gwajangeun Sanjaecheori Dwaesseulkka
description:
“Why do you care about those non-paying users?”

Seo Seo-hyeok, a game planner who gave up on the quality and only focused on the paid contents. But why did he die from overwork after working all night out of greed to make money? When he opened my eyes again, perhaps fortunately out of misfortune...
'This is the game I was making...!!'

As the devil-like planner who harassed gamers reaped what he sowed, his suffering with the transformation of the game begins!

title: 3-byou, Sude ni Koi
