alt_title: やり直し令嬢は竜帝陛下を攻略中, The Do-Over Damsel Conquers the Dragon Emperor, The Returnee Noble Lady in the Middle of Conquesting His Majesty the Dragon Emperor, 重生大小姐正在攻略龙帝殿下, 새출발 영애는 용제폐하를 공략중, Win Over the Dragon Emperor This Time Around, Noble Girl!
description:
The curtains rise on the tale of a young lady who once stormed the battlefields now getting to start her life all over again!  
  
The young noblewoman, Jill, was sentenced to death by her fiancé, the Crown Prince. Just as she was on the brink of death, time rewinds back to when she was 10 years old, to the party where her engagement had been decided!   
  
Determined to avoid going down the same path to ruin, Jill hastily proposes to the person behind her, only to discover that he’s none other than Hades, the Emperor of the neighboring kingdom who’s (set to) fall into darkness, ergo the worst villain.

Lady Elizabeth has her engagement annulled at a party by the crown prince, whose heart has moved on to another young noblewoman. She is then imprisoned in the dungeon over unjust accusations, and learns she has been betrayed by the country to which she has devoted everything…

At the peak of her frustration, Elizabeth finally decides to defect, with a grimoire holding hidden and formidable powers in hand!! She begins her new life and trade with the help of Viscount Lucas from the neighbouring country. With a fierce desire for revenge against her home country in her heart.

Into his aimless life steps a wealthy man who makes him a proposition he finds impossible to refuse: that he will become Koreeda's investor on the condition that Koreeda use his abilities to help the man "conquer the world." But with her kitchen occupied by her pet hermit crab, Hikki, Fuko has to get creative... Cooking with only a rice cooker?! Challenge accepted! Join Fuko as she steams ahead in this lazy gourmet adventure!

We watched movies and became fast friends, even planned to make a movie together for the school festival...but no one at school seemed to know him. I will discover Shibata and the whole world will turn into Shibata. This is a story of, by, and for Shibata. Now showing in a theater near you.

title: Sekai no Owari no Encore
alt_title: Encore of the World’s End, Летопись конца света, 世界の終わりの世界録, 世界终焉的世界录, 세계 종언의 세계록
description:
The valuable treasure, the “Encore” which was left by the legendary Elline the Brave Hero, has the recording of the end of the world and the reincarnation of the world. The countries and brigades (parties) all over the world are searching for its whereabouts; the age to fight for the Encore. The boy called Ren who wants to become a knight has no talent in wielding swords despite looking exactly like the Elline the Brave Hero, he has been having a lifestyle where people taunts him as the “Fake Brave Hero”. The one that appears in front of him is the legendary Dragon Princess Krische, who had woken up from her seal. She mistakes Ren for Elline, though she gets disappointed since he simply looks like him, but she later finds out a hidden potential in him. And she invites him to the journey to find the Encore together with the Archangel Phia and the Demon-Lord Elise that saved the world before. “Do you want to come with us?”. This is the prelude of wild excitement played by the heroes. The boy known as the fake Brave Hero cross paths with the legend now!  
  


---

The younger siblings are so cute that they take care of their younger siblings, and the older siblings are pampered and rebel against their older siblings.

Yuta was your typical introverted loser.

One day, he got invited to an IRL meeting by someone he met online with a shared interest. He wondered what kind of person will be there, and it turned out to be a beautiful lady far beyond his expectation! Yuta felt thrilled but guilty, and he was flustered at every turn.

Seeing his nervousness, she tried to draw him out of his shell...?

---

Naofumi Iwatani, an uncharismatic Otaku who spends his days on games and manga, suddenly finds himself summoned to a parallel universe! He discovers he is one of four heroes equipped with legendary weapons and tasked with saving the world from its prophesied destruction.

title: Fuufu Ijou, Koibito Miman.
alt_title: More Than A Married Couple, But Not Lovers., 夫妇以上，恋人未满。, 부부이상, 연인미만, 夫婦以上、恋人未満。
description: Jirou, a third-year in high school, is forced to live with a gyaru named Akari under a course called the "Couple Practical". In order to be paired with their own romantic interests, they're going to act as a married couple…!?
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Kanamaru Yuki

title: Class no Daikirai na Joshi to Kekkon Suru Koto ni Natta
alt_title: クラスの大嫌いな女子と結婚することになった。, I’m Getting Married to a Girl I Hate in My Class, I Ended Up Marrying a Girl I Hate in My Class, 我要和班裡我最討厭的妹子結婚了。, Kurasu no daikirai na joshi to kekkon suru koto ni natta.
description:
High school student Hojo Saito married his classmate, Sakuramori Akane, the girl who’s his worst enemy in school.

“If you tell the rest of the class we’re married, I’ll kill you”

“I don’t want them to know either. There’s no point in that.”

Their newlywed life wasn’t going so well, and they were constantly at odds. However, as they progress through their daily lives, the distance between them closes, they have more enjoyable moments together, and they gradually come to understand one another.

Saito learns about Akane’s cute side, which he never saw before, and Akane gradually began to recognize the feelings that she’s been keeping inside…

The heart-throbbing newlywed life of two people who just can’t seem to be honest with each other begins here!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Amano Seiju

title: I am Han Sanqian
alt_title: 我是韩三千, I'm Han Sanqian
description:
Han Sanqian has been in Zuo Su's family for three years and was called the trash son-in-law because of his relatives.   
  
In order to prevent his wife Su Yingxia from being humiliated by others, Han Sanqian worked secretly to become a super son-in-law and began preparing for payback.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Full Color
author: 糖人家

title: Imprisoned with the Horror Game's Male Lead
alt_title: 공포게임 남주와 감금당했다, Confined Together with the Horror Game’s Male Lead
description:
I became a maid inside of a horror game.
Penalties were given to the male lead, who was trying to escape being locked up in a large mansion, and I acted as a guide. 

I was going to fulfill my duties until the male lead’s play ends.

“When I get out, I’ll lock you up exactly the same way.”

The male lead is so noisy. 
If it’s going to be like this, I’ll just help him escape faster. 

“Let’s eat, Dietrich.”
“This is a potion, it’ll help you recover faster if you take it.”
“The hint to escape is over there…”

I fed him well to prepare for the next play, and when the male lead got hurt, I gave him a potion so he could quickly play the next game,
I even gave him a hint for the problem. 

You’ll be able to get out now, right?

However. 

“I don’t really know the answer.”

What’s the meaning of this? Aren’t you supposed to be smart?

…The male lead doesn’t think about leaving the mansion at all. 

“If you won’t get out, I will.”

I shouted in anger because I was so sick of the thought of having to see the face of someone I don’t want to keep seeing. 

“Is it possible for you to get out of here?”

His eyes sank bitterly. 

“Let me tell you this, I have no intention of leaving this place.”
“What?”
“And you have no way of getting out, either.”

What the hell is going on?
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Video Games, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Flangby

title: Rom-Comixxx!
alt_title: 에로만화부!, Erotic Comic Department!
description:
It’s called Erotic Comic Department so it may cause some misunderstandings, but the misunderstandings are right!!  
Sangyeol, the club president who loves erotic comics, and Sunjeong, who loves every type of comic except for erotic comics.  
And to protect the existence of the club, they work together in making an erotic romantic-comedy school comic!
genre: Long Strip, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: 공란

title: With Vengeance, Sincerely, Your Broken Saintess
alt_title: 傷だらけ聖女より報復をこめて, Vengeance from a Saint Full of Wounds, The Holy Wound Became a Villain, Возмездие Раненой Святой
description: Lua, a candidate saint with healing powers. However, her abilities were flawed, and she would be pained and painful to herself in order to transfer the symptoms to herself and heal them. The saintly candidates treated her as a flaw, but only her best friend Ariane was always there. One day, Garrot, the Knight Commander whom Lua cares about, is dying. After completely healing his wounds, Lua wanders between life and death at the limit of her abilities. However, when he awoke, all the credit belonged to Ariane, and Garrot and Arian's engagement had been decided. Seeing Arian's true nature, he is coldly beaten by Garrot. In despair, Lua vowed not to heal anyone anymore. Then the Second Prince Swen asks, "Why don't you take revenge on those who have demeaned you?" She uses another ability she has been hiding – the atrocious ability to inflict healing symptoms on others – and joins forces with Swen to start a new life as an "evil woman" instead of a "saint."
genre: Sci-Fi, Long Strip, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic
author: 編乃肌

title: Arknights: OPERATORS!
alt_title: アークナイツ OPERATORS!
description:
The popular four-panel comic strips from the official Arknights Twitter account have finally been collected into a book!

In addition to the individual episodes of the 22 operators, the stories "The Great Chief Returns", "Mansfield Break", "Under Tides", and other event comics are also included. This is a must-have book for fans, to help you find the operator who is just right for you!
genre: Sci-Fi, Comedy, 4-Koma, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

title: I'm Da Best
alt_title: I Am Cool, I'm the Best, 난 짱이야
description: The story of junior high school student new outlook on life. Its an inspiring tale of the many issues in our modern society. And the undue pressures of society to conform their standards instead of being yourself. For those who dealt with issues such as bullying, weight, and appearance. This series is a must read.
genre: Long Strip, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Kim Byung Gwan (김병관)

title: Watashi ga Motenai no wa Dou Kangaetemo Omaera ga Warui! - Tomoko wa Sonna Koto Iwanai (Doujinshi)
alt_title: 智子はそんなこと言わない (私がモテないのはどう考えてもお前らが悪い!), Tomoko Wouldn't Say That (WataMote: No Matter How I Look at It, It's You Guys' Fault I'm Not Popular!)
description: A stuffed toy that looks like Tomoko that Yuri received from Tomoko herself starts talking.

alt_title: コワモテの隣人がΩだった時の対処法
description:
"I thought he was a scary and popular alpha, but I've never heard of such an erotic omega!"

Kouta, an alpha college student, finds his tattooed neighbor, Miyanaga, extremely scary. He tries to give the suspicious-looking man a wide berth, but one day he encounters a strong smell that even Kouta, who is insensitive to omega pheromones, could detect――!
Source: MU

title: Tensei Idol to Doruota no Kishi
alt_title: Reincarnation Idol & Idol Freak Knight, Tensei Idol and Idol Otaku Knight, 転生アイドルとドルオタの騎士
description:
After going through several lifetimes, Takao, a former knight, is currently living as an office worker in modern Japan. After discovering Hikaru, who is the reincarnation of the prince he served and was unable to protect until the end in their past lives, he swore to protect Hikaru in this life by being a hardcore fan.
For the sake of protecting Hikaru from a closer position, Takao decided to become his manager. But after Hikaru, who has an aloof personality this time compared to their past lives, showed him a smile directed only to him, Takao starts to feel another type of feeling budding within him!
genre: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Fantasy
author: Sakumoto Ayu

title: Dragon Ball Kakumei (Doujinshi)
alt_title: ドラゴンボール角明
description: The story in Dragon Ball Kakumei picks up right after the Tournament of Power and deals with the consequences of Android 17 restoring the erased universes. In addition to the six universes destroyed by Zeno, the wish brought back Universe 19, which has warriors that are powerful enough to take down Zeno and the angels.
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Doujinshi, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Aliens
author: DBKAKUMEI

title: Gensou Gourmet
alt_title: Fantasy Gourmet, Gourmet in different world., 幻想グルメ, 幻想グルメ〜健康で文化的な最低限度の異世界生活〜
description:
One day, Shunichirou suddenly transferred to a different world.  
His reason for living in this different world… to see, touch, and smell, -eating unknown food!  
Along with Sylphin, a Beastman Maid, they have an adventure eating fantasy gourmet in a different world!

title: New World Lovetopia Memento
alt_title: ニューワールド・ラブトピア メメント
description: Once upon a time there was a "big hole" between the other world and the human world, through which various otherworldly creatures flowed into the human world. The one-way "big hole" kept the otherworldly creatures in the human world, where they began to coexist with humans. The tribe of angels, unable to return to their original world, keeps searching for the "big hole to return to", but they reach a certain young man...?

title: Stella no Mahou

description: Upon enrolling in high school, Tamaki Honda joins a club for making doujin games known as the SNS Club. Joined by programmer Shiina, writer Ayame, and composer Kayo, Tamaki begins working as an illustrator for the club's next game.

title: Die Wergelder
alt_title: Wergelder, Вергельдер, ベアゲルター, 血偿金, 血償金, 베아게르타, Beageruta
description: Wergelder: in Germanic law, the money paid by a murderer or his family to the victim’s family in atonement. A mysterious deal goes down on a remote island known as a red-light pleasure district. An insane fight between a blonde sniper and an assassin in a Chinese dress brings up questions about who the players are in this deal. A group of misfit yakuza gets caught in the crossfire while trying to get in on the deal, or at least find out what’s being dealt. At the center of it all is a woman who has been wronged in the worst imaginable ways. She will have her revenge. Eisner award-winning creator of Blade of the Immortal Hiroaki Samura presents a new badass thriller with some very bad ladies!
genre: Action, Psychological, Crime, Survival, Martial Arts, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama

alt_title: ガチ恋粘着獣 ～ネット配信者の彼女になりたくて～, Obsessive Fangirl Horror: I Want to Be That Streamer's Girlfriend
description: Kaguya Hinaki is a female college student who is highly regarded by her classmates because of her good looks. She had a secret she couldn't tell anyone, the secret being that she is genuinely in love with Subaru, a member of a certain streamer group.... Hinaki, who really wants to go out with Subaru, receives a DM from a strange account one day, and Hinaki's life changes completely――。
genre: Thriller, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Drama, Mystery, Gyaru

alt_title: ナイトメアバスターズ, 噩夢毁灭者, 噩梦毁灭者
description:
The stage of "Nightmare Busters" is Tokyo in 2034. In the streets, a strange disease of unknown cause, which made me wake up while sleeping, was rampant. One day, Ichijo, a salaryman who spends his days working hard, has a mysterious dream. In a dream, Ichijo meets a coma patient … This is the latest work presented by Akase of "Southern and Comet Girl" as a full analog drawing and all-color work.

title: Major
alt_title: Major – Dramatic Baseball Comic, メジャー, 棒球大联盟
description:
Shigeharu Honda is a Japanese League batter on the rise. His son Goro is a Little League pitcher who one day hopes to follow in his father's footsteps. Momoko Hoshino, Goro's schoolteacher, is the first woman Shigeharu has been interested in since the death of Goro's mother. The destinies of these three individuals will become intertwined as father and son experience both heartbreak and triumph on the baseball diamond. But when an unspeakable tragedy visits the family, it will take everything they have to pick up the pieces and reclaim their dreams.  
  
Won the 41st Shogakukan Manga Award in the Shounen category.
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life

title: Ashita, Watashi wa Dareka no Kanojo
alt_title: Tomorrow, I Will Be Someone's Girlfriend, 明天，我會成為誰的女友, 明日、私は誰かのカノジョ, 내일, 나는 누군가의 여자친구, Algún Día Seré la Novia de Alguien.
description: A bitter love story depicting the realities of love between female college students who earn money by renting themselves out to men as their girlfriends.

title: Tears on a Withered Flowers
alt_title: 시든 꽃에 눈물을
description: Na Hae-soo's life unravels when her husband betrays her with an affair, leaving her burdened with debt and losing their child. In a devastating blow, she witnesses him with a younger woman. Broken and despondent, Na Hae-soo feels her life crumbling around her. However, a mysterious young man unexpectedly enters her life, asking to be taught about adult love. His vulnerability and sincerity begin to stir emotions within Na Hae-soo, challenging her to reconsider her path forward.
genre: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Mafia, Office Workers, Sexual Violence, Drama, Slice of Life, Full Color

title: Kashimashi Meshi
alt_title: かしましめし
description: Three friends get together for an unfortunate occasion. Each of them is facing a difficult moment, between finished or complicated loves. But even if it is difficult and it seems to you that your heart is about to dry up, you can always find new light and hope if you reunite with people you love to eat rice together.

title: Koyoi Oto Furu Sora no Shita
alt_title: Kiss & Harmony, Koyoioto Furu Sora no Shita, คีตราตรี kiss & harmony (Thai), 今宵音降る空の下
description: Miyabi has lost her voice from losing her happy family, and she is adopted by Naozumi who runs a piano school. There, she meets Yue. Yue has loved Miyabi's piano-playing since he was small; he stops playing piano, and looks at Miyabi who closes her heart to the world. Thus, he becomes desperate trying to bring her back to the world of sound, but…

title: Bakemonogatari
alt_title: Истории монстров, 化物語, 바케모노가타리
description:
Koyomi Araragi, a third-year high school student, manages to survive a vampire attack with the help of Meme Oshino, a strange man residing in an abandoned building. Though being saved from vampirism and now a human again, several side effects such as superhuman healing abilities and enhanced vision still remain. Regardless, Araragi tries to live the life of a normal student, with the help of his friend and the class president, Tsubasa Hanekawa. When fellow classmate Hitagi Senjougahara falls down the stairs and is caught by Araragi, the boy realizes that the girl is unnaturally weightless. Despite Senjougahara's protests, Araragi insists he help her, deciding to enlist the aid of Oshino, the very man who had once helped him with his own predicament. Through several tales involving demons and gods, Bakemonogatari follows Araragi as he attempts to help those who suffer from supernatural maladies.

[INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/2219-bakemonogatari?utm_source=mgd)
genre: Loli, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Gore, Drama, School Life, Vampires, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

title: Sentai Daishikkaku
alt_title: Go, Go, Loser Ranger!, Боевой отряд «Полный Провал», 戦隊大失格, 戰隊大失格, Ranger Reject, No Longer a Sentai Ranger
description:
Thirteen years ago, suddenly the Villainous Army of evil appeared in their gigantic floating castle 10000 meters in the sky to invade Earth!

The villainous army have reviving capabilities that make them immortal, making them a serious threat to humanity. To protect us against these invaders, the Divine Dragon Rangers, the Dragon Keepers, wield their miraculous powers and their weapons, Divine Tools, and continuously fight for our safety!

The assault of the Villainous Army! The vigilance of the Dragon Keepers! Will they succeed in their conquest…?

From Haruba Negi, the creator of *5Toubun no Hanayome*, comes the action-packed superhero series of a lifetime!
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Superhero, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery

title: The Invincible Deadbeat
alt_title: The Strongest Unemployed Hero, 백수무적, Jobless, Yet Invincible
description: Shin Min-cheol had been recruited to the world called ‘Anhelles’. He was one who had lived 200 years fighting to survival and destroying the enemies, in the end the ruler of the continent Zero, was lead to the victory of war. And finally, Min-cheol, who has finally returned to Earth leaving the peace of Anhelles behind, wants to live his long-awaited life as a ‘rich unemployed man’, but another conspiracy begins to approach him? If they are after me, they have to find me first. All I have to do is go and fight it off!

author: Jakto

title: Koroshiya no Oshi
alt_title: 殺し屋の推し, The Hitman's Fav
description:
A legendary assassin found the light of life. It was an underground idol!

Endo Owal is the most powerful assassin in the Fujisan-kai, a huge black market organization. He was feared as a "killing machine" because of his ruthless work and overwhelming fighting power, but one day he decides to retire. The reason for his decision was to live his life proudly with Kaorin of the underground idol Ro~Xesia.

Can a man covered in blood and sorrow protect the light of life that he has finally obtained?!
genre: Action, Comedy, Gore
author: Ooshima Rintarou

title: Beethoven Reborn
alt_title: Beethoven Born Again, 다시 태어난 베토벤
description: Only music sustained me from the maddening pain. If only I could hear my music... with my own ears... Even as my soul was falling apart, I prayed to God... and prayed again. Ludwig van Beethoven is considered the greatest composer in human history. I closed my eyes like that. And 180 years later in Seoul. The saint of music, known as an immortal genius, has been reborn. <Beethoven Born Again> And then I began to hear the voice of an angel. "Dobin.. Dobin.." Only music sustained me from the maddening pain.
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Music, Full Color
author: Jayeoung-I

title: Yama ni Suterareta Ore, Tokage no Youshi ni Naru
alt_title: 山に捨てられた俺、トカゲの養子になる 魔法を極めて親を超えたけど、親が伝説の古竜だったなんて知らない, Abandoned in the Mountains, I’m Adopted by a Lizard ~ I’ve Mastered Magic and Surpassed My Parents, but I Never Knew They Were Legendary Old Dragons
description: Born and abandoned in the mountains, Hadar, picked up by an ancient dragon. With inherent powerful magical abilities, he is raised by the ancient dragon and, without realizing, becomes the "strongest being" capable of advanced magic at the age of 12. Hadar is sent to the most challenging magic academy by the ancient dragon to adapt to human society. However, he effortlessly dominates school life with his magical prowess!!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Yoshigae Tamaki

title: Insector
alt_title: 인섹터
description:
One day at school, the class teacher turns into a "huge spherical insect beetle" and kills half the students. The Black Ant that appeared at that moment, which was able to save the rest of the students, becomes the main object of attention of the media and social networks, and its existence is no longer a mere legend of the level of urban ghost stories.
Eventually the government decides to infiltrate a team of Bug Reapers, insector-catchers on a secret mission and, according to survivors, on the heels of the Black Ant. Black Ant's personality is an ordinary high school student, Ka Mi-sun, who has an anthill in his body. So that the insects living in it do not eat it, the guy has to become an enemy of the insects and reluctantly fight.
genre: Action, Long Strip, Superhero, Fantasy, Aliens, Supernatural, Full Color
author: macabim

title: Loving the Mad King
description: Odette is a psychiatrist who transmigrated to medieval times. To go back to modern times, she needed to help Rion, a king with multiple personalities, a condition caused by his mental trauma after he beheaded his own wife. Chaos, silliness, and craziness surrounded Odette when she was dealing with Rion's ever-changing split personalities - just like one extreme weather to another.
genre: Time Travel, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic
author: Ogi Saga

title: Pumpkin Scissors - Power Snips
alt_title: Pumpkin Scissors: Power Snips (Supplemental Episodes), パンプキン・シザーズ：パワー・スニップス, パンプキンシザーズ外伝
description:
Power Snips is a collection of side stories that further explores the setting of the manga series, Pumpkin Scissors.  Along with familiar faces from Army Intelligence State Section III, new characters also appear to help tell stories of "what happened before", "what happened during", and "what happened afterwards". 

A young woman worried about her own towering stature meets a certain corporal who's even taller. 
 
Sent to infiltrate the Republic of Frost, Cold Vitter stumbles upon a "cat" and a child "gray" as ash. 
 
Lieutenant Alice and Corporal Oland form a contract. 
 
These stories and more touch on events behind the scenes and between the cracks, expanding the world of Pumpkin Scissors!
genre: Action, Comedy, Drama
author: Iwanaga Ryoutarou

title: In This Life, the Greatest Star in the Universe
alt_title: 이번 생은 우주대스타, I'm Going to Be a Big Star
description: Sun Woo-joo, an aspiring idol with shining talent, dedication, and passion, had only one shortcoming: "dancing." Having to give up on his lifelong dream of becoming an idol due to this one flaw, he was preparing for a different path in life when a miracle suddenly appeared! "I'll become a superstar brighter than anyone." His once lacking dance skills were no longer a problem. The UV Starship. Five perfectly prepared idols are finally ready with everything they need. A monstrous rookie is about to debut in the entertainment industry! Presenting 'The New Black.' This life, he's destined to be a cosmic superstar!
genre: Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Music, Full Color
author: D&C Webtoon Biz (디앤씨웹툰비즈)

title: The Role of the Femme Fatale
alt_title: 魔性の乙女の役廻り
description:
Kairan Girls’ Academy.

A boarding school rich with history and tradition, attended only by orphans. 

It has a special system in which students are given “roles” that align with their individual goals.

Hanako Shimura, a kind-hearted girl filled with dreams and expectations, enrolls into the academy hoping to make friends with everyone at school. But will she be able to?

A new series by Sasuke, author of False Marigold and Be Careful, Onee-san.!
genre: Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic
author: Sasuke

title: Doukyonin no Sano-kun wa Tada no Yuunou na Tantou Henshuu desu
alt_title: 同居人の佐野くんはただの有能な担当編集です, My Housemate Sano-kun Is Just My Editor!, My Capable Editor and Housemate, Sano-kun.
description:
Shinomiya Teiichiro is a prolific, workaholic novelist who is too consumed with writing to take care of himself. To prevent him from neglecting his well-being, his editor, Sano Satoru, moves in with him. But when the calm and collected Shinomiya finds himself flustered by Sano's constant presence and good looks, he begins to question their relationship. After all, Sano is just his editor, isn't he?!
(Source: MangaUP!)
genre: Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Uda Nozomi

title: Yuri Kagi
alt_title: Yuri Key, 百合鍵, 百合鍵 ～先輩の秘密をのぞいてみた～, Yuri Key - Peeking at Senpai's Secrets
description: Asou is an office worker who has been entrusted with the key to her senpai's room, to take care of her pets while she is gone. Thanks to this, she discovers that Mochizuki-senpai has a hidden face that no one in her office knows about.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Slice of Life
author: Seta Seta

title: Shitsuji-sama wa Demodori Reijou wo Amayakasanai
alt_title: 執事様は出戻り令嬢を甘やかさない
description: After Akiko is cheated on by the boyfriend she's living with, she has no choice but to return to her parents' home. At home for the first time in several years none of her family is there, only Tanaka, a handsome but brazen butler! Akiko is hesitant to rely on someone she's met for the first time, but she ends up being taken in by Tanaka, who is surprisingly kind(?). Their life together full of ups and downs now begins!?
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Yuki Nichola

title: Eila to Totsukuni no Ou
alt_title: エイラと外つ国の王, 에이라와 이국의 왕, 艾拉和外国的王, Eila and the Distant King
description: As part of an arranged political marriage, Eila is forced to travel to the country of Lottefeltz, and marry the beautiful Prince Errold. As soon as she meets him, he steals her heart, but there is something unsettling about the castle. There is a rumor about girls who enter the castle grounds... it is said that once they enter its walls, none of them are ever seen again. Could these terrifying rumors be true...?
genre: Genderswap, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Bikke

title: Koori no Reijou no Tokashi kata
alt_title: 氷の令嬢の溶かし方, How to Melt the Ice Queen's Heart
description: Kagami Asahi: a blunt yet overly caring high schooler and Himuro Fuyuka: a classmate who never lets anyone near her, earning her the nickname “Ice Queen.” These two never had any chances to meet, but from Asahi’s meddling, the closed off soul of Fuyuka might just be showing change? The winner of the 8th web novel competition begins its comic serialization! The curtains rise on a frustrating yet sour sweet slow-acting love story.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Adaptation
author: Takamine Kakeru

title: Baki Gaiden: Hana no Chiharu
alt_title: バキ外伝花のチハル, Baki Side Story: Chiharu's Flower
description:
(from ebookjapan):

The classic look, and a presence backed by an overwhelming sentimentality!　

The shocking story of Chiharu Shiba, the leader of a suicide squad of Bozozoku, is depicted in this work!
genre: Action, Crime, Martial Arts, Mafia, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Delinquents
author: Itagaki Keisuke

title: Rikei ga Koi ni Ochita no de Shoumei shitemita
alt_title: 理系が恋に落ちたので証明してみた。, リケ恋, Science Fell in Love, so I Tried to Prove It, I Tried to Prove That Science Fell in Love, Science Has Fallen in Love, so We Tried to Prove It, Наука влюблена и мы докажем это, Учёные влюблены и намерены доказать это научно, Я пытался доказать, что наука влюбилась, 理科生坠入情网，故尝试证明。, 试证明理科生已坠入情网。, 理科生墜入情網，故嘗試證明。, 試證明理科生已墜入情網。, 이과가 사랑에 빠졌기에 증명해 보았다
description: Yukimura Shinya and Himuro Ayame are two scientists that want to find out if love can be solved by a scientific theory. These two scientists also have feelings for each other and want to be able to solve their true feelings through similar theoretical facts. With this perfect opportunity, these scientists will attempt to solve the theory of the love they express for each other.
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Yamamoto Alfred

title: Ore no Isekai Shimai ga Jichou Shinai!
alt_title: 俺の異世界姉妹が自重しない!, My Otherworldly Sisters Won't Hold Back!
description:
***Live free and be happy.***

―These were the last words of Amemiya Yuya's sister, who was seriously ill. Despite her wishes, however, Yuya, who was suffering from the same disease as her sister, was supposed to end his short life without fulfilling his promise. For unknown reasons, Yuya was suddenly reborn in another world. Confused by his new life, Yuya begins his life as the second son of a count. One day, Yuya thinks about the possibility that his younger sister has been reincarnated in this other world just like him. In this world, there is a sister, a young fiancée, a slave, a maid, etc. - but one of them is his own sister!

---

- ![Syosetsu](<https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png>) [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4696dd)
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Hiiro no Ame

title: Binetsu Shoujo
alt_title: Feverish Girl, Girl With a Slight Fever, The Feverish Girl, The Sick Girl, 微熱少女, 미열소녀
description: A sweet shoujo story about a high school girl named Rina who falls in love with Hiro, the guitarist of a band and member of the archery club. They have to deal with many obstacles along the way, especially Rina’s poor health condition.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life
author: Miyasaka Kaho

title: Otaku ni Yasashii Gal wa Inai!?
alt_title: オタクに優しいギャルはいない!?, Gal Can’t Be Kind to Otaku!?, 没有辣妹会对阿宅温柔!?, Gals Can't Be Kind To A Geek!?
description: Takuya Seo is an otaku who likes "anime for girls" and can't say he likes it out loud. One day, he hooks up with two gals from his class, Amane and Ijichi, but it seems that Amane is also an otaku... It's about a school romantic comedy where the otaku meets the gal he likes!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Norishiro-Chan

title: ZUKYUN X BAKYUN
alt_title: ズキュン×バキュン
description: A slaughtering Pure-Pure romance of the greatest assassin couple. The bullet of love, DEATH Zukyun!!
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Gore, Web Comic
author: Yuzuriha Teito

title: Kyo mo Hajime-Senpai ga Sukisugiru
alt_title: 今日もハジメ先輩が好きすぎる
description: Kokomi enters into a new school but ends up tearing her clothes. The kind and popular Hajime lends her some clothes and she falls in love with him at first sight, after not being able to speak to him for a long time, she discovers a terrible truth about him but is undeterred into trying to win his heart.
genre: Psychological, Romance, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural
author: Yumachi Shin

title: Hanma Baki (Shinsoban Release)
alt_title: 範馬刃牙, Baki Part 3 (Shinsoban Release), Baki Hanma - Son of Ogre (Shinsoban Release)
description:
The climax of the Baki series, "Hanma Baki", newly re-edited!

Hanma Yuujirou, the world's strongest creature, vs. Hanma Baki, the world's strongest high schooler... A spat between father and son on an unprecedented scale begins here!

author: Itagaki Keisuke

title: Chimidoro Ice-cream
alt_title: ちみどろアイスクリーム, Bloodstained Ice-cream, 鲜血淋漓的冰淇淋
description: Class rep Minegishi Hinata is saved from a traffic accident by the new transfer student Nagatsuki Shion, who survives the crash as it is revealed she is half-human and half-zombie. However, the impact from the crash breaks Shion's special apparatus that keeps her heart beating, and if Shion's heart stops for even a moment, she'll become a full zombie! The only way to prevent that from happening is for Hinata to get Shion's heart pounding...
genre: Comedy, Zombies, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, Gore, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Hokuto Sui

title: Kuni ni Saikyou no Barrier wo Hattara Heiwa ni Narisugite Tsuihou Saremashita. Sono Barrier, Eizoku Janai yo?
alt_title: 国に最強のバリアを張ったら平和になりすぎて追放されました。そのバリア、永続じゃないよ？, 国に最強のバリアを張ったら平和になりすぎて追放されました。～俺の魔法がヤバすぎて、美女と魔族に囲まれてるんだが！？～, When I Put up the Strongest Barrier in the Country, It Became Too Peaceful and I Was Banished. They Did Know That That Barrier Isn't Permanent, Right?, Cuando levanté la barrera más fuerte del país, se volvió demasiado pacífico y me desterraron. ¿Sabían que esa barrera no es permanente, verdad?
description:
A young man, Shield, can only use the beginner magic [Barrier] and has been looked down upon.

Despite putting up an ironclad barrier to protect the country, he is deported due to his fiancée's tricks. However, before he knew it, he had subjugated the strongest dragon (a young girl), was courted by beautiful women from other countries, and was being followed by a group of brutal demons!?

A new type of battle action begins, woven by Shield, a young man who can only protect himself, but whose defense is the strongest!
genre: Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: CK

title: Seaside Space Heater: Ooshiro Kogani Anthology
alt_title: Seaside Space Heater: Kogani Ooshiro Short Story Collection, うみべのストーブ 大白小蟹短編集
description:
A series of short stories by Ōshiro Kogani about life and human relationships.

---
- **Won the "Kono Manga ga Sugoi!" Award for Women's category in 2024**
genre: Award Winning, Anthology, Philosophical, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Ooshiro Kogani

title: Final Boss Fake-out: The Protagonist Thinks She Killed Me So Now I'm Free!
alt_title: ラスボス、やめてみた　～主人公に倒されたふりして自由に生きてみた～, I Tried to Stop Being the Last Boss ~I Pretended to be Defeated by the Main Character and Tried to Live Freely~
description: The strongest final boss in RPG history figures out a way to get super rich in his own world! Demon Lord Menas, ruler of the Noa Empire, finds the Resistance's forces on his doorstep. While Alex, a determined, beautiful, blonde young lady stands before him, he gets this weird feeling of deja vu... Isn't this just like the prologue of 'ResNoa', the video game he plays in his dreams?! Menas realizes that he was the final boss of his own world all along! He fakes his death at the hands of Alex and seizes his chance at a brand new life with both hands.Our dark hero takes his world by storm, using whatever cheat codes he has to protect his newfound freedom!
genre: Action, Demons, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Sakaki Mochimaru

title: Hina no Mama ja Dame desu ka?
alt_title: ヒナのままじゃだめですか？, Почему мы не можем остаться детьми?, ¿Por qué no podemos quedarnos como niños?, Why Can’t We Stay as Children?
description: Hina from 5th grade has a secret she can't tell anyone: 3 months ago she started having periods. However, one day her childhood friend Daichi found out about it. These are the endless worries of children starting puberty.
genre: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life
author: Kurachi Chihiro

title: Return to Heaven
alt_title: 还天
description: Shen Chu, burdened with an incomplete soul, heads to Zhuo Lu, the cultivation world's most prestigious academy, with a very specific goal in mind. Upon his arrival, his world, previously dimmed by his incomplete soul, unexpectedly brightens due to a young man with striking blue hair. Could this be the person Shen Chu has been searching for? As he navigates the relaxing day-to-day life of academy studies, Shen Chu soon finds a complex web of intertwined timelines and ancient conspiracies unraveling around him, revealing secrets that could change everything.
genre: Thriller, Historical, Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color
author: 月刺啾

title: Madara Moyou no Yoi
alt_title: まだら模様のヨイ, Yoi With Mottled Skin
description:
Yoi, a girl who has nowhere to go because she looks different from the people around her.
Who reached out to her...?

This is a sci-fi story about an atypical girl who puts her existence on the line to survive in a world of despair!
genre: Sci-Fi, Crime, Drama
author: Asada Nemui

title: Kurotonbi no Seija
alt_title: 黒鳶の聖者～追放された回復術士は、有り余る魔力で闇魔法を極める～, Saint of Black Kite, The Black Sword Saint, Saint of Black Kite ~The Banished Healer Masters Dark Magic With Abundant Magical Power~, The Black Sword Saint ~ The Exiled Healing Master, Masters Dark Magic with Abundant Magical Power-, 黑鳶的聖者～被放逐的回復術士，以充沛有餘的魔力使闇魔法登峰造極～, 黑鸢的圣者~被放逐的回复术士，以充沛有余的魔力使闇魔法登峰造极~, 흑연의 성자
description: Russel is a [saint] who was an expert in recovery magic. he was in a group with his childhood friends until the rest of the members learned recovery magic. Branded unnecessary and expelled from his group of friends, he meets a mysterious beauty named Sybilla. His infinite magical potential, combined with her guidance now allow him to reach heights once deemed impossible!
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Masami T

title: My Father Has Become a Beautiful Girl and It's a Lot of Pain
alt_title: 父親が美少女になってしまって色々つらい, My Father Turned into a Beautiful Girl and It's a Lot of Trouble., Мой отец превратился в красивую девушку и это доставляет много хлопот.
description: A successful but annoying dad got gender-swapped and became a beautiful girl. Now he has lost his job and has to depend on his son while slowly starting anew.
genre: Genderswap, Comedy, Office Workers, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Neda Hirofumi

title: Once Married
alt_title: 일단 결혼부터, Ildan Gyeolhonbuteo, Let's Start with Marriage, Начнем с брака, 首先從結婚開始
description:
The East. The cursed land where the sun never rises, always engulfed in dreary weather, swarmed with criminals, and where depression is the norm. And the monster who governs over this land is the Duke of Eckard. Hedel, who was on the verge of marrying her cousin, receives a marriage proposal from this monster Duke. Although everyone opposes her, Hedel had no choice but to accept the Duke's proposal...

"I've never had this kind of food before!"

"Ever since Madam's arrival, the sun seems to always set here...!"

"The East can never live without Madam anymore."

It seems Hedel has done very well in taming the people from the East. This is the story of Hedel occupying the East, which starts with a marriage.
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Meoni (머니)

title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 9 - The JOJOLands
alt_title: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 Part9 The JOJOLands, JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Parte 9 - Las JOJOLandias, Невероятные приключения ДжоДжо, ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 第9部 ザ・ジョジョランズ
description:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure. 

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.
genre: Action, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Araki Hirohiko

title: Far East Chimera
alt_title: 極東キメラティカ
description: “Chimeras", creatures that can steal and use the form of any creature except humans. Hunting these creatures are "Hunters", and one of them, Yuri, lives a free-wheeling life. But when she encounters a human-shaped Chimera, something "mysterious" takes rest within her---. These hunters' spear skills will charm you! A super-beast hunting action story!
genre: Monsters, Action, Martial Arts, Adventure, Fantasy
author: Itabashi Daisuke

title: Burning Hell
alt_title: 버닝헬
description: The story unfolds on the island of Burning Hell, located near Dokdo, involving two murderers. Criminals and monsters from Joseon, Edo, Qing, and the British Empire come to this island, each harboring their own desires.
genre: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Samurai, Adventure, Web Comic
author: Youn In-Wan

title: Don't Call Me Lady!
alt_title: 주인님 이라 부르지 마
description: Lee Yuri studied as the successor of the aroma shop, her family's business has been passed down from generation to generation. She rejected the love of her smug classmate, but end up being bullied by the boy's gang at school. One day, she was running away from the man who was bothering her and went to the mountain. But suddenly a tin fell from the sky and hit Yuri's head which killed her immediately. Yuri thought she was dead, but when she opened her eyes, she was already on the lap of a handsome man named Sowoo! And the man called her Lady.
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Mackerel

title: Kono Hi, "Itsuwari no Yuusha" de Aru Ore wa "Shin no Yuusha" de Aru Kare wo Party kara Tsuihou shita
alt_title: この日、『偽りの勇者』である俺は『真の勇者』である彼をパーティから追放した, On This Day, I, the “False Hero”, Expelled Him, the “True Hero”, From the Party.
description:
Foyle, bestowed with the job of the "False Hero", followed his role and expelled his best friend from the party. That friend awakened as the "True Hero" and Foyle was defeated... or so he thought. At death’s door, Foyle is saved by Iris, an elf girl and the only one that knew his true identity as a false hero dedicated to humanity.

Acknowledged by her as "My Hero", Foyle remembers his aspiration to save people like a hero and begins to desire to do so from the shadows.
The "False Hero" who has lost everything becomes the "Hero of Shadows" and decides to embark on a new adventure!
genre: Action, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Shinonome Koushaku

title: Doumo, Yuusha no Chichi desu. 〜Kono Tabi wa Gusoku ga Gomeiwaku wo Kakete, Moushiwake Arimasen〜
alt_title: どうも、勇者の父です。～この度は愚息がご迷惑を掛けて、申し訳ありません。～, どうも、勇者の父です。この度は愚息がご迷惑を掛けて、申し訳ありません。 〜幼馴染みの許嫁を捨て、そこらで好き放題やってる息子をぶん殴るために旅に出ます。今更謝ってももう遅い〜, Hello, I'm The Hero's Father ～I'm Sorry For All The Trouble My Foolish Son Has Caused You～, Hello, I Am the Hero’s Father. I Am Sorry for the Trouble My Stupid Son Has Caused. 〜I’m Going on a Journey To Beat Up My Son, Who Has Abandoned His Childhood Fiance and Is Doing Whatever He Wants Out There. Even if He Apologizes Now, It’s Already Too Late~
description:
Croix, who works as a lumberjack in a remote village, spends peaceful days with his beautiful wife, Wiel, and his only son, Alka. 

One day, Alka receives an oracle that he is the only one who can defeat the Demon King, the "Hero", and together with his fiancé Saya, he sets out on a journey to subjugate the Demon King... I spent my days as a lumberjack with pride. 

However, one day, three years after receiving the oracle, Saya returned to the village in tatters. 

From Saya's mouth, we are told about how Alka is failing in his authority as a hero, and is told that he does whatever he pleases without saving the world... to wake up his stupid son. Spank him with your strongest fist!!
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Akagane Musashi

title: Open Sesame
alt_title: 恋爱新鲜人, オープンセサミ
description: Danjou Yamato is a high-school student who lives in the countryside and is the boxing champion of the region. However, when his family has to move out to live in Tokyo, he is transfered to a school in Tokyo that was previously an all-girls school. Girls have a lot of power and give the guys a hard time. But Yamato will not bow down to the power of the girls, and on his way to claim power for the guys in the school, he finds out something about his past… something that he had forgotten long ago…
genre: Romance, Comedy, Sports, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Kawakata Kaoru

title: Into the Rose Garden
alt_title: 인투 더 로즈 가든
description:
Alock, taking pride in being an aristocrat, falls in love with Klopp at first sight, a nobleman of a family of lower social status whom he met by chance.
Ignoring the difference in social rank, wealth as well as the taboo of both being Alphas, Alock approaches Klopp, only to be disregarded by Klopp who later marries an Omega.
Blinded by jealousy, Alock ultimately commits a terrible sin. Having learned the truth, Klopp takes a ruthless revenge. Alock struggles and tries to resist all while slowly enduring the price to pay for his sin…

"What you did wasn't love."
"If that wasn't love, I don't know what I should call this feeling."

If given the chance to turn back time, would it make a difference to the pair’s relationship?

'Can life become a blessing once again? 
Can I be guided towards the light once again?
Will I be able to see him along the path under the cedar trees once again?'
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Sexual Violence, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy
author: MEG

title: Okashi na Elf to Joshikousei
alt_title: おかしなエルフと女子高生, Sweets, Elf, And A High School Girl
description:
Japanese sweets save a debt-ridden elf!

Alice, an elf, runs a confectionery shop in the forest of Auin to pay off the debt left by her parents.
One day, however, when she is worried that her sweets are not selling, she suddenly falls into the "Fountain of Wishes.
When she opens her eyes, she finds herself in a strange world...
genre: Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Higashi 385

title: Chou to Teikoku
alt_title: 蝶と帝国, Butterfly and Empire
description: Russia at the beginning of the 20th century, at the end of the imperial period. A newcomer depicts the love and revenge of a woman who was tossed about by the malice of the times.
genre: Historical, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Adaptation
author: Namboku Yoshitaka

title: Killing Me / Killing You
alt_title: Убить себя / Убить тебя, キリングミー/キリングユー
description: Ever since a meteorite fell, the world has become strange. Two young immortals, Mithia and Youthanasia, are traveling through this crazy world in hopes of finding a way to die.
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Tragedy
author: Narita Imomushi

title: Natsume Arata no Kekkon
alt_title: Arata Natsume Getting Married, 夏目アラタの結婚, 夏目新的结婚, La boda de Natsume Arata, Natsume Arata's Marriage
description: Arata Natsume works at a child guidance center, is in his thirties and single with no plans for marriage. But one day, he receives a request from the child he was in charge of, Takuto, to "meet the criminal who killed his father". That serial killer is Shinagawa Shinju, also known as the "Shinagawa Pierrot".
genre: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Gore, Drama, Mystery
author: Nogizaka Tarou

title: Touhou - Ladies of Scarlet Devil Mansion
alt_title: 紅魔館の女たち, Ladies of Koumakan
description: A light-hearted comedy centered on the residents of the Scarlet Devil Mansion. Unofficial and non-canon. Published monthly in the web edition of Strange Creators of Outer World.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Magic, Girls' Love, Fantasy
author: Risui

title: Joukamachi no Dandelion
alt_title: Castle Town Dandelion, 城下町のダンデライオン, 城下町的蒲公英
description: In the manga's story, the everyday lives of the nine super-powered siblings of the royal family are monitored by more than 200 surveillance cameras and broadcast nationwide. The people of the nation who are watching the broadcast will have the ability to elect the next monarch. The story focuses on Akane, the third-oldest sister who can manipulate gravity. She is shy and desperately does not want to be caught on camera.
genre: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, Fantasy
author: Kasuga Ayumu

title: 9 Wonder Worlds
alt_title: 9つの不思議な世界
description:
Bored of Isekai? Reincarnation? You have come to the right place.

The Great War devours millions of lives. The children lost their parents, orphan are everywhere. Salvage is an institution funded by the government especially for orphans to become their country's heroes in the future. Akira Koshino is 14 years old boy orphan desiring revenge for his parent's death to accomplish his goal. During his journey, he encounters and makes friends, foes, and fantasy creatures.
genre: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Gore, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: 9WONDER

title: NEET dakedo Hello Work ni Ittara Isekai ni Tsuretekareta
alt_title: I'm a NEET but when I went to Hello Work I got taken to another world, Я NEET, но когда пошёл устраиваться на работу, попал в иной мир, ニートだけどハロワにいったら異世界につれてかれた, 尼特族的异世界就职记
description:
The 23-year-old NEET Masaru Yamano went to Hello Work and found an interesting job offer. 
 
_"A sword and sorcery fantasy, playtest for Miniature Garden of Razgrad World. Extended period of time, preferred to be able to live on-site. Monthly salary of 250,000+ yen."_ 
 
He immediately goes to the interview and signs a contract. However, the place of employment is another world. Because of the contract, he’s taken there. To survive, Masaru receives a cheat, but he is told the shocking truth: the world will be destroyed in 20 years! Can a simple NEET prevent the destruction of the world?!
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Katsura Kasuga

title: Sugar Girl Drip
alt_title: シュガーガール・ドリップ
description: Marie, a sparkling university student who craves validation, takes up a part-time job at a concept cafe for their uniforms. There, she meets Akira, a spontaneous and unpredictable person. Their meeting sets off a chain of events that changes Marie's life, and they end up spending time together as…accomplices!? An overdose of desire begins in the neon-glowing sleepless city!!
genre: Psychological, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Gore, Drama
author: Tsukinowa Ao

title: I HATE
description:
"The only taste you need to know is mine."  
  
A chance reunion after 10 years for Hiro and Kiriya. They were "kiss-friends" during their last summer of high school: a memory from the past which Hiro wants to forget. However, even after turning 27, his memory of those times keeps binding him to the point he can't date anyone. Kiriya on the other hand, even after the reunion, kept his cool, but… These cool men intense feelings are welling up!
genre: Boys' Love, Office Workers, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Natsume Kazuki

title: White Angels Have No Wings
alt_title: 하얀천사에게 날개는 없다
description: A Catholic school where everything seems tranquil and fine. But for Ayeon, a day doesn't pass without getting bullied until one day, Yeonhwa steps in against the bullies. Ayeon is grateful for Yeonhwa but what she doesn't realize is that there seems to be something more than just good intentions behind that beautiful smile.
genre: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, School Life, Full Color
author: Gado (가도)

title: Shounen Zanzou
alt_title: Boys Next Door, 少年残像
description:
Consists of three stories:

1) Boys Next Door
Lawrence is a young male prostitute whose actual aim was to look for his brother. However, his life was about to change when he witnessed one of the biggest serial killers - Dr. Wolfgang Adrian Clay - killing someone. Instead of running away, he searches for the murderer and falls in love with him. Lawrence's brother was not too happy about losing a possible money tree and sends out his gang in search of Lawrence.

2) Devil Inside
Rick Randool has a dangerous condition which affects a few unfortunate members of his family.

3) When a Heart Beats
All Ted wanted was a guitar. But the price he paid to get one was a young girl's life. Many years later he meets her again and…
genre: Psychological, Anthology, Boys' Love, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Yuki Kaori

title: The Valiant Must Fall
alt_title: 勇気あるものより散れ, Die Even More Valiantly
description: The Edo period has ended, and former samurai Haruyasu is adrift in a strange new world. Not even the promise of rebellion can cure him of his desire for death. But after an assassination gone wrong, Haruyasu finds himself at the mercy of his intended victim’s bodyguard, an intriguing young woman with the power to heal–so intriguing, in fact, that he decides he wants to live in order to learn more about her. But what will she ask in return for saving his life?
genre: Historical, Survival, Samurai, Drama, Supernatural
author: Aida Yu

title: Normality and Monsters
alt_title: フツーと化け物, The Story About a Monster Teaching Common Sense
description:
Itou-san, who’s poor at interpersonal relations, was jealous of her mild-mannered classmate Takahashi-san, who gets along well with everyone. But one day, she witnesses Takahashi-san swallow a person whole. Takahashi-san was a monster mimicking a human!

Such a terrifying monster was calmly blending in with the class – that’s extremely admirable!! I definitely want to be her friend!!

And so Itou-san learns the “normality” of human society from Takahashi-san the monster. But while Itou-san is in high spirits, Takahashi-san has her own motives…

A tag team between a prodigy author and the spirited illustrator behind “Youjo Senki” brings forth a thundering tale of maidens whose youthful impatience and yearning jumble together and accelerate! (Translated from the Bookwalker description for Volume 1.)
genre: Monsters, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Horror, Monster Girls, Supernatural
author: Warugi Wanai

title: Akuyaku Reijou to Akuyaku Reisoku ga, Deatte Koi ni Ochitanara ~Nanashi no Seirei to Keiyaku shite Oidasareta Reijou wa, Kyou mo Reisoku to Kisoiatte Iru you desu~
alt_title: 悪役令嬢と悪役令息が、出逢って恋に落ちたなら　～名無しの精霊と契約して追い出された令嬢は、今日も令息と競い合っているようです～, If the Villainess and Villain Met and Fell in Love, If the Villainess and the Villain Were to Meet and Fall in Love: It Seems the Shunned Heroine Who Formed a Contract With an Unnamed Spirit Is Fighting With the Nobleman Yet Again
description:
Despite being from a prestigious noble family, Bridget, a failed daughter who made a contract with the weakest spirit, one day had her engagement broken off by the third prince, Joseph.

However, no one sympathized with her, who was acting as a proud daughter at the behest of Joseph... At that time, Bridget meets the Duke's son Yuri, who is feared by those around him because of his overwhelming ability and cold personality.

Two people who hate each other and repel each other. However, the encounter gradually changes their destinies. This is the story of a villainess who is despised for being incompetent and a villain who is shunned for being a genius who eventually fall in love.

---
Despite her noble status, Brigitte contracts with the weakest type of spirit—and on that very same day, the prince publicly breaks off their engagement. No one shows much sympathy towards the once haughty young lady—except for the duke's son, Yuri, who attends the same magic academy. Yuri is feared for his incredible abilities and icy personality, but with him on her side, her fortunes might have changed…

---
**Original Web Novel:** [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816700426830814673), [Syosetu](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9923hb/)
genre: Romance, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
author: Haruna Don

title: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Koto Nairan-hen
alt_title: The Irregular at Magic High School -  Ancient City Insurrection Arc, Непутёвый ученик в школе магии: Волнение в Древней Столице, 魔法科高校の劣等生 古都内乱編
description:
Zhou Gongjin, who was the mastermind of what happened in the Parasite Doll incident of Nine Schools Competition, has fled from Yokohama to the area of the original ancient magic users group centred around Kyoto also known as the *traditionalists*.   
Since then two months have passed and the National High School Magic Thesis Competition will soon be held again. This year's Thesis Competition is being held in Kyoto sponsored by the Magic Association and in their conference hall.   
Tatsuya gets visited by the Kuroba twins who as representatives bring Yotsuba Maya's letter to him. The letter is a request from his aunt saying "I hope for your cooperation to capture Zhou Gongjin".  
While it is questionable that whether it is a "command" rather than a "request", Tatsuya and Miyuki go to Kudou's house as they are in the centre as opponents of the traditionalists. As a result, the two siblings have a fated encounter with the "Genius Augmented Magician”.   
Conspiracy of the ancient city was the stage. The fate that has continued to smoulder away in the back of the history of magician development, Tatsuya and Miyuki and his companions are challenged.   
  
Adaptation of the original novel's volumes 14-15.
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Military, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Satou Tsutomu

alt_title: 終りなき午後

Oneshot from Garo 1967-11.  
A short story about time travel in a post-apocalyptic world.
genre: Oneshot, Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Drama

title: The Seven Deadly Sins
alt_title: 七つの大罪, Los siete pecados capitales, Семь смертных грехов, Нанацу но Таидзай, 七大罪, 七原罪, 일곱개의 대죄
description:
The "Seven Deadly Sins," a group of evil knights who conspired to overthrow the kingdom of Britannia, were said to have been eradicated by the Holy Knights, although some claim that they still live. Ten years later, the Holy Knights have staged a Coup d'état and captured the king, becoming the new, tyrannical rulers of the kingdom. Elizabeth, the king's third daughter, sets out on a journey to find the "Seven Deadly Sins," and to enlist their help in taking back the kingdom.  


---
genre: Award Winning, Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy

title: Us on the Water.
alt_title: 물위의 우리, Cage on the Water, Mates Above the Waters
description:
After experiencing multiple diastrophisms, the Earth’s sea level rose exponentially. 
Hoju wants to show his daughter, Han Byoel, the world and heads toward his hometown. There are multiple strange marks in the town he hasn't visited for 20 years… Will the two be able to survive safely?
genre: Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, Mystery, Full Color
author: 뱁새

title: Moto Shogun no Undead Knight
alt_title: Former General Is Undead Knight, Немёртвый бывший генерал, 元将軍のアンデッドナイト
description: Lambert, one of the great generals from Regios kingdom, was suspected of planning a rebellion against his lord at the end of unification war, and he died an unnatural death. Two hundred years later, when the era had changed and Regios kingdom had entered its peaceful era, he accidentally revived as a demon called Undead Knight… Lambert, whose entire body was wrapped in a flashy Demon Metal[Organ], set out on a journey to punish the wrongdoers while enjoying the peaceful sight of Regios kingdom. But… This peaceful era was basically an easy mode for Lambert, the greatest general of the chaotic era.
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Gore, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: Nekoko.

title: Haibara-kun no Tsuyokute Seishun New Game
alt_title: Haibara-kun's Strong and Youthful New Game, 灰原くんの強くて青春ニューゲーム
description:
Natsuki Haihara is a young man who failed to make his high school debut and is now in his fourth year of college following a terrible high school life. He was about to enter the workforce when he was unexpectedly whisked back in time seven years to just before he started high school!

Natsuki is given the opportunity to “redo” his regret-filled high school life, and he uses his prior experiences to successfully become a member of a group of six beautiful boys and girls at the top of the class caste!

What’s more, the beautiful girl he once had a crush on, Hikari, was also there…?!

The unconscious high-spec young man starts his second adolescence all over again in real life, a strong, new game school romantic comedy!
genre: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Amamiya Kazuki

title: Meguro-san wa Hajimete ja Nai
alt_title: Не девственница Мэгуро-сан, 目黒さんは初めてじゃない, 目黑同學並非第一次, It's Not Meguro-san's First Time
description:
Third-year high school student Makoto Koga decides to confess to his crush, the school's most beautiful girl, second-year Saki Meguro. To his surprise, she agrees to date him. But what surprises him even more is her following words: "I'm not a virgin."

Unbeknownst to Koga, the surprisingly passive Meguro has the reputation of being the lascivious "easy girl" at school, not rejecting any boy that approaches her and having gone through multiple boyfriends.

Will Koga persevere? Will he fare any differently than the rest?
How will Meguro react to Koga, a boy who, for once, actually approached her before he knew of her reputation?

*Note: Was originally on Palcy (Kodansha platform for shojo manga), but also is on Magazine Pocket (Kodansha platform for shonen manga.)*

[Alternate official raw](https://palcy.kodansha.co.jp/c/1.html)
genre: Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

title: Henjin no Salad Bowl
alt_title: 変人のサラダボウル＠comic, Salad Bowl of Eccentrics, Odd Salad Bowl
description:
While trailing someone, the poor detective Sousuke Kaburagi runs into Sara, an imperial princess from another world who uses black magic. Sousuke and Sara gradually begin living together, but in the blink of an eye, Sara becomes accustomed to modern-day Japan...

Meanwhile, Livia—a female knight who transferred to the world after Sara, is enjoying a surprisingly pleasant life, even though she is homeless. The two otherworldly individuals who live a pleasant and strong life influence Sousuke and the other oddballs who live here, such as a devilish lawyer, a divorce agent, and a cult leader.

title: Huck the Air Pirate and the Princess of Steam
alt_title: 空賊ハックと蒸気の姫
description:
The Mist Industrial Revolution ushered in the "Age of the Air."

As people move their lives from the ground to the skies, "air pirates" appear, forming cliques and roaming the skies. Among them, there was a pirate who disliked herds and roamed the skies freely, and his name was Huck, an air pirate. 

The adventures of Huck and his crew in search of treasure and romance begin now!

description: Emperor Qin Ying Zheng was unable to overcome the tribulations in the immortal world. He was reborn in the city, where the spiritual force was restored. With his sword, he vanquished the strong men from outside the realm, conquered the ladies in the harem, and called forth the fierce warriors and fierce generals with his hands to conquer the entire world! He held the title of Emperor of the Immortals during his previous existence. He pledged to return to the immortal realm and reach the pinnacle of immortality in this life!

title: Henjo - Hen na Joshi Kousei Amaguri Senko
alt_title: Henjo - The Strange Female High-Schooler Amaguri Senko, 変女～変な女子高生 甘栗千子～, 변녀 : 이상한 여자고등학생 아마구
description: Amaguri Senko is a high school girl with a cool personality (as in kuudere) and a big pervert. She openly reads porn, masturbates and isn't perturbed in the slightest at the sight of penises and such. The story centers around Senko's daily life with two male handymen working for her father's company  which she also helps out with, Takamura Ryou and Sugita Kouhei. Takamura ends up being constantly sexually harassed by Senko, partially due to his phimosis dick that caught her interest,  but little did he know, she wasn't joking when she bluntly said "I like you"…

description:
A battle tournament full of cheat powers begins! The long-awaited comicalization of the hotly-discussed work from "Kono Light Novel ga Sugoi! 2021"!  
  
The Demon King, who terrorized the world for twenty-five years, was slain. However, the Hero who killed him never came forward. Therefore, in order to decide on the "True Hero" that will be acknowledged by everyone as the strongest, sixteen "Asuras", masters of extraordinary abilities, are gathered in the great kingdom of the Yellow Capital! "Insta-Kill Blade", "Almighty Magic", "Absolute Defense"… The ultimate deathmatch for the title of the strongest in another world begins now!

They start training, but start by holding hands, and interact like lovers! I'm... Somehow the skinship is too intense? Courtship love fantasy starting with lessons with unicorn beast knights!

While living here, Marie Antoinette (the famous queen of France) has been waiting impatiently for her Prince Charming to come riding in on a white horse and whisk her away. So when a new handsome guy comes along, she feels it was destiny that brought them together... But she's in for a shock when she finds out who he really is!

title: I Am the Main Characters' Child
alt_title: 주인공들의 아이로 태어났다, Juingongdeul-eui Airo Taeeonassda, I Was Born as the Lead Characters' Child, I Am the Male Lead's Child, Reborn as the Protagonists' Daughter, メインキャラの娘になりました, 穿越成男主角的女儿?!
description:
A duke's daughter, aged six, was being bullied by the servants when all of a sudden, she started to recall her past life. Emeliet realized that she had been reborn into the world of the novel that she had read in her past life, as the child of the main characters!

Three years after the novel's end, her mother had died while giving birth to her, and as a result, her father had abandoned her. In order to overcome her dire situation, Emeliet puts into motion her plan to get closer to her dad...

Will Emeliet overcome immense odds stacked against her and recover her dad's love?
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

alt_title: 품격을 배반한다, I Betray My Dignity, 默许侵占, 背离品格

In order to save her family from ruin, Chloe Verdier must find a groom for her sister, Alice. 

She soon runs into the handsome but arrogant Duke Thisse who makes a proposal that could save them.

When Alice flees with a mysterious man, Chloe must seek out the Duke in the biggest gamble of her life.
genre: Historical, Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

description: A high school boy, Yomi Hashiba, is troubled. He is unable to understand what Mizuki Hanai, a cool girl who became his girlfriend a month ago, is thinking... One day, while he is worrying about his relationship with Mizuki Hanai, he starts to understand her "Kanji"...? (same pronunciation as feeling) This is the beginning of a thrilling coming-of-age romantic comedy about love and kanji!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

title: Sekai Saikyou no Majo, Hajimemashita ~Watashi Dake "Kouryaku Saito" o Miseru Sekai de Jiyuu ni Ikimasu~
alt_title: 世界最強の魔女、始めました ～私だけ『攻略サイト』を見れる世界で自由に生きます～, I Became the World's Strongest Witch: I Will Live Freely in a World Where Only I can Access the "Guide Site", The World's Strongest Witch Has Begun - I Will Live Freely In A World Where Only I Can View The "Strategy Site" -
description:
An unknown skill turns into unlimited power with divine knowledge [Internet]!

"To manifest an SSS rank with the weakest skill is a disgrace!"

Rona is a girl who was expelled from her home due to her lack of money, food, and power. Lost and hopeless, she suddenly hears the words...

"Would you like some guidance?"

She discovers how to utilize her unique SSS rank skill: [Internet], which she alone possesses. The true nature of this skill is the ability to access this world's 'guide sites' - an extraordinary cheat skill! Endless production of valuable items! Acquiring ultra-rare equipment! Thanks to her skill, she can do as she pleases...!
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Sakaki Mochimaru

title: Sewayaki Mafia to Hakkou Shoujo
alt_title: 世話焼きマフィアと薄幸少女, Meddlesome Mafia and Misfortune Girl, The Meddlesome Mafia and The Hapless Girl
description:
A girl who was sold by her mother and left without relatives is taken in by the boss of the most terrifying Chinese mafia. She thought her life was over, but she was taken to a luxury boutique to get clothes...?!

"Don't be mistaken. These favors from me are so that I can sell you at a high price."

A love comedy between a tough-looking boy with a sharp attitude and a cute girl with a good heart!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Mafia, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Kudo Ayumu

alt_title: クオーツの王国, A Kingdom of Quartz, El Reino del Cuarzo, Кварцевое Королевство, Королевство Кварца
description: "Angels"... are heroes who follow the will of the Goddess and protect the Quartz Kingdom from demons. Blue, an orphan born with dark wings, lives a peaceful life, dreaming of becoming an angel. But one day, after meeting a prince, her destiny begins to change.

title: Charlotte
alt_title: シャーロット
description: In an alternate world, a small percentage of children are able to manifest superpowers upon reaching puberty. Yuu Otosaka, a boy who awakens the ability to temporarily possess others, hopes to use his power to live an easy going high school life.

title: Basilisk: Kouga Ninpou-chou
alt_title: Basilisk: The Koga Ninja Scrolls, Василиск, バジリスク～甲賀忍法帖～, 巴西利斯克, 바질리스크 ~코우가인법첩~, Basilisk: Kouga Ninpouchou
description:
By the order of Shogun Ieyasu Tokugawa, ten ninja from the Iga and the Kouga clans must fight to the death in order to determine who will be the next Tokugawa Shogun, with the surviving clan ruling for the next thousand years. But Oboro of the Iga clan and Gennosuke of the Kouga clan have fallen deeply in love. Now these star-crossed lovers have been pitted against each other. Can their romance conquer a centuries-old rivalry? Or is their love destined to end in death?  
  
Note: Won the Kodansha Manga Award in the category "Best General Manga" in 2004.
genre: Award Winning, Historical, Action, Romance, Ninja, Martial Arts, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Yamada Fuutarou

title: Gunka no Baltzar
alt_title: 軍靴のバルツァー, Gunka no Baltzer, Gunka no Balzer, Baltzar militarismus, 巴爾扎的軍靴, 군화의 발차, Бальцар на тропе войны
description:
Glory is won over the roar of cannon fire. Peace exists simply as a time to prepare for the next battle. In a nation with superb military power, Bernd Baltzar advanced quickly through the ranks. However, his career now takes a sudden turn when he is reassigned to being the military advisor in a neighboring allied nation with little military power and a lack of civilian support of firearms. Will Major Baltzar be able to win the hearts and minds of both the soldiers and civilians in this country?

title: Kuzumi-kun, Can't You Read the Room?
alt_title: Кузуми-кун, ты улавливаешь атмосферу?, 久住くん、空気読めてますか?, 久住君，会察言观色吗
description: Erika Sakura is the school's most popular female high schooler, and only met with envious gazes since she is out of everyone's league. However, she is recently interested in a certain male high schooler who can't read between the lines, Kuzumi. While having a relationship between the two is out of the question, her unrequited love will soon change in this romantic comedy. Follow this new inevitably heart pounding, out-of-contact short love comedy!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Mosuko

alt_title: ハンキー・ドリー
description: The protagonist Yukari and the twin brothers Shun and Ou have grown up like a family ever since they were children. However, their relationship begins changing on the first day of high school…?
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life
