title: Fugue Across Worlds
alt_title: 越过尘世的歌, The Song that Transcends This World
description: During troubled times, Weng Shaoying is one of the most famous singers in Dongping. Many people go to Song of Fairyland just to see her perform. However, under her glamorous facade, she has been controlled for more than 10 years. On the other side of Dongping is Bi Xing Tang, one of the most famous gangs there. After her father’s death, Yanchu became the young female leader of Bi Xing Tang, which caused a lot of rumors to spread. On one inevitably fortuitous night, the two happened to meet. At that time, neither of them knew that they would eventually become the most important person in the other’s life. Starting from that night onwards, the gears in Shaoying and Yanchu’s fate will forever be rotating together.
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Wenzhi Lizi (文枝栗子)

title: Kono Ai wo Owarasete kurenai ka
alt_title: この愛を終わらせてくれないか, Terminarás con este amor?, Will You End This Love?, Kono Ai o Owarasete kurenai ka, 能让这份爱画上休止符吗
description: Yuzu is Hayami Madoka's ardent fan. Having no friends or family that care for her, Madoka is her only solace. Being that Sachiko is Madoka's best friend, she is Yuzu's most hated existence. To vent, she opens a secret account where she posts malicious comments about Sachiko. When she discovers this, she instead attempts to befriend Yuzu and offers her a chance to talk to Madoka. However, an accident occurs and they end up switching bodies with Sachiko being left in coma.
genre: Psychological, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life
author: Tsutsui Itsuki

title: I Swallowed the Heavenly Demon
alt_title: 천마를 삼켰다
description:
40 years ago, three mysterious seeds fell to Earth, unleashing countless monsters. Chosen beings arose to fight against these monsters. Those who manifested the powers of this world's heroic spirits into weapons or blessings were called heroes.

Min Jae-ha, who aspired to become a hero, wandered the front lines but couldn't achieve his dream. Giving up hope of becoming a hero, he now works at That’s Real Company.

One day, while investigating a mineral dungeon for work, Min Jae-ha steps on a mysterious summoning circle and unexpectedly gains an extraordinary heroic spirit, one he had always dreamt of contracting with.

However...

"How many times must I tell you? I am alive!"

"Aren't you technically neither dead nor alive?"
"So what can you even do inside my belly?"

Why has this extraordinary heroic spirit taken residence in Min Jae-ha’s belly instead of manifesting as a weapon or blessing?

"Look up to me, and I shall teach you martial arts."
genre: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Stay

title: The Path Where the Forsythia Fell
alt_title: 개나리가 떨어진 길, 连翘花落之处, The Path on Which Forsythia Fell, レンギョウが散った道〜拾った卵はイケメンだった〜
description:
Byeoru, who was living secretly deep inside the mountain, collected an egg under the forsythia shrubs. Soon after, a dragon hatched from the egg.

Byeoru ended up having to take care for the dragon and gave it a name, Shinri.

However, Shinri, who's still a newborn, grows at an amazing rate. Soon after, he grows bigger than Byeoru and Byeoru becomes more concerned about Shinri.

One day, Byeoru is eaten by Shinri...?

"No matter how much I lick and suck you, it's never enough. Every time I smell your sweetness, I want to eat you."
genre: Long Strip, Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Sumrim 숨림

title: The Voodooist's Wrathful Return
alt_title: 회귀했는데 FFF급 부두술사, I Returned as an FFF-Class Witch Doctor, Hoegwihaessneunde FFF Geup Budusulsa, Regrese como un chaman de clase FFF
description:
Ma Jinsung was once a top-ranked player in Arsia Chronicle, but he was brutally killed by his trusted leader. After that, he thought he'd wake up in his room... not 10 years in the past! 

Now, prepared to exact his revenge, he jumps right back into the game. But this time, his job class is voodooist, and he gets bonuses for killing other players. The only downside -  if he dies in the game, he dies in real life.

Can Jinsung get his revenge without causing too much carnage? Don't bet on it...
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Pinbol

title: Rock
alt_title: ロック
description:
We begin the story as Rock has left her husband, Astro, and their children and wants a divorce because Astro has cheated on Rock (again). As the five year old twins, Rockette and Astro Junior, find pictures of their parents when they were young, we flash back to the ever so popular romcom scenario of when Rock met Astro... except it's Kyoko Okazaki so it's messy, it's kooky, it's funny and it's all in a way that's unique to Kyoko Okazaki.
Between romantic comedy and hallucinated fairy tail, Kyoko Okazaki blows a wind of hysteria in the fashion world and its nights saturated with music and drugs.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Okazaki Kyoko

title: Tensei Shitara Hime Datta node Dansou Joshi Kiwamete Saikyou Mahou Tsukai Mezasuwa
alt_title: 転生したら姫だったので男装女子極めて最強魔法使い目指すわ, I Was Reincarnated as a Princess, so I’m Going to Become the Strongest Wizard in the World!
description:
Ikuto, an ordinary high school boy, is reincarnated as Isabella, a sheltered princess in a world of magic?!
Although he is happy to be able to use magic, Ikuto's ambitions are crushed when he discovers that, in this world, women are not allowed to use magic.
Still, Ikuto is not ready to give up, and at the age of 16, he decides to leave the castle and embark on a journey to learn magic...?!
A new sensation about a princess disguised as a man (while inwardly a high school boy) and a handsome wizard with special circumstances!

(Source: Hakusensha, translated via DeepL)
genre: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Romance, Adventure, Crossdressing, Isekai, Mystery
author: Akira (輝)

title: Hikaru to Hikaru
alt_title: ひかるtoヒカル, 化身为光
description:
"Hikaru to Hikaru" is a comedy about Hikaru Katsuragi, a boy who is a descendant of the Iga ninja, sneaking into a girls' school.

In the Katsuragi family, if you don't master the secret "Kunoichi no Jutsu," which turns your body into a female body, by the age of 18, you won't be recognized as an adult, and his mother was worried about Hikaru's immature technique.

In order for such a Hikaru to become a full-fledged woman, he is ordered to attend a prestigious school for young ladies, Kazami Girls' School, in the form of a woman.
genre: Genderswap, Romance, Ninja, Comedy, School Life
author: Harada Shigemitsu

title: Sensual Novelist and High Schooler Yuri
alt_title: 官能小説家と中学生の百合漫画
genre: Oneshot, Psychological, Girls' Love, Web Comic
author: Dsym875

title: Giri no Kyoudai Dakedo Koibito no Futari wa Doudou to Tsukiaitai
alt_title: 義理の兄弟だけど恋人のふたりは堂々と付き合いたい, Stepbrothers Are Dating and Want To Be Open About It
description:
Kazuma and Yuuya are stepbrothers who are actually lovers and live under one roof (in their parents' house), secretly doing the things lovers do under their parents' radar.

A particular close call is intercepted by Kazuma's quick-thinking. While Yuuya is determined to keep their relationship under wraps, he also begins to feel anxious and conflicted for how long they can keep it a secret.

On the other hand, Kazuma meets Yuuya's student, Matsubara, from his part-time as a cram school tutor by chance when they're out shopping. Seeing their closeness, Kazuma's instincts tells him that he should keep an eye out for him.
He is also curious how Yuuya is doing at the cram school, with Yuuya having a charm that attracts those younger than him...

A possessive younger brother who loves his brother x A popular, soft-type older brother
The two face the feelings they can't hide for each other...
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama
author: Sakumoto Ayu

title: Elden Ring: Become Lord
alt_title: Кольцо Элден: Стань Повелителем, ELDEN RING Become Load
description:
Guided by a blessing, the fading adventurer who has reached the land between the two lands sets out on a journey to become the king of Elde - and he is not alone.

This comic book depicts Elden Ring's epic adventures, including fascinating characters encountered along the way, various dungeon explorations, and battles with powerful bosses.
genre: Action, Long Strip, Survival, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color
author: From Software

title: Tokkou no Shima
alt_title: The Isle of Tokkou, 特攻の島
description:
This story takes place in 1944. Japan is entering a crucial phase in the war against the United States. Cities and towns in Japan fall one after the other under America's continuous bombing. They even get hold off the pacific coast due to their mighty force of 230 submarines, but Japan refuses to admit defeat. They must stop the enemy's advances at all costs. Testings for their new weapon are done - the Kaiten, a suicide torpedo with a built-in cockpit was ready to be mobilized into the battlefield. The time is now perfect for Japan to recruit pilots and station them at a military base on a remote island. Volunteers will forfeit their lives, but recruiters do their patriotic duty: the fate of Japan rests on their shoulders! A fascinating and psychological story on these suicide missions told from the Japanese soldiers' perspective.  
-Mangaupdates
genre: Thriller, Historical, Action, Survival, Martial Arts, Military, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Shuho Sato

title: Kegawa to Nakami
alt_title: けがわとなかみ, Under the Skin
description: One day, a rabbit confesses their love to a fox who tries to eat them. Despite the fox's confusion, the rabbit continues to tell her that they love her. Can the eater and the devoured live together?!
genre: Animals, Romance, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Ruike Umi

title: Momoiro Meloik
alt_title: Peach Colored, 不良妹控的桃色日常, 桃色メロイック
description: Yamato loves his little sister. His sister is the cutest and sweetest girl in the world, and he won't settle for second best. Unfortunately, everyday life and the rest of the world intrude on his idyllic plans, and he finds it's not as simple as he imagines it should be. Follow along with tough Yamato and cute Masaki as they deal with the problems of an otherwise normal family life.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Incest, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Fukuda Shinichi

title: First Time at Starbucks
alt_title: 陰キャちゃん、初めてのスタバ, Первый раз в Старбаксе
description: it was an exciting first experience.
genre: Oneshot, Comedy, Web Comic
author: Semimaru

title: Love Lab
alt_title: Rabu Rabo, Renai Lab, ラブラボ, 恋愛ラボ
description:
Love Lab is set in Fujisaki Girls Academy, which is known for their school body being composed of very prim and proper middle school students. The most prominent one of them is Natsuo Maki, the student council president who is admired by her classmates for her calm and polite demeanor, and her profound beauty. On the other hand, Riko Kurahashi is also admired, but due to her having a very forward and boyish personality.   
  
One day, Riko accidentally walks into Maki when she is kissing a body pillow with a picture of a guy for practice, and learns that she is not as collected as everyone thinks she is. Riko is forced into keeping Maki's secret and joins her in practicing romance activities such as holding hands and more, and in the middle of all that mess, somehow smoothly running a student council regardless!
genre: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Miyahara Ruri

title: Gambling Outcast Kaiji - Kaiji Part 3
alt_title: Kaiji Part 3, 賭博堕天録カイジ
description: Six months after the fight to the death with The Bog, Kaiji escapes from the underground and pays off his debts. Sakazaki gets fed up with Kaiji and tries to get rid of him by giving him 3 million yen as compensation. At that time, Kaiji is reunited with Miyoshi and Maeda, who were his friends in the underground, and they come up with a plan to swindle a large sum of money from Muraoka, the president of the underground casino where they work. Kaiji takes 3 million yen from Sakazaki, promising to pay it back, and plays a variant of mahjong called "17 Steps" invented by Muraoka.
genre: Thriller, Traditional Games, Psychological, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Mafia, Adventure, Office Workers, Philosophical, Drama, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Tragedy
author: Fukumoto Nobuyuki

title: I Woke Up as the Villain
alt_title: 나 혼자 소설 속 망나니, Trapped in a Webnovel as a Good for Nothing, The Trash of a Fantasy Novel, I'm Alone in a Novel, Trapped in a Webnovel as a Trash, Я стал главным ублюдком в этом романе, 俺だけノベルの中で暴れん坊, Я стал главным ублюдком в этой новелле
description:
Yuseong’s an ordinary office worker, reincarnated as a web novel’s foolish side character of the same name. Born into the wealthy Haesung Group conglomerate, hated by his family, and prone to violent tantrums, the character’s fated to be manipulated and killed. To escape his doom, the new Yuseong finds a way to become one of the Awakened, those gifted with supernatural powers. He’ll try to level up and climb the ranks, defeating monsters in different dimensions… and his enemies at the same time.

---

genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Yu Hyun So (소유현)

title: I Became a Top Actor Just by Reading Books!
alt_title: 책만 보고 탑배우!
description:
Due to his lack of talent, Seonghyeon gave up acting and became a writer. Seonghyeon is a genius author with a natural talent for screenplays, but he still misses acting. Then one day, he got into a truck accident on set.

“If I’m born again, I have to act,” he promised and closed his eyes.

Seonghyeon returns 13 years back into the past to when he was 24 years old. And the method acting ability that goes into his scripts became the character itself! Okay, this life is about being reborn as a genius actor!
genre: Thriller, Reincarnation, Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Lee Han Sung

title: Sugoi Smartphone
alt_title: Super Smartphone, すごいスマホ, Супер смартфон, Super Smartphone
description: What would you do if you had a smartphone that let you look up anything? Secret documents, security camera footage, a certain person's text messages, where people dropped money... This smartphone lets you do the impossible! Jump's newest suspense thriller begins!
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Psychological, Comedy, Crime, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Tomisawa Hiroki

title: Arasa OL Haman-sama
alt_title: The Thirty-ish Office Worker Haman-sama, アラサーOLハマーン様
description: A comedy manga about Haman Karn as a modern corporate section chief at an apparel company named Neo Zeon dealing with her insecurities being a 30 year old office lady.
genre: Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life
author: Iwasaki Masakazu

title: Goodnight Punpun
alt_title: Buenas noches Punpun, Спокойной ночи, Пунпун, おやすみプンプン, 晚安，布布, 잘자 뿡뿡
description:
Punpun Onodera is a normal 11-year-old boy living in Japan. Hopelessly idealistic and romantic, Punpun begins to see his life take a subtle—though nonetheless startling—turn to the adult when he meets the new girl in his class, Aiko Tanaka. It is then that the quiet boy learns just how fickle maintaining a relationship can be, and the surmounting difficulties of transitioning from a naïve boyhood to a convoluted adulthood. When his father assaults his mother one night, Punpun realizes another thing: those whom he looked up to were not as impressive as he once thought.  
  
As his problems increase, Punpun's once shy demeanor turns into voluntary reclusiveness. Rather than curing him of his problems and conflicting emotions, this merely intensifies them, sending him down the dark path of maturity in this grim coming-of-age saga.
genre: Thriller, Award Winning, Monsters, Psychological, Animals, Romance, Crime, Sexual Violence, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Delinquents, Police, Slice of Life, Aliens, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Asano Inio

title: Colori Colore Creare
alt_title: コローリ コローレ クレアーレ, ココクレ, Kokokure
description: The town of Onobori is located on an island and is protected by a noren (a traditional Japanese curtain). Aka is a naive girl living alone with her grandfather who runs a coffee shop in a quaint windmill hut. An encounter with a giant black cat opens the curtain on a story of creating the colors of the future by weaving together the colorful splendor that is scattered throughout daily life!
genre: Sci-Fi, Animals, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Amano Kozue

title: I Became a Terminally-Ill Knight
alt_title: 시한부 기사가 되었다, A Knight With a Time Limit, I Have Become A Time Limited Knight
description:
Levis Cloyd, a man who transmigrated from Earth to another world, is bound to live a time-limited life. To survive, he must kill living beings.

Living with the motto of "if you are going through hell, keep going, " he meets another opportunity.
- - -
Minhyuk, a bedridden man in Korea, meticulously counts his waning days when suddenly, he's transmigrated to another world where he gains the new identity of Levis, the Soul Harvester. 

In this world, Levis must claim lives to extend his own, a haunting paradox that he must come to terms with.

Forced to grapple with a life tethered to a merciless ticking clock, Levis becomes a harbinger of fate, tasked with the daunting responsibility of ending the lives of others in order to preserve his own.

How far does the will to survive stretch? Is one life's preservation worth another's demise?
genre: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Kim Durumi (김두루미)

title: Tondemo Skill de Isekai Hourou Meshi: Sui no Daibouken
alt_title: Campfire Cooking in Another World with My Absurd Skill: Sui’s Great Adventure, とんでもスキルで異世界放浪メシ スイの大冒険, Sui's Big Adventure
description: A spin-off of the series TONDEMO SKILL DE ISEKAI HOUROU MESHI told from Sui's perspective.
genre: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Cooking
author: Eguchi Ren

title: Together With the Gods of Music
alt_title: 음악의 신들과 함께한다, Eum-ag-ui sindeulgwa hamkkehanda
description:
A producer who had no talent but wanted to make it as a singer.
Death came on what he thought was his last chance, but the music gods didn't turn their backs on him.

-If the music gods don't abandon you, can you really do it?

With the gods of music, change began.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Music, Full Color
author: Jeff(WHYNOTME)

title: Pokémon SPECIAL The Mount Shirogane Training Chapter
alt_title: Pokémon SPECIAL The Mt Silver Training Chapter
description: A pair of chapters that take place during Red and Gold's training on Mount Shirogane (Mt Silver). They were published in Pokémon the Comic and never published in a volume.
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Animals, Adventure, Video Games, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Hidenori Kusaka

title: Kono Oto Tomare!
alt_title: Stop at This Sound!, Задержите этот звук!, この音とまれ！, 一弦定音!
description: Since the graduation of the senior members of the club, Takezou ends up being the sole member of the "Koto" (traditional Japanese string instrument) club. Now that the new school year has begun, Takezou will have to seek out new members for the club, or the club will be terminated. Out of nowhere, a new member barges into the near-abandoned club room, demanding to join the club. How will Takezou be able to keep his club alive and deal with this rascal of a new member?
genre: Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Music
author: Sakura Amyuu

title: Human Weapon Katsuo!
alt_title: Human Weapon - Katsuo, 人間凶器カツオ!
description: The protagonist Hamada Katsuo, is your everyday pervert/loser character. He's starting a new semester in school, so he wants to escape from his loser days, the only problem is the new change in look/lifestyle he got is that of a gang member. He beats a strong guy that was bullying a friend of his by mistake and now, because of it he's the target for all the gangs in the region, even though he's still only a weakling and a pervert. Will Katsuo escape alive…? Find out.
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life
author: Hamori Takashi

title: Saint Seiya - Another Story of Hades: Dark Wing
alt_title: 聖闘士星矢 冥王異伝 ダークウィング
description: A high school student suffers an accident and wakes up in Elysium, the World of the Dead. In search of answers, he meets Hades, the God of the Underworld, who sends him on a mission only he can fulfill.
genre: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Saitou Kenji

title: Cage of Eden
alt_title: Клетка Эдема, エデンの檻, 逃离伊甸园, 逃離伊甸園
description: Akira and his classmates are traveling on a plane when it crashes onto an island inhabited by species thought to have been extinct. The situation becomes increasingly desperate as some of Akira's classmates are eaten alive, while some kill others in desperation. Now Akira and a few other survivors are trying to survive what seems to be a horrible nightmare.
genre: Action, Psychological, Romance, Survival, Adventure, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Yamada Yoshinobu

title: Bocchi Jieikan no Isekai Funsenki
alt_title: Different World Adventures Of A Lone Japan Ground Self Defense Force Ensign, ぼっち自衛官の異世界奮戦記
description: Jinguji Jo, an officer candidate of the Self-Defense Force, who had just graduated from the University of Defense, was reincarnated into a different world due to a traffic accident. The inventory had the standard equipment of the Japan Ground Self-Defense Force! Jinguji Jo's self-defense officer battle action makes him unrivaled in the fantasy world with equipment stronger than magic!!
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Military, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy
author: Heesokai

title: Saint Seiya: Asgard
alt_title: Knights Of The Zodiac: Asgard
description: Doujinshi Chinese from the Asgard saga from the anime Saint Seiya.
genre: Action, Martial Arts, Adventure, Doujinshi, Adaptation
author: Kurumada Masami

title: My Favorite Idol
alt_title: 사생돌, Sasaengdol
description:
The bodies of the top idol and a school outcast are switched?! A school outcast who is always bullied everyday, Hong Jooa. A top idol who is loved by the whole nation, Go Yohan. Jooa, who envies the life of her beloved idol, and Yohan, who envies the simple and free life of an ordinary person. While they yearned for each other’s lives, their bodies were switched one day!? A spectacular body-switch romance, My Favorite Idol!
Blackout-Phantom
genre: Sci-Fi, Genderswap, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

title: Planetarium Ghost Travel: The Art of Sakatsuki Sakana
alt_title: プラネタリウム・ゴースト・トラベル：坂月さかな作品集
description:
A combination illustration and manga artbook featuring the ultramarine works and fantastical world of Sakatsuki Sakana. These short stories served as a precursor to Sakatsuki's eventual ongoing publication [Star Tripper](https://mangadex.org/title/77c7d3eb-16e9-4ef2-81f0-4d3876a037c5/star-tripper-planetarium-ghost-travel), and offer additional universe lore that is of importance in the main series.

---
Altogether, there are 11 "chapters" in total:

- Part I: A Star Tripper's Scenery
- Part II: A Sleepless Boy's Journey to the Moon
- Part III: Star Tripper
  - 3.1 - Prologue
  - 3.2 - Listening to the Rain
  - 3.3 - Buying Sweets
  - 3.4 - Drinking Kikiriri
  - 3.5 - Windowshopping for Spacesuits
  - 3.6 - Climbing the Tower
  - 3.7 - Luck of the Draw
  - 3.8 - Epilogue
- Part IV: The Journey of Tobias and His Brother
genre: Sci-Fi, Anthology, Adventure, Magic, Philosophical, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Sakatsuki Sakana

title: Wedding Impossible
alt_title: 웨딩 임파서블, Weding Impaseobeul, ケッコン：インポッシブル, Невозможная свадьба, 搞定小叔子
description:
What would you do for $500k? As a struggling actress, I agreed to play the part of a "doting fiancée" to Jeekyung Lee, a charming, handsome heir to a Korean conglomerate—the perfect husband! Except, he's gay. Eh, it's fine! The only problem is... (cue ominous music) Jeehan, Jeekyung's younger brother. That jerk may have the looks of a leading man, but he's determined to show I'm the wrong girl for Jeekyung! It's gonna take the performance of my life to win him over. Hah! I'm ready for my Oscar!

---

title: I Will Not Be The Supporting Character Forever
alt_title: 永遠の脇役なんていない, 영원한 조연은 없다, There Is No Eternal Supporting Character
description:
“Why a supporting character instead of the main character?! And out of all supporting characters, why must I be this girl…” When she came to, she was in the middle of the novel, [Empress Rosalynne], as the supporting priest character, “Elena”. Moreover, the story starts right after Elena messed up a holy ritual and she was treated awfully by everyone around her… “There’s only one way to get out of this! I have to become the tutor of the Emperor’s little brother, Duke Levi!”

Elena thought she could watch over the protagonist of the story, Rosalynne, as the events of the story unfolded at the imperial court, but something was wrong. “Equality between commoners and me, a noble? You better watch yourself!” The protagonist she had admired so much was a villainess that discriminated against others based on their social status.

“I won’t be able to stand it if everything ends up the way she wants!” And so, Elena resolves to change how the story unfolds.

Can she rise from her role as a supporting character and claim the position of protagonist?!
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Kim Roah (김로아)

title: Saitei Chara ni Tensei shita Ore wa Ikinokoritai
alt_title: 最低キャラに転生した俺は生き残りたい, I Have Been Reincarnated as the Worst Character Possible, and I Am Determined to Survive
description: Jin reincarnates into the most hated and worst character in the game he played before he died. If the same scenario is followed, he will fall into darkness after three years... In an attempt to avoid such a fate, Jin begins a life as an adventurer—?

title: Pray To a Ghost
alt_title: 귀비나리
description: A psychic high-schooler Tae-rin discovered the story of a ghost one day. After that she realized, humans are more dangerous than ghosts. Tae-rin then decides to help the ghosts get rid of their grudges with her childhood friend, Chang-woo.

title: Kyou mo Kitansu ka, Yoda-senpai.
alt_title: 今日も来たんすか、依田先輩。, Have You Come Again Today, Yoda-senpai?
description:
This woman makes herself at home in my parents' house.
She is a senior in the same high school and a friend of my sister's.
It seems to take her two hours to get to school each way, so she stays at my house almost every day.

Yoda is defenseless and a bit out of the ordinary, and I'm always on the edge of my seat!
A short daily love comedy of a natural devil sister and an otaku boy under one roof!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Kurokawa Yuuya

title: I Gave Birth to the Villain's Child
alt_title: 살인귀의 아이를 낳았다, Sal-ingwieui Aireul Nah-assda, Romance in Reverse, I Gave Birth to a Villain's Child, I Gave Birth to a Murderer's Child, I Raised the Son of a Murderer, 带着萌娃嫁公爵？, 殺人鬼の子を産んだ
description: Lady Carinne is in danger of being sold off in a political marriage, but the arrangement falls through when she spends a night with a mysterious stranger, willingly conceiving his child. Her spiteful father locks her away as punishment for years, until one day - another suitor steps forward, offering to marry Carinne and take her child in. When she arrives at his castle, however, she realizes he is someone she has met before…
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Gaksaek Giseon

title: Come Out, Romeo
alt_title: 나오세요, 로미오, The Events of Romeo's Household
description:
Romeo Montague, a boy thrown into the attic with disgust after an accident five years ago. Although the world knew him as a boy unable to move due to a horrid afflicted illness, he lives a happy and fruitful life as a hermit in the attic. Only his cousin, Benvolio, and the housekeeper, Miriam, knows the truth.   
  
But his peace breaks when Miriam's brother, Abram, enters the mansion.  
  
"I'll get you out of this room on your own feet!"   
  
"You don't need to make such promise."  
  
Romeo begins to solve Abram's various troubles with a single thought and determination to preserve his peace in the attic.   
  
Meanwhile, an unexpected adversary appears in front of him half-heartedly.
genre: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Yang Hye Suk

title: The Fallen Duke and the Knight Who Hated Him
alt_title: The Fallen Duke & the Knight Who Hated Him, 몰락한 영주님의 사정, The Circumstances of the Fallen Feudal Lord, The Fallen Lord's Circumstances
description:
Sleeping with the enemy... literally.
After Duke Louison is given a second chance at life, he sets out to save the people he had so terribly failed by surrendering himself to the enemy. Yet little does he know that crossing paths with an enemy knight — the noble-hating Carlton — would become so... intimate. Things are about to get messy!
genre: Long Strip, Boys' Love, Survival, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Lero (레로)

alt_title: If You Break Up, You Die, 分开即死, 分手就死定了, 離れたら死ぬ, 헤어지면 죽음
description:
The perfect influencer life. Having a date with the girl you like.
Only confession remains, but I got caught up in an absurd terrorist incident?!
"It's not an obsession, we really...! If we break up, we die!!"

---

**Note:** This is part of The Red String Universe published by Ylab.

title: Becoming the Villain's Family (Promo)
alt_title: 악당과 계약 가족이 되었다, I Became the Villain's Contract Family
description:
Sirens… a name derived from an ancient creature, used to describe those who could charm, lure, control, and heal others by singing. Years ago, a siren named Sophia was kidnapped by Count Cortez as his prized siren, and a girl named Aria was born soon after as their daughter. Subjected to live the life of a siren, Aria had experienced, seen, and heard many horrific things. Others would do anything to hear her sing, to the point of insanity. The emperor, who grew obsessed with her, broke her legs and locked her in a bird cage deep within the imperial palace to hide her and keep her to himself. Broken beyond repair, Aria resigned herself to death, when suddenly–  
  
The Devil Archduke, Lloyd Cardenis Valentine, arrived and whispered, "Should I kill everyone here? If you need me, just call me. Your song will always reach me, wherever you are."  
  
In the end, Aria called the devil, bringing death to all those present, except for herself.  
"Let's fall down to Hell together."  
And with that, Aria breathed her last and died… only to return back to her 10 year old self.  
  
Now that she has a second chance at her life, Aria is determined to change her fate, as well as the cruel future of her savior, Archduke Valentine. She proposes a contract marriage to him, with a divorce planned 10 years later, but he has other plans…
genre: Oneshot, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Sol Leesu

title: Reborn as the Enemy Prince
alt_title: 적국의 왕자로 사는 법, How to Live as the Enemy Prince, Living as the Enemy Prince, Cómo vivir como el príncipe enemigo
description:
Imagine being kin to your sworn enemy.

Killed in battle while defending his country, Bern wakes up in the body of the enemy prince, Kalian, and vows to avenge his people. But between taming an abusive half-brother and surviving his mother's deadly web of intrigue, sweet revenge seems to slip further beyond his grasp at every turn.

---
I could hear the hum of life in my ears. It was hard to breathe… I raised my gaze and stared into the distance. However, my blurred vision could not see anything. The light began to fade. That was my last memory.

When I opened my eyes once again, it was ten years before that last memory took place. And of all the things I could have become, it was from the enemy country that drove Secretia to ruin – I had become Kyris' third prince, Calian.

…..

Bern was the proud Crown Prince of Secretia who fought and died in the war against Kyris. But he woke up ten years into the past – as the timid Third Prince of Kyris, Calian.
genre: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Ja Seo Hyeon

title: His Majesty Doesn't Want to Be Too Bossy
alt_title: Marry My Enemy, 朕也不想太霸气, 朕也不想太霸氣
description: Like a mascot, this "Emperor" is a woman disguised as a man. The black-hearted Prince Regent has been "taking good care" of her since she was a child. Countless treacherous officials are blocking her way to taking over the throne upon her coming of age. However, if you can't beat that person, then there's always the option of bringing him home to marry!
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Feng Qian

title: 0 and 1
description:
여성향 연애 시뮬레이션 게임 속 공략 캐릭터에 빙의했다.
1왕자 에드워드에 대한 열등감을 해소하려고 여주를 꼬시는 2왕자로.
난 에드워드에게 살해당하기 싫다.
남의 연애 방해하기도 싫고, 미움받기도 싫다.

“네가 좋아하는 사람이잖아. 난 아무 감정 없어.”
“그래. 좋아하지 않는 게 좋을걸. 네가 그녀와 이어질 일은 없을 테니까.”
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Min On

title: Why Are You Obsessed With Me Even Though I Reject Your Affection?
alt_title: Why Are You So Obsessed With Rejecting Love?, 총애를 거절하는데 왜 집착하나요, Chongaereul Geojeolhaneunde Wae Jipchakanayo, Why Do You Love Me When I Refuse Your Request?
description:
The extra who sacrifices herself for the beloved female lead. Princess Shuelina who is tossed aside by her biologically related father and older brother. Now I’m the main character of this odd situation. In regards to hope, I’m still neglected at this orphanage. Just as I was going to run away before the imperial family found me–  
  
“Did you hear? The House of Grand Duke Vailot came to sponsor an orphan.”  
  
To find a way to live, I threw myself at the villain's family, the Grand Duke’s, and-  
  
“You can do whatever you want. I, as the Grand Duke, will protect you.”  
  
“You’re not an orphan. You’re my younger sister.”  
  
Why do they love me? Just as I made up my mind to live well since I'd already become a lady of the House of Grand Duke Vailot…  
  
"I have searched for you for a long time, my child."  
  
This time my biologically related father, the Emperor loves me. Why are you acting like this? I said, I don't need you guys who wouldn't have listened to what Shuelina had to say. I refuse to accept your love!
genre: Oneshot, Long Strip, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Seo Yoo-ah

title: Please Save My Husband
alt_title: In-Law World Game - Please Save My Husband, The Newlywed Game - How to Save My Husband, 시월드 게임 -please save my husband
description:
The ideal husband; a romantic wedding day; a perfect honeymoon… Everything looks as if it's going in the right direction, but instead I'm suddenly living a fantasy?!! Hahahaha, what the hell's going on?!  
  
Every time I fail a quest, I'm thrown right back to the beginning of the mission! Where exactly is this heading!?   
  
To protect my husband, Yeoyun, and stop travelling back in time, I must control this marriage and the in-laws!
genre: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Song Baek

title: Hanayori Ookami
alt_title: 花よりオオカミ, The Wolf in the Flower Shop
description: Riku Kirishima, a rough-looking high schooler, is a lover of romantic comic books who takes care of his family in place of his late mother. He has a younger brother, who he cares for deeply. One evening, he is suddenly embraced by a man in the park who offers him $300 to spend the night. Riku runs away, but soon learns that the handsome pervert who approached him is actually the guardian of his brother's friend! Enjoy this love story between a handsome florist and a romantic high school tough guy!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Slice of Life
author: 75 Nako

title: Akaiito
alt_title: Akai Ito (MIYASAKA Kaho), Il Filo Rosso, Innocent scene, Kızıl İplik, Le Fil Rouge, Алая нить, خيط احمر, ผูกใจไว้ใกล้ ๆ เธอ, あかいいと, 紅線情, 红线情, 붉은 실 (미야사카 카호)
description: A red thread exists between a guy and girl that are fated to be together, a bond that can't be seen by the naked eye. Finally, this fated romantic love will begin to open its curtain.
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Miyasaka Kaho

title: I Will Seduce the Male Lead for My Older Brother
alt_title: 오빠를 위해 남주를 꼬셔 보겠습니다, Oppareul Wihae Namjureul Kkosyeo Bogetseumnida, Raffine's Plan: Save My Favorite Character, For Older Brother, I Will Seduce the Male Lead, I Will Try to Seduce the Male Lead for My Brother, 为了哥哥，我决心诱惑男主
description:
*I'll marry the male lead myself!*

Raffine is in a predicament, and there are three reasons why. One, she's been reincarnated into a super angsty, highly depressing novel. Two, her older brother is destined for death in said novel. And three, the only way to save him is by marrying the male lead. What the hell is going on?!

---
I possessed Raphine, the youngest sister of the second male lead, who had no dreams nor hopes, in an impoverished and obsession filled novel. That was also because he had a crush on the female lead, who married the male lead on a contract, and eventually died.

I can't believe it's such a miserable ending for my favorite character and kind eldest brother. No way!

Raphine decided to brainwash Prince Jerkan, the male lead of the novel, to prevent the female lead's contract marriage.

So that he can think of me when he needs a contract marriage!

"Jerkan! I want to marry you!"
"If you're grateful, you have to marry me next time."
"I need a simple marriage, so I'll get married through a contract."

And when the brainwashing finally succeeded, Raphine cheered inside.

"Okay. Definitely, I'll marry you."

I never imagined what kind of eyes he was had. Yeah, I really didn't know then. I didn't know this would happen.

"Didn't you pester me because you wanted to marry me?"
"Will you run away?"
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Jangsu

title: Boukensha ni Narenakatta Ore, Skill [Oppai Kyousei] de Nayameru Anoko wo Hitotasuke!?
alt_title: 冒険者になれなかった俺、スキル「おっぱい矯正」で悩めるあの子を人助け!?, I Couldn’t Become an Adventurer, so I’ll Help Troubled Girls With My [Breast Correction] Skill!?
description:
More than ten years have passed since dungeons suddenly appeared on Earth. In a world where people with excellent skills play an active role as adventurers, the skill that high school student Takeshi Miyamoto has discovered is... "breast correction"!?

Takeshi is confused by the unique skill he has never seen or heard of. But there seems to be a surprising number of girls who need it.

---

title: Kamitachi ni Hirowareta Otoko
alt_title: By the Grace of the Gods, Избранный богами, Милостью богов, Человек, выбранный богами, 神拾之男, 神達に拾われた男, ками-тати ни хироварэта оток, 众神眷顾的男人, 眾神眷顧的男人, 신들에게 주워진 남자, The Man Picked Up by the Gods
description:
Upon his sudden death, middle-aged otaku businessman Ryoma Takebayashi finds himself in a curious situation. Three gods request his cooperation in their divine plot, which requires him to reincarnate in another world as a young boy!

Equipped with magic, young Ryoma undertakes a carefree existence in the forest, leisurely learning more about his new abilities and surroundings. And when he encounters slimes like those in video games from his former life, Ryoma uses his newfound magical powers to get creative with his research!

Will the gods get more than they bargained for in Ryoma?!

[MangaUp!](https://global.manga-up.com/manga/273)
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Shota, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Roy

title: Nihonkoku Shoukan
alt_title: Summoned Japan, 日本国召喚, 일본국 소환, Вызов для Японии
description:
In the Great Orient, lies a continent called Rodenius. One day, an unidentified flying object arrived at Qua-Toyne Principality’s airspace. 
That UFO defied the Principality’s common sense, but it was just a harbinger of something even more shocking.  
  
Far to the eastern sea, a group of islands suddenly appeared. The country of the islands called itself: Japan.
According to them, their nation had been transported to another world.  
  
Now finding themselves separated from their old world and must survive in the new one, how will Japan interact with the native countries of this world? Will they greet it as a friend or as an enemy?  
  
This is a story of the country called Japan as it was engulfed in the chaotic storm of this new world.
genre: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Military, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Minorou

title: Witch Hat Atelier
alt_title: Ателье колдовских колпаков, 尖帽子的魔法工房, 고깔모자의 아틀리에, とんがり帽子のアトリエ, Atelier of Witch Hat
description:
In a world where everyone takes wonders like magic spells and dragons for granted, Coco is a girl with a simple dream: she wants to be a wizard. 
But everybody knows magicians are born, not made, and she was not born with a gift for magic. 
Resigned to her un-magical life, Coco is about to give up on her dream until the day she meets Qifrey, a mysterious traveling magician. After secretly watching him perform magic in a way she’s never seen before, Coco soon learns what everybody “knows” might not be the truth and discovers that her magical dream may not be as far away as it seems…
  
- Winner of the 2020 Eisner Award for Best U.S. Edition of International Material-Asia.  
- Winner of the Best Manga award at the 2020 Harvey Awards.  


---

title: Assassin de Aru Ore no Sutetasu ga Yuusha Yori mo Akiraka ni Tsuyoi Nodaga
alt_title: 暗殺者である俺のステータスが勇者よりも明らかに強いのだが, My Status as an Assassin Obviously Exceeds the Hero’s, My Status as an Assassin Obviously Exceeds the Brave's, 身为暗杀者的我明显比勇者还强, 身為暗殺者的我明顯比勇者還強, 암살자인 내 스테이터스가 용사보다 명백히 강합니다만, Но я убийца, а не герой!, Ассасин, с которым не мог потягаться герой
description:
Oda Akira, a high school student who excels in erasing his presence, was summoned along with his classmates to another world. In this world of sword and magic, Akira and his classmates were asked to become heroes and bring down the demon king. Having a bad feeling about the king and the princess who asked them, Akira uses his special skills to sneak into the king’s library, in hopes of discovering the truth. Whether to help or abandon his classmates who knew nothing, it all depended on Akira.  
  


---
genre: Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Akai Matsuri

title: Yuukyuu no Gusha Asley no, Kenja no Susume: to, Pochi no Daibouken
alt_title: 悠久の愚者アズリーの、賢者のすゝめ, Yuukyuu no Gusha Asley no, Kenja no Susume, The Eternal Fool's Words of Wisdom: A Pawsitively Fantastic Adventure, Вечно живущий дурень-мудрец «Азли», The Principle of a Philosopher by Eternal Fool "Asley", 悠久の愚者アズリーの、賢者のすゝめ と、ポチの大冒険
description:
A couple thousand years of solitude would wear down any young man — that is, anyone except Asley, an eternally youthful and eternally foolish sorcerer. After all, he has man’s best friend... er, familiar, to keep him company.

When his Level 100 canine companion Pochi demands that he get some fresh air for the first time in two centuries, Asley sets out to reintegrate into society and test his magic mettle. His mission? Dropping several unglamorous titles from his repertoire and restoring his good (okay, decent) name.

A brand-new world and fresh adventures await Asley after his many years of hermitage. Perhaps he’ll lend Pochi a hand to place first in the mysterious Familiar Feud. Or maybe he’ll lose all vestiges of dignity and turn tail. Whichever comes first!

No matter what, Asley has great evil to fight, a big world to save, and even a little growing up to do... that is, if he can endure Pochi’s “friendly advice” along the way!
genre: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Hifumi (壱弐参)

title: Soshite Akuma wa Seigi wo Kataru
alt_title: そして悪魔は正義を騙る
description: At Chesthill, a boys' school where the students are judged only for how right their acts are without regards for their wealth or birth, the top student is granted the position of “Angel”, head of the “Angel Council” who guides his fellow students to be right. Taiga, a teacher arrived from a country in the far east firmly believes in that which is right and aims to guide his students towards being right, but one student, Lucas, the black sheep of the school nicknamed “the devil” has other plans than going along with the ideals of rightness that the school embodies. After the Angel is murdered and Taiga is framed for the murder, he has no choice but to accept Lucas' offer to save him and follow the mad, coquettish Devil in his quest to solve the mystery of the Angel's murder and become the new Angel.
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life, Mystery
author: Aobe Mahito

title: Mahoui Rex no Hentai Karte
alt_title: 魔法医レクスの変態カルテ, Magic Doctor's Perverted Medical Record
description: In a world where the Demon King has been defeated and peace reigns, there is Rex, a magical doctois, who attends a clinic. However, the patients who visit them the most are those with something wrong with their heads enough to do perverted things with slime or extremely strange things with man-eaters... Here begins the strange medical comedy in another world!
genre: Monsters, Demons, Comedy, Magic, Medical, Fantasy, Web Comic
author: Motomi Daisuke

title: Dragon First Crush
genre: Long Strip, Boys' Love, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Mr. Blue

title: Kamen Kitan Theo
alt_title: Mask Chronicle Theo, 仮面奇譚テオ
description: A mysterious man donned in the mask of a wolf travels to 19th century Venice to investigate the strange happenings of men turning to stone. What will he uncover, and what does his new companion Eleanor have to do with it? From the team that brought you Phantom Seer!
genre: Oneshot, Historical, Monsters, Demons, Fantasy, Mystery
author: Gotou Tougo

title: Grand Dwarf
alt_title: グランドワーフ〜町工職人、匠の技で異世界無双〜, Grand Dwarf ~The Smalltown Craftsman's Skills Are Unmatched In Another World~
description:
For 52 years, Takumi Fujimura, a craftsman who has continued to hone his skills at a town factory, finds himself in a predicament when he has a dispute with a client and stops getting loans from banks. After many years of hard work, he finally collapses, but he awakens in a different world where he meets Frau, a girl who aspires to become a hero. 

With the benefit of modern technology and decades of crafting skill, can Takumi take this new world by storm?
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural
author: Saito Naotake

title: Mainichi Ie ni Kuru Gal ga Kyorikan Zero Demo Yasashiku nai
alt_title: 毎日家に来るギャルが距離感ゼロでも優しくない, The Gal Who Comes to My House Every Day Has Zero Boundaries but Isn't Kind
description:
Class queen Manami Fuwa has been gaining weight lately. 

To make matters worse, a rival girl is taunting her in class, calling her a "muscle ball with money". 

When Taichi Utsuki can't contain his thoughts about her weight, he's forced to accompany Fuwa on her diet! 

A romantic comedy of dieting with a violent, irrational, selfish girl with no sense of emotional distance begins.
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation, Gyaru
author: Kuronyan

title: Maou ni Natta node, Dungeon Tsukutte Jingai Musume to Honobono suru
alt_title: Я стал Повелителем Демонов и создал подземелье, чтобы проводить время с девушками-монстрами, 魔王になったので、ダンジョン造って人外娘とほのぼのする, 魔王建造地下城转生到异世界建造人外娘, 마왕이 됐으므로 던전을 만들고 인외아가씨와 훈훈해진다, 魔王建造地下城轉生到異世界建造人外娘, Now I'm a Demon Lord! Happily Ever After with Monster Girls in My Dungeon, I Became the Demon Lord so I Created a Dungeon and Spend Heartwarming Time There with Non-Human Girls
description:
Before I realized, I had become the guardian of a dungeon, a Demon Lord. I was suddenly in a dangerous world with giant monsters loitering around, fighting for their existence. So I thought to go about developing the dungeon in order to not die, but for some reason I was having quite the good time…. How did it turn out like this?  
  
The protagonist, Yuki, having to live in that world now, uses his bold and sharp senses and spends time with a supreme dragon girl and a vampire girl, sometimes laughing, sometimes being angry, passing days doing what he likes.
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Ryuyu

title: Vintage
alt_title: ビンテイジ
description:
"Why am I not popular!?"

Eiji is an unpopular first year university student who is indifferent about fashion. He wants to lose his virginity and has been attending mixers for that purpose but has been failing miserably at them. In the midst of all that, he found a pair of jeans left behind by his late vintage clothes loving father and that's also when he met Ayame, an unfriendly but super cute girl working at a vintage clothes store!

Here's to the beginning of a campus life comedy that started from "vintage clothing" and "love".
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Akaborikun

title: Akuyaku Reijou no Dere wa Ore Dake ni Barete Iru
alt_title: 悪役令嬢のデレは俺だけにバレている, 悪役令嬢が実は心が綺麗な良い娘であると俺だけが知っている。, Only I Know About the Villainess' Dere, Only I Know That the Villainess Is Actually a Good Girl With a Beautiful Heart, 唯我独占恶役千金的娇羞
description:
The protagonist was reincarnated into an otome game as the first prince. He had played the otome game in his past life, and knew that the villainess was actually not evil and had lived an unlucky life. He searched for the route where the villainess was saved through all media, but he couldn’t find it and gave up. But this time, he was determined to save her.

---
**Original Web Novel:** [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/1177354054918169629), [Syosetu](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3771gk/)
genre: Reincarnation, Romance, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
author: Crosis

title: Out
alt_title: Выход, アウト
description: 17-year-old Iguchi Tatsuya has just been released from juvenile detention and is on probation. He's been relocated to a new area, away from the bad influence of his old friends, and is under the care of his aunt. He is determined not to be sent back to lockup, and he works hard in his aunt's restaurant. However, he still has the same personality, the same tendency to violence, and still falls in with the same sort of people. It's going to be difficult for him to stay out of trouble.
genre: Action, Gore, Drama, Delinquents
author: Iguchi Tatsuya

title: Records of April 3, 2037
alt_title: 2037年4月3日のこと
description: In the year 2037, everything we know has changed. Humans are known across the galaxy as delicious treats, and have nearly been hunted to extinction. One lonely astronaut roams the Earth’s surface, searching through abandoned bunkers for his lost daughter. One day, he is surprised by a noise behind him. Out of the shadows steps a figure with fangs for teeth and tentacles for hair. But, instead of killing him, she introduces herself…?
genre: Oneshot, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Survival, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Aliens, Supernatural
author: Enewald

title: The Story of Getting Remarried and Having a Cute Older Sister
alt_title: 再婚してかわいいお姉ちゃんができた話
genre: Oneshot, Crossdressing, Web Comic
author: Mikazuki Lamp

title: Yubisaki to Renren
alt_title: ゆびさきと恋々, A Sign of Affection, Attached to Your Fingertips, Любовь с кончиков пальцев, Знак привязанности, 指尖相触，恋恋不舍, 손끝과 연연, Love Affection
description:
One day, Yuki, a university student, is in trouble when she is rescued by Itsuomi, a senior student at the same university. Even though Yuki is deaf due to a hearing impairment, Itsuomi is unfazed and treats her naturally. Yuki gradually becomes aware of Itsuomi, who makes her feel a new world...

---
Yuki is a typical college student, whose world revolves around her friends, social media, and the latest sales. But when a chance encounter on a train leads to her meeting friend-of-a-friend and fellow student Itsuomi-san, her world starts to widen. But even though Itsuomi-kun can speak three languages, sign language isn't one of them. Can the two learn to communicate the budding feelings between them?
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Morishita Suu

title: Historie
alt_title: ヒストリエ, Вехи истории
description:
Historie takes place in ancient Greece and follows the life of Eumenes and his childhood, who would later in his life grow up to be the secretary and general to Alexander the Great.  
  
**IMPORTANT:**   
- Hitoshi Iwaaki frequently redoes the art for volume releases as well as add smaller chapters together.   
- There are no missing chapters on MangaDex, Chapter 108 "Warped" immediately follows Chapter 97 "Disposal of Olympias (2)", this is because chapters were added together in previous volumes, so the chapter count between volume and magazine are out of sync.  
  
---
- **Won the 16th Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize's Grand Prize in 2012 for Manga**  
-  **Won the 14th Japan Media Arts Festival Grand Prize for Manga**
genre: Award Winning, Historical, Action, Adventure, Military, Gore, Drama
author: Iwaaki Hitoshi

title: Kimi ga Utau Kusuri Renka
alt_title: 君が唄う薬恋歌, 詠歌藥戀, 咏歌药恋
description:
A fantasy about a different world that celebrates life and sings of love.

A healer who has the unique ability to cure disease and is said to be the world's last hope. While on an overseas expedition, Laila, a newcomer to the world, meets a beautiful demoness named Lail, who is kept in the royal castle.  The two live out their predetermined destiny, and what develops between these two.
genre: Demons, Romance, Adventure, Medical, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Morino Ion

title: A plot twist is a plot twist plot twist
alt_title: 반전의 반전의 반전, Reversal of the Twist of the Inversion
description:
"I'm pregnant, and I'd like to marry him."
Seoho decides to suddenly arrange a marriage with a man he claims to have had a baby with.
He introduces a man who turns out to be Ko Eunhyun, an alpha and the wealthy son of a famous hotel's chaebol family.
In reality, they had only met yesterday in an one-night stand, 
but who cares about the little details!
genre: Long Strip, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Yuging

title: Midori no Rakuen
alt_title: みどりの楽園, 미도리의 낙원
genre: Oneshot, Fantasy
author: Kugiyama Rui

title: Hibiscus with the Fragrant
alt_title: 木槿与薰風
description:
A red hibiscus tops the fence so tall,
Passersby greet but leave without a call.
This humble flower, unworthy of a vase,
Would lose its glow by morning’s soft embrace.
 
Summer's breezes whisper by,
Hesitant they float and shy.
Carrying forest scents anew,
While hibiscus stays blushing in the dew.

Tomorrow, when the winds return,
The hibiscus longs for sweet scents to burn.
A flower with just beauty's grace,
Lacks a fragrance to embrace.
 
Winds, aware of this design,
Bestow the summer’s scent so fine.
The hibiscus blooms at dawn’s first light,
A truth strange, a wonder in sight.
 
Yet fate cannot be denied,
Blaming winds for love untried.
Without waiting for the day to break,
A silent farewell, hard to forsake.
 
Winds wander, searching for a face,
Is it the one who lost the race?
...

Bach Tu Chi is a young master from the wealthy Bach family. Despite being only 17 years old, he suffers from severe tuberculosis and faces a challenging family situation, having grown up without his father's love and experiencing conflicts with his relatives. Fortunately, he meets Luu Trac Vu, an orphaned boy who roams the streets. Bach Tu Chi takes him in to be his close servant. Since bringing Trac Vu home, Bach Tu Chi has developed a fondness for this servant...
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Boys' Love, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Lynx Paul

title: I Won't Let Mistress Suck My Blood
alt_title: ご主人様には吸わせません！
description: Matilda is looking for a job and a place to stay, and ends up in a large mansion known as the "Haunted House." The owner of the house, August, is a beautiful, soft-spoken woman, and Matilda is attracted to her and decides to work for her as a maid. However, that night, Matilda finds that her master has transformed.
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Vampires, Web Comic
author: Paderapollo

title: Sensei to JK
alt_title: 先生とJK, 老师和JK
description:
Nako is a high school girl who falls in love with her cool and mysterious private teacher.
She loves her teacher and wants to act on her love, but sometimes it doesn't work out...
This is a heart-warming slice of life manga about the daily life of a girl who is in love with her teacher and her mysterious teacher who may or may not be aware of the girl's feelings.
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, Slice of Life
author: Ayase Alice

alt_title: 开局绝色俏师父：系统十斤反骨, Beginning With a Stunning Master: The System Is 10-Catty Reverse Bones
description: Comedy + Transmigration System. My name is Xia Chi. I originally thought that the four female masters would act as my bodyguards on the path to becoming a god, but little did I know, each of them has their own ulterior motives. They actually want me to be their little cotton-padded jacket!?
genre: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

title: Ushiharu
alt_title: ウシハル, Усихару
description: The cow Ushiharu was brought to the middle schooler Kiyoharu's farm. To the people around him, she appears as just a normal cow, but just to him, she appears as a sexy cow-girl…!?
genre: Animals, Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

alt_title: Kasumi Identifies As A Man!, 性自認が男になった霞

author: Zeroyon

title: Whisper Me a Love Song
alt_title: Прошепчу тебе песню о любви, ささやくように恋を唄う, 恋语轻唱, 恰如細語般的戀歌, Whispering You a Love Song
description: Bubbly, energetic first-year high school student Himari falls head over heels for her senpai Yori after hearing her band perform on the first day of school. Himari tells Yori she just loves her, and, to Himari’s surprise, Yori says she loves Himari back! But when Himari realizes that she and her senpai are feeling two different kinds of love, she begins to ask herself what “love” really means…
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Music
author: Takeshima Eku

title: Yoshifumi to Karaage
alt_title: よしふみとからあげ
description: When you return home and you're all alone... In times like these, don't you wish you had a conversation partner? Although it may not satisfy that sentiment, this is an "aquatic slice of life manga" in which the owner Yoshifumi and pet Karaage spends their daily life conversing, fighting, and sometimes showing consideration for each other.
genre: Animals, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Sekiguchi Kanko

title: Smiley
alt_title: スマイリー, Улыбающиеся
description: Yuushi Kamome is a freelance writer who lost his beloved daughter in an accident. In despair, his wife leaves him, and he spends his days like a shell of a man. One day, however, a flyer from a strange religious group, the "Heart Laughing Society," changes his fate. It shows the image of his wife, whom he has lost touch with...This is a story of faith and madness. What is the black darkness of the cult that an evil smile invites? A chilling “new religion” suspense begins!
genre: Thriller, Psychological, Mystery
author: Mitei Hattori

title: Nora and Weeds
alt_title: The Stray and the Weeds, Бродяга и Сорняки, ノラと雑草, 들판과 잡초, 野猫与杂草
description:
The place where I belong is with you.  
A runaway girl who knows no hope. A middle-aged detective who has lost hope. Through their meeting, this hopelessness begins to melt away.  
  
Following the death of his daughter, Assistant Inspector Yamada Hajime has lost hope in everything, and jobs like closing under-aged prostitution rings don't exactly help matters. But there he meets a girl who looks alarmingly like his late daughter. Her name is Umino Shiori, a runaway girl who's desperate enough to sell herself to escape her house but won't tell anyone why.
genre: Drama, Slice of Life, Tragedy
author: Shinzou Keigo

title: Chihiro-san
alt_title: ちひろさん
description: Chihiro-san, a former sex worker uninhibited by the shackles of society and conventional wisdom, is a someone that has life figured out… for the most part. The story follows her life in a small seaside town as customers of the box lunch shop she works at come to her about various concerns weighing on their minds. What's Chihiro's guiding answer to their love, work, family, and self-inflicted troubles?
genre: Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Yasuda Hiroyuki

title: The Reincarnated Noble Who Was Exiled, Uses a Useless Skill to Rule Over Domestic Affairs~ Was Supposed to Run the Territory Freely, but Thanks to the Skill "Gacha", Ended Up Creating the Strongest Territory~
alt_title: 追放された転生貴族、外れスキルで内政無双～気ままに領地運営するはずが、スキル『ガチャ』のお陰で最強領地を作り上げてしまった～, 追放された転生貴族、外れスキルで内政無双
description:
Hiro, who worked for a black company, was reincarnated into another world one day after an accident. He was carefully brought up as a boy of a prestigious noble family, but at his coming of age ceremony, he was given an unidentified "unfamiliar" skill...  Hiro is banished to a remote territory with no citizens by his disappointed family. But along the way, Hiro's mysterious skill... "Gacha" is activated! The situation changes when he draws a legendary rare divine dragon egg.
This skill is the only possibility I have.
Hiro, who has an out-of-the-box "Gacha" skill and is an unfathomably good-natured person, is now being joined by the legendary divine dragons, ancient dragons, cat-eared warriors, and other powerful lords one after the other! Moreover, the effects of the "Gacha" skill make his friends display an unbelievable strength that rivals the military power of a country...?
genre: Reincarnation, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Shirai Shiarata

title: BonHyakuSenSai ~ Jinrui no Jumyou wa Takadaka 100-nen desu ga Kikai no Watashi wa 1000-nen Ikirareru node, Anata ga Inaku natte mo kono Basho de Hitori Ikiteikimasu kara Goshinpainaku ~
alt_title: The Human Lifespan Lasts No Longer Than 100 years, but I, as a Machine, Can Live Upwards of 1000, so Do Not Worry, I will Continue on Alone Here Even After You are Gone, 盆百千栽〜人類の寿命はたかだか100年ですが機械の私は1000年生きられるのであなたが居なくなってもこの場所で一人生きていきますからご心配なく〜
description:
Androids and bonsai trees have one thing in common: they'll both outlast a human's lifespan. Kanna, an android, receives lessons from the "Sensei" who runs the bonsai shop, Kifu Garden. As "Sensei" regaled her with the wonders of bonsai, Kanna would watch with eyes full of curiosity...

A long time has passed since then, and Kanna is the only one remaining at Kifu Garden. Though, a new face seems to have come to visit... A truly human tale of the long lives of bonsai and androids comes together in this brand-new drama.
genre: Sci-Fi, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Kaziya

title: No Guard Wife
alt_title: 防御力ゼロの嫁, No Guard Wife
description:
It is the summary of the story of a bride whose love attack power is 255 but her defensive power is 0.

---

title: Agape Angel Yarinikuru
alt_title: 聖交天使ヤリニクル, Holy Lewd Angel Yarinikuru, Holy Intercourse Angel Yarinikuru
description:
When you turn 16, let's have "agape" together --
Michisada Ichizu, a young man who often dreams of making such a promise with a woman; one day, a silver-haired, red-eyed, "unshod" angel named Yarinikuru suddenly appears.
According to her, she was sent from heaven to have "agape" (sex) with Ichizu!?
genre: Romance, Comedy, Magic, Supernatural
author: Hayashi Yuuichi

title: The Most Heretical Last Boss Queen Who Will Become the Source of Tragedy Will Devote Herself for the Sake of the People. ~To the Savior~
alt_title: 悲劇の元凶となる最強外道ラスボス女王は民の為に尽くします。～To the Savior～
description:
At the age of eight, I realised I had reincarnated as the nefarious last boss of an otome game, Queen Pride. Her fighting strength is high because she’s the last boss who will fight with the capture target, and her superior cunning wits make her the most powerful first princess in a matriarchal country. Since she brings misfortune to all that surrounds her, what awaits is a future of ruination! …really, wouldn’t it be better if I died?

In this case, I’ll avoid destruction from the capture target and freely use my authority and cheat abilities to save everyone!

---

**Note: This manga is continuation of the canceled manga, be sure to read that one first (check the related tab)**
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Reverse Harem, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
author: Tenichi

alt_title: Jobless Reincarnation - I Will Go All Out When I'm Transported to Another World, Jobless Reincarnation - It Will be All Out if I Go to Another World, Mr. No-Job's New Life - If I Go to a Parallel World, Then I'll Get Serious, Mushoku Tensei: If I Get to a Parallel Universe I'll Bring Out my True Effort, Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation, Реинкарнация безработного ~История о приключениях в другом мире~, Реинкарнация безработного: Попав в другой мир, я стану сёръёзнее, 无职转生~在异世界认真地活下去~, 無職転生 〜異世界行ったら本気だす〜, 무직전생 〜다른 세계 가면 진심 낸다〜, 無職轉生~在異世界認真地活下去~, Реинкарнация безработного: Я серьёзно постараюсь, если отправлюсь в другой мир
description: A 34-year-old NEET gets killed in a traffic accident and finds himself in a world of magic. Rather than waking up as a full-grown mage, he gets reincarnated as a newborn baby, retaining the memories of his past life. Before he can even properly move his body, he resolves to never make the same mistakes he made in his first life ever again and instead live a life with no regrets with the new one that was given to him. Because he has the knowledge of a middle-aged man, by the age of two, he has already become a prodigy and possesses power unthinkable for anyone his age and even older. Thus begins the chronicles of Rudeus Greyrat, son of swordsman Paul and healer Zenith, as he enters a new world to become the strongest mage known to man, with powers rivaling even the gods themselves.
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Rifujin na Magonote

title: No Guns Life
alt_title: Жизнь без оружия, ノー・ガンズ・ライフ
description: After the war, there are many "Extends" in the city, people whose bodies were modified to make them into dangerous weapons. Inui Juuzou is one of them, and he has no memories of his life and body before his head was transformed into a gun. Strangely enough, his head-gun is designed so that only someone behind him can pull the trigger. Juuzou makes a living by taking on cases involving Extends in the city, and he is assisted by Mary, an intelligent young woman that he has taken under his protection.
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Martial Arts, Military, Gore, Drama, Mystery
author: Karasuma Tasuku

title: Legend of Dragon Mates
alt_title: Companion of LOONG Girl, Era of the Dragonbound, Partner With a Dragon Girl, The Guardian's Dragon, 龙俦纪, 수호룡기, Dragon Companion Epoch, Era of the Dragonbound
description: The dragon girl met her dragon hunter when her hometown was consumed by flames. The hunter protected her by forming the Partner Alliance-a sacred contract bonding the destined two together-and dragged her out of the sea of fire. Together, they set out seeking revenge. Little did they know that…by taming her, he was also tamed by her.
genre: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Ileguo

title: Bartender
alt_title: Бармен, バーテンダー, 王牌酒保, 调酒师, 바텐더, Bartender Glass of God
description:
Genius bartender Ryu Sasakura makes the most incredible cocktails anyone has ever tasted. Seeking his "Glass of God", individuals from all different walks of life visit his bar. 
With both a compassionate ear and a godly drink, Ryu helps people with their problems.

title: The 8th Failed Love
alt_title: 8번째 망한 연애
description:
On one ordinary night, a relationship between the two began without much thought. For Hoyeon, that's just how it was with Soobin. Despite this, as they spent more time together, he found himself growing more sincere in their relationship. But then, Soobin said to him:

"Hyung, let's break up."

"Alright, do what you want. No plans on giving me a reason this time, either?"

This was Soobin's 7th time breaking up with him without a reason. Every other time they had met up again within a week, so Hoyeon didn't expect any different this time... But it's been two weeks and Soobin still hasn't called!! Something felt wrong.

Looking back, Hoyeon's biggest mistake was that he didn't ask the reason why they had broken up the first time.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life
author: 손도

title: Assassin & Cinderella
alt_title: Assassin × Cinderella, アサシン＆シンデレラ, 刺客与灰姑娘, Ассасин & Золушка, Assassin and Cinderella
description: Neneko is spying on a rival organization's assassin, but her true identity is revealed, and the condition for her safety is "marriage"!? The world's sweetest and most dangerous «Contract Marriage» begins!!
genre: Action, Romance, Crime, Mafia, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Natsuno Yuzo

title: Doumo, Suki na hito ni Horegusuri wo Iraisareta Majo desu
alt_title: どうも、好きな人に惚れ薬を依頼された魔女です。, Hello, I Am a Witch, and My Crush Wants Me to Make a Love Potion!, I'm a Witch Whose Crush Requested a Love Potion., 你好、我是受心上人所托来做恋爱药的魔女, Hi, I'm a Witch, and My Crush Wants Me to Make a Love Potion
description:
"I want you to make me a love potion."

The “Witch of the Lake” had her heart broken when the object of her one-sided affection requested that she make him a love potion.

If that’s the case, then I wish to spend more time with him, even if it’s just up until the preparations for the love potion are complete. That was what I had told myself, and yet…

The romantic tale of a reclusive witch and a solemn knight that begins from unrequited love.

---

[Official English Light Novel](http://www.crossinfworld.com/news-articles/New-Release-Hello-I-am-a-Witch-and-my-Crush-Wants-me-to-Make-a-Love-Potion.html)
genre: Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Eiko Mutsuhana

title: Wahhaman
alt_title: ワッハマン, 哇哈超人
description: Wahhaman is a special robot soldier built ten thousand years ago by the Atlanteans. Found and dug up in present-day Toukyou, he doesn't remember anything, due to a nasty knock to the head he received at some point.
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Mecha, Superhero, Slice of Life
author: Asari Yoshitoo

title: Youkoso Isekai e, dewa Shinde Kudasai
alt_title: ようこそ異世界へ、では死んでください, Welcome to Another World, Now then, Please Die
description:
"You all will not be heroes. You'll be Living Sacrifices, will you not?"

Atsuto thought that by going to another world his unremarkable life would change and he would be granted all sorts of powers. However, in that other world he found nothing but despair.

Atsuto is an ordinary and unpopular high school student with no remarkable talents or romantic success. One day, his school is enveloped in light, and he is suddenly transported to another world called Tilunog.

Some students who believe they can become heroes with cheat skills are excited about the transfer to the otherworld. However, a beautiful woman from Tilunog named Philia cruelly informs them that they were summoned to be sacrificed, and that they are destined to be killed.

Thus begins a storm of massacre and humiliation by demons, called the "Chaos Banquet" begins! Can Atsuto and his friends survive in this world of despair?
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Survival, Martial Arts, Magical Girls, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Horror, Fantasy, Mystery
author: Mizushiro Mizuki

title: Our Classmate Sookgyung
alt_title: 우리반 숙경이, Our Classmate Sook Kyung
description: The tale of Sookgyung, a ghost no one pays attention to, who's been sitting in school for the last twenty-seven years.
genre: Thriller, Ghosts, Long Strip, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Haemil

title: Winning Pass
alt_title: ウイニング パス
description: Haruto Ichinose has an older brother, Shori Ichinose, who has excellent grades, is a basketball prodigy, and is very popular in school. Although he says he hates basketball, he trains alone and challenges his brother, only to be beaten back. On the other hand, his older brother Shori seems to recognize his "talent" more than anyone else, but who is he really...?
genre: Comedy, Sports, School Life
author: Sakamoto Tatsuya

title: Shuumatsu Train Doko e Iku?
alt_title: 終末トレインどこへいく？, 종말 트레인은 어디로 향하나?, Train to the End of World
genre: Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: Torimura

title: Gal to Iinchou ga Guuzen Saikai suru Hanashi
alt_title: ギャルと委員長が偶然再会する話, A Story about a Gal and a Committee Chairwoman Who Meet Again by Coincidence
description: After finishing her errands, Marina heads for the bus stop on her way home. However, there she runs into the drunken former committee chairwoman from her high school days. She thinks she doesn't remember her, but while she's taking care of her, she says to her, "You used to avoid me...," which is very meaningful to her...?
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Takuma Miyuu

title: Yoru no Himeboku
alt_title: 夜の姫僕, The Princess Me of the Night
description:
Shoto is a 20-year-old part-time worker struggling with his first love (rejected but still friends) with his high school best friend. Suddenly one day he was unemployed because the restaurant he worked part-time at went bankrupt, and at the same time he discovered there was something floating under his butt. He decided to go to a dermatologist for a check-up when he met Hizuki, a dermatologist - and after an appointment with this doctor, he discovered that the doctor was also in an unrequited love like him.

Both of them had unrequited love so they decided to stay together temporarily to "fill the void in their hearts, bodies and wallets" but gradually they developed feelings again.!?
genre: Romance, Boys' Love
author: Masaki Souko

title: Misupuri!
alt_title: Miss Princess, Misu Puri!, Misu-Puri!, ミスプリ!, 公主小姐
description: In the world of the high society , it is expected that each member of every family has their own personal butler. Himeoka Kokoro is a natural tomboy with a knack for sticking her head into trouble. Kokoro hopes to be able to hire a butler for herself, but only temporarily so she can partake in the nationwide "Miss Princess" model search. She is determined to win the competition because of a promise she made but runs into problems on the way. She incidentally saves an old lady who turns out to be the President of Butler, the most prestigious butler agency in Japan. The old lady decided to help her with the model search & Kokoro is suddenly faced with four good looking butlers to help her on the way to winning the title "Miss Princess".
genre: Romance, Reverse Harem
author: Seizuki Madoka

title: Cardfight!! Vanguard YouthQuake
alt_title: Vanguard YouthQuake
description:
"I Think it's time for me to stop...playing Vanguard." "You've Got to Grow out of this Kid's Game."
Sentatsu Meguru, a first-year high school student, was wondering whether or not to continue playing Vanguard when his childhood friends and classmates are starting to quit.
One day, the master of his favorite café takes him to a fight with his grandfather,Kuranaga Sanzou.
Through the fight, Sanzou asks him a question, which leads him to look into his own mind, and is naturally led to the answer.
"I love it so much, there's no way I can stop!"
Then, he awoke to a strange power that allowed him to see the unit and the light that was connected to it on the board.
Quake your Soul!! A new story that Leads you to Vanguard!
genre: Traditional Games, Action, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Itou Akira

title: Nichiasa Suki no Otaku ga Akuyaku Seito ni Tenseishita Kekka, Hametsu Flag ga Houkaishiteiku Ken ni Tsuite
alt_title: ニチアサ好きのオタクが悪役生徒に転生した結果、破滅フラグが崩壊していく件について, Regarding the Destruction of the Destruction Flag as a Result of a Nichiasa-Loving Otaku Being Reincarnated as a Villainous Student.
description:
Yugo Kurei is a high school student that loves tokusatsu hero shows. One day, he loses his life protecting a child from a street slasher, but he is reincarnated in another world as Yugo Clay, a character from a certain game. However, Yugo is the most disliked person in the school and is destined to die tragically... He was reincarnated as a villain, but with the new power of magic in his hands, he aims to become a hero!

"In this world, I can become the strongest hero!" A hero story of a tokusatsu otaku who rises from the bottom while crushing his doom flags!
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Superhero, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Karasuma Ei (烏丸英)

title: Hana-Uta Memoir
alt_title: 花唄メモワール, 朝花夕歌
description: Ume Sasaki, a senior in high school, is helping out at her great-grandmother's ryokan during this summer vacation. She goes to the ryokan in hopes of getting some hints about her future...? This is the brightest and most dazzling "memory (memoir)" of the girls.
genre: Time Travel, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery
author: Ichinose Kei

title: Ani no Inu Ma ni Ani no Kanojo ga Ie ni Kita.
alt_title: 兄の居ぬ間に兄の彼女が家に来た。, While My Brother Was Away, His Girlfriend Came to My House., My Brother's Girlfriend Came over to Our House While He Was Away., La novia de mi hermano vino a la casa mientras él no estaba.
description: Un hermano menor espera el regreso de su hermano mayor en casa de sus padres con la novia de este último, a quien conoció por primera vez. Pero algo anda mal con ella... ¿está sudando y respirando con dificultad...? La razón es...
genre: Oneshot, Drama
author: Nejiga Nameta

title: Senpai, Chotto ii Desu ka?
alt_title: 先輩、ちょっといいですか?, Senpai, Can I Have a Moment?
description: A super-sheltered girl, Shiranui Rei, has a lot of things she doesn’t know! She asks her questions to her senior, who is also a library committee member. But sometimes, her questions are hard to answer…!?
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Kuromiya Sakana

title: Get Schooled
alt_title: Chamgyoyuk, The Real Lesson, 참교육, True Education
description:
Na Hwa-Jin’s teaching techniques are pretty violent for someone who works in the Ministry of Education.

That being said, when punishments don't seem to work on even the worst of school bullies, there is no better man for the job.

Sometimes you can’t get a good education until those bullies are taught a lesson.


---
