title: Omen O Tsukeru
alt_title: Putting on a Mask, お面を付ける
description:
"Do not take your mask off, this is not your world."  
"Once this flower withers, you will be able to go back."  
  
This is the yokai festival where you mustn't take off your mask.  
  
Three tangentially related short stories that can be read independent of each other.
genre: Monsters, Demons, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Kawa

title: Kujibiki Tokushou Musou Harem-ken
alt_title: 777 Power Harem, Aligned Seven of Three Stars, Grand Prize: Unrivalled Harem Ticket, Главный приз лотереи: Несравненный гарем, くじ引き特賞：無双ハーレム権, 抽獎特獎：無雙後宮權
description:
I drew a lottery at the Shopping District and won the privilege to go to another world. After drawing a lot of balls, unexpectedly I got a cheat-like skill. Silencing those who are noisy and getting hold of all the things that I want. I will satisfy all my desires.  


---
genre: Loli, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Miki Nazuna

title: Surviving With an SSS-Rank Inventory
alt_title: SSS급 창고 캐릭터로 살아남기, SSSgeub Chang-go Kaeligteolo Sal-anamgi
description:
‘One day, I became a ‘Storage Character’ within a game!’

A no-life gamer with seven max-level characters is stuck within the highest-difficulty Virtual Reality game, .

Unfortunately for him, he just had to get stuck when he was on his level 10 ‘Storage Character’.

It might be a shabby start to his new life, but at least he can take comfort in his abundance of items, right?
genre: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Glossam

title: Seoul Station Necromancer
alt_title: 서울역 네크로맨서, Seoul Station’s Necromancer, Некромант города Сеул
description:
[You have entered the dungeon at Gwachun Station’s 1st Exit.]

After years of fighting for survival on planet Alphen, Kang Woojin had become a fearsome necromancer and ruler of his own territory. But now that he’s finally found a way back to Earth, he’s nothing more than a low-level player clearing dungeons for cash. Soon enough, though, Woojin’s undeniable skills have major guilds vying for his attention. And just in time, because with Woojin’s old enemy threatening invasion, those skills might be the only thing standing between humanity and destruction!
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: 진설우

title: A Boy Who Was Just a Friend for Ten Years Confessed Love to Me
alt_title: 10年間友達だと思ってた男の子に告白されるお話, A Story About Being Confessed To By A Boy Whom I'd Only Considered A Friend For 10 Years, A boy who was just a friend for ten years confessed love to me
description:
The Beginning of… love!? Straightforward and pure high school love!

Rintarou, the boy who've been friends with since we were small. Large, grim and popular. He turned down a girl again… What a waste!

"No, because I love you."

…Huh? What!? That's the first time I've heard about this!!! W-w-w-why me-

Damn…!!!
I can't believe he would confess to me. I feel like I lost and it's frustrating. Now that it's come to this, I'll test him and see if he's good enough to be my boyfriend!!

A straightforward and pure high school love, begins!!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life
author: Marusen

title: Revenge of the Baskerville Bloodhound
alt_title: 철혈검가 사냥개의 회귀, Cheolhyeolgeomga Sanyanggaeui Hoegwi, Revenge of the Sword Clan's Hound, 回帰した鉄血の猟犬, 铁血剑家猎犬的回归, Revenge of the Iron-Blooded Sword Hound, La Venganza del Sabueso de Sangre de Hierro
description:
Raised to kill like a pack of loyal hounds, the Baskerville children took countless lives as a band of fearsome assassins.

Despite being the shunned illegitimate son of the brood, Vikir served his family faithfully, only to meet his untimely demise at his father’s hands. But when he is inexplicably reborn with a second chance at life, Vikir, armed with the memories and knowledge of his past, swears to rise above the pack and take his revenge.

This time, he's ready to bite the hand that feeds.
genre: Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Legobalbasseo

title: My Cute Little Kitten
alt_title: 私の可愛い子猫ちゃん
description: A story of two close friends living together.
genre: Animals, Romance, Girls' Love, Slice of Life
author: Morinaga Milk

title: Lily of the Valley
alt_title: 릴리 오브 더 밸리
description:
Because of her father's debt, 'Lily' lives in the mansion of her father's creditor, 'Rose'. At the mansion where Lily goes with Anna, the only maid she relies on and loves, she meets the attractive Rose...


[NTR Warning]
genre: Historical, Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Reverse Harem, Girls' Love, Harem, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: RANGRARI

title: Mitsuba  Monogatari
alt_title: みつばものがたり 呪いの少女と死の輪舞《ロンド》, Mitsuba's Stories, Mitsuba's Stories - The Cursed Girl and the Circle-Dance of Death (Rondo)
description:
This world revolves around me.

While sleeping in a "deathly" boring dark world, Mitsuba woke up from a long sleep with a mysterious all-powerful feeling, the girl was destined to die, but the magic that was poured into her for 10 years brought the power of a "curse" that should not exist in this world.

Her stepmother, fearing Mitsuba's "death," takes away her aristocratic nature and she is  enrolled n a military academy. However, this was only the beginning of Mitsuba's use of the "curse" to pursue her own path.

The powerful "curse" that resides in a small girl causes a unique tale of otherworldly devastation!
genre: Magic, Military, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Nanasawa Matari

title: After Ten Millennia in Hell
alt_title: 만 년 만에 귀환한 플레이어, Man Nyeon Mane Gwihwanhan Player, Игрок, который вернулся спустя 10 000 лет, Player Who Returned 10,000 Years Later, 만 년 만 에 귀환 한 플레이어, Jugador que regresó 10.000 años después
description:
Oh Kangwoo the Demon King has had it with ruling over Hell and wants to return to Earth. 

But when he finally gets there, not only are his powers sealed, but the Earth he once knew has turned into an MMORPG free-for-all. 

Dimensional gates have appeared all over the world, and "players" enter them to make a living by hunting monsters. If Kangwoo wants to survive in this dangerous game, he's going to have to level up, and fast. 

But for this demon king, hell on earth might be worse than Hell itself!
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Maeng JuKyung (맹주경)

title: Pick Me Up
alt_title: Pick Me Up, Infinite Gacha, 픽 미 업!, Pick Me Up!, PICK ME UP～低レア★英雄の成り上がり～, ピックミーアップ！低レア英雄の成り上がり, Gacha infinito
description:
1-Star heroes are just fodder for learning a boss' attack patterns.

That was Seojin Han's philosophy when playing the notoriously difficult game Pick Me Up. But after being transported into the game as one of those 1-star heroes, he's got no choice but to rise in rank and defeat the player controlling him and his party.

Can a gacha game character hope to defeat a player akin to being his god?
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: U-Ne Cho (조우네)

title: Ougo Mitsunaga wa Namagoroshi ga Tsurai
alt_title: Mitsunaga Ougo Is Trying to Control Himself, 淡河実永は生殺しがつらい
description:
"When we turn 18…" In order to fulfill his cute girlfriend Karen's wish (?!), Mitsunaga has been holding back a lot. He may be a quiet, hard-headed guy, but he has as much sexual desire as anyone else and was even looking forward to it a little bit. However, on the anniversary day, something terrible happens?! He can't touch her because she's precious to him, but he wants to touch her more because he loves her… A pure love story about the troubles of a boy of age!  
This is the sequel to "Karen Ichijou Tempts Him."
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life
author: Fujitani Youko

title: Mazin Saga
alt_title: MazinSaga, マジンサーガ
description:
MazinSaga is a manga written and produced by Go Nagai between 1990 and 1998; currently incomplete and up to the sixth volume, it's the summa of Nagai's works, for the complexity of the plot and the treated thematic content.  
Mazinsaga tells the story of the young Koji Kabuto, university student who finds himself having to collect the fruit of the researches of his father, physicist of world-wide reputation who died in mysterious circumstances.  
The boy is thus given a powerful artifact, Mazinger Z, the Armor of God.
genre: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Mecha, Office Workers, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Military, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Nagai Go

title: Seiyuu Radio no Ura Omote
alt_title: 声優ラジオのウラオモテ, The Two Sides of Seiyuu Radio
description: Yugure Yuhi and Utatane Yasumi, two high schooler voice actresses who just happened to attend the same school and coincidentally got placed into the same class, are the two hosts of a radio weekly program. As fellow classmates and voice actresses, they show all the listeners their great friendship! At least, on the surface. In reality, the quiet girl Chika and the gyaru Yumiko are complete opposites. And they absolutely cannot stand each other. Off air, chaos and insults erupt. On air, they're the best of friends. Just where will this tumultuous relationship lead them?
genre: Award Winning, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Gyaru
author: Nigatsu Kou

title: Past Life Returner
alt_title: Past Life Regressor (2022), 전생자 (2022), Jeongsaengja (2022)
description:
Would you like to reverse time?]
[All your abilities will be reset.]
[Please choose the date.]

“February 28th, 1985. The day I was born.”

Financial power. I will gather all the fortune of the world—
and create a monopoly. I will monopolize all the dungeons of the world.

I will do this now, while the world is still peaceful...
before it all begins.

**Original Webtoon:**
[Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A0%84%EC%83%9D%EC%9E%90/3130), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60754076) 

**Official Translations:**
[Simplified Chinese](https://pdt.tencentac.com/?adtag=appshare.ios.detail%26QQ%26392&contentId=392&platform=IA), [Japanese](https://piccoma.com/web/product/134347)
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: NFToon (JANG)

title: Max Talent Player
alt_title: Talent Management Player, A Talented Player, 재능만렙 플레이어, Jaeneungmallep Peulleieo
description:
I accepted the test results.

[Talentless]

Today, the word “talentless” came to mind. It's my fault, my lack of effort, my lack of talent, or both, or neither. Is it my fault for living like this, or is it society's?

A day passed. I don't know why, but I went back 10 years.

...This is very easy. Is it really true that I had no talent?
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Hyomak

title: Even If I Were to Die, I Wouldn't Choose You
alt_title: 君だけは死んでもごめん
description:
The latest work from the author of "Drag Queen and Snow White" & "Coffee Shop Anemone", Azusa Kina.  
  
The admirable middle-school girl gifted with both beauty and intelligence, Yagami Mitsuko, has a secret.  
  
And that is, being an incredibly enthusiastic fan of her classmate Souichirou.  
  
From his “good morning” until “good night”, she closely watches him wherever he goes. His favorite food, his body weight & height, his bedtime and school courses, even the TV shows he watches, she is undoubtedly a fan who knows everything about him…. Or rather, she has become his stalker completely…  
  
However, a boy who likes her chases her with the same type of infatuation appeared……!?  
  
Stalker boy x Stalker girl, an extreme social ethics rom-com!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life
author: Azusa Kina

title: Becoming a Magic School Mage
alt_title: Surviving as a Mage in a Magic Academy, How to Live as a Magic School Wizard, Life of a Magic Academy Mage, 마법학교 마법사로 살아가는 법, 魔法學校 魔法師로 살아가는 法, Magic Academy Survival Guide, La vida de un mago de la academia de magia
description:
Han Lee, a graduate student, was born as the youngest member of a famous magic family in another world.

He vowed never to go to the place where the word 'school' was written.

The place where the resolution was headed to the colorless was the notorious magic school 'Einroguard'.

Self-sufficiency is the default, monster appearance is an option, and professors are all the same!

The salty school life that I have never seen before begins.

"Can I... graduate safely?"
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Writing Machine (글쓰는기계)

title: Kaishin no Ichigeki!
alt_title: Critical Hit!, かいしんのいちげき！
description:
Shino Chigasaki is a high school girl who dreams of experiencing a romance likes those in shoujo manga. On the day of her high school entrance ceremony, she drops her commuter pass and the guy who picks it up bears a striking resemblance to the handsome boy in her dream…! Shino has been shot through the chest with Ichinose-kun's little gesture!? The comic version of "Kaishin no Ichigeki," a song written by Amatsuki, a popular singer.   
  
Manga adaptation of the music video of the same name by Amatsuki.  
  
**Links:**  
- [Amatsuki ver.](https://youtu.be/Q7AVA1e0qN4)  
- [Hatsune Miku ver.](https://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm33546188)
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Narumiya Kei

title: Dr. Choi Giseok Levels Up
alt_title: Level Up Doctor Choi Ki-seok, Повышение уровня Доктор Чхве Ки Сок, Level Up Doctor Choi Kiseok, 레벨업 닥터 최기석, Level-Up Doctor
description:
Growing up as an orphan, Jeong He-Jin didn’t open his heart to anyone.

After giving his all to become a cardiothoracic surgeon, he got into an unfortunate accident,
after which he woke up not as ‘Jeon He-Jin’ but as ‘Choi GiSeok’.
And on top of that, he has to <Level Up> using his skills…?

The accident changed his fate drastically…
Can he become ‘the Greatest Cardiothoracic Surgeon’ as ‘Choi GiSeok’?
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Drama, Medical, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Studio Jilpung (스튜디오 질풍)

title: It’s Time to Change the Genre
alt_title: 장르를 바꿔보도록 하겠습니다, The Villainess Flips the Script!, I Will Change the Genre, ジャンル、変えさせて頂きます！, I Will Make an Effort to Change the Genre, Jangreureul Bakkwobodorok Hagessseupnida
description:
I reincarnated into my favorite genre for novels.

I became the villainous aunt who mistreats the young protagonist. I felt sorry for my nephew who would grow up as the protagonist in a revengeful plot, so I’ll try my best to take care of my nephew until his uncle shows up and takes him as per the original plot.

But then…

“M-Mom!”

I’ve become his mother all of a sudden?

“I don’t know your circumstances, but how could I bear to separate a mother from her son? Lady, come with us to Winterwald.”

Hey, Kim Luca! How are you going to fix this misunderstanding?

---

title: Scratch
alt_title: 스크래치
description: "Scratch syndrome is a disease that causes bodily wounds when your mind is afflicted. A disease where you bleed when you're emotionally hurt by someone you love. A rare disease that plagues 0.00001% of the world's population."
genre: Psychological, Boys' Love, Drama
author: Majayong (마자영)

title: Level Up with the Gods
alt_title: 신과 함께 레벨업, Leveling Up With the Gods, Singwa Hamkke Level Up, Leveling With the Gods, 神と共にレベルアップ, 与神一同升级, Поднятие уровня с богами
description:
“Maybe Inner Gods can never defeat Outer Gods…” so thought Yuwon Kim, a plucky, high-ranking warrior, after a bitter defeat.

But Yuwon is too tenacious to give up. His loss becomes the dawn of a new journey as a returnee. With renewed determination, Yuwon starts back from where he began, smashing monster after monster and relearning his skills before taking on the Tower once again.

But can he fight his way through the tutorials and level up once more, or will his conquest crumble before him?

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xhObyLPUq6w)

title: Skill Master Levels Up
alt_title: 스킬빨로 레벨업, Leveling Up With Skills, Seukilbballo Lebeloep, Ascension Through Skills, Level Up With Skills, Subiendo de nivel con las mejores habilidades
description:
In the year 2020, humanity faces a crisis as Earth is attacked by unidentified monsters. Players prepare for the attack by challenging the Labyrinth that appeared. They can choose four options:

Easy Mode, where anyone can survive; Normal Mode, where you must work to survive; Hard Mode, where only 1% could survive; and Solo Mode, the harshest difficulty.

Kang TaeSan, the strongest Easy Mode player cleared the Labyrinth using an unconventional approach and acquired skills others could not: [ Addition, Multiplication, Attack Nullification, Ultimate Judgement...].

But because he chose Easy Mode, his power was lacking. Unable to prevent the extinction of humanity, he lay dying. A miraculous chance appears.

"This time I'll definitely become stronger."

Challenging the Labyrinth again, this is Skill-based Player Kang TaeSan's Solo Mode Attack Record!
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Palan Yeong

title: Idol Is a God
alt_title: Becoming a God by Being the Center of Attention, C位成神, The Idol Is a god
description: With the constant development of technology on Earth, people no longer need to worship the weather gods. Because of this, the rain god, Yushi’s, power starts disappearing. He decides to venture onto Earth under the name “Shiyu” in order to restore his power. Soon scouted by an evil boss into a near-bankrupt entertainment company. Shiyu is sent to participate in the show “I am an idol.” With absolutely zero common sense he somehow still manages to gain popularity and debut in the group SWEN alongside three other members. Overtime, Shiyu comes to discover that his groupmate, Yang Dongjun, and Zhong Yun were also gods who came to the world to work and earn faith…
genre: Long Strip, Comedy, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Jihuo Culture (籍火文化)

title: Nengara Nenbyaku Ansatsu Renka
alt_title: 年年百暗殺恋歌, ねんがらねんびゃくあんさつれんか, All Year Round, Assassination Love Song
description: The Haiboshi family's line of work is assassination. Takatori, their princess, picks up a boy named Raika who swore to dedicate everything.
genre: Historical, Action, Romance, Comedy, Drama
author: Kusakawa Nari

title: Blacksmith Zig
alt_title: 대장장이 지그, Legendary Blacksmith's Vengeance, Daejangjangi Jigeu
description:
‘Berserker Bartz’, a legendary solo player of Arpedia Online, had his character hacked and deleted one day.

"Damn it. No way I'm giving up! I don't know who you are, but I'm going to find you and crush you!"

Having lost the character he put his all into, Kang YuHan creates 'Zigg', a blacksmith with the sole mission of finding the hacker!

Can YuHan find the hacker who deleted Bartz?
Follow Zigg's action-packed adventure to become the greatest blacksmith!
genre: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Next Level Studio
